title: Help Desk Software Done Right
overall_text: We were looking for an easy to use yet feature rich help desk platform to help manage our customer service requests when I stumbled upon Zoho Desk. I have been evaluating the software for a little over a week and have been thoroughly impressed both with the ease of use and the overall depth of features this product offers for a reasonable price. The product offers everything from email integration to custom forms for ticket creation and support for SLA's and workflow functionality for ticket management. I have not completed my full review but rightnow I am suitably impressed enough to move forward with a full scale trial with several of our key clients.
pros_text: Zoho Desk is well thought out feature rich system.
cons_text: Initial setup can take a while due to the amount of features and configuration option available.

title: A flawless ticketing system that has little to no learning curve
overall_text: We need a ticketing system that tracks orders received on our eCommerce platform, Zoho desk fits the requirement perfectly
pros_text: Ease of use, the ticketing system and the channels to which ticketing can be integrated with - spanning from email to chat to social networks
cons_text: You mentioned a Free version and then when we sign up it is automatically tied to a paid version with a trial period - please fix this pricing glitch. Well I could be wrong, but I am fairly certain I selected the free version.

title: Zoho Desk is a great tool for managing support

cons_text: Initially it was the layout but Zoho Desk's layout was recently revamped and is much better. It provides a better flow throughout the application.

pros_text: Simplicity and ease of use for the entire team. We had everyone set up and using the software in less than 24 hours, and in less than 48 hours it was making a very real, measurable difference to our customer service support standard.

title: Fantastic for Ticket Management
overall_text: Extremely positive. One of the best ticket management systems I have used. It is intuitive, links to other software's, and has kept up to date with new technology.
pros_text: Has a much more updated and current user interface than other ticketing systems I have used. Very convenient how the time tracking feature can be linked to automatically track hours in a company's HRM software as well.
cons_text: The attachment button in emails is located in a separate corner of the screen than any other formatting things for the emails, which is slightly confusing to find.

title: ZOHO Desk has everything I need to get started.It's pretty affordable and is very well thought out
overall_text: I was able to get my small business started and compete without making a major upfront investment.It definitely lowers the barriers to entry in certain marketplaces.It's well designed and affordable.
pros_text: I like that it's fully integrated with the ZOHO ecosystem so as I grow and my needs grow I can grow with this.I can do just about everything I need to do to get my business off the ground right off the bat with minimal investment and learning curve.I can compete with much bigger entities.
cons_text: I'd like to be able to allow users to be able to make some choices in the cart.I may yet be able to do this I am just not sure how.

title: Good productivity tool
overall_text: Pros:Zoho is a great productivity tool, it helps you keep organized. You can see all your tasks int he main dashboard, check the ones that are late and prioritize the most important ones. I really like the thread view, where I usually take notes to myself so I have a thread of what was going on on the project.
pros_text: Cons:Something that could be improved is the image viewing. When you attach an image to the task thread and click on it after saving, it opens in full screen. I don't need to see this image so big! It would be nice to have it responsive to the size of the window.

title: Finally found the software for our team after searching for ages!
overall_text: This was the first software help desk solution that we didn't have to spend a long period of time configuring to get it working how we needed it to. Out of other options we had tried at the time when undertaking our research, most had to have scripted or difficult configs to make it our go to platform.
pros_text: Really easy to use and get up and running quickly.Covers all the bases.Strong case management.The UI is simple to work with but doesn't sacrifice functionality to achieve this.
cons_text: If i had one minor complaint it's that there doesn't appear to be an easy way to change the layout/colours/fonts etc. Not that it's a major issue but would be nice.

title: Great tool for a growing business

pros_text: advanced configurations are available, and amazing features.I like specifically the email piping and custom domain.
cons_text: little hard to get around, so takes a second or two to get it all set up.Otherwise not a big deal.

Also when we get any request from Support team they dont answer this is 'impossible' they are saying we can make this everytime :) so Thank you Zoho

title: good interface and functionality, good support team
overall_text: Pros:- Custom fields for the Companyes, Contacts, Tickets (like in Kayako, Zendesk. in JitBit only for tickets)- The task block (in addition to the tickets)- Manage ticket view, change order of fields (including custom fields) on the ticket form- The task block (for internal task)- Attachments in the Company- 10 agents for free (rich functionality s :(
pros_text: Cons:- there is no table view for tickats, can't manage fields to see in the tickets list- Incomplete localization in the Russian language- You can not edit a ticket without opening it

title: Horrible/Absentee Customer Support
overall_text: We have been using ZOHO CRM for years and now wanted to expand usage by signing up for Desk and analytics as well. The DESK team took 1.5 weeks to actually book a call. They would take more than a day to respond to email, never had any booking calendar for the customer to pick time from, scheduling nightmare and then they WENT AWOL ON NOT ONE BUT TWO SCHEDULED MEETINGS!We gave them them a second chance and they still didn't show up. How unprofessional can you be! Wasted so much of our time!
pros_text: The reporting around time spent on each customer and each ticket along with insight into agent productivity
cons_text: The workflow engine was not easy to figure out

title: Great product, support is a bit lacking
overall_text: Pros:The software is very easy to use, and works great for our team. It's also quite cost-effective, so it's an ideal solution for smaller companies or those just jumping into the help desk / IT support waters.
pros_text: Cons:When there's a problem, there's definitely a problem.Questions in the support forums often go unanswered... for YEARS.Or, someone will say a service is coming soon, and the next update is 2-3 years later with someone asking where it is.The lack of support is the only downside, though, so if you can figure out the software yourself, it's a winner!

title: Zoho Desk: una solución para la gestión y resolución de consultas y problemas de clientes.
overall_text: Pese a tener ciertas limitaciones, la herramienta ofrece una amplia gama de funcionalidades y puede llegar a ser útil para pequeñas y medianas empresas que necesiten gestionar el servicio al cliente.
pros_text: Permite a empresas gestionar y resolver de manera efectiva consultas de clientes, ofreciendo una amplia gama de herramientas para la gestión de solicitudes integrándose con otras herramientas disponibles en el mercado.
cons_text: Si anteriormente se trabajó con otras herramientas, el adaptarse puede ser difícil para ciertos usuarios. Además , la aplicación no puede ser adaptada para empresas que requieren un alto nivel de seguridad y privacidad, debido que guardan los datos en la nube.

title: Still early days but has been good so far. Our clients are certainly enjoying the improved service
overall_text: Pros:We'd been looking for a centralised way of managing our support tickets with the main caveat being integration with a task management platform.We moved to Zoho Projects/Zoho Desk to achieve this and are very happy with the experience so far.
pros_text: Cons:While not really a criticism of Zoho Desk itself, the learning curve is certainly challenging to get used to.

title: Zero customer support!
overall_text: In concept ZOHO's invoicing and contact database sound good. Problem with importing from excel on quickbooks inventory and contacts. Three days and despite calls and emails..no return response except for an autoresponder saying thank you for starting your trail and if you have any questions call us. Right! What the heck do you think we've been trying to do. We finally get on a call from somewhere like India support and the call is dropped, no resolution, no call back. We are dropped and totally in the dark. To make matters worse, i tried to log into our account from my lap top and guess what...all the data I MANUALLY entered was gone! Now that doesnt make me feel good about ZOHO PERIOD!
pros_text: Looks good on paper.
cons_text: There is NO customer support. You'd think during your trial period they would be 'on it' to help. Nope, you are totally on your own and when you loose our data, well ...you can pray and count to 10 and find another online billing company to try.

title: Customer relationship management software with lot of drawbacks.
overall_text: Pros:Enables easy integration of customer service management and invoices. You can check the internal performance and also the effectiveness of communication with your clients. They provide quite a lot of tutorials and training to use the app. You can customize and works according to your requirements. Automation and merging features are available. Your data is secured by encryption and multi-factor authentication process. Interact easily with your clients using multiple channels of social media like facebook, etc. Traffic management, reporting tools are the other features. You can avail the demo version before you try out the original. You can effectively manage the task force by also including the other stakeholders in the cycle.
pros_text: Cons:Not a very user-friendly interface, takes some time to get familiarized with the application. Slow response of the customer support system.

title: Decent Ticket System, very extensible
overall_text: Pros:The system responsiveness and customizability are great.
pros_text: Cons:Doesn't link into some zoho products as well as i'd like to see, but as just a ticket system it's great.

title: Really loving this platform!
overall_text: We havent integrated it yet, still trying to see if it fits our needs.
pros_text: The ticket tracking, easy input to build a solid KB, live chat, i cant wait to find out what else it can do.!
cons_text: The trial wasn't long enough to play with all the functions and features. I wish I would have have longer to see if this platform offers everything my company needs.

title: Shifted from Salesforce to Zoho Desk for cost reasons, and I'm impressed with the ease of use.
overall_text: Easy setup during an immediate need for a new support/case system.
pros_text: Creating and managing cases is simpler in so many ways compared to Salesforce.It could be stronger on its links to the CRM side of things, with tracking customer assets and stuff, but in terms of case management and contacts, it's terrific.
cons_text: I wish its integration with Zoho CRM was more thorough, or lacking that, it stored, by default, much more information about contacts. Sometimes ZohoDesk feels like a complete product, and other times it feels like an add-on.

title: Good

pros_text: Cons:Site Personalizationfor our employees, lack of colours in the front end. Some menu options are not intuitive and sometimes options disappear with no reason

When a developer account has been assigned for a project, they would receive a notice thru message system like email or mobile app. But currently I didn't get any notices, that's strange and i need to figure out about this system.

title: good
overall_text: Pros:is a great choice for either internal helpdesk or external service desk scenarios. It integrates with Facebook, Google Analytics, Twilio, and Twitter to extend functionality and provide gateways for users to interact with agents using Voice-over-IP (VoIP) or social media, as well as to provide data analysis to managers monitoring customer interactions and service-level agreements (SLAs). All of that and a nice price tag earn it an Editors' Choice award in our helpdesk category, along with HappyFox and Vivantio Pro.
pros_text: Cons:Overall, the Enterprise version of Zoho Desk is a very capable, easy-to-use, and nicely priced helpdesk system. A free trial makes creating a test bed simple and it provides a well-designed and capable UI for the Enterprise version. Unless you're specifically looking for a helpdesk system with integrated asset management

title: A good blend of functionality with lots of available features
overall_text: Pros:For the most part this has every module that I could ever possibly want. Instead of having to try to connect out to a large # of different apps I can stay within the Zoho sphere and know that each application will communicate with the other.
pros_text: Cons:I would like to see more functionality available in the realm of the API as it seems that the format of sending data is a little strange at times (I am more used to sending information in the payload of a request versus the method of making it part of the URL string)

title: Thumbs up for organization
overall_text: We have a job share arrangement - Zoho helps us to organize who has completed what task , and all of the details of what happened prior so the next person can pick up where the other left off.
pros_text: I like that it keeps our group requests in order, with the option to assign due dates , you can assign people to the tickets to keep everything in order.You can even add tags so you can look at similar issues in the past.
cons_text: It is difficult to cut and paste a picture at times.And I wish there was a automatic signature option like on Outlook

title: Zoho Desk is a good product, affordable compared to similar offerings in the market
overall_text: We signed up for Zoho desk as we have been using Zoho CRM and found the integration between CRM and Help desk very useful. We have been tracking our tech support tickets through Desk.

cons_text: The customer support is not up to the mark, they need to improve their customer support a lot.The user interface is sometimes confusing and not exactly intuitive.

title: It is a good software, but I am yet to breakthrough most of the features available.

title: Mostly painless, with a bit of a learning curve and minor frustrations

It's strange that when adding a resolution to a ticket, I can't also close it at the same time as an option... or close a ticket with a comment, for example.

title: All integrated and seamless Experience

title: Zoho Desk Works

cons_text: I'm not sure if it would scale well if our company grew rapidly.

title: Not bad for the money
overall_text: Pros:It's mostly easy to use and the app integration is nice. We have been using it for a few weeks now and are enjoying it so far. We came from Zendesk and it's very comparable.
pros_text: Cons:There needs to be a simpler automation setup. We get a lot of tickets for the exact same thing several times a day. I need to be able to send out a clear concise response by clicking a dropdown and a button, not having to re-type or copy and paste the same message 30+ times.

title: very nice features and very user friendly , value for money

title: We are extremely happy with the use of Zoho Desk.

title: Zoho Desk is a great help desk software - nice feature set at a good price!

title: Excellent way to keep the track of all the task
overall_text: Pros:how simple it is to use and clever modules which supports automation of the tasks and transparency between the teams.
pros_text: Cons:The UX can be improved to make little more clear self explanation, As some of the features are hidden.

title: Ease of use and pretty efficient
overall_text: Really short ways for our little projket. We could solve everything about it.
pros_text: The Struktureoverall, the reporting possibility and the way to communicate to our clients. The Reporting cluster is perfect to match internal in best way. The Survey transfer into the ticketing
cons_text: That I have to use two plattform to setup the Ticketing-System.(zoho desk + zoho public). Additional to that the iOS App Sync doesen't work proper.

title: Outils de gestion
overall_text: Pros:La gamme complète des fonctionnalités pour la gestion des entreprisesSurtout l'intégration de CRM
pros_text: Cons:La maîtrise des certaines fonctionnalités

title: Its good !
overall_text: Pros:Super software and easy to use The ticketing system is awesome and has helped us increase customer satisfaction.
pros_text: Cons:The integration with software with existingsoftware that we use could be easier for implementation.

title: We liked to use it very much.
overall_text: Pros:The application has a lot of features and it is very user friendly. We have tried it with a few users and it went ok
pros_text: Cons:Some users have a little dificult to mange the user interface, but after a little while they got it.

title: I've tried Zoho Desk during 15 days and managed several services for Help Desk
overall_text: I can win a lot of time by stopping email support ! Now, my customer email to Zoho desk and everybody can follow the ticket and have statistics from open to closed ticket !
pros_text: This sofware is very easy to use and the mobile app work well.That i like the most is the capability to manage help desk SLA for each services !
cons_text: The User Interface is too simple and not very funny. For the moment I do not have bad point for this software ;)

title: EXCELENTE HERRAMIENTA PARA SERVICIO AL CLIENTE
overall_text: una excelente experiencia orientada a nuestra necesidad de poder atender de manera mas eficaz a nuestro clientes.
pros_text: LA IMPLEMENTACION ES MUY FACIL, TIENE MUCHAS HERRAMIENTAS QUE AYUDAN AL FACIL MANEJO Y REDISTRIBUCION DEL TRABJO PARA EL SERVCICIO AL CLIENTE Y EJECUCION DE LOS AGENTES
cons_text: EL REALIZAR LA INTEGRACIONES CON MAS APP QUE SE ENCUENTRAN EN NUESTRA ORGAINIZACION NO TAN ACCECIBLE

title: Great tool that boost our internal client requests
overall_text: Pros:It's easy to use, i can manage all tickets automatically with several rules by default, you can have many agents that can focus in specific tickets without interfering with others. It has a great and clean interface with many options that helps to reduce processing request times.
pros_text: Cons:Sometimes email messages can't be sended or received, it has one or another bug that last at least one week to fix it.

title: Great Ticket System
overall_text: Pros:Easy to track issues for employees and the app makes it great for when i'm away from my desk.
pros_text: Cons:that one time it broke for multiple hours

title: Testing paid version
overall_text: Pros:Good choice of reporting.Customer portal.Knowledge Base and Q&AI really like the countdown view of the open tickets and the customization options for the priorities and clasifications.
pros_text: Cons:I have been struggling for months with trying to attach documents to replies, I would question the customer support as I only heard from them twice and nothing has been relayed back to me if it is being looked at or fixed.

title: the best help desk environment
overall_text: I have checked and also used many of ticketing and help desk software.none of them good enough especially complete solutions. ticketing, chatting, task management, community and knowledge base applications are great, easy to use andfull-customizable.
pros_text: User-friendly, elastic, easy to use,customizable and fully integrated.
cons_text: multi-language support is very confusing and hard to implement. integration with other tools (JIRA, Slack etc) is the only bad thing about them.

title: BUDGET software for a call center
overall_text: good and once you get used to it then it is easy to use
pros_text: It is cheap and easy to use, yet has a lot of useful features
cons_text: It is not very beginner-friendly, training needed

title: I've gone through a lot of help desk softwares to locate one that works for me. This one is it.
overall_text: I got rid of working from my email. It's way easier to manage my pipeline through tickets.
pros_text: I really like the ability to create your own filters and then have a status layout on that filter. It allows me to focus on the tickets that are open and keep and eye on the ones I am waiting to hear back from my clients.
cons_text: The feature I like lease is that I cannot auto assign an unassigned ticket without having the full version.

title: zoho social
overall_text: my overall experience with this aplication is good, and i really enjoy to work on this application.
pros_text: features are easy to understand, easy to use
cons_text: not really, i like everything about this aplication.

title: Great ticketing tool!
overall_text: Pros:Super easy to set up and use!Great features for the price.Love that we are only charged per agent.
pros_text: Cons:All the integration's seem a little complicated but I feel once we are a little more familiar it will be great.

title: Very easy and very efficient system. The combination of ease of use and wide functionality
overall_text: Wide functionalityEase of useUser friendly and intuitive interfaceAffordable price
pros_text: Various functions that allow you to automate your business process.It is very good to have an ability to set up workflow rules, notifications, layouts, macro, etc.
cons_text: 1.Lack of support in chat. 2. Integrates only with Facebook and Twitter (would be great to add other popular social networks). 3.There is no calendar for activities

title: Outstanding. The software features exceeded my expectations.
overall_text: I can finally organize all the information I have as a company, along with the daily info I receive from my clients.
pros_text: Firstly, I was impressed by all the features available and how easy is to go from one to another. The software is very organized and it has a clear presentation.
cons_text: There is not a certain feature that I didn't like, but I had some minor problems verifying the e-mail address.Apart from it, it works perfectly.

title: Easy to get up and running, pretty cool with paid plan
overall_text: Ease of management of partner support with the free portal combined with CRM data.
pros_text: * With the paid plan, integration with the CRM was really easy. Could easily add additional contacts as users and the cases are shared within an account. * Portal for users is free* Easy to create knowledge base for the portal
cons_text: * Email notifications were not very intuitive and can't be edited in the free version. Once we upgraded they were OK.* Would like to see more automated notification options. One thing we couldn't do was to send a reminder to an agent if they had a ticket that was past due. * Support is way understaffed for this product. When we call for CRM we always get someone, when we call for Desk, we wait on hold and usually do not get a call back for multiple days.

title: Loving the UI experience
overall_text: Pros:price vs value, there is a lot of value for the price per agent. great UI feel, great ease of use overall
pros_text: Cons:should be able to customize layout in ticketing view. I would like to see unique fields for each portal

title: Great product at an affordable price
overall_text: Pros:It's set up well and has a usable mobile app, unlike some other products
pros_text: Cons:Had some issues integrating with office 365, that's about it

title: Quicjk, Easy
overall_text: Company Visibility across multiple departments. A centralized repository for contact's. The ability to manage our pipeline
pros_text: The integration between CRM and support Desk, caters for all our needs. The first time support has full visibility into a clients history and services procured
cons_text: The fact that the modules are working separately, for some plug-ins we require the data for different modules to be exported which is not catered for

title: The software helped me to reduce most of my routine tasks. It's simply awesome.
overall_text: Easy to use and minimize my work with accuracy.
pros_text: The way in which tickets are rendered is the best part in this software. I would like to recommend it since it has many features which makes my work accurate.
cons_text: The navigation is not good. When I refresh, it should reload the current page. But in setup, when I reload, it switches to main setup page instead of current setup page. Window hash can be much more updated.

title: Great
overall_text: Pros:Great and easy to use. Customers are very happy with support.
pros_text: Cons:Better CRM integration needed. Would be better with advanced lookups.

title: Covers Everything, Cost is Very Reasonable, Support is Great
overall_text: I love that live chat, emails, phone calls and voicemail is all in one system.
pros_text: Phones, tickets and live chats are all in one place. I've contacted support a few times and each time I got exactly the answer I needed and within a timely manner.
cons_text: As far as I know CSS customization for the live chat window is not available. I was also unable to find a generic link to use to place the live chat button in a custom location.

title: Really nice integrated experience
overall_text: Pros:The amount of functionality which exist inside the system is really great to see. When compared to other systems where you have to look at 3rd party solutions to get the same level of functionality, it's great to see it all in one product
pros_text: Cons:There are some clunky areas when trying to set up, once you get past them its ok. These areas mainly exist in the creation of users, just a few little bugs.

title: We have been testing for about three weeks and so far, we are able to do everything we need.
overall_text: Pros:Support team is wonderful; most of the functions are very intuitive; love the customization that is available; love how the notification system works. love the phone app to stay on top of things.
pros_text: Cons:chat routing is dependent on Sales IQ which I had not planned on implementing yet.i wish that it pushed new contacts into CRM, I would like more tags for when an email is sent in (like #original_sender;

title: Easy to use
overall_text: Pros:1. Mobile Application is advantage 2. Alert by email and sms3. Chat will help to communicate with team
pros_text: Cons:1. It is not easy to add customize field in some screen2. Standard workflow should be ready to use

title: We've been using Desk for a week and our experience has been great.
overall_text: Pros:Easy to use. We trained our offshore team in under 1 hour. The dashboards give a great view of our first response time and single contact resolutions.
pros_text: Cons:Customer support responses could be better.Spam control is not existent, so agents have to continually monitor the spam queue to be sure they don't miss emails.Would be great to have some admin functions in setup to white list email addresses.

title: Zoho Desk Is Amazing
overall_text: Zoho Desk is great being part of Zoho One if you can subscribe to this all in one application as it seamlessly integrates with Zoho CRM and the other tools. I highly recommend.
pros_text: Zoho Desk is great as an application part of Zoho One and Zoho CRM. It integrates with QB and allows streamlined functionality to automate processes.
cons_text: Really, I can't say anything bad about the software. It is a great cloud based application.

title: A reliable, customisable and user friendly value for money product
overall_text: Pros:The response time from the support team is always prompt and they resolve your questions first time.The use of custom fields in tickets allows you to adapt the product to suit your needs.The Zoho Desk App allows you to be fully mobile and works without time delay or lag.
pros_text: Cons:It is disappointing that we are unable to export the configuration from one portal to another which would save time.

title: Real value, better software!
overall_text: Pros:At first it seems like you are almost getting nothing for that price, but you are getting automation, efficiency, and almost zero confusion between team members and clients.
pros_text: Cons:A pity what the customers see and what we see (on the backend) are almost two different worlds. If Zoho can improve on that to the likeness of zendesk's help center with that ginormous search bar, it would be a great move.

title: Love Zoho and all it's products
overall_text: Pros:Organizes tasks for my entire team.It works with all the other zoho apps and they have amazing support.
pros_text: Cons:I don't have any issues with desk, other then there are a lot of different apps in zoho and all have a cost, but they do have a bundle that gives you all of them, but it is more per user and can add up for a small business.Again, this is the cost of business, so it does help.

title: CRM to Desk Integration is poor.
overall_text: Pros:Ringcentral integration is nice but not perfect but it is the leading factor for me at this time. Though there are a few bugs with the implementation, I would love to get a training on how to better use it.
pros_text: Cons:The fact that the CRM and Desk are separate. I need to see all the information in one location and I do not like having a link between two different contacts on a database that should be one.

title: Excellent application to bring together a fully integrated helpdesk solution
overall_text: One stop shop for all our helpdesk needs rather than having to rely on multiple systems to manage contact with our clients.
pros_text: Easy ticket managementIntegration between support channels - email, chat, phone and social media
cons_text: It would be great to have a built in Zoho branded VOIP phone system rather than having to rely on other 3rd parties considering Zoho offers so many features already - seems strange this one is missing.

title: Good so far, easy to use and setup
overall_text: Pros:It's easy to use and navigate, especially those using a platform like this for the first time. There is nothing too out of range for any level of business to best implement this within their businesses. Happy I found it.
pros_text: Cons:It's a late but efficient product from Zoho. Marketplace integrations need to offer more apps. Cloud operation is the different business I hope Zoho will handle that part also.

title: Using Zoho Desk
overall_text: We use Zoho desk as a maintenance ticketing system in conjunction with Zoho CRM.The two play VERY nice together and offer some awesome features.Over all this platform has worked the best for us in the budget we have.I also think that if our budget was more.... this would still probably be the best system for us due to the fact we canvirtually do anything we need.
pros_text: As basic or robust as you're willing to make it.
cons_text: Fairly large learning curve..... but once you get itits easy.

title: Zoho Desk is an okay software but nothing so special
overall_text: The benefits are limited and overall it is not such a good software product. Will think about discontinuing its use.
pros_text: They provide a good amount of documentation that allows us to work with this software. In addition, they offer basic webinars on how to use this product which is helpful to our employees. This software does allow us to build stronger customer relationships, which is always a plus in our books.
cons_text: The company provides online support. However, in some instances, having phone support would be preferred because it is hard to explain certain problems online. Support is online and support is only available during certain hours. Some of the reporting features this software offers are not so good. Some instructions are unclear and hard to understand.

title: try out zoho desk
overall_text: good, i recommend it
pros_text: all your help desk needs in one place in one app
cons_text: maybe too many features on this app but everything is covered

title: simplifies everything in one area
overall_text: all under one roof, process is simplified and you dont have to wait for update mails, it all there at click of button
pros_text: all under one platform, i could integrate my access points queries into one channel thereby avoiding the clash amongst all the other branch setups
cons_text: nothing as if now, the only issue is that since it is cloud-based, internet connectivity if lost will create issues, should have a good internet backup lines.

title: Fast and Practical
overall_text: I found it brilliant and I am really satisfied, now I have a fast, practical, secure software that I can trust absolutely.
pros_text: I really liked the system to be able to change the whole look of the customer support site. Really perfect for a company that wants to start.
cons_text: Unfortunately, I found several bugs while using the zoho chat, so much that I tried to save and did not do anything, continued the same and without alterations.

title: Good helpdesk ticketing software
overall_text: Overall it is a good, reliable and accesible software to take control of your support team
pros_text: It is easy to record and then assign tickets. It has a lot of report options, so you can evaluate your team's performance
cons_text: Setting up the reports takes some time, it is not very intuitive, but the options are there, and the information too, you just need the time to find them.

title: Support 24/7
overall_text: Pros:Customer support is so active and fast on responding to questions
pros_text: Cons:Unfortunately the software is slow and this waste time

title: Easy to setup. Limited functionality
overall_text: able to create the software without programming knowledge.
pros_text: Very easy to setup. No programming skill required. simple drag and drop. built in integration with other softwares
cons_text: Limited features. Not much customization offered.Better support such as tutorials will be great. Offering certain industry's example/templates where we can start immediately star using the software with minor changes will be great.

title: Zoha is trustable with high accuracy & easy to use crm application
overall_text: It was amazing, by using my pc i used to log ineveyday morning at 10 am to log out at 7pm , we use this application for marking attendences n our leave holidays paid leave unpaid leave, salary slip also we can get from this application
pros_text: Attendance marking system with another options like leave, off ect
cons_text: Not working properly on mobile devices need to improve this asap

title: IT Help Desk uses ZOHO
overall_text: convenient, readily accessible.
pros_text: Our company has an IT support through a vendor and when in-person is not readily available, they use thiszoho to remotely log in to fix issues I have on my computer. Very convenient.
cons_text: I'm not quite sure how the ticketing system works. I have only tried the remote log in.Ticketing system might not be for a user like me.

title: Great Features and UI for small business support....
overall_text: Pros:All features that required in a ticketing solution were met by Zoho Desk free. There are definitely advantages to upgrading to a higher tier, but one could easily make it by without if they structured things intelligently on their end.
pros_text: Cons:Just enough rope to hang yourself. While there are plenty of features, the documentation is limited and surfing the forums to find answers is tedious.

title: Zoho Support does everything we need at a price we can afford.
overall_text: Save time and money. Better support.
pros_text: Too much to pick most... If I have to pick one thing, it would have to be hotkeys. I'm a huge fan of keyboard shortcuts and Zoho Support is fantastic.
cons_text: Now that I'm spoiled for hotkeys, I get frustrated when I find one of the few functions that can't be accomplished with a hotkey.There aren't that many, but I'd rather be able to do everything with hotkeys.

title: Zoho Desk Support
overall_text: My request being handled in a timely manner and the ease of the system.
pros_text: Easy to use and great support. Happy to use and thankful my company chose to this product. I enjoy the timeliness of the response to my ticket request.
cons_text: I don't have any issues or concerns with the product or service received. Please keep up the good work.

title: The helpdesk is finally here for our business!
overall_text: Our overall experience with Zoho Desk has been great. We were able to get support when needed.
pros_text: What we liked the most about Zoho Desk is the ease of use and how organized it keeps all our help desk tickets
cons_text: What we liked least about the Zoho Desk was... Nothing- we enjoyed it all! There is very little not to like about this software.

title: Zoho Desk
overall_text: Pros:Zoho Desk is a great addition to the Zoho Suite of products.We appreciate the great value offers in the entire suite.
pros_text: Cons:We would have appreciated some more contact from Zoho corporate in the implementation process.

title: Great experience. Really useful app for support departments.
overall_text: We save lot of time in our answers and we can also, at the time we have our support department answering the problems or doubts, have one portal customer which provide us a better image in front of our customers
pros_text: Knowledge data base. It makes us safe time with our answers. Also the email templates area, it's really useful for us.
cons_text: The branding department area its a bit confusing and takes time to make it work with the customer portal

title: Easy to setup and deploy. Had my team understanding the ins and outs in a week
overall_text: Pros:Desk provides not only a provider solution for handling tickets and tracking progress but built in is chat. Having that functionality in the same window saves our agents time from calling or moving windows around to chat with a coworker.
pros_text: Cons:The standard reports are basic. It left me wanting more examples of what it can really do. We had to manually create our own to unlock its potential.

title: Moving to a New Support Tool
overall_text: Pros:Comparing Feature to Feature, Desk form Zoho is more bang for the buck.There are so many ways to set it up and adjust it to your needs.Adding workflow and automation is great, and the baked in Remote Support, a must have in my mind
pros_text: Cons:Right now the only con I can think of is there is no RMA process.Not the end of the world our old software did not have it either.

title: We have gone through many many many systems in the past and we hone believe this will be our last :)
overall_text: Complete Automation of our business processes
pros_text: The features we love most is the team feeds system as this makes internal communication a breeze ,the built in and external integrations with apps like zoho creator.With this you options are endless.
cons_text: Its hard to say, I guess the worst part is that there are to many features... hahaha... It can be a bit overwhelming at first but one easily adopts.

title: Great custom service software. It has tons of options. But needs quite some UI Improvements
overall_text: Pros:- Has tons of features- Covers almost every requirement- Good channel management- Categorisation is great.- Better for larger teams- Fairly usable UI...
pros_text: Cons:- The settings and options are too cluttered.- You will have to traverse through a multitude of options to achieve something- Unfortunately, it creates a ticket even if a mail from and to is same (the support email)

title: Migration to Zoho
overall_text: One thing I found weird with Zoho is Multiple excesses to Client portal. For example, if I want to use Zoho books and desk. I would need to provide multiple login access to my clients. Which would be confusing for the clients. I did not found the customer su[port very helpful. They push you from one line to another. There is really no one I found who can help me understand how the whole thing works and make the process smooth.
pros_text: Economical
cons_text: Need to provide multiple logins to the clients

title: Perfect for what I needed
overall_text: A very affordable solution for a small company.
pros_text: Love the easy setup at the start. I got my desk ready in minutes. Another thing is the ability to send or attache files to the desk. Also the way to order the messages is amazing, well thought.
cons_text: A bit difficult to use in the user end. I would love to do more settings in order to facilitate the input of requests. Needs a bit more customization.

title: Have been using for a short time, still not using to our fullest potential but it will take time.
overall_text: Pros:Much better than what we were previously using which was a home grown system. Our company likes the multiple features/apps available and integrating with other features.
pros_text: Cons:The user interface could use improvement. Visually it is hard to tell where to fill in/click certain things. Not as obvious as I had hoped it would be.Importing our information was decent but manydates are incorrect.

title: Startup friendly Ticketing Software
overall_text: Overall we are happy with zoho. Customer support is liking this new system so we are good with it.
pros_text: Though I have only used trial version.Interface and Customisation are very good. Out customer support has easily adopted this new ticketing system.
cons_text: Support from zoho is slightly delayed. No direct point of contact for any support related queries. Api documentation lacks detailed explanation.

title: This is a one stop shop for my business.Its easy to use. I love it.
overall_text: ITs a one stop shop for all our support tickets.
pros_text: I love that my entire business is managed from one platform.I love that we now have one location where we can keep track of all our support tickets.

title: Evaluating ZOHO DESK... great so far
overall_text: We are a ZOHO CRM customer and we are now looking to manage our service desk operation using ZOHO DESK, so far we are very excited with the trial and it seems the product will be a great fit for our needs...
pros_text: Easy to use, clean user interface, integration with ZOHO CRM
cons_text: We are having some issues customizing the templates but I guess we need to learn more, it would be great to have more tutorials and help to speed up our onboarding process

title: Zoho Desk Free trial
overall_text: Pros:Seems easy to use, a lot of good features, still exploring
pros_text: Cons:I haven't found anything yet that I really don't like

title: very good, close to top tier software
overall_text: Pros:1) easy to setup 2) easy to useIt has the complete features as a top provider. You can compare with Salesforces or similar. It also provides a good value for money. The app is also available and includes integration with phone.
pros_text: Cons:Probably the value for money. 12 agent the lowest cost is perhaps a bit expensive. I would recommend to include a release of free and 12 one.

title: Great and easy to use
overall_text: organized my customer service process
pros_text: easy to setup,easy to get my team on-boarded with little training and started my optimization of my customer service process with little setup
cons_text: the one thing that could improve would be a better help menu for such things as how to set SLA's for tickets and have an SLA flag initiated for tickets that go beyond the SLA time.I still havent figure this out.

title: I could see the Zoho Desk works perfect
overall_text: Pricingis quite comfortable/reasonable
pros_text: I could not see any delays in the ticket submissionsTicket creations are very easy to handle
cons_text: If we have also a mail notification enabled for the followers it would be great

title: It's very easy to deploy...liked it
overall_text: Pros:Easy to start with a basic free setup and upgrade on organization's demands or develops the need for more features.The best thing is it is very easy to manage tickets by automation rules so agents can see their tickets in their system automatically.
pros_text: Cons:No on-site version for those who would not like to go for cloud. Also ITIL features are not present in this version of zoho.

title: Zoho Desk is to the point. You can easily ensure support for your customers using this software.
overall_text: Pros:Its completeness and the user friendly interface in addition to the affordable plans. In addition to that, and most importantly, this software is part of the Zoho Suite, which means it is integrated with modules like Zoho CRM...
pros_text: Cons:For someone who is not really familiar with support software, it may require some time to get familiar with the interface for some and its logic

title: Excellent help desk software and extremely intuitive.
overall_text: Pros:Ease of integration with a form solution (Zoho Form), has an app for ease on the go, and the helpdesk is easy to use customise.
pros_text: Cons:No issues to speak of. Would like some integration into google spreadsheets perhaps (call log also inputs into a spreadsheet for customer archive) but thats my own personal need, not something they should need to implement. On the whole extremely positive.

title: Product is good but support is average
overall_text: Pros:Intuitive designLook and feelCombined customer support suiteMulti department featuresIntegration with many tools
pros_text: Cons:Support is not gooddifficult to merge two ticketsSearch functions are not working properly. Most of the time you can't search with body of the content or subject contentsCustomer rating features are not moderated, even operators can do the rating themselves

title: It looks like it is the right tool for a vCIO to use. Can keep track of tickets and contracts.
overall_text: I was actually able to look at our process of keeping track of requests and improve it by using Zoho's way of organizing data.
pros_text: All cloud and seamless connection from one module to the other. Ability to assign products to tickets, users and accounts. Connection to Google is a plus.
cons_text: Would like to see Service Catalogs included and support for Quickbooks. We need to be able to automatically bill from Quickbooks.

title: It's really an operating system for any type of business
overall_text: Organize my work and make all information on one page especially with its integrations with Zoho CRM
pros_text: User-friendly, customizable, integrated with most of the related services and fit any size of business.
cons_text: Integration with other services should be easier and smarter for non-technical users, But I think even for them, the forums and internet contain a lot of articles and tutorials to make things done.

title: It's a really useful tool for Service Desk, I fell very confortable using it.
overall_text: Easy control and administration, offering our clients a friendly interface; As well as a fast and secure connection method.
pros_text: It's structured by modulesOffer remote connectionI can review all tickets and its statusI can get graphics about the staff performance
cons_text: More options to get some reports; customize information to present reports to our clients. I think could have integration with more applications

title: Good trial so far, like the feature set and interface
overall_text: Pros:The interface is neat and intuitive. I like the feature set and the ability to integrate with other vendors like JIRA and Twilio, which is a must for us
pros_text: Cons:When signing up it started sending invitations to all the contacts with my same domain, which created a lot of chaos, I may have done something wrong but as far as I recall I did not touch anything that could have caused that

title: Need to work on lag time but like customization for agent viewing
overall_text: Pros:Compared to other help desk software it is good for the price. It allows agents to customize how they want to view tickets/dashboard. It has a very modern looking color scheme and layout.
pros_text: Cons:There were many times when there was a lag time when emails were sent from the system. The Free trail period is too short. We didn't like that our agents had to create a ZoHo Social account.

title: Great Software
overall_text: Pros:Zoho does it all, and it does it all well. It's relatively easy to configure compared to some other solutions, and the integration of all the apps is great once you figure them all out. Handles many aspect of our clients support, sales, chat, and crm capabilities.
pros_text: Cons:That there are so many separate apps, sometimes it can be daunting to properly configure everything.

title: overall a brilliant piece of software for the money.

pros_text: Cons:as with any good, flexible software, there is quite a steep learning curve involved getting things setup.

title: This takes a help desk to a whole new level
overall_text: Pros:Setup is easy, we were up and running day 1. The interface is clean and simple to navigate. The reports are customizable and can be scheduled to automatically send, giving the team and managers visibility into team performance and most time consuming issues.
pros_text: Cons:Right now I can not fine anything that I do not like. Every feature seems to fit exactly what I am looking for.

title: Zoho Desk - Ideal tool to support your customer

title: The experience using Zoho desk has been very good, we've been testing lots and they right at the top

pros_text: Cons:There are some UI choices that they make that kind of confused me, and still confuse me. Its something that probably I'll get used to but getting back out to my over all view of tickets is a slightly hard job.

title: Simple to use
overall_text: I have used Zoho support for a long time. It was not until recently I noticed that they he mad an app. I immediately noticed it existed via GetApp. I downloaded it and I began using it on th trial. I have to say, I love how I can view all the tickets and get notifications on my phone! It is a good app with a sleek interface. The app is also free which is a plus since most competitors in customer support will charge for mobile applications. There are push notifications which let you reply quickly to an incoming ticket.
pros_text: The app has a sleek design and I appreciate how easy it is to navigate. They designed it with the staff member in mind so that you can quickly and easily access and organize a ticket. Zoho integration is great.
cons_text: I have noticed that sometimes the push notifications do not work. This may be a compatibility issue with Ios9. I cannot format my text responses. This is probably normal.

title: Good Support Software

title: amazing

The user friendly iOS and android apps work well. I personally liked the iOS version better than the Android although both offer similar support and interface.

Custom automatic escalation policies let you decide beforehand who you want tickets to escalate to and the time intervals between escalations to ensure that unacknowledged tickets continue to escalate until someone on your team responds.

Nice layout - checkActually does interact with O365 reviews slammed the connectivityUploading my data WORKS, and works well! - just like the big boysThen I start uncovering other gems hidden in there. title: Solid app but set it up right the first time
overall_text: Set up a new account and mistakenly used a special character in my company name. Long story short I ended up with two portals and had to merge them. Getting customer support on the phone is a good and bad experience. Bad that I had to wait up to 45 minutes to get through (in one case I was #1 in the queue for over an hour and never got and answer). The good is that once you do reach a rep they were extremely knowledgeable and helpful. I felt likeI was speaking with an actual software developer. From what I have learned so far, the app seems good and the mobile application is very easy to use. I am testing this as a switch away from Salesforce Desk that is fucntional but very expensive for a small company.

title: User friendly, powerful, everything I need is there.

pros_text: Cons:There is no Cons actually. The only thing I can think that should be changed is how all the tickets are displayed in one screen.

title: Great product to use
overall_text: This product is well-made, and it does an EXCELLENT job keeping leaves out of the gutter. Unfortunately, while it also blocks pine needles, the needles on our New England pine trees are fine enough that they manage to get stuck upright in the mesh, and after a while enough of them accumulate so they have to be removed by hand. What's particularly bad is the needles can't be brushed off, but have to be pulled out of the mesh. While this reduces the need to climb an extension ladder to once a year, it doesn't eliminate the need, so in our application the product is OK. Zoom in on the attached picture to see a plucked section and a section bristling with pine needles.

title: One of the leading product for customer service tools

One of the main use that I made for this knowledge management was to be able to save pre-defined solutions for the user's frequently asked questions. It helped the team to reply quickly and reduce the time on analysis. Overall, this increased the product quality as the support provided by us was quick. Thus, increasing the product value.
cons_text: Even though their portal provides a personalized experience, they work on their UI to make it a little more appealing. No other cons were identified when it comes to the functionality.
