pros_text: Allow customization of the modules. Re-branding could be challenging for a newbie, but works great ones you get us to interface.
cons_text: Hard to find correct modules sometime. Takes time to learn your ways around. Specifically, I found respond to a ticket functionality not self intuitive.

title: Great Kit Everytime
overall_text: To keep order and notes of my cases and tickets
pros_text: I use Zoho for everything not just Desk and is always a quick easy to use and vibrant software, its great for my business needs.
cons_text: The price, should have a free version for every piece of software and possibly be able to have a exe version that you can download of your software

title: Reliable ticket and post organizer.
overall_text: Pros:It is easy to use, a very friendly application.Excellent to keep track of all cases and existing emails within an organization.Meets expectations
pros_text: Cons:That at the beginning of the session I do not see the list of tickets at the beginning, we have to look for the option to show all the tickets.

title: Still testing it out
overall_text: Pros:snippets so far seem kind of useful. Cant compare this to other desk software platforms though as I dont have the experience.
pros_text: Cons:Cant schedule emails to be sent automatically at specific times. No response if calling their support #. Need some sort of import that checks headers, for say GDocs, to the knowledge base.

title: It has been great using ZOHO.
overall_text: Pros:It is very easy to use and understand. It has all the features that we require. Also the GUI is too user friendly.

title: simply magnificent
overall_text: keep an eye in real time on everything that happens between our clients and my colleagues.
pros_text: ease in managing all distribution and marketing channels.keep an eye on everything that happens in real time
cons_text: Difficulties with the customization of the online conversation function.the French language version, is not totally in French.

title: Doesn't Help Much
overall_text: It just didn't live up to expectations
pros_text: It appeared that it had the ability to allow us to access our broadcast servers remotely
cons_text: Very difficult to deploy and use.Required constant setting tweaking and often in critical situations failed to work properly.

title: Great solution.Gives our organization a professional support ticketing system
overall_text: Pros:We love that is it cloud based.very easy to customize to fit our needs.we also wanted a system that grows with us as we grow our team.very scalable.
pros_text: Cons:just like any software there is a learning curve to fully utilize this system.but other then that we are very happy with our choice to using Zoho Desk.

title: Great Value
overall_text: Pros:Fantastic value for money. We have compared Zoho to many other systems in the same price range and nobody can compete against Zoho item for item in the same price range, you pay more then double on other systems for the same functions.
pros_text: Cons:Cant really say that we have come across anything.

title: Initial feel and function look to be pretty intuitive.
overall_text: Pros:Initial feel and function look to be pretty intuitive. Also has a very good extension on the free trial period. As with all things ZOHO it has seamless integration into other ZOHO platforms.
pros_text: Cons:Good and bad is that it has a lot of features and will take time to get to grips with the full functionality.

title: Brilliant Tool - A full fledged Support ticketing system and more
overall_text: Pros:A seamless system with automatic ticket management, in app mailing tool and even a knowledge base. Quite intuitive as well
pros_text: Cons:Limited trial period. Could have extended this to 20 days. Also should have added some default/built-in options like mail notification and default rules for ticket assignment.

title: Streamlined and VERY customizable. Unlimited potential I would say
overall_text: Organization to our very chaotic customer support system.
pros_text: Customizable to my workflow/ company structureAble to add multiple departments and automate repetitive tasks
cons_text: The customizability leaves a lot of room for mistakes or inefficiency i.e. saying there's 9 ways to skin a cat when I want to know the best way to skin a cat...

title: Useful, Quick, But at times confusing.
overall_text: Keeping support organized.
pros_text: Syncing custom fields between CRM and Helpdesk. Using the Status view to keep track of Open tickets as well as waiting on customer and scheduled for later.
cons_text: No Automatic Time logging. Unable to paste images into tickets (have to insert them as a photo if we'd like them inline in the text).

title: Positive experience so far..
overall_text: Pros:Very convenient, easy to setup, and integrate with other Zoho tools. Great for a small business startup.
pros_text: Cons:Sometimes, contacts can get duplicated across different zoho integrations.It would be nice if the software could recognize these duplicates, and merge any information missing from either into one account.

title: Can be tailored to fit your needs
overall_text: Pros:Features can be adjusted and customized to fit your company's needsIntegrates well with other Zoho appsAdding file attachments is very easy.The pricing is friendly.
pros_text: Cons:No indication on how many emails go directly to the spam folder.

title: Wir sind soweit zufrieden testen gerade
overall_text: Wir sind soweit sehr zufrieden und für unsere Zwecke ist das eine sehr gute Software
pros_text: Dass man viele Möglichkeiten hat und sich relativ schnell in die Software einfindet
cons_text: Die Stimme der anrufaufzeichnung klingt meist etwas Roboter mäßig aber nicht schlimm

title: Easy to use and great customer support
overall_text: Provided our team with a seamless platform to collaborate on providing customer service.
pros_text: Very straightforward guides and has a complementary iPhone app to allow you to seamlessly take your tasks to your phone.
cons_text: Ran into a bit of an issue with the sign up page as it was not loading but this was quickly resolved by the Zoho support.

title: Needs a lot of improvement
overall_text: Pros:1. You can review the KB's while working on a ticket.2. Integration with Zoho CRM3. Agent collision detection is done in good way.
pros_text: Cons:1. UI not so friendly.2. Support needs a lot of improvement.3. A lot of issues when replying to a ticket, like recreating another ticket instead of updating the original one.

title: We have looked at a lot of helpdesk solutions and Zoho offers the most features for the lowest cost.
overall_text: Pros:The price and the way the tickets are handled.The lack of spam control was a big problem for us with our previous helpdesk software, and Zoho Desk is controlling the spam great!
pros_text: Cons:The community forum does not have as many features or at least is not as easy to set up as the other parts of the software.

title: Great
overall_text: Pros:Easy to use, multi channel email management software solution. A lot of customizations to customize it according to your needs.
pros_text: Cons:Dashboard interface may have too many options (too busy) for the average user. I'd recommend starting out with a simpler base interface and allow users to add on levels of options.

title: Zoho Desk enabled us to embed a fully fledged help desk in a short timeframe.
overall_text: It enabled us to quickly embed a specialist help desk and knowledge management tool within our software.
pros_text: The live chat and community forum together with knowledge management makes it on of the top support desk software for ISV.
cons_text: The authentication for single sign on for users when embedding Zoho Desk within our app with not available.

title: Awesome software for technical support
overall_text: Peace of mind in terms of management.
pros_text: Zoho desk is very good and allows us management to have control of all the field technical support work that gets done everyday.
cons_text: We dont have any issues with the software as of right now.As with any software it takes a little bit to get used too, but overall very good.

title: Reasonably simple and quick setup of an on-line helpdesk function
overall_text: Pros:Ease of deployment made it quick to setup on our website.Try before you buy option is very useful. Large feature set, sufficient to setup a basic service.
pros_text: Cons:Integration with other ZoHo modules and 3rd party products is unclear.The setup of SLAs and workflows requires a little more effort to comrehend.

title: Quick setup ans easy to use
overall_text: Pros:Easy to use handle very intuitive. The users learn fast to use it and it is very comfortable for the agents

title: Easy to use, but lacks some minor features
overall_text: Pros:It is extremely easy to create and mantain a list of customers. You just write an email the first time describing your issue, and that's it, you become a support customer.
pros_text: Cons:More control over the reports layout. As in example, we could not sort our reports by Category A, then Subcategory B, then Subcategory C.

title: Strong product with a clear UI but lacking refined sales and support process
overall_text: Pros:The ability to manage all mailboxes in one place is great and the top level reporting is a very strong feature
pros_text: Cons:The software would benefit from a global level account that allows you to define rules and support material across multiple departments. When supporting SAAS based software this is essential.

title: Limited features and unreliable customer service
overall_text: Pros:it was easy to use and setup. The price point was ok depends on what you are going to end up using that data from this software for.
pros_text: Cons:Customer Service is really bad. They never get back to you.The free trial doesn't let you access the enter software so you can't even see what Desk is capable of before buying.

title: Works great, helps us engage with our users in a single place.
overall_text: Resolved our issues of support people responding to the same email multiple times.
pros_text: It's simple and easy to use, integrates within our email system and lets our support work concurrently while resolving tickets.
cons_text: While roaming through the settings, using the back button lead to a completely different page that I was expecting.

title: Meets or exceeds expectations.
overall_text: Integration with other management, organization and communications software is a big plus.
pros_text: Free plan is feature rich and the trial lets you test drive the upgraded features for a decent amount of time.
cons_text: Navigation can be confusing and it should have the feature available for administrators to set and override user signatures.

title: so far so good. easy to use, no crash, it's helping us in our daily tasks
overall_text: sorting the customer requestuser friendly
pros_text: For a small company an easy way to have aprofessionnal customer support.We have a simplier interface between the customer and us.
cons_text: sometimes we have some lag. It would be great to have a notification per SMS and not only per email in order to have a quicker feedback

title: Great value for the money
overall_text: Pros:When you get to know itgood enough, it's makes your life musch easier. I keep implementing that feature to other companies too.
pros_text: Cons:It takes time to get to know it, but when you get to know it - it's profitable. I said it from the view of the one who set it up and see oraganization improve their way of work.

title: Awesome value for the money
overall_text: Great for tracking customer issues via email or web form.
pros_text: Incredibly easy to setup and integrate with their other products.The products are well thought out and have mobile apps as well.
cons_text: prices can get out of control if you don't bundle their products. The lack of integration with Office 365 in disappointing.

title: Love the new Zoho Desk
overall_text: Pros:Love the new clean layout and all of the features. Perfect for small businesses looking for a pro level customer service app.
pros_text: Cons:Although I love the new clean design, there are a lot of leftover outdated design elements in live chat, the help center, etc. Would love to see all of this cleaned up as well.

title: Still evaluating but over all very impressed.
overall_text: Pros:User interface and application speed are exceptional.I also liked the templating functionality for the emails that are being sent out.
pros_text: Cons:Lack of JIRA integration.I believe this will be coming soon.JIRA integration would be very useful for me because our team uses it every day for defect management.

title: PErfect
overall_text: Defenelly help my for get organizate all issues and task to resolve for my customer
pros_text: When you have a project scalable, this solution it´s perfect for grow up step by step getting more service when you need.
cons_text: Don´t have personalizate level for access private for knowledge base by project, level o custumer.

title: Quite usable
overall_text: Enough to work
pros_text: Not too much clutter. Everything is well, almost well it should be.Between Freshdesk and Zendesk, Zoho wins . By Far
cons_text: The admin dashboard is always black and like death, sucks the life out of the working spirit.They need to be a little life in this, make me want to wake up and do this.

title: Zoho Desk
overall_text: Very positive. Users had no problem adopting the interface
pros_text: The system was easy to deploy and configure. We were up and running quickly
cons_text: Tracking the time that an agent actually spent on the call could be smoother

title: REALLY GREAT APPLICATION, LOVING HOW ITINTEGRATES WITH EVERYTHING ELSE
overall_text: Pros:The fact that the staff does not have to enter anything in particular as all info is prepolulated. In fact, this is so far the best we have tested and we did test a lot!!!
pros_text: Cons:nothing to say appart the fact that the APP on the telephone is not great, could be better, especially the KB articles par of it

title: Great Product
overall_text: Pros:It's really easy to track conversations with clients and the dashboard feature gives really great insights into our teams performance.
pros_text: Cons:Like any new system it took some time to configure the set up, but once we hade it modified to our custom business rules then it was very easy to use.

title: An all encompassing simple
overall_text: Very smooth, easy to set-up, understand, and train my team.
pros_text: Ease of use, help docs, support was very helpful in understanding our use-cases and suggesting fitting steps
cons_text: Pricing could be more SMB friendly - easy customization to match the look and feel of our application would be a great plus.

title: We are using Zoho Desk and it
overall_text: Pros:The ability to track agents' responses is one of the best feature of this software. It allows Managers to track and evaluate agents' performance.
pros_text: Cons:I feel there's too much information on the page which can confuse the user. Also, I would prefer use of different colors to identify different functionalities.

title: Good for small projects
overall_text: Pros:we are using it for a maintenance program for different locations and its working well for that and I like how its able to assign this to our maintenance guys
pros_text: Cons:We have different locations and on the reporting then it shows the different locations but you have to go in and assign and group things by hand

title: Use the Desk portion of the software and works great. Simple to use for support tickets
overall_text: able to keep all support tickets in once location and send / receive with customers
pros_text: Use the Desk portion of the software and works great. Simple to use for support tickets. The remote assist is very helpfuly
cons_text: Perhaps a easy way to load into our website without having to email a forum to the zoho account. gets a bit messy.

title: Very Good Software for Ticket Support System
overall_text: better customer support
pros_text: The best the ticketing system! Easy to manage and works super Fast.Simple and Intuitive Interface.Not bad at all.
cons_text: Nothing major. Maybe training videos for staff would be helpful. The setup is not the easiest,you can get lost during the setup as there are many options in the menu

title: Good program
overall_text: Helped us manage cases and issues on project management.
pros_text: Links in with other zoho software and offers free or competitive pricing. Good software for entry level businesses.
cons_text: Takes a bit to get used to the features and functions but other then that there is not any cons that we discovered for our use.

title: I just started to use the ZOHO
overall_text: Pros:The package gives a lot of features that are required for good customer service. It helps in daily management of all inquaieries
pros_text: Cons:In some areas it is too complex which make it sometime difficult to implement. Only in Enrerpirise version it is possible to integrate the package with e-mail account.

title: Easy to use, nice customization options but some areas for improvement
overall_text: Pros:I love how feature-rich the starter version of this software is; you can really get up and running very quickly.
pros_text: Cons:I could stand to see more customization options, especially for email intake/helpdesk ticketing. Some of their templates aren't terribly beautiful. But I'm happy with the service overall.

title: Zoho Desk - Great
overall_text: Pros:I enjoy the integration with Zoho CRM and the way I am able to perform more with less steps.The price is great and is well worth it.
pros_text: Cons:I find ithas a lot of features and options but since I don't need it all, it does take a little time but I am sure for others those are needed.

title: Smooth, and amazingly feature rich
overall_text: Complete small business help
pros_text: Anything you need, it is there! No matter if you are a growing business or you are just starting out, ZOHO Desk can help you out!
cons_text: Can be overwhelming at first. It takes a little while to get used to how everything operates, but when you do, you have a full feature small business.

title: Great product which is continually updated and improved
overall_text: improved usability and app.
pros_text: The advanced features that make managing tickets just that much easier; splitting/merging tickets.Amazing set of free features
cons_text: Support for the product is responsive, but suggestions are not always that helpful or misunderstood.Other than that it's a really great product.

title: Zoho Desk is a good solution to manage incoming mails together with colleges.
overall_text: Better overview of the customers questions via email and the answers our team members supply.
pros_text: Easy to use GUI. With the help of the KB you can quicly reply with quality answers on your customer's questions.
cons_text: It is too bad that Zoho Desk does not support Telegram messaging. That would be a want to have for our company.

title: Zoho Help Desk - Solves my problems
overall_text: Pros:I like all the products by Zoho and the best part about zoho desk is integrated with other zoho apps. We are going to extend to more advanced version as we can certainly see a value into it.
pros_text: Cons:There are so many options. There should be a way to hide options which are not used which can certainly help.

title: So far, the evaluation has been great.We are definitely considering the potential of this suite.
overall_text: Pros:The options for customization is great.The interface looks great.I love the fact that it connects to Zoho CRM.
pros_text: Cons:Doesn't have all the connectivity for different external apps but they are working on this.They are looking at having new system options that allow you to connect to external apps.

title: Powerfull support software, tricky to translate
overall_text: Pros:I can control mi technicians and their work, create tickets from social networks, emails and on site. Great web forms to create tickets.
pros_text: Cons:No fully transtaltion to spanish, templates still in english if you choose spanish. We had to translate all of them, not intuitive to adjust some templates.

title: Excelent customer support tool
overall_text: Pros:A lot of options available at your fingertips. also have a lot of options available when it comes to integration tools that you can sync with zoho desk
pros_text: Cons:what i like the least is the user interface, it is complicated to get use to and took a very long time to get familiar with the platform

title: Zoho Desk is Great! - However Lacks in Advanced Reporting
overall_text: Pros:We have liked the system for its built in features. The Context view is great. Also the interface is fresh and clean.
pros_text: Cons:However, the reporting is still not uptothe mark and Advanced SLAs stats cannot be tracked. Also, the integration with 3rd party applications or dashboards liek geckoboard are missing.

title: Great tool for customer service, easy to use
overall_text: customer service made easy
pros_text: I have been using Zoho for half a year, it's Help desk has got almost everything we need to handle customer service. It is easy to use and highly customised.
cons_text: sometime i find its not easy to arrange my articles / sections in help center. but it doesn't effect user experience.

title: Easiest Help Desk Set-up
overall_text: Pros:Easy to use and set up. Setup entire team in under two hours without previous knowledge of the software.Menus and setup are intuitive.
pros_text: Cons:There are some fields and layouts that are not customizable.I was hoping to be able to further customize the look of my tickets, but it is just a minor annoyance

title: Excellent. Well worth it
overall_text: I get to assign logs to consultants
pros_text: Easy to use. Excellent features. Multiple users and agents. Easy to respond and close logs. Good value for money
cons_text: Cannot block users from logging unnecessary logs. I have tried this before and haven't had any luck. Perhaps there is a way which I have not yet discovered.

title: Much easier to use than competitors
overall_text: Pros:Integration with Zoho - many of the other chat and ticketing tools don't easily integrate with Zoho, or they only integrate on a limited basis with Zapier.
pros_text: Cons:Some setup was difficult - to get the integration within zoho to actually work, it seemed like we had to go through a million steps.

title: To the point service desk tooling
overall_text: An organized support center!
pros_text: Easy to get your support up and running and organise customer questions.It works fast and it helps you to start a professional support.
cons_text: A crowded user interface. The user interface is somewhat busy, with many many options you don't need on a day-to-day use.

title: Helpful and easy
overall_text: Pros:The Dashboard helps my team organize themselves.The team is able to see their tasks, pending work and unassigned work that needs to be taken up.
pros_text: Cons:Zoho Project and Desk should have one dashboard, or we are checking two applications constantly. If we can fix this, it will be super user friendly

title: Overall a good customer support tool
overall_text: Pros:The ticket receiving time is fast comparing to other tools. They takes at least 5-10 minutes to be appeared in other support softwares. So I really like it
pros_text: Cons:The design needs to be improved, sometimes we feel difficult to find ticket module and search function is also not working sometimes.

title: Useful application
overall_text: This is an useful application that do not require too much configuration to start working with.You do not to have any support email address in your mail server, Zoho desk allows you to create multiple support email accounts to support your customers or endusers.
pros_text: Easy to use, and to configure
cons_text: the support e-mail address could be complicated for the customers

title: Okay for what it is
overall_text: Pros:Zoho desk was good for live chat options and ticket support for those who need both in one place.
pros_text: Cons:At the time we had trouble integrating other parts of our tech stack and you have to pay a lot more to get all the features through their service.

title: Very good
overall_text: Pros:Get the request to the right audience.It can be widely used in many industries.Receive requests from multiple channels
pros_text: Cons:The authentication step for the client is a bit difficult and there is no app for the client.I hope next time there will be app for vifkhachs customers who use mobile lot

title: Support Software
overall_text: Pretty good. Usually the team is responsive. Helps us track tickets with multiple resources.
pros_text: It's easy to manage tickets here and visualize your trending ones. Reports are nice.
cons_text: Supports a bit bumpy. The chat feature is helpful but sometimes the answers you get are rudimentary.

title: Great experience
overall_text: customer service
pros_text: Does what we want it to do. User friendly and allows us to deliver customer service without any nonsense or over complicated systems.
cons_text: Analytics could be more detailed to allow us to see a breakdown of tickets by category. Maybe we can do that, I have not found out how yet.

title: Excellent support system for our company
overall_text: Pros:A complete set of features. Has everything our business needs, backed by an easy and powerful API that we use for the integration within our back end system. Zoho doing well.
pros_text: Cons:The learning curve was a bit uneasy, as the abundance of features makes the user a bit overwhelmed at the start.

title: The zoho Desk software is excellent it helps manage customer questions and thier needs.
overall_text: managesupport claims ,
pros_text: Its easy to manage your customers needs. especialy followups.with this applicacion we have everyting in one area. now our customers complains are solved .
cons_text: not seen any problems yet, its hard to corolate the notifications from facebook with the actual facebook page

title: Zoho has a lot of products/solutions for start ups
overall_text: Pros:We use zoho for a variety of tech needs, service is always quick and friendly with a desire to help out as much as needed.
pros_text: Cons:Sometimes there's a few too many tools in zoho's tool box, lots of their products have 'tasks' features but none of them carry over from platform to platform.

title: Great Help Desk system!
overall_text: Pros:Zoho Desk provides more features for your help desk witch a less price when you compare with the competitors! Its a really complete help desk system, test it and see with your own eyes.
pros_text: Cons:The Live Chat Channel should also be made available in the professional plan.

title: organizing the attention
overall_text: Pros:I like being able to have the order and take control of the assistance we provide to customers. It is also good to have the solutions within reach by the time they are resubmitted.
pros_text: Cons:Generating web forms is a bit complicated. I have created some but they are not 100% functional. I wish they could be better embedded.

title: Support alway prompt and on top of issues.
overall_text: Easy to support our members.
pros_text: Easy to fix design, no experience needed. I like the free SSL and also can use my own subdomain for support.
cons_text: Put a day aside to get it organize and be patient.It can Uber frustrated to find how to get it up and running but I think it is the same for everything new.

title: Pleasant surprise to find this for the cost
overall_text: Pros:Great for a startup looking for great value for price.The interface is well done and it seems like there is a ton of good functionality.
pros_text: Cons:Was a little hard to customize the FAQ at first. Spent a good deal of time trying to figure it out.Ended up with something simple, but it works for now.

title: ZOHO Desk has revolutionised our support process
overall_text: We had outgrown our current support process and needed a product that was flexible, easy to use and would integrate with the way we work.ZOHO desk is just that! Highly configurable, flexible and works the way we want to work so very minimal impact on current users.I would highly recommend people looking for a new help desk system to give this a go.
pros_text: flexibility
cons_text: non

title: It is Great tool for Ticket Management
overall_text: Pros:Easy to use, have good features, we were looking for software that caters to our ticketing and we can set-up multiple e-mails and it works with ZOHO desk.
pros_text: Cons:The Desk Plau-in should be offered along with CRM products and should be integrated with it and we don't need to buy it separately.

title: Awesome Support Desk Tool
overall_text: Pros:We have been using Zoho Desk tool for a month now and have been very happy with the software. It has helped our team to get back to client on time and increase the customer satisfaction.
pros_text: Cons:The initial setup does take some time but the Zoho team was always available to help us out.

title: Powerful and highly configurable
overall_text: Pros:Lots of features and configuration. I am impressed by how many features it provides especially on customization.
pros_text: Cons:Most helpdesk solutions also have a livechat function but Zoho is a bit weak in the livechat area compared to other competitors. I end up using another set of livechat

title: Terrific platform
overall_text: Pros:Using Zoho has given us all the horsepower that we would expect from more expensive CRM platform, but with a level of flexibility that allows us to customize it for our needs.
pros_text: Cons:The amount of manual setup required to move our KB over from Confluence has exceeded our original projections.

title: Very Useful Software
overall_text: Pros:I use this software every day to follow all my jobs and my teamwork too. It's very easy to use and understand. All details of a project in the same place.
pros_text: Cons:I don't have Cons so far. All is good. My emails work perfectly.I can check all my tickets and follow my teamwork.

title: Great support tool for our small startup
overall_text: Pros:- Easy to use.- Intuitive- Easy to manage all tickets and users.- Simple and clear user interface.
pros_text: Cons:More features for the free version would be nice, but anyway you get quite a lot for the free version and it's enough to start supporting your startup and switch to paid plan later.

title: Great customer support chat
overall_text: Pros:This is a great tool to manage each case with your clients. There are a lot of aspects that can be customized, I love it.
pros_text: Cons:Is not difficult but it takes so long to set it up. I think is great for the customers but for the administrators it takes a while to understand every aspect of it.

title: Organised and we never miss a task
overall_text: Organisation
pros_text: Zoho Desk covers all our needs as we have many emails and with Zoho Desk we can manage and we are not over whelmed
cons_text: When you have closed a ticket then the customer responds this response can get missed as well as new tickets can get auto allocated to the wrong department

title: Amazing
overall_text: I don't have to pay for multiple apps because this one provides a them
pros_text: It's really a one stop shop for all of your helpdesk needs. There are many great features bundled into this one app!
cons_text: The interface is clean, but somewhat complex. It wouldn't be easy for a novice to set up and use the interface.

title: ZOHO DESK Review
overall_text: I hope we can manage our managed services task with the help of Zoho Desk and make our customer happy with our services.
pros_text: I like the most 1. Easy to use GUI2. Feature rich tool to handle managed services
cons_text: Costing model should be improved by providing for bulk agnets instead of per agent

title: Easy to use!
overall_text: Pros:This software is great and easy to use. The integrations to our social media and the 24 hour support is great to have! Love to get the analyzed reports and updates
pros_text: Cons:We have no issues with Zoho Desk. They are helpful and the software is a tool that helps us out each day

title: Lots of features
overall_text: Pros:Great custom branding options allows you to make it look and feel however you want.lots of features.
pros_text: Cons:The con is that there are so many features and options, it can be confusing to use as an admin and often have to look up how to do simple things. UI should be improved for admins.

title: Good free help desk software
overall_text: Pros:I like that the software is free and has enough features to get a small company by until it is time to upgrade.

title: This software is very efficient when it comes to a service and help desk

title: Convenient and reasonably priced
overall_text: Freshdeskfrom our users is crucial as a consumer app. With Freshdesk, our customers can quickly and easily send us comments or concerns, and my staff can quickly and simply respond and stay in touch with the customer. Each feedback ticket may then be monitored to ensure it was addressed and resolved in a timely manner.
pros_text: We've been using Freshdesk for years and are quite pleased with our decision to switch from Jira. With so many tickets, we quickly outgrew Jira, which caused it to break often and make its interface cumbersome. After years of problems, we finally made the transfer to Freshdesk. When compared to Jira's pricing and functionality, it's hard to top this deal. Since we'd lost our previous wiki and needed to start again, we used Jira's streamlined setup process to create a new one. It's a combination of the help desk's ticketing system, online chat, email, and a comprehensive knowledge library.
cons_text: There is nothing I dislike about Freshdesk. As a support desk tool, it much above our expectations, therefore I will be investigating their other offerings.

title: Excellent customer support ticket system
overall_text: Our team were able to automate and monitor a number of our process workflows thanks to Freshdesk's help. In addition, it is a better choice than emailing support questions and concerns. Freshdesk allows our clients to see their ticket status and ticket history, as well as submit their comments and rating, which simplifies the process of providing excellent customer service.
pros_text: Freshdesk has a wide range of essential services, including live chat, email, phone, and social media support channels. The software is cloud-based and easy to use, with clever automation capabilities that guarantee things are done easily and quickly, resulting in more efficient corporate operations and a better customer experience.
cons_text: Upgrades to Freshdesk's reporting feature are, in my opinion, overly pricey for individual agents and users. There is a good thing about Freshdesk's free trial plan since it allows us to test out their vast variety of services before making a decision on whether or not to upgrade our business.

title: Freshdesk -small IT Team, large campus. NO problem!
overall_text: My overall experience moving our helpdesk operations to Freshdesk was extremely positive and simple to implement.We started out with the free trial and quickly decided to purchase the Pro version.Our productivity with ticket management increased beyond what my expectations were and the fact that we could keep the tickets forwarded the same way through an existing email address made the transition process transparent to the rest of the community.
pros_text: We made the move to Freshdesk because of its features and Mobile app.Immediately, my team found the interface far superior to our previous helpdesk application.The filtering and merging of tickets allows us to keep track of our busy workload while the mobile app helps us stay updated while on the go across our 200 acre campus.We can see in realtime what is happening with a ticket status and can respond accordingly.No time is wasted because of duplication.We have also built out our solutions section with FAQ articles that we can easily link in our tickets.When you have a team of 3 for 180 FTE, 700 students and 1,500 parent constituents that you provide technical support to, you need a tool like Freshdesk to keep you as agile and efficient as possible!
cons_text: We currently only use Freshdesk in the IT dept.I would love to expand our school's use of Freshdesk to other areas but the per agent cost may become a barrier to doing this.

title: Lacking rudimentary filter/show by date range feature, terrible for recordkeeping
overall_text: Mediocre at best - it does what every other support desk system does - assign & distribute tickets, some automation etc. etc. I've submitted the above feature request for very basic date based filter & displays that any email system should have and what is supposed to be an advanced business management tool completely lacks this.
pros_text: For years I've been asking for date filters - something as simple as see all emails sent by this client between 2020-04-10 to 2020-04-15 - NOTHING.To make matters worse, when looking at older emails in a list, it doesn't even show the date - it will show some ambiguous phrase like About a year ago which lumps in a 6 month period.If you want accurate tracking of communication, forget it. If you have one off emails that you'll never need to see again once resolved, maybe.If it weren't for the fact we have so many existing records with this company we'd switch but we are stuck, and years of asking them for a simple feature to either allow date based searches OR at least display actual date of email, has been futile. Regret having chose this as our support desk provider for our team of 8!
cons_text: The lack of basic and very simple features such as filtering emails/communication by date, or even displaying an accurate date. What business runs on emails that show the date on a list as About A Year Ago?Absolutely horrible for business management or record keeping. If you want to manage long term relationship with clients and be able to look up conversations quickly, DO NOT USE FRESHBOOKS.

title: Good software, support a let down
overall_text: Painful in terms of getting what we need. The software is good but everything else around it is a let down
pros_text: The system is comprehensive with a lot of features and plugins
cons_text: The setup process was painful. Call after call booked in with nothing really being achieved. We ended up figuring most things out ourselves. Ongoing support when there are issues is painfully slow and I feel most of the guys supporting don't understand the system fully themselves

title: Simple but powerful ticket system
overall_text: Overall positive feedback. We would like to see features be able to be added on ala cart.we would also like easier integrations such as billing and inventory software to easier manage items being sold.
pros_text: We can keep track of our tickets and see them grouped in the dashboard. I can see at a glance if anything is overdue and what is actively open. I can run metrics to see how many tickets on average we get incoming per day.The field service add on allows us to have customer sign their work order upon completion and keep track of time.
cons_text: Certain features are not ala cart. Depending on the feature you want, you'd have to upgrade your whole plan and get even more features that you might now want. sometimes when we are replying in a ticket, the curser jumps to the beginning. We haven't been able to figure out if its a keyboard combination or shortcut that is doing it, or something else.

title: An Iconic and Straightforward Help Desk Tool.
overall_text: It provides 24/7 customer support thus increasing customer satisfaction.
pros_text: It is simple to communicate and engage with our customers in multiple communication channels via live chat,calls,emails and SMS using Freshdesk.It streamlines and automates customer service workflows.It handles and responds to our customers enquiries faster.
cons_text: I lack anything to complain about this Help Desk tool.
