cons_text: - the new 'mint' view is a huge pain- searching is a joke. dont even bother trying.- support agent statistics are almost never accurate.

title: An indispensable tool in my business
overall_text: Enables me to be effective in my business and ensures satisfied clients. Provides me with full control and visibility of ticketing status.
pros_text: Powerful functionality, easy to use, superb support and affordable. The software provides a professional representation of my business and ensures happy clients as all issues and requirements can be handled efficiently without ever dropping's the ball
cons_text: One or two minor areas that could be more intuitive but certain these will be attended to. Eg is selection of from/to periods. Find the mobile application to not be that good or comfortable to use.

title: Easy to use tools for a digital company
overall_text: Pros:I love the way this software accepts a number of sources creating tickets in a unique interface that simplifies agents life when replying to customers.It doesn't matter if we get emails or whatsapp messages or other messaging system, they all converge in a single system where we can forget about the source and concentrate on customer needs.
pros_text: Cons:The price for a singlelicense :DSince we would need many licenses to experience the full capabilities of FD but have a tight budget restriction, that's what I like least.

title: Great support
overall_text: Pros:Support. Solution of an issue in minutesSolid options for different communication channels (email, chat, phone...)Solid API allowing integration with our softwareRelative ease of setup and maintenance of product family.
pros_text: Cons:Backup and export/import options. It is not possible to export/backup parts of the data individually (all or nothing). Some parts are missing in backups (manly related to localization)Localization is not supported from the beginning, requiring purchase of more expensive packages (localization not available on lower priced packages).

title: I use Freshdesk everyday to keep track of and complete a wide array of different tasks for clients.
overall_text: This software has allowed me to organize my work effectively, and ensure that all my clients get their tasks done accurately, and on time.
pros_text: I like the features designed to make sorting different tasks from my clients easier. The Scenario feature allows me to efficiently sort all my different tasks from numerous clients. Without this feature, I'd have to spend much more time organizing my work each morning.
cons_text: While I am quite comfortable with Freshdesk, I have found that my clients sometimes have a hard time navigating the software. It could be a little more user-friendly for beginners.

title: Freshdesk increases service efficiency.
overall_text: Freshdesk is a tool that has helped a lot in the management of internal problems, through the tickets that are opened in it. It is possible to solve problems at a higher speed and this increases the efficiency of the support team.
pros_text: It is easy to use and has a nice interface. It is possible to survey the productivity of technicians throughout the day. Through it, it is possible to receive immediate feedback of the service performed, making it possible to always improve the performance of the service provided. Old tickets can be easily located, if necessary. Another good point is that if multiple people are solving a single problem, it is possible to know which person is contributing information to remedy the problem.
cons_text: I think it should be possible to customize the software. Another thing that does not please much is the value spent on the product, it is a little above the amount I think fair.

title: My Experience while using Freshdesk for 2 Years
overall_text: My Overall experience is satisfactory with FreshDesk
pros_text: The most Useful features are Easy to use User Interface, Easy Searching options with the help of Ticket Numbers, Ease to send New mails, create New Tickets, add notes in the Working tickets and easy to assign the cases to the Colleagues
cons_text: Sometimes the User Interface got hang after using for long time when using at home or in Home Wi-fi, then to resolve this problem I have to Log-Out Freshdesk and Log-in again.

title: Freshdesk - Easy task tracking!
overall_text: I use this within our organization to manage support tickets between clients and internal stakeholders. It is great to track progress, assign tasks, and keep track of project life cycles. I use this in my daily workflow and can't imagine not using it!
pros_text: Freshdesk is super easy to use and manage tasks between people within an organization as well as external contacts that are able to submit tickets as well. I enjoy how it keeps tracking of points across the organization so you can see the score board compared to other people - it makes things fun!
cons_text: It isn't super user friendly in the beginning - there is a learning curve that generally requires training. However, after that initial hurdle the system is fairly simple to use.

title: Have used it since I did support myself and still use it with a team
overall_text: Pros:Freshdesk has done a great job of expanding its capabilities since I started using it over a year ago. You can tell the team behind it is passionate about making support suck less and is trying to create as many tools as they can as fast as possible to make our lives easier. They've added live chat, a mobile support sdk, and embedded widgets just recently and they're not slowing down. I've dealt with their support as well and they're fast to reply and really know how to solve problems.That said, they haven't lost touch with what I came to them for, ticketing. Freshdesk handles tickets and support team access to those like pros. Canned responses, reminders, contact
pros_text: Cons:The UI of the admin interface is a bit dated and ugly, therefore the same with the customer portals. We don't use the portals externally, though, so it's not a huge issue for us. One issue I had due to lack of explanation within the software was that deleted contacts also block all incoming emails (auto archives) from those contacts without warning, so don't delete any! Caused a lot of confusion for a half hour until we reached their support.

title: Efficient and robust
overall_text: Pros:The software makes tracking customer support issues easy. Tickets can be moved between teams or individuals. There are many automation options that help manage ticket assignment, replies to customers and more. The customer service is always quick, friendly and efficient - even though we don't always get the answer we want. :)
pros_text: Cons:For a small company with a small team, it can be a little expensive, but they do have graduated plans (fewer features, less cost). The reporting features aren't as customization as we would like and don't always meet our needs.

title: Amazing social integration app!!!
overall_text: We initially introduced the product to increase the efficiency and productivity of our agents. This has lead to our ques decreasing and many satisfied customers on our social media pages, as our response time has gone up and the unhappy customers have gone down due to our great service, all thanks to this product.
pros_text: I love how I can assign certain incoming queries to certain teams or agents. We previously struggled with this and since we managed to get it right, it has increased our overall productivity and also contributed to our reporting which has become much more easy to read and understand. We now know exactly who was working on what, when and why :)
cons_text: The only con is the features you miss when you don't purchase the premium package. Other than that this software has greatly helped our company.

title: Freshdesk the Best Option
overall_text: Awesome software to work with that makes work really easy. Would definitely recommend anyone.
pros_text: It's simple to use; you can easily set it up and begin using it in a matter of minutes.Users can avoid the headache of server maintenance because the program is web-based.They can receive regular updates on new functions and features.Regarding integration and functionality, it is quite adaptable and adjustable.The provider provides dependable technical assistance, and their friendly representatives respond quickly to your concerns if you run into any issues with any feature.It has a lot of information stored in it, including FAQs, which aids new users in resolving problems independently.Cheap
cons_text: A small improvement should be made to the reporting module.The premium prices per agent are a bit expensive.

title: Quality Product and Support
overall_text: Happy, good support and account management and good value for money compared to other services in the market
pros_text: It is forever improving and take our feedback into consideration for improvementsSupport and the Account Managers always pro-actively reach out to us and provide guidance on best practice on how to use the platform
cons_text: How we manage our different support levels within Freshdesk makes it sometimes difficult to report accurately on 'First Response times' (for example private notes are not considered first response)

title: Email Platform Feedback
overall_text: Experience is fine, customer service is good but need to work on system enhancement more
pros_text: This is an excellent platform for gettingemails ticketing and ensure all people are aware of customer solutions. Enable great extension of access for admin to understand everything in details to manage operations
cons_text: This tools is not that great in terms of development as per client requirement which need to work upon

title: Excellent applicationfor customer service!
overall_text: Pros:The application is easy to setup and very user friendly. Customer support has become very efficient and effective. The chatbot, ticketing service and time tracking has helped immensely.
pros_text: Cons:The ticketing feature in terms of the status of the ticket can become a bit complicated sometimes. For instance, if I want to send that ticket to a colleague then I need to make sure that i change the status to open. Otherwise, my colleague wont be able to see it.

title: Modernising our support system ... and replacing RT
overall_text: Much more efficient way of working and engaging with customers, previously we copied/pasted from emails into our 'old ticketing system', with Freshdesk the customer emails result in a tickets raised automatically including all the later correspondence. Easy to read presentation of information and easy to use but powerful filtering enables the team to locate the records they need. The communication back to customers is increased and with ticket management features ensuring that the team are working in the right way to meet SLA targets and customer expectations.
pros_text: The ease of use is great but also the fact this is 'software as a service', no installation just configuration to take into account our particular business processes
cons_text: Would like to see a range of reports that are tailored to what 'our' customers would like to see

title: Good product... less than stellar support
overall_text: Pros:All our helpdesk tickets come into FD and we run our consulting business with those tickets.The email integration is great.The automation is good.The ability to configure the product for our specific needs is excellent.All in all, it's been a good investment for us because it gives us the ability to serve thousands of customer requests annually.
pros_text: Cons:Support is slow and largely ineffective.When a ticket gets a long thread of email, more than about 50 messages, it really bogs down the browser.Product doesn't get much in the way of upgrades.

title: Customer Support for Customer Support
overall_text: Being able to control support queries and set up rules that allocate them to certain groups is overwhelmingly helpful. This not only saves time but ensures that no query is missed.
pros_text: I love the flexibility of this product and how it streamlines all of the support queries that come through to our company. The layout and ease of communication between clients and even colleagues makes the job a whole lot easier.
cons_text: The customization of emails is very limited, more so to do with the editing of text. However, there are workarounds but I believe this is a feature that can definitely be improved.

title: Its good but difficult to use
overall_text: Pros:it is a good option when it comes to giving support, you can create tickets using the web page, using email, using a floating chat that you can insert in your html pages and using facebook. Track work and time for each task, you can create groups of people. It is a good way to offer support to your users.
pros_text: Cons:I have been using it for 2 years in my company, it fulfills its function well, but some menus are somewhat confusing, they have options that basically mean the same thing. Multilingual translation is partial, it does not offer a full translation.

title: Great product and good value.
overall_text: This has improved our ability to manage large volume requests in a timely fashion.
pros_text: Ability to manage the status of tickets. The customer service is also very good.
cons_text: Not always very obvious how to set something up (example out-of-office replies).

title: Fresdesk is a good ticket management tool
overall_text: Pros:It helped me a lot to balance the load of tickets to my staff (agents), additionally it is super useful in terms of SLA time reports, how long a ticket lasted, who attended, what satisfaction the customer had.
pros_text: Cons:the support they provide is limited and it is not in Spanish (my native language)

title: Great tool for all your helpdesk needs
overall_text: Overall awesome! Super happy we chose Freshworks. I have no regrets and no other software I’d like to use. Everything works in our daily tasks and flows smoothly.
pros_text: The ease of use and look/feel of the product were the best we’ve seen. This tool is such a blessing to my team. Freshworks pulled us out of a jam with two other softwares that were not accomplishing our needs and it’s exactly what my team needed! The ticking system is beyond anything else we’ve seen, the product looks great and is super easy and user friendly. Their support team is great too whenever you have a question.
cons_text: There are a few limitations in the product, support requests can take a lot of explanation, and feature requests haven’t been granted for our team in almost a year of using the product.

title: Fresh Desk Review
overall_text: Ability to assure my customers that their issues will be addressed
pros_text: Setting up of timelines.Helps to set up reminders and ensuring that no item is left pending based on tickets that are not closed. Customer satisfaction when they see that their issues are allocated tickets and that someone will take charge to attend to their issues.
cons_text: Increase Agents to at least 4 Agents for the freemium Platform.If you add additional agent subscription you lose the freemium option for the entire account

title: A feature-rich support ticket system
overall_text: Overall the experience with Freshdesk has been very positive and we will continue using it to for the foreseeable future.
pros_text: We were able to implement Freshdesk quickly within our organisation, and setup a lot of automated functionality for responding to tickets which saved valuable time for all teams involved.
cons_text: It took some time to learn the dashboard and discover all the features available on the platform - this could be resolved with more in-depth training for new users.

title: Great customer support software
overall_text: My experience with Freshdesk has been good so far. My team and I have been using it for the past 2 years now. A while back there even an update (Freshdesk Mint) that brought about new UI and some new dashboard functionality. Like it so far.
pros_text: Its a great software. Really help me and my team to deal with the huge volume of emails we were constantly getting from out customers. The ability to create teams, filters and scenarios is something i really appreciate about this software.
cons_text: There are some issues with temporary email bounce back that occurs very rarely. Hoping for a definitive fix for this

title: Pros and Cons of Freshdesk.
overall_text: Overall, I personally feel Freshdesk is user friendly and reliable tool to track the requests, export the data and have the productivity data stored in one place.
pros_text: Freshdesk is one of the most convenient and user friendly ticketing tool. The way it's structured based on the groups,agents,teams,priority status, it really reduces a lot of manual work. The best part about freshdesk is, it eases the tracking way. Users from multiple teams can track the request and check the status if the issue has been resolved. The multi functional use of Freshdesk makes it even more user friendly like report generation, automatic allocation, creating canned response etc.
cons_text: There are very less cons, i feel it would be more convenient if the aging pattern in the freshdesk for a particular ticket is improved. And bucketing the tickets to the agent as per the groups. Aprt from these, no cons.

title: Promising offering but not delivering it
overall_text: It works, it is affordable, I wouldn't recommend it when compared to other tools out there.
pros_text: Freshworks tools offer 360 customer experience and their ticketing system is a core of everything. Their multilingual support is one of the best in the market.
cons_text: Tools is really inefficient and their automation tools are built by people with very little CSX experience. Everything needs to be hacked somehow. Also, it doesn't integrate with chat as good as other tools (such as Intercom). Indian customer support with little clue about the product.

title: FreshDesk As The Perfect Virtual Assistant
overall_text: I have been able to manage multiple queries without any issue and reply to all incoming queries in a professional way. I definitely recommend.
pros_text: Before using FreshDesk, it was really difficult to keep with the increasing amount of increasing emails and customer support request. FreshDesk helped me not only to organize this but also included custom response, which greatly enhanced the customer support experience for all parties. Perfect ticketing features.
cons_text: The paid plans starts at $25 per agent monthly. I believe that this is still expensive and should be lowered.

title: Freshdesk Review
overall_text: Freshdesk application is an awesome platform to use for customer/user support.
pros_text: Freshdesk makes it easy to track support tickets raised by the company users. It gives accurate numbers of open and resolved tickets. Also, make collaborations between support agents easy.
cons_text: A visual representation feature that tracks open / resolved tickets can be added.

title: New to Freshdesk
overall_text: We are still not live with full implementation yet but will be very soon.Currently while testing the bulk updates to tickets are such a time saver and helpful when managing an outage or bug.
pros_text: --The SUPPORT,starting the implementation of this software I loved the support provided.It was huge to be able to set up webinars to demo the software to our team.The live chats...saved me so much time.If I was struggling with getting logic perfect for automated tickets I could resolvewith chat very quickly.
cons_text: Currently,I don't like how responses to tickets are captured on the dashboard.This is likely just a user error and I need to adjust the settings so that each response doesn't look like a new ticket.

title: Freshdesk: Great concepts and customer service, but lacking in depth
overall_text: Allows me to organize customer service calls by adding notes to calls to keep track of customer service inquiries.It is easy to share things with teammates around tickets.
pros_text: It allows me to call people using a service line.It records both incoming and outgoing calls and allows me to take notes on them and tag them and assign them to different teams.Emailing between teams is easy and the notification system allows you to easily share tickets, conversations, etc with other teams members. There customer service response chat box is top notch with quick responses and helpful tips.
cons_text: I wish it transcribed part of the conversation for you.Merging tickets can be cumbersome.the metrics needed to measure certain data points can be difficult to achieve with the base options for how to organize tickets.Features often seems buried within a multitude of steps and can be complex.

title: Bang for you Buck! Clearly the easiest and most convenient product for Supporting!
overall_text: Have been using it for more than 2 years now. Now that I have learned the admin panel entirely, I can do pretty much everything. The main thing which makes this product stand out is the wide range of features and the simplicity to implement them. (e.g. SSO).
pros_text: The wide range of features.Customer Support (they are very proactive!)Ability to take control of the entire support process.Visually interactive reports to assess your progress.And most important- great features to block spams!
cons_text: The admin panel is a bit tricky for the first timers! But once you get used to it, it works like magic!

title: Let down by reports
overall_text: Pros:The system itself is great and does everything I need. I have used across two companies and it suits our needs and helps us greatly. It’s user friendly and quick to set up.
pros_text: Cons:New analytics suite isn’t very good compared to the previous reporting they had available. Constantly wrong data

title: A good alternative, not so simple to use, but with many possibilities in terms of functionalities
overall_text: We have been through several similar applications for some time and this is the one that has worked best for us. It has a good and easy integration with some other tools (like gmail or chat) and its user interface is friendly, making this a useful tool
pros_text: The ease with which it can be integrated with various applications is undoubtedly a great point in favor. It also has many features and its graphical interface is highlighted (even more in comparison with other similar applications that tend to be relatively bad in this regard)
cons_text: Although the handling in general is intuitive, the dashboard for the handling of the cases has some details that if not taken into account are not entirely intuitive: in particular when using the predetermined filters.

title: Software that is still evolving
overall_text: This was the first software used for Customer Support on the website and a stepping stone. Moved to Gorgias that works well with Shopify.
pros_text: User-friendly software and worked with previous software before upgrading to Shopify
cons_text: Support was unreliable and not helpful as the team was passed off to other representatives. More frustrating then helpful

title: Fantastic & Effortless service
overall_text: Wehandle different types of tickets which is created by different clients usually to receive queries from users and solve the queries. It is time based and easy tocommunicate with the clients and also share tickets within the organization to the correct or respective department.
pros_text: The product is user friendly, easy to use. All response can be saved. Keeps record of tickets for future use. Does not take up much time.
cons_text: The fact that users can open old tickets about a year back. That needs to be changed as users response will go to the support agent even is the are no longer here it should automatically create a new ticket to the companies email address. or the ticket number should expire after 3 months so that it can not be reused once closed or resolved.

title: Ottimo per l'assistenza
overall_text: Ottimo Software per helpdesk .tutti i ticket monitorati e salvati.
pros_text: Sistema allerta/notifica in tempo reale, semplice da usare e funzionale... ottimo software per assistenza ai clienti.Le richieste possono arrivare anche dai social, quindi hai la possibilità di dare al cliente più opzioni
cons_text: nessuno, a volte le notifiche in ritardo.

title: A great easy to use tool
overall_text: A very good entry point with a lot of features and a robust marketplace.
pros_text: Ease of use - very simple to set up and a great price point.
cons_text: I wish it had stronger integrations to channels like Facebook and instagram. We have to use plugins for these that are not very strong. Additionally I wish it had more customization on the CSAT. Lastly - the charts on the mobile app are not very usable as you can't save filters and to change filters on mobile is almost impossible.

title: Take control of your support desk and function!
overall_text: It’s changed our service desk and the level of service we now provide to our end customers. Quite simply once this is setup correctly it will transform your customer experience…
pros_text: I don’t know where to start; this software streamlines our support function, interaction with key customers and is an invaluable tool to look back on those requests.
cons_text: There are certain features that are easier on a PC. I guess making those that bit easier on the mobile app would be the only thing left to look at. Overall a fabulous product.

title: Freshdesk Software and Support
overall_text: I opened a ticket with Freshdesk months ago where a feature was not available in the Mint desktop, not a big issue really but I thought they should know.Support had said they were aware of it and were working on a fix.I didn't expect any reply further and just thought it would be fixed, however, they emailed me later to let me know it had been fixed.
pros_text: Freshdesk's pricing comes in much lower than it's competitors and includes many of the same features.
cons_text: Some of the Mint desktop features are not available but are in the classic Freshdesk.However, it's easy to switch back and forth between Mint and classic.

title: Freshdesk: Empowering productivity with streamlined efficiency and flexible functionality
overall_text: Pros:Its flexible functionality, cost-effectiveness and streamlined approach.
pros_text: Cons:With cost-effectiveness of Freshdesk, its pricing should be seen as reasonable, however it can be thought as a bit expensive in the viewpoint of some other users.
cons_text: Reasons for Switching to Freshdesk:Because Freshdesk is more cost-effective.

title: Great customer support product
overall_text: Simplicity, visibility of ticket status and agent performance.
pros_text: It is a well-thought customer support product with easy to use UI for agents, managers and specially customers.
cons_text: It would be great having a workflow engine that allows a multi-user process to be triggered by a ticket type.For example our RMA tickets. There are at least 80 steps that need to happen once a ticket is determined to be an RMA. Each step needs to be tracked (who did it, when), some of the steps need to be sequential, some in parallel. I can get into more detail if you contact me.

title: Very Useful Helpdesk Application
overall_text: We use FreshDesk for Helpdesk and support call processing to our Customer Base which is over 2,500 customers in the USA. Overall we love the product and it has helpd us create and maintain a much more efficient support team and process for our customers.
pros_text: My favorite functionality of FreshDesk is the ability to track call volume by product we support and ticket type as well as different groups and sources.
cons_text: I wish the Mobile App allowed for reports and the user interface on the Mobile App was more flexible. I also wish the Customer/Company info would sync with our CRM which is Sugar CRM.

title: Amoldable a nuestras necesidades
overall_text: PrácticoForma de estar conectado con el equipo rápido y sencillo aunque estemos todos teletrabajandoCompartir documentos fiable y robustaAbrir y gestión de tickets
pros_text: Pues lo sencillo que es de usarlo. Antes usaba un programa muy parecido y el cambio a Freshdesk no me ha costado trabajo.
cons_text: De momento no he echado nada en falta de Freshdesk y las herramientas que he utilizado me han funcionado genial.

title: Reliable and helpful
overall_text: Overall excellent
pros_text: easy to useautomationproblem management
cons_text: Native dark modeautomation option need to improvelimited reporting options

title: Good for engineering customer bases.
overall_text: Overall this software tool has been exceptionally useful to our operation.Freshdesk has been a valuable tool for solving our growing need for trackable customer interaction.
pros_text: Our primary requirement for helpdesk software was that customer emails must arrive at the support agent's view unmodified from the sender's original intent.Freshdesk wins this contest hands-down with the most accurate rendering of the original email.
cons_text: Operational rule sets could be more powerful if they included a full set of logic functions with both include and exclude capabilities.

title: Freshdesk is a robust yet easy ticket system
overall_text: We have had a very good experience with Freshdesk. As our needs evolve we are finding Freshdesk is able to meet our needs every step of the way and we still have not exhausted all the tools at our disposal.
pros_text: We like that the system can be as simple or complex for the tech support team as we need or want. Our users can also engage by just sending an email or by using the customer portal. Support has been very responsive when we needed it.
cons_text: The best reports are only available with the higher tier subscriptions and the added features are not enough to justify the cost.

title: Intuitive, robust and awesome customer support
overall_text: I have been using Freshdesk for 2 very differents businesses and it always delivered. My favorite part is the Customer Support who has always been very efficient.
pros_text: It's intuitive: you can set up your own helpdesk in a few clicks and begin to support very quickly.It's robust: the down times are very, very rare.The customer support is amazing: they are reactive and very efficient, even when you are on a free plan.
cons_text: The new Mint version has some lag issues from times to times but nothing too bad.I find the first plan prices a bit steep for small companies.

title: Whenever I submit a ticket, I get a response within a couple of hours, if not sooner.
overall_text: It's our main customer support portal, so it's the key to everything in our business. It goes without saying that a bad customer ticketing system would kill our production, efficiency, and ultimately our sales renewals.
pros_text: Ease of use, customization options. Customer support has resolved each of my issues/questions within a day.All the functions are pretty easy to understand and explain to others
cons_text: Sometimes I wish there was an option to not accept an update. There are a lot of functions in Freshdesk, which we like, but we also spent a lot of time setting them up to our needs.

title: reseña Freshdesk
overall_text: buena, flexible y adaptable a mi organización. amigable para entender y explicar a los agents y clientes
pros_text: es fácil de usar una vez que entiendes como funciona, es flexible y se puede adaptar muy fácil a la operación de la empresa. a los clientes les gusta porque es amigable.
cons_text: no me agrada que sea tan autodidacta, es fácil sentirse sólo en esto. Podrían mejorar en enseñar a los clientes a usarla mejor y a explotar los planes que se contratan. puedes llegar a perder mucho tiempo en aprender a usarla y configurarla

title: Easy to use straight of the box help desk solution
overall_text: Its a great product for a any IT team to use, the simplicity and ease of use is a major selling point.It comes with additional analytics which you can use to track the performance of the team and individuals.
pros_text: Ease of use and simplicity, tickets can be easily followed and tracked.
cons_text: additional features require a higher tier license, which is fair game but I feel as though some features should be included as a standard

title: Freshdesk for Our Small Company
overall_text: Our experience with Freshdesk has been amazing, and we had done a free trial and two demos before we made the final decision. Our end users find the product easy to use, and our customers say it looks a lot more professional that what we originally had.
pros_text: What we like most is how versatile and easy to use this product is. Implementing this product was quick and easy, and any hiccups we had was dealt with quickly.
cons_text: The only con I can think of with this software is that it takes a lot of adjustment to get everything ready for use. All of the settings and documents you have to type up before you can implement it is exhausting, but it pays out in the long run. There's just a lot of upfront work.

title: Excellent customer service ticketing
overall_text: Excellent. It's improved our customer service and some sales.
pros_text: It draws in our tickets from multiple sources, quite quickly so we can respond to customers quickly and effectively.
cons_text: The live chat is clunky and we couldn't implement it as you couldn't turn it off at specific hours of the day, easily. Plus the AI isn't very good.

title: Freshdesk helps our internal communication and activates of an organization.
overall_text: Freshdesk makes internal communication of any organization easy as walking on a cake.
pros_text: We manage the Ticket created for any activity using Freshdesk. Different team like sales, support, delivery and management manage in this window to complete the task. We can enable Remote Access if need. Task are completed Real-time and Consumer-facing Chat is effective. People working in remote can use in Mobile devices itself.Best Real Time Notifications is generated to track the activates.
cons_text: We file difficulty in large File sharing with team. And forwarding is been limited.Ticket status shared with mail supported is always delated.

title: Our team enjoys working with Freshdesk, and their support team is always quick and happy to help!
overall_text: Pros:I think the user interface is easy to understand. Settings are very detailed, automations work great. Reporting is very insightful as well. I always appreciate the customer-centered approach and FD support team's interest to find the best solution for the customer, even if it calls for deeper investigations and creating custom solutions or work-arounds! That makes me confident that if I can't figure something out on Freshdesk, I know that I'll get it sorted when I'll reach out to their Support team.
pros_text: Cons:We would really appreciate an integration with HubSpot. That would really be the cherry on top!Additionally, realtime stats on all reports would be great, too.

title: Highly Recommend this software
overall_text: We as a company use freshdesk every day. It is extremely easy to use with great functions and a simple design that doesn't leave you overwhelmed. We have contacted them via the online chat and support is quick and useful.
pros_text: Extremely useful for companies, easy to use, Freshdesk has various functions that can be tailored to what you need. We use mainly the ticketing system which correctly allocates queries to a specific person in the company. We also use it for our clients to contact us so that the query can be answered efficiently in a timely manor. We also use Freshdesk as an information portal which all clients can access.
cons_text: Customer report section could be tailored more effectively to what the user needs.

title: Freshdesk
overall_text: Simplificou muito meu processo de suporte, também nos ajuda a centralizar consultas do cliente em só lugar, relatórios com métricas
pros_text: Nos permite capturar, rastrear e gerenciar tickets de suporte de várias fontes, como e-mails, chamadas telefônicas, bate-papo ao vivo e redes sociais, Interface intuitiva e fácil de usar, Integração com várias ferramentas populares, como CRM e chat ao vivo, Boa escalabilidade para empresas em crescimento.
cons_text: Alguns recursos avançados podem ser complexos de configurar, Os planos mais avançados podem ter um preço mais alto, Personalização limitada na interface do cliente.

title: About Freshdesk
overall_text: Good
pros_text: The tool is user friendly and also cost is very affordable
cons_text: Its reporting & analytics tools which they are yet to improve

title: Easy, intuitive and a delight to use.
overall_text: Easy to control and manage my company support team, having statistics, reports and visually overview of how good are we attending our post sales costumers.
pros_text: I personally use Freshdesk at work as level 3 agent (just the most hard support) and I love to use it, The interface is intuitive easy to use and foolproof. Love the rationalization for your Company. Tickets are made automatically by incoming emails from clients, lots of perks.
cons_text: They only thing I don't love is that it has a free level: Sprout, then first paid level Blossom, then Garden and State, Blossom is just too basic, garden is just basic +, the wonderful level is State but cost per agent per month and become a little steep, still cheaper than SalesForce, etc. but from Basic level to sweet level he difference is much, It will wonderful if the State level would cost in that price range much companies will use it.

title: Friendly and Affordable Customer Help Platform
overall_text: Freshdesk has established efficient customer help programs, from chats, and direct calls. There is credible customer facilitation for rational business processes.
pros_text: Freshdesk has a straightforward customer support, which has established different engagement structures. More so, Freshdesk has enhanced order, where ticketing is a must to create a stable business functionality.
cons_text: Freshdesk is keen to customers requests, and there is better subscription terms, making the company more compelling.

title: Serves its purpose
overall_text: migration to another data center has been such a pain that we basically gave up. there was no clear explanation on the process from their support, no precise answers, very poor. but the tool itself makes it worth it. if I went to another organisation, I'd choose this tool again for managing support tickets.
pros_text: Our expectations are not super-high. Ticket management is quite easy, their support on chat is very quick in helping with simple inquiries.
cons_text: it is not very flexible when it comes to creating knowledge center for clients.

title: Perfect for small teams!
overall_text: Organizes all the companies incoming email traffic so it can be answered by the appropriate rep.
pros_text: Notice 5 stars on everything - there's a reason.The quality is great - it works as it should.It's easy enough to train new customer service reps.As far as features - there are plenty we don't even use (or are missing!) Customer service is top notch and only an email away.Lastly its hardly noticeable on the budget.
cons_text: The only thing I would change is the interface seems a little dated.With that its still easy to use and accessible

title: Freshdesk is a great CRM for customer support team.
overall_text: Freshdesk has very intuitive user interface that is easy to use. We are ableserve our customers across all our channels from a single dashboard. It t aslo easy to work with many groups by using group filters.
pros_text: Freshdesk has averyintuitive interface thathelps us to see the opened and closed tickets. It's aslo enables us to serve our customers across all channels either in social networks ,emails, websites and SMS messages in a single dashboard. Their customer support team is very responsive and ready to help.
cons_text: Freshdesk reporting can be improved. It's notvery detailed thus missing key information. Other features just works very well for us.

title: Freshdesk A+
overall_text: I am glad that I can rely on Freshdesk to currate and manage our customers support channel experience.
pros_text: Freshdesk has made handling customer support so much easier! I really appreciate that it can sync nicely with GitHub and Stripe. I also appreciate how Freshdesk makes it easy to audit our common ticket types and report on our team's activities.
cons_text: During the change from old to mint Freshdesk, there were some bugs that disrupted our normal customer support processes. However, I should note that these were fixed in a timely manner.

title: Great Application and Excellent Support
overall_text: Very happy with this application and has made a huge difference to our service levels and customer satisfaction!
pros_text: I most enjoy the ease of use my teams have with this application. Being web based means we can access tickets from almost any device and isvery useful when on the road and you need to check on something without the need to make a call.Any issues/queries i have had with FreshDesk i have been able to get support using the built in chat and in most cases resolved/answered there an then, anything needing further investigation is logged as a ticket which i can track via the support portal
cons_text: The dashboards although very good can be a little limited in configuration.

title: Advice from a customer service manager.
overall_text: There's nothing else I would add at this point.
pros_text: Tickets and private notes have been vital to my support team because it keeps every rep in the loop.
cons_text: Needing apps for features that should be included in the software, such as VOIP, because it's just an additional cost. I would prefer a one stop shop experience. Also, I was initially excited about the Arcade because I frequently have support driven contests. The Arcade does not factor in my particular needs in that it's limited to publishing solutions, resolving tickets, and engaging the community. If there was an option to build a quest without the three features in mind, it would open up more opportunities to use the option as I imagine developers intended.

title: Impressive, robust, reliable and very economical customer care managements software
overall_text: This is how we handle customer inquiries.I often cc my Outlook email so that I can track it in fresh desk.
pros_text: Searchability; stability; the way it reminds me of unresolved issues and provides an archive of information about our customers and their needs.
cons_text: The New mint experience seems to be slower than the previous version.I'd like to see this platform transition to an app, rather than being browser based.Ideally, that would speed the reload and refresh operations that i occasionally have to perform.

title: Freshdesk for a small, parttime/hourly team
overall_text: Customer support has been great. But I definitely find myself submitting more tickets and asking more questions than I think should be necessary.
pros_text: Freshdesk has a lot of capabilities, and they've been hard at work deepening their offering, such as advancing specifically in call center and chat capabilities.
cons_text: Migrating to their new product lines, especially FreshCaller, was a nightmare. We rely heavily on Freshdesk as our hub for all tickets and the integration was not a seamless one, requiring agents to have both Freshcaller and Freshdesk open.Agents also had a lot of issues with missed calls and notifications coming through, which resulted in a lot of lost hours with their support team over the phone.

title: Buena aplicacion
overall_text: Pros:Una de las principales ventajas de Freshdesk es su capacidad para centralizar y organizar todas las solicitudes de soporte en un solo lugar, lo que facilita la gestión de las mismas por parte del equipo de atención al cliente. Freshdesk también ofrece una amplia gama de herramientas de automatización, como la asignación automática de tareas y la generación de informes detallados, que ayudan a optimizar el tiempo y la eficiencia del equipo de atención al cliente.
pros_text: Cons:Uno de los mayores contras de Freshdesk es que puede ser un poco complicado de configurar y personalizar, lo que puede llevar a un tiempo de inactividad para los usuarios. Además, puede haber limitaciones en cuanto a la integración con otras herramientas y servicios que la empresa utilice. Para mejorar Freshdesk, se podría trabajar en la simplificación de la configuración y personalización de la plataforma. También podría ser útil añadir más opciones de integración con otras herramientas y servicios. Además, podrían ser útiles mejoras en la funcionalidad de automatización para ayudar a los usuarios a optimizar aún más su tiempo y eficiencia.

title: Easy Customer Support Management and Tracking
overall_text: We love freshdesk!
pros_text: I love using freshdesk for customer support because it makes customer service easy. I love using my to-do list to set specific reminders to follow up on tickets/questions. The interface makes it easy to keep our customers up to date on the status of their ticket as well. We use the FAQ section to add questions and link customers for easy effortless assistance that's easy to navigate because the organization features it offers. Training is even made easier by the ability to store and reference past tickets using the search bar to search the entire text of the ticket!
cons_text: We have not found anything we don't like about Freshdesk.

title: Freshdesk is a Game Changer
overall_text: It keeps us organized and makes our support of our product into a ticketing system.We know who has responsded and what is still open.It's a must have for our organization.
pros_text: It's so easy to customize and it simplifies our support.When we needed help a support person was quickly able to show us on our screen what changes to make and then walked us through testing those changes.All in all, it has been a very positive experience!It's been so easy to keep track of what customers we need to respond to and have a detailed record of our conversations.
cons_text: So far nothing.The only problems I had were quickly resolved by a support person and it was simply making some changes to our configuration.

title: Rich functionality and simplicity for a reasonable price
overall_text: We are handling the support tickets for our cloud base software solution, issued by the end users.
pros_text: I like the most it's rich functionality and simplicity. We just subscribed to it and everything is just works, no downtime at all. It is preconfigured for common scenarios and with the recommended setup we could easily start to use it. Later we extended the configuration with our requirements, fields and processes and it works like a charm!
cons_text: In the Garden plan you are not able to customize the customer portal, so it is not the best experience for the end users.

title: 3 out of 5
overall_text: Overall experience is good. There are issues when it comes to ticket sharing but if I am going to compare this with zendesk, FD far more superior
pros_text: I guess what I like most about Freshdesk is the customer support hotline. They are always available, never have I ever been put on hold for a ridiculous amount of time, Have never experienced rude customer service and have never experienced an agent not getting back to me
cons_text: I don't like it's inefficiency when it comes to communications between different departments inside the company. How our company operates is that we have agents who answers the calls from our external clients and they need to reach out to different departments for assistance and then afterwards, they need to get back to the client. In short, we heavily rely on ticket sharing features because of this. One inefficient scenario is that when someone from a different department needs to send a ticket to another department, they still need to make sure that the ticket is internally shared with them. since the ticket is shared, they have to check in with each other before making updates on the ticket (like closing the ticket for example). This causes double handling on the their part to be honest.

title: Freshdesk
overall_text: It is a good ticketing software and has really boosted my customer support department.
pros_text: It's ticketing is fast and in real time ensuring customer support is smooth and feedback given on time
cons_text: The problem i have had is the Auto-Assign feature has been a little inconsistent at times.

title: Freshdesk User Review
overall_text: It is an ideal tool to use especially to help agents be more accurate in time management
pros_text: Everything we need is here from call monitoring, call recording, taking calls, chat support and documentation
cons_text: It’s performance when distributing calls are imbalance

title: Neutral, I miss a few features
overall_text: We use FD as our mail software, also we use connexion with other soft (slack, Aircall...)
pros_text: Easy to use - Chat to talk to support - Easy set up of settings
cons_text: The lack of overview on the main page, we must create a dashboard for that, and if the view ain't for all agent, you cannot build the data into the dashboard.Also, automations cannot clean up existing tickets

title: This product is excellent in terms of ease of use and configurability. The support has been very goo
overall_text: Advanced reporting capabilities and great flexibility.
pros_text: The configurability options are outstanding. It allows us to manage our workflow in a way that makes sense for us. There are many features available that can be utilized or not at your discretion.
cons_text: There are some basic features such as the ability to blind carbon copy someone when creating an outbound email as a new ticket that are not present. Although there has been a lot of feedback on these items, there does not seem to be much in the way of resolving these basic issues.

title: Excellent solution, great pricing, and helpful support
overall_text: Pros:Has all the features you'd need to provide support for your customers, integrates easily with my app, and is very reasonably priced.
pros_text: Cons:The design of the solutions page/portal is a little old fashioned.
cons_text: Alternatives Considered:Help ScoutandZendesk Suite

title: Great Product - Customer issues all in one place
overall_text: Pros:I love that all of my emails, FB messages, and submissions to our website can all be handled in this one spot. Additionally, there are canned responses, which are essentially pre-writeen answers to the most common questions, allowing me to expedite my responses and move on to other aspects of my daily tasks.
pros_text: Cons:The FB integration feature isn't 100%. I can't always tell when a FB message has been responded to if a team member has used either hootsuite or FB itself to respond when I am out of town.

title: Fresh is Best!
overall_text: Pros:So coming from ServiceNow, FreshDesk feels much more user friendly - and I mean for the people responsible for actively using the thing every single day. Not only do you have access to all the product features that are constantly improving and rolling out, but you also have a direct link to chat with customer support on every single page you are on. Being an admin feels like the ultimate control over our ticketing system that I never had before. If fresh can't do it, the API or workflow automator can!
pros_text: Cons:It costs money! Licenses per agent, and one license can be entirely consumed by an API key if not set up properly..
cons_text: Alternatives Considered:ServiceNow

title: Freshdesk Review
overall_text: Overall, it is a great product for the cost!
pros_text: This software package is a great alternative to higher cost products like ZenDesk. It comes with some great features, allows you to do multiple things with multiple products, and is very cost friendly.
cons_text: The folks that develope FreshDesk aren't the easiest to work with. They are very good at coming up with new products but they don't seem to want to improve current offerings. They do not accept ideas very well and it's almost impossible to get feature requests completed.

title: Ffreshdesk is a very good tool
overall_text: Freshdesk helps me to organize my support job for our customers.
pros_text: I like the ticket system and the information per mail in case of changes to the operater of the ticket. I like that I see an icon if another colleague watches the same ticket. And I liket the good support from Freshworks members about freshdesk iself.
cons_text: I dont like an error messsage. I would like more flexibility with incomming emails inside a ticket.

title: Freshdesk Rocks!
overall_text: Overall, Freshdesk has helped our business achieve better support results and there technical support is fast, easy to speak to and make sure an issue is fixed before leaving the customer.
pros_text: Freshdesk has changed the way we work as a team and has made managing tickets far easier than our previous help desk system.Freshdesk has made ticket resolution quicker and helped keep customers informed of progress.
cons_text: Freshdesk does had some odd licensing categories and it would be nice if some of the more technical features were available in the lower categories.Would be nice if there was a URL we could set with automatic Google Authentication for login to reduce the confusion users face on the login screen.

title: Great Product At a Great Price!
overall_text: With FreshDesk, our support team can now easily access important information at the click of a button (using Canned Responses and Support Articles) to share with customers instantly. No more hunting down documents in a random folder somewhere deep in the shared network drive hierarchy. Just search using key words, and all the matching articles just pop up for easy insertion into an email.
pros_text: FreshDesk allows our office to pull in information that has been stored in various locations (Google Drive, shared network drive, Trello, Slack) into one easy to use platform for handling support requests. We even have the ability to manage all email and communication through FreshDesk, which means that instead of having five different productivity products open at the same time on my computer, I can simply have FreshDesk open and manage everything from one place. Super time-saver!
cons_text: There are a few quirky behaviors. The inability to fully customize ticket views to make them appear the way we want is sometimes a minor frustration. Also, the ability to filter for certain contacts and then email those contacts as a group directly seems like it should be an option, but it isn't. We have to manually add each individual to an email communication.

title: Best Helpdesk on Market
overall_text: Pros:The ability to manage support for multiple products and brands is what Freshdesk offers unlike any others., and what makes it best on the market. One could start their own outsource/contracted support company by using Freshdesk.
pros_text: Cons:As the company has grown over the last few years, some features and functions I believe should be part of Freshdesk, have been placed in other applications offered by parent company Freshworks. Thus, in my opinion, degrading the expected enhancements for Freshdesk itself.

title: Does what I need it to
overall_text: Pros:It gets the job done, and for free! We use the free version and it allows our customers to submit/create support tickets, support specialists to reply back, link to JIRA tickets, view comments/progress on the ticket (for everyone), and track open/closed/overdue tickets. Nice to look back at resolutions to create FAQs.
pros_text: Cons:I'm sure if we had the paid version, it would be better, but there are some features I feel the free version lacks - such as adding a keyword to a ticket for searching and reports to see the % of tickets submitted under that keyword (different from the ticket subject line since you can't change that if it is created by a customer).

title: Freshdesk
overall_text: Pros:I use everyday Freshdesk solution. It's easy to use and has useful and powerful options to give support to my customers.
pros_text: Cons:All features are useful adn easy to use.
cons_text: Switched From:Zendesk Suite

title: Great Product, easily customisable
overall_text: We were searching a holistic solution which can help us with ticket logging via email but do suppress repetitive mail to same issue into one ticket. Freshdesk was an excellent solution for it
pros_text: Ease of use, customising on the go, changing ticket fields of your choice,
cons_text: Limitation on number of agents , blossom plan should support minimum 5 agents

title: Our bread and butter for continuous improvement
overall_text: FreshDesk was implemented before I took over ticket management within our business but I instantly saw a platform with potential to gather customised insight to aid us in our continuous improvement. The customer support team are always prompt and helpful. Couldn't recommend them enough!
pros_text: FreshDesk is as easy to implement as it is easy to customise. This allows us to to apply the insight we need from a ticketing solution ourselves and then present it back to us in valuable reports that are easy to use.
cons_text: So far FreshDesk has done everything I have wanted it to.

title: Beginning with Freshdesk
overall_text: I'm a beginner on that, but i´m very glad
pros_text: this features: user friendly, multichannel, SaaS
cons_text: that it hasn't some feature to manage planned task, and resource management

title: Review for Freshdesk
overall_text: Pros:The speed of this app is really good.It helps in assigning tracking and delivering services to the stakeholders.It is easy to use and very intuitive.The customer support is also very responsive and helps in resolving the issue of any kind.
pros_text: Cons:Sometimes it becomes difficult to resolve a simple mistake that can be rectified very easily.Some features can be upgraded otherwise its a good app to work with

title: Freshdesk Game changer
overall_text: Pros:For a beginner I'd highly recommend Freshdesk as it is effective for data capturing and keeping track of reports. It has excellent searching capability ,quick accessibility and an easy-to-use software, even with the interface. It has proven itself in many ways and I'm even loving the fact that all my data is encrypted using AES-256-bit standards, really works well with my CRM ,the workflow keeps me on my A game.
pros_text: Cons:The shortcuts on the software can be a bit tricky, and some time its backward navigation is not the most reliable .but either than that, I've just been providing the best customer services with this amazing tool.
cons_text: Switched From:Tidio

title: Review for freshservice
overall_text: It is a must have product as per my point of view to develop a growth and manage your tasks
pros_text: It is one stop solution for every thing to manage the problems as well as the time taken for particular task
cons_text: As of now everything i like about it. there are no such dislikes

title: They have problems with invoicing, don't use them!
overall_text: Pros:Easy to use. We were using this software for a couple of years, but they have very bad support right now. We're switching to some alternative cos. of their support.
pros_text: Cons:Very very bad product support. I've been trying to get my invoice for couple of days, and it looks like they are making just fun of me, on live chat I was waiting till someone send me the invoice, and then they were saying Hi and Hellow for no reason, while I was waiting, and they did not provide the invoice. I've been trying to email them, no response as well, they are opening tickets and then closing them with no response to my question about invoicing us.

title: It's a good software if you're planning going serverless
overall_text: Pros:Easy to useReally good and helpful support available at anytime. Even during night shifts in case something goes wrong they are able to provide chat support.
pros_text: Cons:It's hard to get in contact with chat support trough freshdesk website. Sometimes there's just no answer if it's during the night. But then I get a reply under the website freshworks.Also you should avoid toll fee numbers at least for EU. For example under your website I tried to contact the UK number and I coulnd't because it was a toll fee number (starting by 800) If i'm not living in the UK I cannot get phone support. Since EU banned roamming your UK number should be available anywhere in EU

title: customer service tool
overall_text: it was ok not sure why company switched but they did the job i would’ve kept using them.
pros_text: ease of use and knowledge of customer service reps.
cons_text: response time was a little too slow. their response time to support tickets sometimes would take [SENSITIVE CONTENT]to days to get a reply and in my industry we need response sooner.they had knowledge to help tackle the problems when we did get a response but by the time we did get a response sometimes the issue was already resolved.

title: The perfect suite of support tools for any startup
overall_text: We've got support tickets and live chat set up in an instant, with some personalised elements, for zero cost. I couldn't ask for more right now, we're happy and I look forward to growing with Freshdesk.
pros_text: Unlike other alternatives, Freshdesk give you a fantastic level of access to their tools for free, and not in an evil attempt to quickly get you to upgrade to unlock more. Having reviewed many of the alternatives for both features and price, we are happily launching a new venture using Freshdesk for tickets and Freshchat for live chat; their free options will do everything we need for the first year at least, but then we'll likely continue to grow to a paid plan with them as we grow.I'm really happy with the Freshdesk's approach to business, and am glad to see them keep up with the competition, this is a completely new Freshdesk to the one I first saw all those years ago!
cons_text: The only con I can think of is multiple calls from an account manager on first signing up; we eventually spoke over email as the calls were never convenient, and really they were just trying to offer a great service. I think a call might work for some people, but for some it can be annoying.

title: Wonderful for small businesses
overall_text: Pros:If you have a small business and want to up your customer service game, and make sure your employees stay on task with customer service needs this platform is for you. I've used it for several years and I have no complaints, all updates have been wonderful along the way!
pros_text: Cons:Occasionally we noticed there are emails from customers that don't make it onto Freshdesk. We haven't determined why that happens, but it's extremely rare.

title: An Awesome, Affordable Starting Place
overall_text: I've been using Freshdesk on and off at various ventures over the past three years. I find that it is a great place to begin adding support for your services if you don't already have support, as it is easy to set up and offers all the minimums you need to get rolling at their free tier. I found that is was great for handling between 0 - 250 requests per day with a few agents, however it got clunkier as we tried to scale this approach toward 500-1000 requests/day. The main issues that we ran into were UI complexity and constantly having to jump around to get things done - whether that was referencing a customer's information in detail or jumping between conversations. It is also important to note that their embeddable support widgets are not the best looking, but their API makes up for it - I strongly recommend you write your own front-end components for this if you intend to operate at scale.Overall, Freshdesk offers a great starting place of you don't have any support service in place and I think it will serve most small to medium companies perfectly.

title: Alfonso's Review 21 May 2021
overall_text: Excellente!
pros_text: Easy to use and the integrations functionality with the omnichannel focus.
cons_text: Flat prices for all users isn´t appropriate for growing businesses.

title: A great tool for customer support
overall_text: We use Freshdesk daily to manage our info mailbox and it absolutely does what it needs to.
pros_text: The UI is very intuitive and the tool is very easy to use. It also tracks every communication very well.
cons_text: Some of their useful features are locked to only higher plans.

title: One of the best help desk platforms out there, but with its quirks
overall_text: Pros:Incredibly affordable help desk system with an abundance of features and tools. Integrates almost flawlessly with the Freshworks platform to add calling, live chat, and an entire suite of apps.
pros_text: Cons:Way too buggy. Out of all the tools our company uses, employees ask for help with Freshdesk most frequently. It is quite too often where a feature stops working, acts funky, or we get a case where we need to delete cache/cookies/history. Not a great tool for someone who doesn't know how to troubleshoot.

title: Best value for money
overall_text: Pros:I love the fact that the flow is very nice. All options and functions are working as intended and are very easy to find, no need to lose time in settings.
pros_text: Cons:I haven't found anything I don't like in the software. It runs pretty smoothly.

title: Overall A Great Product
overall_text: Pros:I like most the ease with which you can use Freshdesk. It's filters for different Groups, canned responses and shortcuts and integration with other Freshworks platforms (like chat and calls) really makes this a game changer and slims down my workload.
pros_text: Cons:There are some things that need to be smoothed out - sometimes shortcuts (like /c) wont always work on a new email, or if I've typed something else in a reply before I use /c, but these are small things that don't really impede me.

title: One of the best issue resolution tracker
overall_text: My overall experience with Freasdesk is good. I am using this tool from so many years and still using it. Features should be updated with current features.
pros_text: The best feature of Freshdesk is whenever any ticket is closed, if any stakeholder comments on that chain, it's reopens that tickets. It saves times and also reduces number of duplicate tickets.
cons_text: The least liked thing about Freshdesk is limited functionality when compared to similar tools. These days ther are so many other tools which provides a range of features.

title: Freshdesk Experience
overall_text: We can easily keep track of tickets assigned, resolved, and closed from each employee. It is very easy to use and effective.
pros_text: We have been using Freshdesk for our task management in our company. It is very easy to use and tasks can be easily monitored and assigned. Task Reporting of employees is also very easy to generate.
cons_text: Moreover, it is very useful and easy to use but sometimes they are taking a long time to load and keeps asking for logins even though we have already logged in.

title: Freshdesk Review by Andrea, Experienced Engineer
overall_text: Freshdesk has been a valuable asset for our customer support team. It has streamlined our processes and improved our efficiency.
pros_text: Freshdesk provides an easy-to-use platform for managing customer support. The UI is intuitive and the variety of features such as multi-channel support, automation, and reporting make it a comprehensive solution.
cons_text: The platform can be a bit slow at times and the integration with other tools could be improved.

title: Fresh Desk - Fresh, Fast & Fantastic
overall_text: our overall experience with Fresh Desk has been excellent. its simple to use, easy to manage, and we have had no complaints.
pros_text: we love how freshdesk allows us to manage and organise our tickets for the day, we can group them, split them, merge them and assign in bulk making workload management amazing!
cons_text: not much is included in the lower tiers you have got to go for the pro one to get the advanced automation parts.

title: A valid work friend!
overall_text: History of contacts with customer
pros_text: A complete service desk portal, accessible to customer (if authorized) and agent.The solutions are a very useful knowledge repository with public section and internal section.The canned responses speed up and standardize the response to customer.Collect all contact and tickets from a company makes Freshdesk a little CRM
cons_text: Sometime a customer reply create a new ticket. The merge function creates many automatic notes that make the ticket reading difficult.

title: A simple and effective helpdesk system
overall_text: Adopting Freshdesk for the IT Services dept has given us a place to communicate effectively with users and also track our own internal workflow. The additional benefit has been the adoption of freshdesk by several other teams in our enterprise following the success of it in our IT Services Dept. They liked how the workflow streamlined communications and centralized jobs.
pros_text: Freshdesk is easy to configure, scalable, and highly customizable for administrators. There are various plans with additional features that suit different enterprises sizes and budgets.
cons_text: I don't have any real negative feedback for the software. It does everything that I need it to. I might suggest transparent pricing for Education, non-profit, etc.

title: Great product - could use more flexibility
overall_text: I do like Freshdesk,we have been with the tool for a little over 3 years, I have looked for alternatives multiple times, but every time Freshdesk wins and I opt not to switch.
pros_text: I like the simple format, it's not too complex. I can edit views to see what I want, change fields easily, set rules to auto fill tickets!
cons_text: There are some things I wish I could change about reporting. I wish I can add other fields to export files. I also wish the customer survey could be more editable, would like more fields and options for questions.

title: Fresh Desk is not stellar.
overall_text: Pros:It has a nice user interface and that is about it.
pros_text: Cons:I use it for the chat/ help desk functionality on our website. It is horribly annoying. There are several people reviewing the questions and if someone asks a question, it doesn't notify everyone. It just notifies the person who clicked it first. This means that I have to log in and constantly check it instead of just getting a nice convenient notice when someone asks a question through the site.

title: Good Help Desk for a startup
overall_text: It helps me solve customers' inquiry and the best benefit that comes from Freshdesk is it's free. Compared to other paid helpdesks, Freshdesk could still really be worth it.
pros_text: a. It’s free.b. It functions the basic system for email-based customer support well enough.b. Shortcut to the macro is always a plus.c. Can be used on Android and iOS.d. Can be integrated with Slack.e. Easy tagging system.
cons_text: a. Bad UI. It can be confusing at first when you use Freshdesk for the first time.b. Long loading. Long loadings could occur when you load the helpdesk up and go exploring the helpdesks, however is less so when you're going through tickets

title: Take your business to another level in terms of marketing
overall_text: Pros:Freshdesk is an excellent service that allows you to take your business to a higher level, it is marketing, but what I like the most is its way of joining new technologies with new ones, since it takes care of your customers both by phone and mail, as by social networks, thus joining the two types of customers, those of the old and the new school, also giving the ability of interactivity to the clients within the application, allowing them to create entries among other things, it is very complete and functional.
pros_text: Cons:Account with the disadvantage of the services of the nuve, that without connection to Internet does not work and disconnects you totally from your clients, besides that your technical service sometimes presents delays that make you lose essential time for the business.

title: Clear and simple user experience both internally for the team and for our clients
overall_text: We use Freshdesk to manage all of our incoming client support requests - it's made things much simpler for our clients and our team. It is easier for me to manage overall the productivity of the team and report on the status and volume of tickets we receive.
pros_text: Clear and simple design, lots of flexibility and an excellent Knowledgebase of self-help articles for me and my team to try out new features. They have a very helpful support team who have often helped me work out the best way to set up or administrate something.
cons_text: A few features don't work exactly as I hoped/need so I still have a bit of manual intervention, but there seem to be regular updates and they listen to their users.

title: Wonderful customer support tool
overall_text: We at Learnlight LOVE Freshdesk. We use it for customer support portal where we help our learners resolve their issues fast and efficiently. We use it for admin support when our teachers are experiencing tech issues. We use it not to forget to reply to that annoying colleague who keeps bugging you for some paperwork. With Freshdesk we always stay on top of everything: with it we´re always within SLA and we´re always improving our KPIs :)
pros_text: We LOVE Freshdesk - the support, the safety it gives to shared accounts (teams don´t even have to have these accounts anywhere in Outlook or else - it´s all on Freshdesk!), the simplicity! Canned responses and automated scenarios are a must. Another round of applause to the support team they have. Tailored and highly efficient solutions provided. Highly recommended
cons_text: Some limitations for free version, too few payment options or plans, lack of discounts for existing clients

title: Awesome CRM tool for small and large companies alike
overall_text: More visual way of articulating customer requests and gauging needs
pros_text: I love the watch feature that allows you to see if another analyst is responding to a ticket. This really help reduce duplicate responses and cuts down on conflicting info being shared. I also enjoy how easy it is to search for tickets using tags, ctegories and names
cons_text: Sometimes merging tickets caused threads to be hidden or overlooked. This was mostly problematic when attachments were searched but resided on different ticket numbers though.

title: Outstanding!FreshWorks make the Dream Work...
overall_text: Pros:Ease of design and custom features. Support is fast and efficient. Integration with our Exchange environment has made retrieval of support requests much quicker which makes for happier customers.All members of support team and other departments can easily corroborate on a single or multiple requests by clients.Best support Bang for the Buck!
pros_text: Cons:Would like to see better integration with API and HubSpot.Currently no way to auto populate summary into HubSpot contacts..

title: Freshdesk user
overall_text: I love it because of that automatic ticket close in 3 days when selecting waiting for customer. I also love doing the search in freshdesk, it really filters the search results I am looking for.
pros_text: It is easy to use. The user interface is user friendly. What I like about it is that there is an option of the system that will automatically close the ticket after 3 days, like selecting waiting for customer status of the ticket. Unlike with other ticketing systems I have tried, you have to manually close it and you can't just close it without sending an update to the customer which makes the ticket possible to be open again because the customer will either remember the issue or inform another issue. In Freshdesk, if the customer will not reply and you select the waiting for customer, it will automatically close the ticket after 3 days. So you don't have to follow up on that customer and the credits on that ticket is yours because ticket is closed.
cons_text: the filter on the right hand side, where you need to manually select the proper options on the required fields before closing the ticket which it takes time since there is so many required selections.

title: All tools for service ticket management and help desk
overall_text: Service ticket management and work flow management.
pros_text: Save time on handling tickets, flow of work orders and ease of closing tickets. Good features and good pricing
cons_text: A bit not so user friendlyto implement.Better training videos will be added benefit while onboarding new users.

title: Get 5-Star Customer Service with Freshdesk
overall_text: Freshdesh allowed us to build a strong and stable communication with our clients from all over the world. We are able to manage and interact with users to make sure that we are able to resolve the issue and provide 5-star customer service at the same time.
pros_text: My favorite feature of this software is the user interface.It is clean and easy to navigate, definitely user--friendly.

title: A very good ticketing system

cons_text: It is not always clear which criteria are used by the system to decide if an email is an answer to a ticket or is a new issue (=new ticket).

title: Fresher with FreshDesk
overall_text: I think it’s a great alternative to Salesforce
pros_text: I like the live chat feature and the simplicity of creating and accessing tickets.

title: Great solution, easy to get going
