title: Great tool to manage help desk
overall_text: We have been using this tool to handle the tickets/emails received from customers to resolve the reported issues, solve their queries and help to get them onboard smoothly. It has really been a great experience for us with this tool.
pros_text: - Management of tickets- Conversion of tickets to different emails- Integrations with lots of tools- Gamification of ticketing system- Automations provided
cons_text: - sometimes it gets slower- data analytics can be better- can be a bit more user-friendly- can be expensive for small organization

title: Freshdesk Review
overall_text: Overall, Freshdesk is intuitive to use and I have had no problem providing quality customer support to our clients and customers with this platform.
pros_text: It is easy to navigate and allows for multiple people to respond to tickets at one time. There is an option for canned responses so you can have those preset, which is also nice.
cons_text: I don't have any issues with the software. If multiple people are logged into one account it is annoying that you can't see who is answering which ticket, but otherwise no problems.

title: Help Desk Ticket Solution
overall_text: Pros:We migrated from Zendesk to FreshDesk for better pricing and additional features. FreshDesk was a fresh, welcome change from ZD convoluted UI. It was easier to make our way around FreshDesk and it almost started feeling like a CRM where we could access full histories of customers. We loved the API and it's ability to integrate with our various systems.
pros_text: Cons:Reports needs a lot of help. They have basic ones but it would be nice to see a report builder of some kind.

title: Personal thoughts
overall_text: 8/10Optimized performance Amazing mobile app Chat support replies fast enough User friendly interface A lot of managing tools, abilities, etc.
pros_text: Mobile application, the way it worked, amazing performance, user friendly, it was easy to manage small amount of tickets by this mobile version. Not a lot products have strong mobile apps, my advice - push more this direction
cons_text: Unexpected issues, it happened rarely, chat support usually replied fast enough

title: Switched from UserVoice and do not regret it!
overall_text: Using it for over 2 years now and when we have an issue, support is fast and helpful.
pros_text: Excellent support, custom pricing and flexibility to enable certain features from a more expensive plan without switching to the plan. The discount you get, is kept forever, even for new agents. The platform is great and has all the features you can think of.
cons_text: One particular issue bugging me is that an agent cannot create global snippets/canned responses. I'm sure this feature will be available soon.

title: Overall it is a great ticketing software. It has good integration and the work flow is fluid.
overall_text: Great ticketing while providing fast and consistent customer service.
pros_text: Needless to say we are extremely satisfied with the results. I would be lost without Freshdesk. It's exactly what I've been looking for. I don't always clap, but when I do, it's because of Freshdesk. The CRM integration imports contacts directly from our CRM system for easy access to customer information.
cons_text: When configuring some of the deeper customization features, it can sometimes be tricky to find the setting for what you are trying to configure. There is a bit of a curve to familiarize yourself with the system which is to be expected but it's not always intuitive.

title: Easy to setup and use, provides the functionality my customers need.
overall_text: We are a small software engineering company with several software products to support. Freshdesk allows us to provide fast, efficient customer support with a limited staff. It is easy to use which allows me to utilize part time support people whose main job is engineering or other functions.
pros_text: Value for the money. The entry price point is very low, yet Freshdesk provides all the functionality my team needs to support our customers.
cons_text: The text editing functionality is simplistic and sometimes I wish it had a little more capabilities.

title: Always impress the new feature and integration, have no urge to find a replacement.
overall_text: Pros:Quick responsive websiteConstance new features and integration 3rd partyHas mobile application
pros_text: Cons:Opening a link from the email in mobile doesn't use the mobile apps. (Android Oreo not sure about iOS)Having an overall dashboard for the mobile app would be great, instead just ticket assigned to me as I need to know all open tickets.Not sure if it's setting or not, but upon replying ticket it shows the freshdesk domain address instead of the custom domain set in the portal

title: Taking our Customer Service to the next level
overall_text: Pros:The FreshDesk product is exactly what our small company needed to manage our ever-growing support needs.Our company offers two product lines, and having the option to structure help and solutions and forums into product-specific help portals was a huge benefit.In addition, I found the user interface throughout FreshDesk to be extremely user-friendly, even when diving into some fairly complex setup options for auto-handling our incoming inquiries.Because of our success with FreshDesk we recently added FreshSales to our toolset, and are thrilled with the integration and sharing of information our sales and support personnel are now experiencing.
pros_text: Cons:Our dev team utilizes Azure DevOps as its management tool and while we did explore a 3rd party solution for integrating FreshDesk to DevOps, we found it had limitation in automatically syncing information 2-ways.Offering a more robust integration to DevOps would be an added bonus. However,given the custom configuration options freshdesk presents, we were easily able to work around this and do not find it to be a deal breaker by any means.

title: The response time to my issue was almost immediate.
overall_text: Keeping track of which clients need the most assistance and the area in which they do,.I would think from an administrators view, a check on employees based on the amount and time put into tickets.
pros_text: I like that it never closes.You can walk away from it for an hour and just refresh and you are where you left off.I also like the ability to track team members' tickets.
cons_text: I wish there was a way in a help ticket for clients to have to answer a few questions regarding their issue.However, that would have to be customized for our business.I do understand that, but it would prevent me from having to ask them several questions before I can be gin to work on their issue.

title: Mint interface is a great improvement
overall_text: Overall I am impressed with the updates in Mint. If you have not looked at Freshdesk recently it is worth taking the time to look at the improvements.
pros_text: The new Freshdesk Mint interface is a lot more efficient. You can do a lot of your ticket maintenance(reassign, change status, etc)from the filtered ticket list. The table view also allows you to add fields which has been a great help. I also really like the split ticket option since a lot of our customers combine multiple issues on the same ticket.
cons_text: Recently ran into some issue with replies (have to keep clearing cookies) and sometimes reply is sent twice. I am working with support on this.

title: If You Don’t Have It, Get It
overall_text: Fantastic. Customer support is great, and that’s why we stuck with them for so long. The pricing is competitive, and in most cases, cheaper than Zendesk with all of the Zendesk functionality.
pros_text: I like a lot about this program. My favorite feature is that you can create more than just the standard statuses which can greatly help organization of customer emails.
cons_text: I have no qualms with this program. It is so easy to use and can greatly help a customer service team to organize and answer customer inquiries.

title: Not using a customised portal but want to once start to earn more. Need customization badly
overall_text: If I am impressed with the non-customized option then I am sure I would be very happy with the customized one too. Only that I need to get it sooner for better handling and data extraction.
pros_text: Very simple. Easy to learn and teach.Can access the details anytimeVery reliableHas good features
cons_text: Freshdesk looks more simple, focused and easy but the mint experience is little distracting Cannot add more field and cannot extract the description content maybe this would be there in customized but haven't tried yet.

title: Freshdesk - Make work faster and easier
overall_text: It's very good for tracking and teamwork. Easy to use. Makes work easier and clearer.
pros_text: - Tracking all the questions, avoid leaving out customers enquiries. - Good for working as a team, all the shared information is easy to find and access.
cons_text: - Sometimes creating new contacts, sending activation emails can be really slow.- The new version Mint is not very well presented for agents to have an overall view of the full picture, feeling more like trapped in one's own little space.

title: Great customer support application with tons of great features
overall_text: We are keeping support for 3 different line of business and we can also keep a kwnoledge base accesible to all of our clients and internal staff. Some of the features also help us have collaborative work with our consultants while mantaining the subscriptions just for our support staff.
pros_text: This software is very easy to use, has the option to use apps from it's market and has helped us to keep our customer service in order. FreshDesk also has great embedded features and a very easy admin center.
cons_text: Some features will requiere you to upgrade to the next level suscription but the different options are very well thought since you will be needing the features when your business grows.

title: Overall
overall_text: Pros:The application is very responsive and user-friendly.The customer support is very prompt and the service is reliable.All the features needed for a ticketing system are available and really work well.The migration from the legacy ticketing system was done in a timely and correct manner.
pros_text: Cons:I would like to see a better search functionality.Also, we have to go through two login pages to reach the application.Not sure if this is something at our end.

title: Clean customization and improved efficiency
overall_text: Freshdesk easily allowed my team to create a customized feedback form on our website to auto-populate ticket types in the Freshdesk interface. This helped make my customer support intake process run more efficiently. The software allows me to batch similar ticket types together for responding quickly and with consistency, upholding our quality of customer support and it's reporting tools provide access to important insights about our customers, our product and assist in future planning for my organization.
pros_text: The customization and interface allow me to provide quality customer service.I like the ability to add canned responses into the ticket very easily. I like that Freshdesk enabled my team to create customized ticket types that feed directly from our website into my customer support queue to make for easy organization and timely replying.
cons_text: Creating certain settings and preferences seemed less intuitive than other tools I've used and the switch over to the new user interface was very quick and somewhat brash without much notice or guidance as to what was changed. That being said, getting used to the new version only took a couple of days and Freshdesk support was very supportive along the way with any questions we had.

title: mostly satisfied
overall_text: If you don't need dependent fields via freshdesk API and you can live with only sending mails to one recipient at a time, than I can unreservedly recommend freshdesk. In spite of all that, I like freshdesk because of it's ease to use and the fast responding support.
pros_text: Freshdesk is easy to use and it has the most common functions you would expect from a helpdesk software. Some additional features like shared ticketing or child tickets are a great asset to us.
cons_text: We were promised that we can get the dependent fields via API. But after a year it's still not possible, so we question ourself if we want to stay with freshdesk in the future, because this is very important to us for external reporting.The other thing we don't like. You can't send an e-mail from freshdesk to multiple recipients. That should be easy to change for freshdesk.

title: Freshdesk for software SaaS support
overall_text: Better customer experience and suppoprt results
pros_text: Very user friendly and lots of functionality.
cons_text: some restrictions in automation...especially where no activity is involved

title: Freshdesk
overall_text: Important gain de temps et surtout une meilleure gestion des demandes des clients.Rappels, alerte.. Une très bonne solution de gestion des incidents
pros_text: Ce logiciel permet une personnalisation de nombreux éléments du tickets, la possibilité d'avoir de nombreux états de reporting pour suivre et gérer aussi bien les tickets que les contacts
cons_text: Support uniquement aux états Unis et difficultés d'échanger avec eux pour une demande spécifique.

title: A cloud-based helpdesk software that streamlines customer support.
overall_text: Pros:I have consulted with 3 small to medium size companies to help manage the implementation process for this software.I have really enjoyed working with the support team over at Freskdesk.They are always helpful and fast to respond.What I love about this software is that Freshdesk is a cloud-based software that easily integrates into several subsystems and provides the flexibility to use it in several channels. this product also has a special mobile application that is userfriendly and very convenient.
pros_text: Cons:The only thing I am not fond of is the pricing. It can be a little pricey for smaller businesses.

title: Freshdesk works well
overall_text: All in all, Freshdesk has been a great solution for us! New agents are able to learn how to use it fairly quickly.
pros_text: Freshdesk works well for our helpdesk. We like the round robin feature to auto-assign tickets to our agents and the ability to grant different agents different privileges within the helpdesk.
cons_text: Sometimes formatting can be a little buggy in tickets the Solutions center where we house our FAQs. I always have to check to make sure the formatting didn't go awry when pasting.

title: Useful intake system
overall_text: Pros:I've implemented Freshdesk as a ticketing system for one of my programming teams. Our team managed eight websites across a university. To handle the vast amount of maintenance and update requests, I sought after a ticketing system that was lean enough that it wouldn't bog down our website and was intuitive enough on the front end for our users to easily submit tickets. After searching for a while, I found Freshdesk, which was by far the best option with the best price. It's automated response system was one of my favorite features. Freshdesk also makes it easy for everyone on your team to see which tickets are in progress and which ones have been completed, taking out the guesswork and the need for the use of other systems. I highly recommend this software if you business is looking for a ticketing system.
pros_text: Cons:Setting up the backend of the system (ie, creating processes and agents) takes a bit of time. It also takes some time to understand the backend interface.

title: What I Love About Freshdesk
overall_text: Like a breath of fresh air!!
pros_text: Freshdesk helps keeps us focused on delivering great customer service to our clients in the USA and around the globe. We love the simplicity, ease of sign-up, and easy way to on-board our clients our support staff. The overall architecture ofFreshdesk and the Freshworks suite of products is looking good and gives us confidence for the future.
cons_text: Hmmm... I want to assign due dates to some of the more complicated trouble tickets.

title: Changed to Freshdesk
overall_text: I like Freshdesk over WHMCS and OsTicket, which was my past solution for ticket management. Only wish GreshBooks had a free or very low cost package to intergrate together, or to allow me to integrate WaveApps with FreshDesk.
pros_text: Easy to use site. Loads of helpful information. Love the ticket layout. Better way to load and trace incidents/projects/tasks
cons_text: Price is a bit high for me, for the next level.

title: Awesome product
overall_text: For me, its a whole new world of running a contact centre - without the need for a PABX, Switch, T-servers, diallers, hard phones, softphone apps, ethernet cables, phone pins, time sheets, etc. I can run my team from a browser window with no need for IT support and my agents can do their job from any computer anywhere in the world #mindblown
pros_text: Super quick to set up a new call centre from scratch
cons_text: Migrations from native features to integrated widgets (live chat to Freshchat) could be improved with better user testing before launch.

title: The Perfect all round tool
overall_text: The support is amazing and the logic behind the problem they are solving works really well; it is stopped me from trying out many tools (along with the integrations) that solve this problem.They get it and I am excited for future products from the Freshdesk team.
pros_text: It helps us at The Social Collective maintain a professional standard as we grow the business and it gives my small team accountability with the room for the team to grow.
cons_text: Some features don't work perfectly, but they are covering a wide based of needs.

title: ITSM tool covering SDLC in a perfect way..
overall_text: great product the remove the need of manual interaction and automate the entire product lifecycle including the product support
pros_text: ITSM tool that include the full adoption of ITIL with the support of 360 degree SDLC in a prefect way, tracking the product from initiation, development to support phases.
cons_text: integration with CRM shall be more easy.

title: Follow Up
overall_text: Pros:to change the e-mails to other people thats work with me
pros_text: Cons:When arrive e-mails he transfer automatic to the responsable
cons_text: Alternatives Considered:WellSky Personal Care

title: Great, intuitive and easy to use!
overall_text: Overall, it's very effective for managing customer interactions and customer support.
pros_text: The UI is simple and intuitive. Built-in functionalitytosort, filter, merge and tag tickets makes life easy. The in-built wiki and forums are good help in resolving and discussing issues. Freshdesk support is super prompt in their responses as well.
cons_text: The setup time can be a little high as can be the time for integration. More number of customised reports would also be helpful.

title: Off to a great start
overall_text: Pros:- Immediate access with an excellent intro video to help get started- Instant customer support by phone- Intuitive enough that I was able to get started with no help, customer support and the knowledge base filled in the gaps.
pros_text: Cons:- Understanding multiple products was confusing but support helped clear things up.- A partner that FreshDesk recommends on their site breached our private data. This has nothing to do with the FreshDesk software, but they should know that someone they recommend posted a screen shot of sensitive data on social media platforms.
cons_text: Alternatives Considered:HappyFox Help DeskandZoho Desk

title: Great addition to our company
overall_text: We have used this software for about 2 years and we saw a 50% increase in usage over our previous solution.We have found this easy to use on the agent side and users are likely to use this on the employee side.
pros_text: This software is easy to use, inexpensive to scale and easy to customize to our needs.
cons_text: Love using the app, I wish there was a customer side to it for on the go submission as we have many field service employees.Wish there was a share with all or post this ticket element in our pricing tier so if an issue affected the entire organization we could share portions of that ticket to enterprise.

title: Great powerfull product
overall_text: Pros:The product does have a lot of functionality. It's comprehensive, user friendly and it's great that it links very easily to other FreshWorks products.
pros_text: Cons:There is still some lacking capability such as having more than one customer satisfaction survey switched on at once but apart from that no issues.
cons_text: Switched From:Intercom

title: Call Center Management
overall_text: Freshdesk helps to better understand customer support operations. By analyzing data such as ticket volumes, response times, and customer satisfaction scores, businesses can identify areas for improvement and make data-driven decisions to optimize their support operations.
pros_text: Freshdesk's call center management features allow businesses to manage customer calls more efficiently and effectively with features like call routing, IVR, and call recording, businesses can ensure that customers are connected with the right agent and receive high-quality support. Freshdesk is a user-friendly platform. Its intuitive interface and well-designed features make it easy for businesses to get started and manage their customer support operations effectively
cons_text: I have issues with certain integrations, such as difficulty with data syncing or limited functionality. It can be challenging to get the specific data you need.

title: Customer service
overall_text: I use it for sending newsletters and also promoting my business through campaigning and creating customer chat room
pros_text: It has an application which fits on a mobile and of different versions and works as that one of the desktop.
cons_text: Fresh desk is a home for customer care and also patient support.

title: A user-friendly Helpdesk solution
overall_text: Overall experience is positive, the solution seems reliable, I have never encountered any major technical issues, breakdowns, delays or anything alike. It has always worked smoothly for me.
pros_text: I like the fact that all important functionalities are easily accessible, i.e. easy to find and use. When I first started using Freshdesk, the work flows were logical and it was fairly easy to learn how to use it. Ticket overview and status are clear and easy to monitor.
cons_text: The features I do not find particularly user-friendly are as follows:1. When responding to user messages received through our company's UI we need to forward the message instead of replying to it (this is a little confusing and one must be very focused, otherwise the message will be sent to our company's UIsupport). As well,any responses from the users are then received as private notes, which until recently did not cause the closed tickets to reopen. This has been fixed, reportedly, and it is being tested.2. The difference between the 'closed' and 'resolved' tickets still is not clear to me - we will close a ticket if we consider it resolved, so one of these two categories seems redundant.

title: FreshDesk - the helpdesk for everyone
overall_text: FreshDesk is particularly good for SMEs with pretty standard help desk requirements. It can also handle much more complex use cases, but that generally needs additional help either from internal IT or outsourced.
pros_text: Freshdesk does the basics well; easy to setup and get working even for non-technical people.
cons_text: There are so many features and integrations, things can get complicated if you don't have strong governance over your helpdesk implementation project.

title: Amazing customer support Saas solution
overall_text: We use for enhancing perfomance of our support teams, internal and external. All our team members love Freshdesk.
pros_text: I have been using Freshdesk for 7 years now and never thought about changing. The software is very easy to use, for end users and for admins. The features are great and it just works perfectly.
cons_text: Honestly there is nothing i don't like about freshdesk, the only thing that could be better would be a cheaper price, but to be honest the pricing is already quite low.

title: Freshdesk is improving their helpdesk platform
overall_text: Pros:Easy to manage the ticket assignment and update, user can filter all the information they need, also the report is useful to view whole picture on support team.
pros_text: Cons:When trying to reply to user, there will be somehow randomly auto refreshed the page and all the text is gone, usually it will happened if the reply content containing with / or Chinese, I believe it is a minor bug in this program.

title: great tool
overall_text: We use this tool to connect and simplify all our customer service inquiries. This tool has helped us make it easy to follow conversations and provide assistance to all our storefronts worldwide.We have a different customer service staff for each location (partner) we have and with this tool, we are all connected and can follow along the thread.
pros_text: I like how you can simplify the customer service part of the job and have everything in one place.
cons_text: Sometimes it takes some time to load the page. Another thing is that you need to wait for the ticket to fully open before you can write or else it deletes whatever you have written.

title: Freshdesk - Recurso valioso para atendimento aos clientes!
overall_text: O Freshdesk nos oferece recursos de automação de e-mails, chat ao vivo, integrações com redes sociais e métricas de desempenho para análise e relatórios. Essas ferramentas nospermitem monitorar o desempenho do suporte ao cliente, identificandoáreas de melhoria e tomar medidas para aprimorar a experiência do nossocliente.
pros_text: Sua interface intuitiva e amigável,facilita a adoção e o treinamento de equipes e nos dá um retono positivo com os clientes.
cons_text: Apenas a adequasão nos deu trabalho, mas vale a pena.

title: Omnichannel CRM
overall_text: Pros:Ease of using a new mobile app for Freshdesk CRM for new generation users, equally good desktop console.Canned answers feature is very useful
pros_text: Cons:Bulk action can get better, easier I am sure responding UI can get better with app
cons_text: Reasons for Choosing Freshdesk:Ease of setup and all integrations

title: Simple FAQ / ticketing system
overall_text: Freshdesk is simple to use and set up with functionality available to have freecall numbers set up to call direct to agents and log the calls as tickets along with many more plugins. Multiple pricing tiers depending on your needs, the base free plan is great for small businesses needing to support their software with up to 3 agents, tracking g of agents assigned tickets and simple contact sync with Google accounts if needed.
pros_text: Simple to use and set up
cons_text: No desktop app available that I can find, web or phone app only though web works fine sometimes offline access is nice

title: Le meilleur programme de service client pour répondre à leurs demandes
overall_text: Pros:Il est facile à utiliser et ne présente aucune complication. Il fournit le service d'intégration de toutes les plateformes de médias sociaux en un seul endroit pour répondre aux demandes des clients. Il facilite une interaction et une communication accrues avec le public. La meilleure caractéristique de celui-ci est qu'il fournit de nombreux services gratuits.
pros_text: Cons:Depuis que j'ai utilisé le programme jusqu'à présent, je n'ai rencontré aucune difficulté ou problème majeur au sein du programme.

title: Freshdesk is super useful to manage live chat
overall_text: Pros:The best feature of Freshdesk is to manage the tickets. Freshdesk can be easily integrated with the 3rd party app eg. a chat application to collect the tickets and resolve it
pros_text: Cons:when it comes to integration of the Freskdesk to chat application on the web, there is a slight delay and it does not support buttons and QRs in case of some chatbot platform

title: A Fresh approach to client management
overall_text: Over all im a very happy employee using Freshdesk as a client support tool. Its ease of functionality and dedicated customer support makes this a worthwhile investment for any business.
pros_text: 1. Fast Auto Response with ticket creation and ticket number2. Easy to track individual tickets3. Ticket filters help track different status with a click of a button4. Very flexible in terms of molding the tool as per business requirements5. Reporting made easier with multiple reporting criteria6. Can track individual leader boards within the team
cons_text: Using this tool for aver a year now and have not faced any issues that would be an eye sore.

title: Freshdesk is easy to use!
overall_text: My overall experience with Freshdesk has been great.
pros_text: I've used Freshdesk for several years and I find it very easy and simple to follow. It is a nice platform for customer service issues and organizing them. I also like their Solutions section where customers can easily find answers to frequently asked questions.
cons_text: I would like the editing of support questions to be a little bit more clearer.

title: Intuitive, flexible tool
overall_text: Having used other tools for our ticket tracking, FreshDesk was easy to implement and adopt.
pros_text: Very intuitive to use the tool.Provides flexibility for customization.
cons_text: There is not a lot of flexibility in customizing reports.

title: A great piece of collaborative software
overall_text: Pros:Simple and intuitive to use -my team adopted the software fairly easily and make use of it daily. The integration of the software into what we do has been seamless.
pros_text: Cons:All-in-all, I think we're very happy with it.
cons_text: Switched From:monday.com

title: Freshdesk - An Ultimate and All round CRM solution for the enterprise

title: Necessity for managing customer service tickets.
overall_text: Freshdesk has been very helpful to organize and ensure we are providing great customer service.
pros_text: It's easy to track tickets and make sure all customers are responded to. Emails can easily get missed without a program like this.
cons_text: I cannot think of anything I don't like about this software. It has been easy to use and customer support has been helpful to find things I could not find on my own for settings.

title: Major improvements in customer service; good value for product
overall_text: Useful in managing day to day activities and incoming requests, excellent level of service
pros_text: The ability to customize, the level of customer service provided has increased significantly since I began using the product
cons_text: As an older customer, we do not have the same feature upgrades to our plan as are currently available - for example, can now prioritize ticket assignment by agent but this is not available to us unless we upgrade to the newer version of the same plan.

title: Online Support Portal
overall_text: I am using Freshdesk for 8-10 months and I can say that the experience is awesome with this software. The best thing I liked is here I can track records of Ticket/Issues also it alerts me before the resolution due time. Also, I can easily look for customer details and experience with them.
pros_text: There are many things that I liked about Freshdesk. First, the simplicity of this software. Anyone can easily find anything if he wants. It is very easy to use, simple and well organised software.Secondly, it helps you in tracking online complaints or register new complaints very easily.
cons_text: There isn't any specific thing that I didn't like. Just a problem I faced is many times gets automatically logged out. This is the only thing that I didn't liked very much.

title: A nice helpdesk software which leads the agent to perform more efficiently.
overall_text: 1. Quick resolution of any query on time.2. assigning a particular key area ticket to the specific agent or people.3. Automation option which sends auto mail on any updates on tickets.4. Generation tickets through the email option. 5. The whole conversation of any query is same mail and have a unique ticket no.6. Make easy to answer on a phone call regarding the status of tickets.7. Customers can also see the status itself.8. Knowledgebase features with lost of folders type structure.
pros_text: 1. auto-ticket generation through email.2. Support your customers through the social media like facebook twitter. 3. Giving suggestion when people try to search any faq or even when a user tries to create a new ticket.
cons_text: in the free version, the user doesn't have an option to create a form to get tickets by the embedding it to his different domains or sites.

title: Worth it and highly recommended

title: An excellent and adaptable ticketing or sales tool.
overall_text: Worth investing for a new startup to get staff and productivity underway.
pros_text: This is a great ticketing system, we used it more for sales and lead generation to pump in and convert emails into leads which would be distributed to sales teams. Great for productivity and works well in a highly adaptable and changing environment.
cons_text: We would for a user base for 25, the monthly cost was high but it worked well for the 24 month period in which we needed it for.

title: Continuous Improvement
overall_text: We're supporting tech-agnostic software users. With Freshdesk we try to migrate our customers online. Freshdesk offers a nice combination of traditional helpdesk software with advanced automation features
pros_text: We're using Freshdesk for 3 years and have seen many innovations and improvements.It's agood product which keeps getting better. We're also heavy users of the solutions pages, migrating our manual online in bits and pieces.
cons_text: Inflexible password policy for our customers.

title: We made Freshdesk a core contributor to our tech stack and haven't looked back!
overall_text: Pros:Freshdesk is intuitive, easy to use, and facilitates a smooth interaction with our customers. They have plenty of 3rd party extensions and even have a web-app Freshchat that we recently integrated on our site. Their customer service is top notch as well!
pros_text: Cons:They have a lot connections to external services, but would like to see some more robust connections so that we can not only connect, but filter by the data from those 3rd party apps.

title: Fresh Desk
overall_text: Complete tracking of customers support calls and requests, this also includes enhancements requests for our software so great all round view of customers issues and needs
pros_text: Easy to track customer conversations, requests and support issues. It has made a difference to the overall view of our customers needs
cons_text: I like the ease of use of the old Fresh Desk but the features in Mint. But I guess we will have to get used to using Mint. I also think the pricing is perhaps a little high

title: I do not have a reference, I am only through my experience with the program

title: Freshdesk Review
overall_text: excelent
pros_text: Ease to customize: Rules, automation etc. integrates easily with our g suite e-mail
cons_text: Distribution rules that stops at the first one which finds positive match. Cannot send e-mail to group or all contacts

title: Nice for 7-8 member team.
overall_text: The reports are very clean and the navigation and customisation are very handy when we are concerned for the clients.
pros_text: It has made life simple. It is very easy to navigate and weuse with a number of options to suite most business requirements. Freshdesk is also reasonably priced, which makes it a cost-effective tool for businesses like ours. It supports third-party integration by which it is possible to connect with the many popular social media channels and CRM solutions. The support team is also very responsive, knowledgeable and helpful.
cons_text: Some support people do tend to neglect small issues. The support could have been made better. The reports the software products are basic and there can be improvement in terms of providing adminis some analysis of the data.

title: Using Freshdesk for front office operations
overall_text: We use Freshdesk for customer support purpose and we allow the customers to create tickets. We use them for further follow up. Its a very good tool, we must use it.
pros_text: Freshdesk allows for the very good management of front desk operations. It handles the problems of cutomers very easily. It allows for ticket creation and ticket processing for resolving the customer issues.
cons_text: All things are good in freshdesk software, the only improvement area in freshdesk is its GUI.

title: Fresdesk Ticketing System
overall_text: Overall is good that provides accurate basis of performancd and SLA
pros_text: The ticketing system to track all our issues raised on freshdesk ticketing tool.

title: Best software for customer ticketing and customer communication
overall_text: Pros:Best software to understand the query of the customer with the help of ticketing. And also we can schedule online meeting if we need better understanding.
pros_text: Cons:Till now there is no disadvantages I found in this software.
cons_text: Switched From:Salesforce Service Cloud

title: We have been using freshdesk from 4 years, its easy to use and has some good features.
overall_text: Reports feature is really good. Helps us to segregate based on issues and gives us a graphical representation as well
pros_text: Report Generation, Chat option, Activity details feature of tickets. Call and chat history options. Canned response and chat shorthand is also helpful
cons_text: Need to have an instant feedback feature on chats, As soon as we resolve an issue via chat, there should be a feature or link that we can provide the users to rate our service instantaneously

title: Freshdesk Review
overall_text: Pros:I like the customer support that Freshdesk offers. Anytime I have had a question and needed it answered, they have been there. I also love their FreshMarketing feature. They have a Heat Map feature that has been extremely helpful when A/B Testing the format of our website.
pros_text: Cons:Freshdesk has been a great asset to our company. There can always be an improvement, but Freshdesk does a great job of figuring those things out.

title: Helped us tackle our support queries at 3x the speed
overall_text: Pros:Freshdesk has completely changed the way we manage our support queries. It was extremely easy to setup and get started. We have been able to cut down our support time and not lose track of customer queries. Being able to templatise common support queries and make it accessible across the team is quite indispensible.
pros_text: Cons:They upgraded to a new user interface which looks great as that would have been the only drawback.

title: Elevating Customer Support
overall_text: Pros:When a customer submits a support request, it automatically creates a ticket and prioritizes it. This ensures that no issue goes unnoticed, and I can provide timely support to my clients, improving their overall satisfaction.
pros_text: Cons:Its occasional lag when handling multiple tickets. It can slow down my workflow during busy periods.

title: This is a Great Product!
overall_text: Pros:This is a very easy to use product that will save you time and money long term. The Project management/Tasks feature is amazing. The Ticketing system has improved overall efficiency for our Tech department. You can implement other third party tools for remote access to your end users.
pros_text: Cons:Could use better features for Auto-response and in canned responses or some kind of AI feature to assist.

title: Freshdesk Review
overall_text: Pros:The platform is good for internal and external knowledge base building, and I think the mobile app is extremely useful when it comes to support with tickets and the chatbots
pros_text: Cons:It's in the details, but the way to create the knowledge base articles is really unintuitive and very time-consuming as the text options are always lagging, it's hard to include images and make something that's easily usable for the customers. It's also really hard to manage when creating it in several languages.

title: Freshdesk para gestión de PQR (Peticiones, Quejas y Reclamos)
overall_text: Por medio de la plataforma hemos logrado dar seguimiento a los PQR's y con ella su solución, ya que permite catalogar prioridades así como los tiempos de vencimientos que se tienen para dar respuesta.
pros_text: La facilidad de asignación, la visualización den tiempo real de los casos que tengo pendientes por gestionar, así como la gráfica que permite ver el aumento o disminución de los seguimientos, la posibilidad de clasificar los tickets de acuerdo a usuarios y a su vez la totalización de los mismos
cons_text: Muchas veces requiero configurar mi panel de visualización para que por defecto me traiga un usuario y no es posible hacerlo, tengo que verlo a través del grupo y luego seleccionarlo. Adicional, es importante para mi descargar información y esta descarga no es tan intuitiva, se requiere dedicarle un lapso de tiempo utilizando el ensayo y error para lograr descargar lo requerido.

title: Best CRM for Support Team
overall_text: It is an amazing experience using Freshdesk. Customer support is best
pros_text: Usability, tracking, reporting, API, team management, Automations
cons_text: No option to split a ticket from a point, API have very limited data points that you see on the dashboard

title: Good
overall_text: Pros:Simplicity of the use of the tools and efficiency of the rules of automation.
pros_text: Cons:The search engine lacks a bit of efficiency. Being able to add search criteria to it could be a plus.
cons_text: Reasons for Choosing Freshdesk:3 years ago, Freshdesk was an innovative product and below market costs. Today the product is still innovative, but at the market level and with prices that are no longer as competitive vis-à-vis the competition.

title: Freshdesk all in one review
overall_text: I love this software as it is smooth running and customer service is top notch and it makes my job so much easier than ever,I just would like upgrade asap so that i can have the fulll feel of the platform.

cons_text: That the High -end analytic is only available in BETA mode and that to get to higher tiers one need to upgrade pricing plan.

title: High quality in providing solutions and often inexpensive.
overall_text: A program that helps you to prepare multiple bases and is not expensive for money, as you can create several modern models using its distinctive features
pros_text: It is an inexpensive program and helps to provide solutions across several websites and their supporters.
cons_text: It is not expensive to upgrade, and it contains several distinct tools and is easy to use than others

title: Great product, even better support
overall_text: I am extremely happy with Freshdesk. We came from an archaic helpdesk system and decided to just pull the trigger on the new system. Go live went pretty smoothly, and we have an entire team ready to work quickly.
pros_text: This tool is modern, flexible, and has a great system for managing tickets. We interact with tickets via web page, Teams, a mobile app, and email. I get ticket alerts on my phone and watch. It really helps me keep tabs on the user and system requests. Whenever I have a question about something the software doesn't do, the awesome help desk support people are standing by and I can typically get a complete answer in just a few minutes. If the software doesn't do what I want, they examine my requirements and capture the conversation as a feature request.
cons_text: Merging tickets takes a little getting used to. There is no way I have found yet to assign multiple users to a ticket -- there is a primary and a team. We worked around that by making teams for our functional groups and making ticket filters assigned to my team so we can see all the open tickets for the team.

title: FreshDesk Review from a English Secondary School
overall_text: The helpdesk and features combined with it made it the perfect solution for a school that receives lots of communication from areas of school. It allows us all to have one place where we can collate all our knowledge and see work that we are all working. This allows us to easily cover for other staff when they are off. The reports were also very insightful and progressive for our department
pros_text: - Ease of use, everything was just simple. Very responsive. Everything was collated in one place on the ticket.
cons_text: Permissions. When I used it we needed more granular permissions, such as custom roles so that certain users can view limited areas

title: Freshdesk Analysis
overall_text: I am very happy with the Support I receive when I have a problem, they are always friendly and willing to help. The interest shown is always good to experience. We have not experienced issues with the data in Freshdesk yet and is thus far happy with the Product.
pros_text: Freshdesk is easy to use and there is the basic functionality you need to run a functioning support desk.
cons_text: The reports are too basic at times and a bit more development can be implemented to make it more informative.

title: Overall Good Product
overall_text: Pros:Overall, this is a good product because it was a great resource of our ticket management.
pros_text: Cons:I did not like the ease of use and the lack of how-to for the support tools.

title: Freshdesk making us more agile
overall_text: Pros:It is easy to use and set-up, the help section usually has the answers to our questions.Customer support is quick and efficient and always willing to help.
pros_text: Cons:It would be great if you could have different agents on different versions of the software, so admins could be on a higher plan than the usual agents, and management so that the additional reporting options are available.Solutions are not available on the mobile app, this is really something that needs to happen, so that mobile staff can easily access user guides and our custom solutions that we spent hours creating.

title: Putting Freshdesk to the test
overall_text: Free should always be taken advantage of, so I am happy to add more features to the company.
pros_text: The best thing is its ability to be used by any personnel, although it would be optimal if they are people with experience in customer service. On the other hand, the prices are economical, including free of charge for less than 10 users.
cons_text: It seems to me that the software customization is a bit rigid, it does not allow many modifications like other programs. This could limit the contributors.

title: Muy buena
overall_text: Muy agil y facil de entender
pros_text: La facilidad para manejar los tickets es muy buena
cons_text: No hay reportes graficos disponibles y siento que es muy necesario a la hora de evaluar la organizacion

title: The best way to handle your tickets
overall_text: A simple, quick and reliable tool to organize tickets in your company.
pros_text: Freshdesk offers users a great way to integrate a ticketing system into their workspace. It is more commonly used for the support team to reach out to clients and to get tickets coming in. You can add macros - they help a lot when you need to respond quick.
cons_text: If you want to understand a bit more on what features it has then you will not find much on their website. But everything you need is online - video tutorials, web tutorials. They help you quickly catch up on how to use Freshdesk

title: Freshdesk really does do the job of serving your clients!
overall_text: Freshdesk has been implemented as our clients customer service providing solution. It has worked for us since 6 months (onthe free plan). We love the service and highly recommend it!
pros_text: - The first thing we love at BitRotor is that the whole software is cloud based. Absolutely minimal effect in our servers.-The free plan is really attractive, it still fulfills all our needs currently.And the upgrade is just Rs 999 tostart.- You can chose your data center location. Its really important for customer service, speed and latency.- All customers are satisfied, never had any complaint against this software.- Our team can get real time information and then solve the problems of our clients.- The interface is really simple atboth the front end and back end.
cons_text: -When we took the demo before implementing the software,we did face some issues with communication and glitches.- Open source alternatives are getting better and lighter. It has started togetting bloated.- The popup feature gets annoying for some visitors, it can be made more subtle.

title: My opinion to Freshdesk
overall_text: Evaluating feedback from customers we make sales to is vital for the sustainability of our business. And this software has been our biggest helper in this regard.
pros_text: Freshdesk has a user-friendly interface. Its easy to use and understandable. It has many features that you can use according to your needs. ou should definitely use it if providing service to your customers is important for you.
cons_text: Freshdesk is a software that knows what its users want and delivers it exactly to them. I haven't encountered any disadvantage that I could say so far.

title: Using Freshdesk for a mid size company it Desk
overall_text: Support is good, and Software is very reliable. I think if you have to find a Helpdesk Solutions you shouldtake a look at it.
pros_text: The software was easy to integrate and meets all our expectations. In addition, it also opens for the future feature which are useful.Because it is available as a cloud solution, we have no start-up time for live operation.
cons_text: The German language Integration is not so good - sometimes this is ab bit confusing for the users

title: Freshdesk
overall_text: Primarily Helpdesk, although also sales and general phone enquiries.
pros_text: I liked the way the web based phone integrated directly with the ticketing system. This meant we could drop our VOIP systems and centralise everything through Freshdesk (inc sales).
cons_text: Unfortunately, they split most of their main modules in to seperate products. So now the phone integration isn't as tight as it was (more clicks to link phonecalls up to tickets etc).

title: Freshdesk: Simplified Ticket tracking software
overall_text: My overall experience with Freshdesk is positive. My company uses another piece of software to track Bugs and development tasks, so we use Freshdesk exclusively for requests of our Web team. The ease of use of this software made it really quick to learn and definitely makes ticket tracking more transparent.
pros_text: Freshdesk is a very effective tool for tracking tickets throughout their completion. Being able to assign tickets and have the assignee be so visible makes it obvious who is currently needed to perform an action. The history of each ticket is also a great way to see who worked on what and when. Also, having tickets be auto generated from emails makes it easy for anyone in the company to raise issues without having to learn the ins and outs of Freshdesk.
cons_text: I think there are ticket tracking pieces of software that offer more functionality that Freshdesk. Is Freshdesk an effective ticket tracking system? Absolutely! However, this is all Freshdesk can really be used for. If this is all your company is looking to do, this software is for you! If you want a piece of software that is more flexible and can be used for many different applications, I'd look elsewher.e

title: The best way the make a good relationship with your clients
overall_text: Freshdesk offers a best way to manage your clients requirements, you have to try and notice all the possibilities you have to solve the buyers request and many way to solve the problem, the possibility to use trought Android and iOS bring the opportunity to solve the problem anywhere and anytime.
pros_text: This app offer the best way to manage your clients efficiently, with this app you can offer online support with all the tools that you need to get a perfect communication with your clients, including email, chat messengers, and social networks like Twitter and Facebook, and have the options to do the support through phone calls. One of the biggest advatages of this app it is the possibility to work through iOS and Android, in this way you can do the support and manage your account in some many devices in only one time.
cons_text: Like others apps of support you have to pin up your need in a very specific way, if you do not do that you can be ovwewhelming with the big quantity of request, in this way yoy have to pin up also the way that it be more easier for you to respond to your clients, selecting the one that fixed on your needs and possibilities.

title: Freshdesk Review
pros_text: Once acquainted, the software is fairly intuitive.The customer support team is awesome and really quick with responses.
cons_text: Lack of integrations and customization (canned forms).

title: Effective and Efficient
overall_text: My team did not have a grasp on customer support before FreshWorks was introduced.This platform has really made everyone step up their game and make it a priority to not just close out tickets/issues but make sure they have been resolved and our customers are happy.
pros_text: Agent interface is incredibly easy to use and allows for flexibility.My Team is able to access and organize their workload as they need.I appreciate that any response will re open a ticket, this really helps reduce drop off and makes sure my team follows up and stays in contact until a resolution has been reached.
cons_text: My only wish is the FreshWorks software would integrate seamlessly into our custom mobile app and internal platforms so everything could be managed in a single space.Maybe someday!!

title: Highly recommended
overall_text: Pros:We use Freshdesk daily. It helps us manage our emails. We also use our chat functions. There's so many amazing features on Freshdesk.
pros_text: Cons:Couple cons.. 1- After we resolve a ticket and the ticket reopens we wish the SLA timer would start over instead and continuing. 2-When we create an email and someone from a distribution responds it opens a brand new ticket separating the 2 tickets.

title: Freshdesk is good i would recommend, just that support is slow
overall_text: Overall functionality very good, i would definitely recommend it if your company is facing customer daily & need to reply all the inquiries in a transparent manner
pros_text: Freshdesk is good in terms on the functions, we have been using it for 2 yearsdownside is just their support is slow
cons_text: support can be slow, i wish their support ( live chat) can solve problems faster.

title: Single Platform for all Support Channels
overall_text: Pros:Does a great job of assisting with the consolidation of support tickets from multiple sources to a single source.The core UI for logging and responding to tickets has been drastically improved in the last 2 months.Ample features on the free plan are appealing.
pros_text: Cons:While the UI of the core ticketing system in easy to use, that of the admin panel and other configurations is certainly more complex and has a steep learning curve. The pricing is a bit prohibitive (especially for early-stage companies) if one opts for a paid plan as it operates on a per agent per month pricing model.

title: Maybe by giving Freshdesk a Bad Review (which they deserve) they'll answer my Tech Support email
overall_text: Not good.
pros_text: It's an OK phone answering and tracking system
cons_text: Mysterious software glitches and tech support will not respond. Now they've removed the technical support pathway and replaced it with come-ons for their chat and support systems.Even before they stopped responding their support people would give different answers, depending on who was on the phone with me

title: Freshdesk is a solid product!
overall_text: So far, Freshdesk has given us the best bang for our buck! And, they continue to make it better.
pros_text: Freshdesk does almost all of what we need it to do. It allows for a lot of customization, which serves us very well, and their customer support is top notch!
cons_text: There are just a few simple UI things - like sorting any column - that would really be helpful from a user's perspective. Also, their reports could be a little more expansive.

title: Great Helpdesk and Support Platform!
overall_text: It has been great so far and we plan to use Freshdesk into the future!
pros_text: It was easy to get setup and is really customizable!
cons_text: Honestly not a whole lot that we find wrong with Freshdesk.

title: Très bon logiciel de ticketing
overall_text: Pros:Facilité de mise en oeuvre. Interface intuitive et facile à prendre en main par les utilisateurs finaux. Possibilité de gérer le parc informatique et les actifs ainsi que les contrats.
pros_text: Cons:Support technique pas toujours accessible mais lorsqu'on arrive à les joindre ils sont efficaces. Gestion des droits un peu compliqué à gérer. Manque de certaines fonctionnalités mais produit en évolution permanente.
cons_text: Reasons for Switching to Freshdesk:Augmentation du nombre d'utilisateurs sur le parc et manque d'évolution du produit Apsynet

title: Hilfreiche Kundendienstsoftware und auch flexibel beim Nutzen
overall_text: Sehr Hilfreich und es ist noch gut zu empfehlen
pros_text: Freshdesk hat richtrig viele Tools und Futures, damit man nutzen kann für ein bessere Teamarbeit. Zu zweite ist auch günstig, also passt meistens zu allen
cons_text: Beim Öffnen das Programm, dauert etwa Zeit. Außerdem wäre noch besser mehrere Tools erstellen, um der Arbeit noch mehr verbessern

title: Help
overall_text: We love it
pros_text: Its a great solution for a high level tier2 and up email management software.Ive tried many for my calm centrs and this one is working out well for us . It has some issues but the dev team continues to provide support
cons_text: Handling distribution list ( organizational in house email kmdist list) is a bit tricky and openes multiple threads but we can understand why.. systrm cant differentiate

title: The support team are very helpful and assist you where they can.
overall_text: It provides us with a system that tracks customer support. One central place where we anyone in the organisation can interact with a customer. It gives our customers a go to place for documents etc.
pros_text: The ticketing system works awesome! It is easy to keep track of the requests customers make, and gage how well they feel supported.
cons_text: There is very limiting text formating when it comes to creating support articles.And some areas of it are clunky.

title: Great customer support solution
overall_text: Pros:We have implemented this management system for a long time and have never regretted it. Most of all I like the detailed collection of statistics. Due to this, we can conduct an analysis of the effectiveness of our employees.
pros_text: Cons:I do not like how the fare is arranged. When the number of users increases, it is necessary to update it. We had to change the subscription to a more expensive one several times because of this.

title: I'm happy to use it but it still lacks features that will make me rate it 10.I hope they improve
overall_text: Pros:I like the chat feature when your clients want to reach you asap.I also like the fact that it lets you know via email when a customer replies to your email and when someone closes or re-opens a ticket.I also like the parked responses that you can configure most especially if you will need to reply to a lot of tickets in a short amount of time.
pros_text: Cons:I like the old interface though; I'm not sure why I'm not happy with the mint edition. Also I would like to suggest that they add a feature wherein you can extract the tickets per year, month or week via excel.

title: Fantastic helpdesk, used by two departments in my org
overall_text: This is a simple to use, yet robust helpdesk platform that we currently utilize in two different departments within my org (IT and Maintenance), to make ticket creation and management simple.I also use this as an example when other helpdesk vendors ask me what it would take to get my business - if they can't at least match the features and price, there's no reason to have that discussion.We're customers of both the free and paid version (two separate helpdesks in use), but the introduction of both within my organization have been overwhelmingly received as positive, and our maintenance department sings its praises almost daily.
pros_text: Simple, fast, robust, it's got it all and then some.The per-agent license price is good if the free version doesn't meet your needs, and the interface is incredibly simple for end users.
cons_text: I wish there was a little more ability to edit things like the ticket creation form, where I could put a line of text above a field to help explain what is needed (something like, please be detailed in your description, or use your business email address), but I expect that will be coming at some point.

title: There are better Front-end Customer Service software packages
overall_text: Mediocre. I would prefer Zendesk.
pros_text: It is good for customer communication as a front-end client software. Also decent for reporting.
cons_text: The lack of features and integrations with other software packages hurts. Also a better API would help.

title: Sales and Tech Team is very responsive.
overall_text: Overall Control of work of my team
pros_text: The support structure and FAQs are very exhaustive. Whenever you have any challenge, you can refer to their support page and FAQ and most probably you will find your answer
cons_text: Dashboard. Users should be able to customize the dashboard as the current view is not suitable for all kind of users. I added some custom status and I would like to see the number of tickets against those status.

title: Powerful Customer Communictions Platform
overall_text: Freshdesk is proficient in making communications reliable, more so through the call center system.Further, Freshdesk is designed to manage the relationships that clients have, and hence, there is consistent collaboration.
pros_text: Freshdesk has a call center, which increases the direct communications means for customers..Further, Freshdesk has the live assistance, which is instant and efficient to solving the rising issues in the company.
cons_text: Freshdesk creates a fruitful form of communications, which enhances the satisfaction that customers have in support to the company.

title: Freshdesk Review
overall_text: Pros:I am able to log tickets in a simple manner and I get email alerts when there is an update on a logged ticket
pros_text: Cons:The homepage can be a bit complex to new users

title: Freshdesk is very easy to use
overall_text: I am able to organize all my support tickets because of Freshdesk by editing its title and tagging which makes it easier if you have urgent cases or non urgent cases.
pros_text: Freshdesk has different sounds for notifications that I can choose whenever I receive a support ticket.
cons_text: Actually none, because it was very friendly-user and even a child can use it!

title: A new user that has been pleasantly surprised
overall_text: Easy migration to a new ticketing system.A fresh updated and easily accessible interface without VPN or any other type remote connectivity software.
pros_text: We have been using Freshdesk for about a month now and it has certainly exceeded our expectations.We've moved from our own on-prem platform to this hosted one.This makes management so much easier and is accessible from anywhere as long as you've got an internet connection.There's also an Android/iOS app available for free that easily hooks into the platform.We like the fresh, simple look and flows like a helpdesk ticketing system should.The cost is reasonable and fair for what you get.The priced levels seem appropriate and not just a way to get you to pay more for features you will not use.
cons_text: There is an area where you can set up your own custom ticket fields for staff and customers.The setup of the multi-level fields was a little challenging but doable after working with the menu a bit.Some of the canned fields also can't be disabled.Some of these we wouldn't use and would not want to present it to whomever is filling out ticket.

title: Good performance
overall_text: Pros:Very easy to use and customize. Developing integration with the use of API is also very easy.
pros_text: Cons:Turkish language support is not very sufficient. It needs to be improved

title: Review by Lakshman - Head of Operations for Wavenet
overall_text: In terms of management this gives some features. But I believe there should be more reports related to trends and patterns including line graphs. Currently we have to use a BI tool to get that done. Also it is good to have a documentation describing all the features and fields rather asking for FreshDesk support.
pros_text: Flexible and giving good support in getting things understanding.
cons_text: Good if the price is bit lowered, and some reports are only required for managers and not for agents.

title: Fresh Desk CRM Review
overall_text: Overall i can give an good rating and its worth for money and ease and automation in ticket routing is satisfactory
pros_text: Ticketing Management and ease use interface
cons_text: Yes Instagram is missing in Freshdesk we have social media like Facebook, Twitter and all the networks in Omni channel Freshdesk and Instagram is missing out of it where most of the people nowadays are insta addicts

title: Effective tools for handling support issues
overall_text: Pros:It's easy to use and very intuitive.We have had very few issues with the functionality and requires minimal training for both customers and agents.
pros_text: Cons:We really could use an effective tool for reporting and analyzing the solutions that have been entered.They can get old and crusty or outdated but it's not easy to identify those.Reporting on who, what, where, when for solutions would be a good tool to have.

title: Freshdesk Review
overall_text: Pros:Freshdesk is such an amazing software, it has made my communication with my customers very easy. This software is very easy to use and saves a lot of time. I would really recommend many businesses to use this software. Communication with customers is very perfect with this software.
pros_text: Cons:Personally everything about this software is very perfect for me.

title: Freshdesk the ideal alternative for the best customer service
overall_text: I would like the application to have more search filters, because when handling many customers, finding one in particular, can be time consuming. Integrating all the programs we needed was a slow process and the technical team did not provide the expected help, so we had to hire an external service to solve the problem.
pros_text: The entire sales and customer service department uses Freshdesk as a unique tool for the management, attention and problem solving of our customers. It has a very intuitive interface design, which facilitates our work, making us much more productive and efficient.
cons_text: We can quickly search for customers with problems and give priority to the most urgent orders, we can also organize all tickets in chronological order or by priority. Allows to integrate other communication channels to the platform, allowing to use only one software to communicate with all customers.

title: Best ticketing system i have used
overall_text: Pros:Freshdesk makes it so much easier to handle tickets in our company, customers can simply send emails to our support team and tickets are created and then allocated to the relevant people.We are also able to respond to tickets via the Freshdesk Dashboard and it will come through the customer as a reply.
pros_text: Cons:I honestly cant find any cons as you could run your entire organization for free on Freshdesk.

title: First Time experience with Freshdesk
overall_text: It is good, after trying multiple other softwares, freshdesk completed my requirement list. Pretty much satisfied with it
pros_text: -Well organized-Functional and suitable for all types of business- Even allows beginning with 1 agent itself- Offers free usage in the beginning to judge whether to continue or not hence I never felt like stuck with freshdesk- Customer support is also good, never felt any need to get any specific persons to contact details, as they are very responsive and equally great
cons_text: - Multiple logins- sometimes gets boring, would enjoy some themes or wallpapers (if possible)

title: FreshDesk
overall_text: Pros:We use freshdesk to receive and send emails to clients. I like having the ability of being able to assign an email (ticket) to a group and being able to assign an individual to know who is working on which email so that multiple agents are not working on the same ticket. It also allows to enter private internal notes if there is something specific that everyone needs to be aware of for that client.
pros_text: Cons:None at this time. Everything is working smoothly.

title: Good ticketing system, always improving
overall_text: Our entire customer support hinges on this. so it is a mission critical software for us.
pros_text: A smooth transition from a previous system: our clients contact us via the ticketing system medium, and it is paramount that the transition should be smooth and seamless.The sales process was also flawless.
cons_text: It is sometimes difficult to get data out of the system, the reporting is not very advanced.

title: Great Automated Software
overall_text: It saves me time to focus on other things.
pros_text: It enables schedule task at my free time and also automates everything from customers emailing to chats while I focus on other things.
cons_text: It's functions are somehow complex which makes it not too easy for beginners. And also the pricing is a lit bit pricey compared to other similar apps.

title: Creative Services Director
overall_text: Great.
pros_text: Easy to use with little explanation required -- but easy to get answers from FreshDesk staff when needed.
cons_text: Change to the new interface has been the only difficulty among staff. Learning that using an igcognito in Chrome solves the problems we experienced was a big help. I had to write to find that out, though, and it would be good to make that more obvious -- I didn't see if you did post this on the site!

title: Automate your helpdesk and increase efficiency
overall_text: Very good.
pros_text: The automation options!I can have the helpdesk automatically create a user in our active directory!Saving us time and improving accuracy.
cons_text: I feel onboarding could have been less costly and more helpful

title: Freshdesk is an incredibly capable and easy to use platform.
overall_text: An easy way to interact with customers and respond to contacts from them across a wide variety of platforms like email, Facebook, and Twitter.
pros_text: I like Freshdesk Mint the most. This is something I encouraged our entire team to adopt here at Lovense. Within the coming months, everyone doing CS on our team will be switched into the new Mint experience. I love the layout and appearance compared to the older version of Freshdesk. Your blog posts and content related to CS best practices have been incredibly valuable as well. I especially enjoy reading interviews with other CS managers from notable organizations, because while I have done lots of CS in my life, it has been mostly face to face, rather than on the tech scene.
cons_text: There are a few little glitches or bugs in the new Mint experience. Sometimes when you hover over a ticket, the window that pops up will not go away until you refresh the page. Sometimes when you insert a canned response, some sort of formatting issue will not allow spaces to be deleted. It is easy enough to work around these things, but they are inconvenient.

title: A little goes a long way.
overall_text: My daily interaction with Freshdesk is mostly painless.I would recommended it to any small business.I wish I had been here when the initial set up was done so that I could take advantage of more options.I am now looking into those options for future use.
pros_text: What I like most about Freshdesk is the ease in which I can communicate with subscribers.You don't need to have everything set up perfectly to help your customers.
cons_text: The reporting features and filters need more options.

title: Feature Laden Application that takes some adjustment to optimise
overall_text: Pros:The general layout especially with the Mint overhaul is clean, easy to navigate; although it may prove foreign to stalwart users of the previous iteration. The integrations with other productivity software and the willingness of their team to work with you to customize (to a degree) the HelpDesk platform to fit your specific needs is pretty good.
pros_text: Cons:In the Mint update there were some features that we became reliant on in the older version, specifically, with the phone/caller integration. Also, salesforce integration is not fully available yet.

title: Be Specific
overall_text: Pros:I like the way emails are treated when they arrive. The functionality of automating standard responses and some processes. The real-time chat feature is very useful for our operation
pros_text: Cons:The method to search for an email already sent. Not having an online training in Portuguese.
cons_text: Reasons for Choosing Freshdesk:The price of the license is very close to a similar local system and due to its additional functionalities.

title: Freshdesk Review
overall_text: With Freshdesk we were able to quickly automate the workflow and meet the SLA's of the areas in a fast and agile way
pros_text: It is possible to make several customizations on your own, creating rules for tickets and very intuitive interface and practicality to manage Workflows
cons_text: The only difficulty compared to the big competitors would be in the part of the reports that doesn't allow you many customizations outside the offered ones, but it has very valuable insights and attractive dashboards.

title: Freshdesk is fresh
overall_text: All in all, the software HAS been beneficial to our team. Everyone is aware of everything everyone else is doing.
pros_text: It helps our company deal effectively with customer queries. It helps us to keep track of all activity and allows us to communicate effectively with our clients.
cons_text: Getting to know the software is quite a process. Getting used to where and what you should click, what the different functions mean and how to use it.

title: Freshdesk - Great Features and Support
overall_text: I like Freshdesk.There's a lot of features in the software that are helpful. It can sometimes be hard to understand all of them at first, but once you dive into the software, it's very helpful in streamlining the ticketing process.
pros_text: I like the support.They were very quick to respond when asking for direction and questions.
cons_text: I think they are working on this but I would love to be able to see my chat history with my clients.Sometimes they end the chat too quickly and I need to access their chat info to complete the service call.Again, I think they are working on it, but it's currently a feature that is not included.

title: Great Helpdesk but I dislike limited users
overall_text: I have trialled and evaluated all popular helpdesk apps like Freskdesk, Zayanko, Zendesk, Hiver and others I tested all of them with our actual marketplaces and the actual support email address. Freshdesk is the best overall. Sadly, we don't take up with Freshdesk because of the cost reasons for 2 support users when we need 6 different users. So, we choose another helpdesk for unlimited users and the limited tickets pricing plan.If you ask me which to choose Zendesk or Freshdesk, I would recommend Freshdesk over Zendesk.
pros_text: - Clean and Clear reply to a customer without any delimiter, agent's user profile.- Helpdesk is very easy to set up compared to ZenDesk- Helpdesk is much better than Zendesk
cons_text: - Limited Users and same cost per user regardless of the different department. For example, In our business, warehouse guys don't talk to customers and they need to communicate on the internal notes on tickets. We want our warehouse/account team to be involved on the Freshdesk for the internal communication. We have 2 support users, 1 account user and 3 warehouse users. What is the point of paying the cost for 6 users when we need 2 support users to communicate to our customers?- We get an average of 500 tickets per month and we need lots of users. Freshdesk offers unlimited tickets, but limit users. which is opposite to our requirement budget.- Slow Technical Support, most of the times I get a reply from the tech. support after 5-8 hours and no live chat available.- eBay is not available on the lower pricing plans but strangely Amazon is available on the lowest pricing plan.

title: Freshdesk for easy work!!
overall_text: This programme is probably the most comprehensive tool for customer support because it enables us to serve our consumers across all platforms, including social media, phone calls, emails, websites, and SMS messages, from a single control panel, ensuring that no request is missed. We can use a feature in it to organise our requests into priority lists based on their importance.
pros_text: With numerous support channels, including live chat, email, phone, and social media, Freshdesk offers many very helpful features. Additionally, it is a cloud-based software that is simple to use and has clever automation capabilities to make sure things are done quickly and smoothly, enabling more effective company operations for greater customer engagement and experience.
cons_text: The ticketing system may become sluggish and the overall programme may feel more complicated when numerous requests arrive concurrently through the various routes. The virtual assistant could also be simpler to set up; I've noticed that some fields are required to launch the assistant even though they aren't absolutely necessary.

title: Very user friendly
overall_text: Pros:I enjoy using Freshdesk because it is simple to use. It also includes unlimited help desk ticketing. It is also compatible with Android and iOS and can be integrated into Slack. Also,I appreciate how simple it is to assign tickets to the appropriate team member and how quick and easy it is to respond to tickets.
pros_text: Cons:I dislike how a ticket can be forgotten if it is assigned but not handled by the assigned member. You must ensure that all unresolved tickets are checked at least once a week.

title: Become ITIL compliant with FreshDesk
overall_text: Pros:Very intuitive and simple to use. Compliant with ITIL recommendations
pros_text: Cons:Reporting and Analytics has limitation and lacks dynamic reporting attributes.

title: Freshdesk services are very effective and efficient.
overall_text: Wonderful and very helpful and most enjoyable experience.
