pros_text: I love the fact that they are respectful and kind .They return your queries right away .They always have just the correct answersthatyou are needing
cons_text: I love itfully.If I have to add a con it would be just a different array of sounding finds or louder sounds once they answer you .

title: Freshdesk review from payroll
overall_text: Overall the best tool we have had to identify our customers needs.
pros_text: Reporting is good. I pull off a report to show me all tickets not currently closed or resolved. Helps me understand our customers and SLA's.Satisfaction score and comments - again helps to pin point customer service
cons_text: When creating an email or closing a ticket, alot of fields need completing. Need to find a better way.

title: Retail - Customer Service
overall_text: As above works well having various platforms in one place.
pros_text: I find that Freshdesk is easy to use and navigate - user friendly for new starters. Freshdesk works well over a range of roles and flows fairly well throughout use with external businesses also. Keeps everything in one place rather than using multiple platforms.
cons_text: Can run slow and use of merging CRM accounts would be useful so that contact isn't missed with Customers having multiple accounts

title: FreshDesk Review from Drew
overall_text: Overall, FreshDesk has been a great tool for ticket management
pros_text: It is a great tool for IT ticket management, allows me to manage all of my tickets from one view, and escalate easily.
cons_text: It forces me to log in each day, so I can' really cache my login, but I guess that is a security feature, which is fine.

title: Ease of work
overall_text: Pros:This software is the best I’ve seen where you can merge multiple email inboxes in one system and also have the ability to categorize each tasks under a specific category. It’s really get for businesses use if you use multiple emails.
pros_text: Cons:The server takes too long to load when the page is inactive for about 20-30 minutes.

title: fresdesk is really Freshdesk
overall_text: nice experience till now thankyou freshdesk
pros_text: ticket management too good easy to reach to students problem ,easy to see tickets ,everything to manageable keep it up Freshdesk to giving nice experience.. me any team very satisfied..
cons_text: minimize some category like not giving to much category ..

title: Freshdesk our customer service tool
overall_text: My overall experience with Freshdesk is positive. It's easy to use, and it provides us with the options we need. However, it is a rather basic tool. If you have a large customer support team, you might find it insufficient for your needs.
pros_text: For me, a positive aspect about Freshdesk is that we have a clear overview if a user already sent a ticket to us before and for which questions. This helps us have a good overview. We can see who helped them before and any private notes we left on this matter.
cons_text: I think a point for improvement is the current possibility of AI. I think it would be great to have an option that after writing a response to a customer, AI will automatically check it for you and make it more clear. I did see they are starting with a BETA version for this, so fingers crossed that a finalized product will be added soon.

title: It's a good Help Desk
overall_text: As my first help desk solution, FreshDesk definitely fits the bill. Great value, good impressions. However, because of some of the shortcomings, I will still be looking for a more superior product.
pros_text: This software was easy to setup. It serves the purpose of a virtual help desk well. Customer support is very eager to help. The value is superb.
cons_text: The functionality of FreshDesk leaves some to be desired. Some of the way things are done are annoying. They're not show stopper, just annoying. Things like entering the time performed on a ticket is on separate page than the ticket itself.

title: Applications are processed automatically
overall_text: Pros:FreshDesk has automation tools - Dispatcher, Supervisor and Observer. With them, I can configure the automatic processing of applications as they become available, according to a specified time interval or for any events. This is definitely more convenient than manually processing applications.
pros_text: Cons:The platform does not provide for informing customers about the status of the application. We have to notify them independently through messengers or by mail. I would also like to be able to categorize applications.

title: Excellent and easy to use.
overall_text: Tracking problems and setting priorities. Allows the ability to pinpoint the more problem issues around the organisation.
pros_text: Ease of use, simplicity. Was very easy to setup and configure. Using a email address for the helpdesk is so much easier than have customers use the portal.
cons_text: With e new Interface, the merge feature is not so easy to use or figure out. When setting resolved, after a few days the software changes resolved to Closed.

title: Great support team
overall_text: Pros:The support team is very responsive at FreshDesk. They go the extra mile to figure out the issues and help in any way they can
pros_text: Cons:Sometimes integrating with things such as JIRA isn't always smooth. The description you write in the ticket addon doesn't transfer directly to the JIRA description box, only the original ticket content does, so you lose the description you write on FreshDesk tickets.

title: Freshdesk gives my support team nearly everything we need and is mostly easy to use.
overall_text: Pros:The support team is incredibly responsive and helpful.The UI design is great because it's easy to navigate and makes it easy to understand how the software works.
pros_text: Cons:The Reports feature is lacking in depth, I wish it captured and reported additional data. There are occasional unexpected bugs that make navigating the software less simple (For example, open pages in new tabs unexpectedly stopped working)

title: Review on Freshdesk
overall_text: Customer and Partner Care
pros_text: usability, structure, possibility to scale your business with freshdesk
cons_text: Better way to integrate your data. Better way to test new features.

title: Decent basic ticket system with automation and time tracking features
overall_text: Customers can initiate contact with our team to request support, services or inquire about them.
pros_text: It helps track tickets and time invested per ticket. Customers can go to a support.[domain].com and initiate a support request. This can be assigned to a tech who can use the ticket to track their time on the issue. Freshdesk make it easy to set up and their system makes it easy to track time and open tickets.
cons_text: They have a spam problem, but when contacted they can help resolve the issue. It's not enabled by default, unfortunately.

title: Easy to use, thorough, help desk software!
overall_text: Pros:Easy to use help desk software! We love this for our customer service for our small(e-commerce) business.We also greatly utilize the knowledge base for our customers to hopefully find their answers before needing to email us. The ticketing system works very well for us.
pros_text: Cons:I don't love that their customer service is overseas & difficult to understand ... but isn't that most CS these days?

title: Freshdesk review
overall_text: Freshdesk has helped us to resolve customers escalations efficiently. It proactively informs us if the ticket is overdue or pending for too long. Action required on ticket helps us in maintaining our SLA's.
pros_text: Ease of access, User interface, it's very efficient, Interaction with customers is very easy. Reports availability.
cons_text: Reports can be a bit more informative. Sub products created by Freshdesk & each is paid version.

title: Support Software that Works
overall_text: Great tool used in our business to assist our customers.
pros_text: Straight out of the box the software has worked great for us. It is very clean, simple and easy to use.Freshdesk is full of great features which deliver the best end result for the customer. Features like Automation of tickets, Auto responses, Canned Responses etc
cons_text: Better detection for spam emails would be good, however we haven't really found any major problems with freshdesk.The problems I have had 99% of the time have been minor things that the support team was able to resolve.

title: Help desk custom feature
overall_text: I like this tool, we have recently started to customize our features to develop a better experience for our users and it has been an easy process setting up the knowledge base page. The support site has a wealth of information that has been very useful.
pros_text: I like the trackability of tickets and the ability for both user and admin can track the status of a ticket.
cons_text: some of the customizations are not available based on the user package level.

title: Complete ticketing system out of the box
overall_text: Excellent support via chat; fast response and always solve my question very quickly.
pros_text: To the point functionality, fast, easy to use.All relevant ticketing reports/metrics ready to use, out of the box. Many Apps that can be integrated, eg jira, slack. Many extension-Apps available as well.Large knowledge base online to lookup functionality, how-to
cons_text: Timed automation rules do not use the business hours eg. when we ask a question to our client, we want to give them 2 days time to answer before we close it. If there is a weekend, then that time is already up when the client sees our question on Monday. I (and many more people) submitted this as an 'idea', (many 'votes') but still not implemented.

title: Couldn't get easier for support teams
overall_text: We have been using Freshdesk for a little over 6 months now. We move from a chat based support to a full blown ticket based support software because we wanted to cautiously document and track bugs and customer feedback and plug it back into our product development roadmap. We have been able to accomplish that and more with Freshdesk.
pros_text: The best part about Freshdesk is the ease with which you can integrate and set up everything. Right from getting the support inbox set up, to connecting social accounts, plugging in your CRM, Slack- everything is straight up smooth. The software is truly designed for lean startup teams that rely on using support tickets as feedback for their product teams.
cons_text: The JIRA integration is not as straightforward as one would want it to be.

title: Freshdesk Helpdesk System
overall_text: The system allows our business to have a 24/7/365 helpdesk with searchable answers as well as the ability to open support tickets for those who still have questions.
pros_text: Very easy to implement.The tiers allowed us to set up the system initially and as we needed more functionality we were able to bump up and add the new services without having to initially pay for things we weren't using.
cons_text: It does take a while to set up some of the automated rules.I am hoping they improve their Dispatchr, Supervisor, and Observer rule systems to make it easier to use and manage.

title: One Man Army Software
overall_text: Using Freshdesk is like cherry on the cake. Its make your mail organized and make them easy to route. My experience with Freshdesk is fantastic so far. And I expect the same in near future as well.
pros_text: The user friendly software not only easy to use, but is also very flexible. Above all the support is also very prompt and polite.
cons_text: I guess few minor bugs do happen with its new mint version. But they assured to be fixed in their next updates.

title: Good Value for money CRM tool
overall_text: Using FD as a ticketing system is easy to set up and maintain, however, the limited reportingfunctionalities make it hard for management reporting and the lack of automated reports makes it hard to use a 3rd party reporting tool
pros_text: Flexible, intuitive, easy to set up and maintain, useful live dashboard functionality.
cons_text: Does not allow the option to set recurring export, lots of known issues and bugs, limited reporting capabilities.

title: Freshdesk provides a very sleek and easy interface for creating a ticketing system and Knowledgebase
overall_text: Freshdesk allows us to maintain an easy-to-use Knowledgebase to dramatically reduce the number of help questions we get from staff, and by nature of that, dramatically increase response time and customer service quality.
pros_text: The interface is sleek and intuitive, and the options it contains are very robust. You can create both an internal and an external Knowledgebase, to help employees and customers alike. You can also use it as a ticketing system to keep track of requests.
cons_text: Each user needs an individual email account, which makes sense, but does complicate things when you have teams that just use a shared email account.

title: I work for a health clinic, it helped usorganize ourorganization and reach out to more people
overall_text: It helped us grow from being small and unorganized to big organization with a hand on everything!
pros_text: i can organize my tickets according to what needs to be done first and close it when it's done. It also helped that i can set up that someone can see all tickets to be able to see what's getting done.
cons_text: When I save an Email address it automatically sends an email when I reply. even all i wanted was to add a note to myself.

title: Excellent customer service tool
overall_text: Pros:You can sign up to three agents at no cost and link them using a common email address, making this the perfect system for customer service. It's easy to assign tickets to agents, create canned responses and report on progress.
pros_text: Cons:Freshdesk could improve the way it handles spam or bot emails. There should be a way to remove these from the inbox so agents don't have to spend time closing/resolving them.

title: Freshdesk make you feel happy !
overall_text: What a good platform that helps solve work problems in addition to concluding agreements, with the ability to collect all important messages, which makes it easy. Keep it up.
pros_text: What I loved about this platform is the ease of unifying all conversations and sent messages
cons_text: Maybe the overall look of the platform is by design

title: Freshdesk works for our Business
overall_text: Freshdesk allows are non technical customers to communicate without having to learn a new system.
pros_text: The product is very easy to use, The UI is simple and our customers love it. The product has enough functionality to fully support the needs of our clients
cons_text: Forums do not currently have notifications

title: Good Product
overall_text: Great product to stay organized and ensure good communication with the customer.
pros_text: Being able to set SLAs and get reports is a great way to quickly see if your team is on par with what you expect from them as they are out taking care of the customers.
cons_text: From time to time when new updates come out there are weird glitches that you have to work around until they push out a fix.

title: Freshdesk is a great tool for support but needs to be differentiated from ITIL based tools.
overall_text: Insights of tickets
pros_text: Intuitive, ease of use. It has an API, which allows you to fetch information from the system. You can have different views based on groups. Filtering and sorting information . Reports / Charts which talks about current status of tickets. Data analysis.
cons_text: Need more of ITIL based as it involves service request, change management, problem management etc...

title: Literally has improved my life
overall_text: I have been very pleased as is everyone else in my office.
pros_text: It's easy to use and makes passing customer service tickets to others a breeze. Before we had this we just used email and it was a nightmare! I LOVE that I can create canned responses and solutions. We use the solutions as FAQs on our site and I can see how many people have read them and respond directly to their feedback.
cons_text: I will let you know when I find one! I guess maybe when we switched to Mint we had to kind of re-train ourselves... but that's pretty normal for something like that!

title: A 2 year positive experience with Freshdesk
overall_text: Freshdesk helps us to organize all external communication (e-mail, telephone) in a systematic way as tickets that can be easily be assigned toappropriate staff and is transparant to everybody in the organization.
pros_text: Intuitive, easy to setup,administer and integrate with other software applications
cons_text: The way the e-mail threads / ticket threads are represented. More intuitive to put the last message on top.

title: Freshdesk Helps Us to Never forget a client
overall_text: Pros:Using the automation setups we never forget clients (tickets reopen after x days depending on their Priority)Passing a client onto another go worker is one click awayThe private notes between emails with clients is a life & time saver
pros_text: Cons:Getting hold of customer support can sometimes be tricky.They offer great help but sometimes with a language barrier with more advanced requests

title: It's easier to use than Zendesk and many other customer support platforms.
overall_text: Easily track any reoccurring issues so that we could solve problems quicker.
pros_text: The user experience is great, really easy to navigate through and set up canned responses. I also liked the rule and tagged feature because you could easily classify tickets to determine any reoccurring issues that our customers were having.
cons_text: That it does not easily integrate with other platforms such as Slack. I also did not like that you couldn't initiate emails only respond to customers who had already submitted tickets. This has been fixed so it's a great improvement.

title: Great experience. Very response and to the point in terms of answering my question.
overall_text: Pros:Fast and easy to manage. It helps me keep organized with tagging the status of the ticket. Great tracking results and clear in terms of which tickets are opened and for how long.
pros_text: Cons:When someone responds to a closed ticket it can cause confusion. However, the split feature is a nice resolution to this.Also, if there are multiple support email address on a ticket, it creates multiple tickets.

title: Great Support Platform
overall_text: Freshdesk makes it easy to correspond with our clients and makes it easy for them to reach out to us. Our company has integrated Freshdesk with other programs that we use so that we get updates for when clients have responded to us on tickets. This is great since it makes sure that we never miss when a client has responded to us.
pros_text: The many different features that make managing tickets easy and quick. For instance, the merging ticket feature which is highly useful as it means that our support team can keep our platform tidy. Also the features which make it easy to track the statistics of the amount of tickets, as can be seen on the homepage of the site e.g. the Today's Trends section and the section to the right hand side of it which is useful for being able to compare how many tickets have been resolved vs how many tickets have been received.
cons_text: When there is an update to a ticket and you are on the list of unresolved tickets and there is a pop-up that says 1 update, however it doesn't highlight or show you the ticket which has been updated so you have to scroll through and look for said ticket.

title: Robust Job Tracking and Time Sheeting System
overall_text: Excellent workflow manager with many excellent features. Especially when everything is working.
pros_text: Easy tracking and managing of clients, contacts and jobs with Tickets. Constantly being improved and suggestions sometimes getadded to system.
cons_text: The support process is not the easiest. I still have issues which have been waiting for resolution for over 2 years, and it is due to no fault of my own.

title: Without Freshdesk, our help desk would be a mess
overall_text: Very good! Don't know how we could do our job without it!
pros_text: It's just a wonderful solution to streamline and assign requests. We have a sister agency who operates out of a shared mailbox, and they'd be much better off with Freshdesk helping them manage and delegate!
cons_text: I can't find anything I'm not happy with. I've dealt with many ticketing systems, and Freshdesk is the easiest to use and most attractive.

title: Solid Solution
overall_text: excellent solution for reliable support that ensures that's one part of your business you don't have to worry about... actual viable solution at free level.easy to grow with your business...
pros_text: different levels, easy to enter & upgrade as need be, feature-rich
cons_text: nothing really... we all want something for nothing, but it's hardly surprising additional features are reserved for upgraded/paid plans (i'd do the same)

title: Monitor calls
overall_text: Our school runs on a feedback basis and we are open to hearing parents and outsiders queries and requests. We do not wish to miss even a single call or query. So we monitor the calls and the queries to help manage and take suggestions for improving the running of the school.
pros_text: I liked that we can monitor the call log and also add agents and add in a message for what the call was for.
cons_text: Certain elements are not easy to use. I wish we could get a consolidated summary on what the calls were for on a particular day or we can create categories and put the call logs into that category.

title: Simplification of client support tickets
overall_text: Pros:-Freshdesk is easy to use and has the ability to add custom fields to meet your specific needs. -Great Client portal and ability to provide the clients with access to their tickets or a complete list of tickets submitted by their company. -Integrations for other commonly used apps to further your connections/productivity internally with Dev teams (GitHub).-Responsive and helpful customer support
pros_text: Cons:-The ticket export needs to have the ability to save the selections of options. This would be great for repetitive reports. -

title: Amazing helpdesk software with a lot of features to manage your customer service experience at best
overall_text: Bring your customer service experience to a higher level. Prioritising your tickets really well. Very secure and easy friendly to use.
pros_text: Layout and colour are good for the eyes, tools such as canned responses and solutions. Really good for managing tickets in terms of prioritising.
cons_text: Couldn't find anything yet to dislike so far. Since I've been using it they've made a lot of improvements in terms of efficiency.

title: Still room for improvement
overall_text: Pros:ResponsiveFriendlyEasy to useLots of functionality to assist with the daily grindAllows for add-ons to improve performance
pros_text: Cons:I can't say that I have had a bad experience with the company or the software. I am not overly fond the Mint UI (New Interface) but they are collecting feedback and listening to their customers. So... I really don't have anything bad to say about them. =)

title: Excellent Solution and Perfect Customer Services + Support
overall_text: I am very impressed with the level of service and the solution provided. There is a constant view to make sure we as users are happy and able to carry out tasks with out any effort.
pros_text: The software is robust and helps with a large majority of tasks my customer services team deal with
cons_text: some of the more advanced set up requires assistants from the Freshdesk team, which is fine as I tend to get a response within minutes.

title: It's kind ofa pain
overall_text: We are able to respond to our customers quickly it'seasy for managers to ensure that no one was left without a reply.
pros_text: Freshdesk has an integrated customer portal and help docs. The UI is pretty modern and friendly but there can be lots of clicks to get what you want.
cons_text: The integration with zoho crm is not good.Lots of clicking all around.The customer satisfaction rating system isn't the best so we don't use it.

title: Easy to use, Great value, brilliant product!
overall_text: I was looking for a well-packaged product that answers my needs out of the box and requires minimal customization & implementation work. It HAD to be intuitive, the easier the software adoption in my environment, the better!
pros_text: The product is very intuitive and easy to use. Considering how packed it is with features, it is still rather simple to grasp and adopt by most users. The out of the box dashboards and views are well designed and answer the needs that most Client Services users & managers will have. Knowledge base very well designed. General setup and customizations are very easy to perform by non-technically inclined administrators when comparing it to other products on the market. The solution is smart and priced well. The team I dealt with has been great, responsive and attentive to our needs and requirements, they were very easy to work with.
cons_text: Probably too early to tell. Generally, in any similar software, my only pain point would be related to downtime, inaccuracy of reporting & core/hardcoded functionalities not working as intended.

title: Exactly what I was looking for
overall_text: Overall I am well pleased with Freshdesk. It does everything I need and a whole lot more. If you're in the market for a help desk solution you would be doing yourself and your organization a disservice by not at least giving them consideration.
pros_text: The software is extremely intuitive. Not only is it easy to set up and configure, but it's simple for end-users as well. The free version is packed full of features, more so than most competitors. The ability to configure the software to my unique situation really stands out as well.
cons_text: As I am using the free version, the only negatives I have experienced would be the features I don't have the ability to use. That's not the fault of Freshworks, just my budget!

title: Good Option for ticketing
overall_text: Overall its a god App if you want to implement ticketing in your organization.
pros_text: keeps updated. Has lots of options to assign distribute the tickets and also to categorize them. can also divide department wise
cons_text: only 1 person can be admin. there are multiple techs handling the tickets, but it doesn't show name of every individual to know who is following the ticket

title: Freshdesk
overall_text: Pros:with Freshdesk we are managing the tickets and following SLAs on all tickets.with the workflow automationits becoming easy to lot a ticket to the right agent.
pros_text: Cons:there is a need to fix support assistance for any issues or queries.I had faced a problem many times but didn't get any appropriate assistance on time.

title: Freashdesk review
overall_text: Overall we are very please with Freshdesk as a ticketing solution. All of the features that we need are there and work excellent.
pros_text: Best part is that it is web based and there is no need to install additional software on any of the computers. Agent interface is very well designed, the same can be said about the end user interface.Easy agent management and a great mobile app.
cons_text: In general I do not have any dislikes about this product. It is being used as a ticketing system without any external integrations at the moment.

title: Freshdesk is a great software program
overall_text: Great program and it really helped us grow our business
pros_text: This software is cloud based - which was important to us. It is easy to use and a lot of features that were extremely helpful.
cons_text: I didn't dislike anything about this program - we had nothing before and this helped us with our ticket system and make IT a lot more effective

title: Freshdesk review
overall_text: It's been great and it help getting started with a ticketing managing system.
pros_text: Is a pretty simple software and inexpensive compare with other vendors. It works really good and it has improve significantly over time.
cons_text: It probably needs more features that other ticket management platform have but that could also mean a high price.

title: Customer service serving others
overall_text: My overall experience has been outstanding. Freshdesk provides quick, efficient,solutions so I can keep my customers happy which in turn keeps me happy
pros_text: It's ease and ability to help me service my customers. I am easily able to look up quick solutions to any questions and more efficient and easily and quickly it makes for me to assist my clients.
cons_text: Sometimes it lags. I've had a customer go from okay to angry because the software drags. Also the last update did not automatically update. I had to spend 2 hours searching and updating the program.

title: Freshdesk usage from a tech support point of view
overall_text: Pros:Ease of useNotifications are quickEasy to pass tickets on
pros_text: Cons:Nothing really.Freshdesk does what it’s intended to do

title: Freshdesk very practical to use
overall_text: Freshdesk is very pleasant to use this application, it offers you everything you need in a remote and in the chat or app that are linked to it
pros_text: Freshdesk is very practical to use, it responds to everything you need in a communication program
cons_text: Freshdesk pleases me in everything there is nothing like this that I least liked the options are great

title: Good, but lacking some features
overall_text: We use this as our customer-facing portal because it's very easy for customers to use, but it's certainly not as good as other products out there for user support. Integration with email is key, though, and they do that pretty well. We do still have a lot of issues with Spam, and it's not something our developers ever want to use.
pros_text: Simple for customers to use. Email integration so customers don't have to change their workflow.
cons_text: Spam emails come through all the time and there's no reliable way to block them. Also when two Freshdesk systems are talking to each other it can be hell, each of the replies ends up creating a new ticket in each system. There's also very limited formatting support and occasionally we get auto-responder wars where Freshdesk and someone's auto-reply go back and forth creating hundreds of tickets.

title: Freshdesk review
overall_text: We guide or whole IT ticketing service through Freshdesk and have setup a real helpdesk webpage via Freshdesk.
pros_text: Product is easy to use and customize. Product is user friendly
cons_text: The concierge, it's a bot you have to talk to for 1 minute before you get real customer support (the latter is excellent)

title: Good foundational support features for growing brands
overall_text: Pros:Good ticket routing, affordable software, wide range of features and integrations
pros_text: Cons:Automation is lacking a bit on ticket-type level, and reporting could be more robust
cons_text: Alternatives Considered:Gorgias

title: Excellent Customer Relation Management Solution
overall_text: Awesome CRM solution.Good to have for your business and seamless operation and easy to use.
pros_text: Contact management, Customer relation management, Call monitoring
cons_text: Add video option feature when customers call in.User security should be enhanced with two-factor authentication

title: Easy to use and easy to implement helpdesk sw
overall_text: We use FD as our main helpdesk service. We like it. It is fast, reliably, clever!
pros_text: Freshdesk is very easy to implement and very easy to use but if you get to know it offers a lot of functionality and features. You can customize almost everything! The onboarding of new personel is easy too!
cons_text: The support tends to fix some bugs VERY-VERY slowly...

title: Freshdesk
overall_text: Overall it’s good experience with freshdesk and it support is available for 24/7 this the best feature in this software.
pros_text: The great cool application to support customer and provide customer with best solution via chat , email
cons_text: It’s a great software to use for online customer support, and open many tickets at same time and check solved and unsolved tickets

title: A Customer's Perspective
overall_text: The company I work for is partnered with a business that utilizes Freshdesk for their help desk, knowledge base, and ticketing system. From my perspective, the system is incredibly simple to use and has a clean, user-friendly interface. We can open tickets from the web app itself or by emailing the provided support address specific to the company that uses it. It's search functionality for open/closed tickets and support documentation is strong and easy to use. We're a small business looking to scale and when we get large enough to necessitate a ticketing system, Freshdesk will likely be the first app we look to.
pros_text: The simple layout and ease of accessing both the Knowledge Base and support tickets.
cons_text: I've yet to run into any cons at this time.

title: Great Easy to Use Platform
overall_text: Pros:Our company uses Freshdesk to notify staff of phonecalls/issues from members. This is great for ensuring response times are kept to a minimum or reminding staff that they still need to follow up on an inssue.
pros_text: Cons:When creating a ticket, how staff are tagged seems backwards and I sometimes end up sending the ticket to myself.

title: Ticketing system in school enviroment
overall_text: Pros:Freshdesk is easy to set up and modify, depending on the needs of different departments. In our setup customers (students, teachers, staff) just write an email and the rest is taken care of by the system and the agents.
pros_text: Cons:As an admin, I think it is pretty easy to use. I use the mobile app quite often, that is a bit slow.

title: Very Good Ticketing System for IT departments
overall_text: Pros:I like how there are separate tickets for incidents and service requests, it helps narrow down emergencies. I also like the customization ability for queues and roles, and the ability to restrict them from viewing others content.
pros_text: Cons:I do not like that I am unable to add someone to the notifications bar if I am editing a note.I do not like receiving more than one email when a ticket is assigned to me directly (one for group notification, one for personal assignment notification.)

title: Great software for tracking team members activity!
overall_text: Pros:You can see the progress of your case and where are the slow point in this progress. This is a great software for larger teams to track the lack of the team members. It did not add any value in out of 3-4 members. But by using the tracking progress you can see what team member is slowing down the process.
pros_text: Cons:It adds so many emails to your already busy email queue. It gets very annoying most of the time.

title: Freshde
overall_text: Fresh desk integrates effectively with other related software and also operates both on mobile and desktop.
pros_text: We use it as a company communication Network between employees and their employers.
cons_text: As by the time we have used it we have received another challenge and no problem registered

title: Great tool for Mid sized company
overall_text: Over all a good tool, easy to learn, configure and track.
pros_text: used it as ITSM tool. Easy to deploy and configure. Perfect for small and mid sized companies.
cons_text: If you are looking for advanced automation, integrations and orchestration, you may need to go for an advanced tool

title: Freshdesk is very unique in its ease of use and multi-features
overall_text: It is one of the very special app that you and your team can use to follow up on business and reports in a distinct way, in addition to that it has wonderful features and controls and protects users wonderfully and we have been using it on a daily basis for more than three years
pros_text: We use it to manage the ticketing system, support customers, track reports, and it works amazingIn addition, it has multiple features and controls that make its use unique and amazing. We use it a lot
cons_text: I think the textual search engine could be developed better than it isAnd that the program facilitates the process of explaining the program to new users because at first it is not clear and we need to explain how it works

title: Quick answer, fast action.
overall_text: Centralization of the support. A place to follow everything.
pros_text: His core business. The management of my clients' tickets. See my delay, follow the resolutions, collect the opinions of my customers, manage priorities, all in one interface.
cons_text: Very little. The api that could be improved. The improvement of HTTPS. For the interface, the MINT version corrects the old faults.

title: Easy to use, with an overview, good features for sorting, storing and beeing more efficient.
overall_text: we increased the effeciency of our support, the teamwork and the fun doing it
pros_text: I love the motivation after the log in, it's a nice way to start working! It'sa way to start positiv, and that feel our customers. You have a good overview on the dashboard, a lot of admin features, you even can customize the look for CI. The features in the admin section are very usable, the storage is easy to use and you can share your work with your team, you can discuss, make notes and push the efficiency of your customer support to the next level.
cons_text: Sometimes the information about new features is a bit annoying,The merging function could be better, or the way you can personalize it.

title: Freshdesk has a CRM that works well for the price.
overall_text: Pros:The system can be configured to send automatic communication based on different custom scenarios. This keeps my agents from having to spend their day continuously watching for a customer response.
pros_text: Cons:You are unable to link multiple customers to the same issue. Also the filtering ability for our customers is very limited, so we do a lot of reporting for them.

title: Freshdesk is a really intuitive system that is now indispensable to us.
overall_text: Helps us manage our workload.Our processes are constantly being developed, and Freshdesk gives us the scope and flexibility to keep increasing our efficiencies.
pros_text: Ease of use.Ability to customise/add fields and create our own solutions, even on the most basic version.
cons_text: It would be great to be able to remove merge tickets from searches and if we could assign to do's to other Agents within the same ticket.

title: Supporting Internal Customers
overall_text: We are not a call center, we are using this for internal emails, to monitor the volume of emails and the type of requests from internal customers.This tool is working perfect for that.This also solves the issue of coverage when co-workers are out unexpected.
pros_text: Add Note - love to be able to add notes to each ticket (email), for myself and for others to see. Being able to see all the emails in the box, opens the ability to cover others when needed. Reporting tools to see what is being processed and how fast emails are being resolved. Onboarding process was simple, love Freshdesk Academy to understand how to use the software.Groups work great, being able to move email types into specialized groups is really handy.
cons_text: Not able to create folders for organization or storage.Not able to flag or change colors of emails for visual organization.

title: This software has helped us keep track of customer communications and has also helped us stay on tas
overall_text: Pros:One stop shop for all customer communications.Also, being able to keep track of an agents tasks with clients is a plus.
pros_text: Cons:Sometimes the ticket closing gets a little dicey for our CS dept.They sometimes need to close and old ticket and it shoots out an email even if we don't want it to.To be able to close a ticket without any communication going out would be a nice feature

title: Essential and easy to use tool that keeps fast-paced support environments under control.
overall_text: It makes my job so much easier that it has become an essential tool. I can keep track and coordinate with whole team through just a few clicks.
pros_text: - User-friendly graphic interface;- Good integration with third-party applications;- Interesting scenario automation features;
cons_text: - Software has occasional difficulty in keeping unique ticket threads merged and creates separate tickets instead;

title: Freshdesk Review
overall_text: Overall Freshdesk is a great software for customer service computing and query solutions
pros_text: Freshdesk provides a great solution to conventional customer service handling experience with modern features that seemed tedious earlier.Its ability to maximize the result with great presets provides more solutions to be delivered within a short amount of time.
cons_text: A lot of time there bugs have proven to delete/drop a request and it has to be rasied again.In the following updates it can be fixed.

title: FreshDesk is generally very easy to use
overall_text: It's a great organizational tool.
pros_text: Managing outstanding tickets and to-dos.The tag system is great as well.Love the charts and performance stats. The filtering is very easy.
cons_text: Sometimes it will create a new ticket instead of adding to a previous ticket and then we have to merge the tickets. You cannot forward a ticket to a non-FreshDesk user because they cannot see the content.Wish you could mark tickets as read and not-read.Wish there was a way to see responses a bit easier.They get lost in the ticket dashboard

title: A great flexible piece of kit, easy to integrate and with a great support team
overall_text: We use Freshdesk to log support queries, and also have it integrated with Jira meaning we can create development tasks straight from Freshdesk. Overall our experience has been very positive.
pros_text: Easy to use, quick to train staff how to use it and the support team is absolutely fantastic, resolving any issues in no time at all.
cons_text: The admin panel which we use to manage enquiries looks great, but the front end which the customer sees looks a little clunky and we can't see any way to change it. Would be great if they made it match the style of the admin panel.

title: A good platform to manage incidents with customers
overall_text: Overall experience is great, we have our customer support portal and we use to provide help to our customers and also to attend any need they have regarding the service we provide to them.
pros_text: Freshdesk is mostly intuitive and provides most of the options you might need to manage your own portal.What I like the most and, in my honest opinion, is the key for Freshdesk success is the support they provide not only for managers, but for standard users. Top quality support indeed.
cons_text: There are some options regarding admin panel that could be improved, for example the creation of dispatcher' and observer' rules, its not very intuitive but still you can manage to figure it out, and also you have the good support to users.

title: Easy to use product, quick support, good value
overall_text: Easy to use for tech team and for end users.Supports SAML for easy logons by users.
pros_text: Fresh Desk is easy to use but still has the features that we need.For a fairly small team, having a product that is simple but still does what we want is important.The online chat support has always been quick and helpful.The product is a good value.
cons_text: They have different license levels based on your needs, it might be nice to be able to choose specific functions to add to your license cheaply without needing to upgrade to the next level.

title: Friendly to the beginner but powerful to the seasoned admin
overall_text: It took some time to configure to our liking and customize all categories and filters, but once that was done it became a joy to work with.
pros_text: You can apply filters to any incoming ticket, based on many factors. You can also make it scan your tickets for updates and automate further actions. You can customize categories and propertiesIt even has plenty of plug-ins to connect to other networks. The Slack bot is really helpful for example.Also, their fully detailed analytics are very much welcome and useful!
cons_text: There are some less intuitive filters for categorizing and logic to whetherto show or not sub-categories. Might get tricky to get it working for you if you have very special needs.

title: Easy to use and good value for money
overall_text: I’m managing help for SaaS product
pros_text: It’s very easy to use, the support team answer very fast and they are willing to help. The iOS app is very well done, and cherry on the cakes it’s cheaper than competitors (I was using zen desk before)
cons_text: Well they redo a complete new frontend, for me it’s a “plus” but some people maybe get lost. Anyway you can still use the old one.

title: Ticketing softwares come a dime a dozen, Freshworks stands above the rest bringing new life to work.
overall_text: Its provided me with a proper format to which tickets can be logged. A new look at what is needed in a ticketing system and how much it can benefit a company.
pros_text: Freshworks is an amazing software, bringing a new look and feel to ticketing. I really like the way in which the users are able to link tickets and merging them ensuring that there are no duplicated across the database. There is also the real time reporting which makes compiling and cross-checking data very easy.
cons_text: The software can be a bit tedious to use, and also there is a sort of a learning curve to this which can be over come with practice and training. Freshworks also can be a tad slow because of the cloud based platform which it runs from.

title: Easy to use, very flexible system
overall_text: Good system, flexible, reliable, responsive Support team.
pros_text: Freshdesk easy to use and has become the core of our Support operation. It's customizable, feature-loaded and easy to use.
cons_text: In general, the main improvement point would be a quicker implementation turnaround for Feature Requests. I would love to add some very specific widgets/metrics that are not currently possible.

title: An Easy to Use Project Management Package
overall_text: The implementation of Freshdesk helped our team to better manage our day to day tasks and track our progress. It not only facilitated a better and more efficient interaction with our customers, but also helped us tracking our performance and improve our services.
pros_text: The platform is extremely easy to use Project Management package requiring almost zero training.
cons_text: The implementation of the Mint platform included a significantly different layout, which required a couple of hours from each of our team members for the transition. However, we do recognize its improvements.

title: Take Your Customer Service and Analytics to the Next Level
overall_text: Pros:The richness in features is vast. In demoing a multitude of products, it offered the richest features at the lowest price point.I love the ability to have the knowledge base integrated with chat and ticketing in such a way that clients are prompted with a solution. This reduces inbounds while getting clients the assistance they need faster. I also like the automated workflows that will alert a manager when a case is escalated due to no resolution, being open a certain amount of time as well as other factors.
pros_text: Cons:As mentioned, the solution is rich in features, we were even able to integrate with our existing CRM, so no complaints on our end.

title: To be very precise this is one of the great ticketing software for a small organisation no of depart
overall_text: Ticketing system and task assignment from group to group with view access on every user.
pros_text: The platform is very simple and user interface is very smooth and friendly, super customer service from the support staff.
cons_text: Not any that I can think of, maybea little more modification for getting the auto populating of data from a linked system may help in fasting the user experience.

title: Saved My Business
overall_text: Very solid product and loving the product development.
pros_text: This product saved my business but decluttering my email account with all support tickets and help me keep staff accountable for business that came in. One transitioned fully, my business cannot live without it.
cons_text: Did not like having to find all of the options where they didn't seem like they would be.

title: Use FreshDesk for support cases for small software company
overall_text: I think they are trying to make improvements on a regular basis so that is encouraging.
pros_text: The interface is clean and not cluttered. LOVED the ability to create Pivotal Tracker stories directly from the Freshdesk case!
cons_text: The search functionality didn't work the best and the report capabilities were lacking. It was a bit difficult to get metrics out in reports, at least the kind we needed.

title: Help Desk software very easy to work
overall_text: It is very easy to deliver a good customer service with this software. Very easy to use, the customer can communicate very easy with you through different channels. Some users prefer to chat, some others prefer to call you, so depending on the customers likes, you can handle all this kinds of channel support with Freshdesk.
pros_text: It works for small or big companies.The price depends on the number of users or agents.Works together with all the Google Apps.Customer can send tickets via social media, like through Facebook or Twitter.
cons_text: So far I think that the reports and metrics can be better or improved. This app handles a lot of information that can give to the IT Managers to make important decisions in the company, but right now this software needs an improvement in this matter.

title: Good Software with integration options
overall_text: I've had a positive experience thus far. Any issues/questions I've had were answered quickly by support.
pros_text: easy to usegood lookingscalable options with different plansreasonable priceeasy to implementa lot of features, even at the free level
cons_text: There isn't a lot I didn't like, for the price I think it is the best option out there. They offer a lot of connected services, such as fresh chat, and fresh ping. However, they currently don't offer an integration with remote management software. This added feature would be helpful

title: Great work order system
overall_text: Pros:Freshdesk is a great way for teams to stay organized and disperse job responsibilities in a ticket form. I really like that I can set service level agreements.
pros_text: Cons:I have run into some technical issues, but nothing that their support system wasn't able to help me with. I also hate the new mint look. The older version was much more user friendly.

title: Works very well
overall_text: The support is great, and the tool never gives errors.It is great.
pros_text: I really like the canned response section which we use every day.Other tools do not let categorize them well, but FreshDesk does and makes it easy to use with shortcuts.
cons_text: The mobile app does not work well as the desktop, and we cannot use it because of it.I wish it mirrors the desktop app.I hope the site is simply mobile-friendly, it would be better than having a separate app that does not work.

title: Freshdesk is great and even better with Freshchat
overall_text: The overall experience with Freshdesk is positive. I can't think of anything we've had issues with; Freshdesk is so easy to use, I have never contacted customer service.
pros_text: Freshdesk is easy to use, intuitive, and easy to teach others to use. Most of the features are fairly common amongst ticket systems, but FreshDesk has them all. In addition, using Freshchat to turn complicated Live Chats in to tickets is very helpful and time saving.
cons_text: There aren't any particular cons. Freshdesk is fairly comprehensive and reasonably priced.

title: Freshdesk - Simple, Clean, Effective
overall_text: Having implemented Freshdesk for multiple organizations, It s all you need to turn you're provide exceptional customer support to your customers.
pros_text: Its simple to use. Easy to understand and effectively gets the work done.
cons_text: Nothing in particular. Overall it looks very clean but sometimes I have these bugs which clutter the whole view on the left-side panel and this still exists.

title: Very Good product overall with room for improvement
overall_text: Though the system has some shortcomings it is overall a very good, reliable and convenient system.
pros_text: Easy to use, feature rich, reliable, good support.
cons_text: Some features are lacking or not convenient to use - such as a lackluster ticket search option if you are searching by custom fields/information. Some lacking right to left language support.

title: Freshdesk Helpdesk Review
overall_text: Pros:Comprehensive support call logging, tracking and communication platform.Web-based and iOS supported.Responsive technical support.
pros_text: Cons:Latest iOS app (v5.X) has been buggy and could have used further development before initial release. Some features from version 4 have not yet been implemented into version (e.g; finger print or face ID to login)

title: Decent system to manage customers requests
overall_text: Freshdesk is decent software. Productivity of our team have got increased by using the Freshdesk. It allows you to set automative tasks on certain events of a ticket, allows customers to add their feedback, provides various analytical reports. A try is a must.
pros_text: Freshdesk is great tool to take manage queries of your customers via a ticketing system that can be customised as per your needs. You can automate all repetitive tasks. Tickets can beaked down to smaller tickets to address complex issues. Freshdesk provides various channels to connect to your customer like Chat, Email, Phone, Social Media Etc.
cons_text: Software lacks the feature to attachphotos, documents or notes to a specific case/requests.

title: Review on Freshdesk 2023
overall_text: We had some issues before, but all good nowThe system is stable and function well
pros_text: Fast, easy to use and quickSimple to work with
cons_text: No in particular Seems to be easy to useWe have full access to changes methods on system

title: Used freshdesk for 4 years, love it!
overall_text: Always fast, pleasant and polite. Nothing but professional, quite happy to use their service.
pros_text: We've been able to grow our business while not being stifled by costs. When we were ready for more features, the upgrade was simple and painless.
cons_text: Our end user customer portal doesn't have the new mint theme, which doesn't look quite so great. But I know it'll get there.

title: Ticket system with many features. Still, there's a room of improvement
overall_text: Pros:1. system covers standard necessary functions such as discussion in ticket, ticket status, auto email reply.2.The portal function where client can check their ticket progress.3.Customer Support responds quickly and on time, try to find the solution that I need an answer.
pros_text: Cons:1. Export system. when we need to export ticket record in tabular data. We need to do it by hand. We cannot setup an automatic export to do it by monthly/weekly. In addition, there is a date range filter in export tickets window, we configure the certain date range, but the data is not completely exported as expected. It seems we have tofilter date range at the main screen in order to export the right data.2. Automation rule. we configure the rule such that if there are specific keywords, the ticket will be closed, however the rules monitor only requester's(first sender) and agent's(freshdesk's user) email which means that any other who replies the email with certain keywords can't close the ticket, in which, I wished the system has an option for us to configure in a way that if anyone in the loop uses certain keywords, the ticket will be closed.3. Ticket update status. when we change ticket's rule, the system sends notification abruptly. I wished they should be a confirmation button before the ticket status is changed and system sends email notification to those who involved.

title: Great Product and excellent support
overall_text: The overall experience has been amazing be it in terms of mail sorting, reports, providing a timely response to users and automation being one of the most rewarding USP's of the software. Would highly recommend this software to organisations looking for a easy to operate and budget friendly, highly supportive software.
pros_text: The amazing features of the software being Flawless execution and highly interactive UI makes it a piece of cake tooperate and sort data.
cons_text: Mostly need to explore the software in the beginning but once you are hands on its highly easy to operate.

title: Freshdesk for office workers
overall_text: Overall, Freshdesk is generally well-regarded by office workers who use it. Its ease of use, multi-channel support, and customization features make it a popular choice for businesses that need to manage customer inquiries and support requests. However, its limited reporting, integration issues, and cost may be drawbacks for some users.
pros_text: Freshdesk offers support for multiple channels, including email, phone, social media, and live chat, which can help office workers to manage customer inquiries more efficiently.
cons_text: Freshdesk can sometimes have issues with integrating with other software, which can be a frustration for office workers who need to use multiple tools.

title: freshdesk review
overall_text: quite decent
pros_text: ease of use for standard customer questions/complaintsyour own customer service is quite good
cons_text: rules (dispatcher, supervisor, observer) for transferring and classifying requests can get rather complexAWS e-mail servers are blacklisted rather more often than we'd like

title: Success of Freshdesk
overall_text: Pros:I like the usability most about Freshdesk. Once you understand the buttons, navigating the software is seamless and moderating your team is easy. The export functions serve as a mass database and report generator all while having the ability to track corresponding infomation throughout the system.
pros_text: Cons:My least favourite aspect of Freshdesk is the pre outlined reports. We, as an organization, have created feilds that we are interested in tracking but can only do so by doing a mass export.

title: Great for internal communication!
overall_text: Pros:We work in team structures within our company and this software allows everyone within the team to know what's going on with each client at all times. If we reach out to a client, another team member can easily see that communication, so they are not asking the same questions again, etc. It helps our team stay on top of things for clients.
pros_text: Cons:Haven't had any complaints so far, other than it gets a bit pricey for all the users we have. We are expanding and it costs more for each user we add.

title: Freshdesk Support Desk - blessing in disguise
overall_text: Overall, all its meeting our requirements but next time when we purchase, we look forward to purchase unlimited pack which is not available as of now.
pros_text: help customers solve their issues themselves, makes it easy for them to connect with us via ticketing system and added to it provide all MIS to provide the supporting data to our analysis.
cons_text: per agent pricing, private ticketing system and advance filters are missing as a feature

title: One Stop for Support Ticketing Support
overall_text: The purpose behind opting for freshdesk is that we wanted agent friendly application which customers too can easily view and freshdesk served that purpose
pros_text: Not much complexity for new person to use, All he got to do is just go through it and learn it. Lots of features available which are very much a necessity
cons_text: The new UI Takes a bit of time in filters to open the page etc.

title: Good value for money software
overall_text: Pros:Easy to use after a few weeks. Good support.
pros_text: Cons:There's a slight mismatch between customer/groups etc. I feel more security options would help, such that we could have our Agents, internal customers, and external customers able to view the tickets. If we could customise this it would be great. The new pop ups asking me if I want to go to New York!

title: Great Cloud based Ticketing Application
overall_text: Overall experience has been great. We were able to integrate multiple products onto one platform. The integration with various support channels is great.
pros_text: Ease of use and ticket visibility options. Application is easy to configure and the online help file is pretty good.
cons_text: Development requests take a while to be completed. Feature requests stay pending for extended periods.

title: Freshdesk, the fair ticket between price and quality
overall_text: In general, my experience with the freshdesk ticket machine was very good. We use it daily in the company and it is the backbone of our IT support system. I recommend it for its ease of use, its performance and its fair price.
pros_text: - Ease of creating tickets- Good SLA system- Clear reporting system- Area management
cons_text: - Mobile application I found it uncomfortable

title: Very intuitive and userfriendly interface
overall_text: While we appreciate the overall look and feel of the tool, I think that there should be a lot more options in order to stick to it as sole ticketing system.
pros_text: We are actively using FreshDesk for a few months now and the best thing about it is how intuitive it is. There is very little training needed for a new person to work with it. It also gives you good options to assign work within a small team.
cons_text: Unfortunately the list is longer here: as the tool is still in development, there are quite a few things which could work better: 1. Analytic results for the Solutions articles; there are no insights available- although such data could be retrieved 2. Proactive Emails don't really work if you need to see an opening rate or the content you sent out; 3. Reports calculated do not include a Median value, just averages; 4. Integration with Salesforce needs to be manually checked daily - because the sync is lost somehow without any warning5. Customer Survey layout can't really be customised and the design is far from ideal for us.

title: An all-in-one option
overall_text: I have used Freshdesk every day for almost a year and it is a very practical tool. Previously used Zendesk and Helpdesk and neither is as complete as Freshdesk
pros_text: Freshdesk has it all, ease of ticket control, kpi to measure the work of collaborators and integration with calls.
cons_text: It does not explain much the way it gives the recognitions to the users

title: easy to use
overall_text: Freshdesk on its own is wonderful but more work needs to be done so it can be used with the other Fresh sites.
pros_text: Fresh desk makes it easy to send out emails to members, log calls and support tickets. they have a variety of statuses you can set and it is easy to merge similar tickets to clear up the feed
cons_text: I've used Zendesk before and in my honest opinion this UI is a bit clunky in comparison. I think it could use a better interface and be integrated better with other Fresh sites, such as FreshSales

title: A very good freemium solution
overall_text: Pros:We were able to use it without paying at the beginning and it solved multiple problematics we had ( ticketing, live chat, knowledge sharing )
pros_text: Cons:We were sometime a bit lost in the configuration of it. We might have requested help from the customer support but we've never done so.

title: Couldn’t work without it
overall_text: The metrics and reports are easy to use and very insightful to determine employee productivity.It’s easy to track the SLA of tickets, track progress using notes and find past tickets when needed.
pros_text: Fantastic Helpdesk service.Easy to create, update, close and track support tickets.
cons_text: In three years this service has only been down once or twice but it is work stoppping when it does.

title: Freshdesk is the TOP!
overall_text: I can manage all the daily jobs with Freshdesk and sort them by priority.
pros_text: I like it, developement and management is very very simple.It's all on-line and this thing is wonderful because you can check all wherever you are.
cons_text: Nothing! Freshdesk is the solution for all problems to be managed.

title: Freshdesk review
overall_text: So far, it has been overall great (minus my point mentioned above). The support team is always friendly and helpful and the system rarely faults or goes wrong.
pros_text: the replying to customers part of it is very easy to use and is set up much like an outlook email.
cons_text: I find on the development side - it is quite hard to get things set up the way you want them, without having to ask for help. It would be great if getting things set up and rules set in place, is easier, to make it quicker to make changes and much less daunting!

title: Ticketing system simplified
overall_text: In our day to day business we use Freshdesk daily as a good application for responding to the users.
pros_text: The overall usage of Freshdesk comes with ease. At first you need a little bit of understanding what features it includes but once you get to know the program ticketing becomes an easy task. There are a lot of features you can include - filtering, rules for tickets, users can rate the quality of the tickets etc.
cons_text: As the version recently went to a newer upgrade there have been quite a few instances when the ticket properties are resetting in the middle of responding to a user. However, once you get to know the hotkeys etc. you can easily avoid these problems.

title: Many features but buggy
overall_text: Dealing with these bugs takes a lot of time. Otherwise, it's a fine product.
pros_text: Basic features are freeIt has nice shortcuts to link to KB articles
cons_text: I've come across several (serious) bugs now. * Customer replies to pending tickets aren't always displayed as such, so you have to click through all open tickets to check for new replies. * If you forward a mail to a customer and s/he replies to it, it gets flagged as private note and you will not get a notification, nor will the ticket get reopened. I get the impression that delivering new features has been the core priority of Freshdesk, as opposed to quality.

title: We started using FreshDesk when we launched our software and have never looked for another solution.
overall_text: Pros:The support is amazing, anytime we need anything they are available to help quickly and with detailed replies.
pros_text: Cons:I can't really find anything that I would need in support software that FreshDesk does not offer.There are always a few features that we wish every software tool had, but we have been able to do everything we need with this tool.

title: Fresh Desk Review
overall_text: Pros:I am able to customize my automation rules to insure our clients get the best support they deserve.
pros_text: Cons:Not enough templates to guide you in how you want to customize your account.
cons_text: Switched From:Zendesk Suite

title: Amazing Helpdesk Ticketing System!
overall_text: Provides us with a free helpdesk ticketing system, where we can prioritise support requests within our school. Works really well and is easy for users to use.
pros_text: FreeWorks properly as describedDoes what is needed Easy to use Amazing support if needed
cons_text: Nothing at all! Every aspect of Freshdesk works so well.

title: Great Zendesk alternative
overall_text: Freshdesk has served our business quite well for the last two years
pros_text: The customer service team is very helpful
cons_text: A lot of the functionality requires you to upgrade to a more expensive plan

title: Been extensively using FreshDesk. What more can you desire for a support backend?
overall_text: Our whole support division is based on this software.
pros_text: Simple and strait to the point configuration.Ease of use and nice integration with Jira.Very good email integration and anti-spam protection. Nice search in the widget.
cons_text: Global Search might be improved a bit to search by details of the issues/forum posts, not just by title and related fields.

title: Review of Freshdesk Software
overall_text: Overall my experience on Freshdesk has been extremely pleasant and pain-free.
pros_text: Exceptionally good service for handling support queries of clients, and ensures all communication between both parties is documented.
cons_text: The inability to edit a response once it has been sent, and also not being able to remove the creator of the ticket from the email response.

title: Freshdesk ticketing management
overall_text: Pros:Easy to import/export data and very practical for ticket management
pros_text: Cons:It has some problems sometimes with exporting data
cons_text: Switched From:Snipe-IT

title: Superb product
overall_text: I've tried many different products for my IT department, including in-house bespoke software, and nothing comes close to the features offered by Freshdesk (for a price).
pros_text: Clean interface; plenty of features (even on the free version); the developers listen to their users
cons_text: Can be a little expensive, especially for smaller companies, if you need features like time tracking.

title: A definite upgrade from what we were using prior!
overall_text: Overall this is a superior product. My team and I have only just started using it so I'm sure there are still a lot of features to maximize.
pros_text: Feature-packed! If you can think it, it's likely got it.
cons_text: The analytics wasn't as easy to manipulate as I thought it would be. Curated reports are nice to have, but it's also nice to be able to break down all the data to it's rawest format and build my own custom report from there.

title: Freshdesk is a very good value for money tool, simple to use and very straighforward
overall_text: Go value for money and an easy to use setup for our customer service department.
pros_text: Freshdesk has a very to the point approach, without overly complicating things, the interface is beautiful and very easy to use.
cons_text: The API documentation and it's limited use, you cannot do much with it in terms of analytics and data integration with your own company's data.

title: Freshdesk review.
overall_text: Overall I find Freshdesk to be a great tool.
pros_text: So easy to set up and maintain. It's also easy for the users.
cons_text: So far no cons that I can see. I like it!

title: Kennion
overall_text: We have several team members and with Freshdesk we can back each other up when someone is too busy or out of the office.It is nice to know that our customers will be helped by someone in a timely manner.
pros_text: I like having everything for our team in one place.It's very easy to see where the workload is and share the responsibility.It's very easy to review and respond to our customers professionally.
cons_text: We cut and past a lot of information into our responses.It doesn't maintain the format and we have to spend time correcting.

title: Review
overall_text: Allowedbis tonytack and manage client interactions amd provide an audit for our client relationships
pros_text: The outstanding support from Freshdesk.The flexibility of the product
cons_text: Lack of integration with individual agents email. Fundamental securoty risk that emails added as what should be private notes to a ticket are set public and visible to the Requester

title: One Stop Shop!
overall_text: Pros:A one-stop-shop system that can be integrated fully between each system and with other external systems as well.
pros_text: Cons:Saudi Arabia numbers are still not supported in freshcaller
cons_text: Switched From:Zendesk Suite

title: From zero to a ticket system
overall_text: We are satisfied with the operation and the possibilities. these completely cover our requirements that we need.
pros_text: A short summary of our experience:-In short, this software is very user friendly to use.-the basics were quickly arranged. -many options to get a good overview-Nice reporting functions
cons_text: Dutch manual / explanation is hard to find

title: Freshdesk user from past 2 years
overall_text: We are managing our production support with Freshdesk. Ticketing features, Reports, Knowledge Base articles publish are some of the prime features. Overall happy with the experience.
pros_text: The ease of use is the prime one. Support is really awesome and I am overwhelmed by it.
cons_text: Dashboard edits needs to be improved. Should have more flexible options for user defined dashboards.

title: Excellent Product and Support
overall_text: IT was not prioritizing, tracking, resolving and following through on all the support calls it was getting resulting in staff displeasure. IT has significantly improved in those areas and staff satisfaction has gone up.
pros_text: Easy of use and the number of features you got on the Blossom subscription compared to other products.
cons_text: FreshDesk did everything we wanted and more. The only thing that would of been nice is to replace the CLOSE button on the Ticket form with RESOLVED but it was a very minor thing.

title: Excellent Ticketing System
overall_text: Excellent software for ticketing services and it is a better option than emailing support questions and providing feedback. It is very quick and efficient.
pros_text: This software offers a wide range of features that proved essential and helped to improve customer experience. It was very easy to use and tasks were able to be done quickly and efficiently.
cons_text: The upgrades were too expensive in my opinion and spam emails from Freshdesk did not filter out automatically.

title: Very good for start ups
overall_text: Overall it was a very good experience. We were a startup and needed this for our 2 agents customer service department. We handled inbound through emails (tickets) and phone calls. This product was very good for our business.
pros_text: Easy to configure and useGood value for the moneyPossibility to customize a lot of things (email responses, canned responses, etc)
cons_text: I found more difficult the way of searching a 'client' in the database (searching by phone or email) and find all the communications made with that client (phone calls and tickets)

title: Makes Support Much Easier
overall_text: I had great experiences with Freshdesk. All my issues were always handled quickly and in a professional manner. Very informational.Great support platform.
pros_text: Any Questions Could Be Researched Before Submitting Tickets When TIckets For Issues Were Submitted They Were Answered Fairly Quickly (24hours)
cons_text: The interaction with the support personnel seemed Impersonal

title: One stop solution
overall_text: Amazing!
pros_text: For every customer query, you can raise a distinctive ticket, rate them as per the urgency, have all the details of a consumer at one place, and so on and so forth! What else do you need when you're dealing in a B2C field.
cons_text: Sometimes there is a delay in reflecting the assigned tickets in the relevant department.

title: User-friendly & easy-to-use customer support ticketing software
overall_text: Pros:Very user-friendly. Nice searching & filtering tools.Good API.Lots of automation options.Their support team is very quick to respond.
pros_text: Cons:Pace of updates / innovation -- Freshdesk has branched off into many other products (renaming the parent company Freshworks along the way) and so the development effort on Freshdesk is lagging.

title: Quick and to the point! We use Freshdesk every day and its good to know they have our back!
overall_text: Daily running of our support service is made a lot easier with Fresdesk
pros_text: Allows us to manage and report on many issues as well as highlight common issues that need to be addressed.
cons_text: Its not a deal breaker however I am not a huge fan of the Archiving process, we used to search and use old solutions a lot. We have had to adjust how we use Fresdesk.

title: Nice Product
overall_text: My overall experience with Freshdesk has been very positive. We have it implemented as our ticketing system for IT issues and are looking into expanding the ticketing portion to other departments.
pros_text: I like the ability to create my own support email with our domain that will link and automatically create a ticket. I also like how easy it is to adjust and customize different ticket fields.
cons_text: My only hangup is the language barrier in customer service. Often times it's hard to understand and feel like you're being understood.

title: Extremely intuitive
overall_text: We use Freshdesk for customer support for our LMS and also external learning platforms. We are extremely happy with the speed and efficiency that Freshdesk has brought to our organization. It is helping us guarantee excellent customer service with less stress.
pros_text: Freshdesk is extremely easy to use. At first I was a little apprehensive when we started using Freshdesk instead of emails, WhatsApp messages and phone calls to deal with customer service. But seeing how easy it is to manage all customer support using tickets under Freshdesk, I regret not using it before. In our organization we are five Freshdesk users, all in charge of different products. Before Freshdesk problems were dealt via email,creating communication bottlenecks, and confusion of roles. Now all customer needs are assigned to the appropriate user and our work is more effective.
cons_text: Not much, only that sometimes we close a ticket, then the person who created it answers back and reopens it! A minor hiccup, I must say.

title: Extremly worth the money
overall_text: overall im very satisfied with freshdesk
pros_text: i really like the ease of deployement and the real time notification system and ticket automationand the pricing is really worth the money considering the functionalities offered
cons_text: the overall look and feel could be optimized a bit

title: A very usable and well featured helpdesk solution
overall_text: It is a better fit with how we work than our previous helpdesk system, whilst being a lot cheaper than JIRA or similar systems.
pros_text: Freshdesk is an easy to use product, which can be used by any team members with minimal training.The interface is clean and simple, but this doesn't mean it is missing features.Filtering by call metadata is easy, and I believe that reporting and KPI tracking are also easy (this is not within my remit, so I am quoting our helpdesk team).
cons_text: Although the interface is clean and simple, I personally find it a little too simple occasionally.Configuring the email side of it is not as simple as you would like if you are using office 365.

title: Easy to use support system
overall_text: Great customer service, support system and documentation is good
