overall_text: This plugin lets you manage several conversations at once, so you can always be present for those site visitors who are most likely to convert. With premium (paid) you can set up triggers that let you reach out to every visitor automatically, so you’re more available to hold in-depth conversations with serious prospects. You can use the chat system on your mobile device thanks to dedicated mobile apps and you can use the included analytics to assess how visitors use your website. You can also easily customize it to reflect your site’s design and color scheme.
pros_text: A free subscription with Zendesk Chat allows one chat agent to handle unlimited chats, though restricted to one at a time. If your website is small, this live chat plugin may well suffice.
cons_text: Not too much to complain about, but the free version is limited. Premium access costs per month. This also unlocks cool additional features like chat triggers – chat triggers let you specify certain conditions for the chat box to auto-launch, such as if a visitor is stuck on a page for more than a minute.

title: Professional Client Support
overall_text: Pros:Our Services team and Client Success teams both use Zendesk in slightly different ways that are equally effective. Services team uses it for status updates to the client on in-progress work and documenting quotes & approvals. Client Success uses it for issue tracking, bugs, and updates on releases. Both teams love having customized SLAs for reply clocks and customized signatures for information sharing. We also use automatic replies and the ticket status options so that our teams are on the same page about where tickets are at.
pros_text: Cons:Not the most intuitive to set up different filters and views -- once they're set up, it's fairly easy to manage. Not super easy to update either.

title: Stay Organized And Efficient With Zendesk
overall_text: Pros:Zendesk is user-friendly and automatically creates tickets based on custom triggers you set, making teams more efficient and organized. It helps to ensure customer communication is handled in a timely manner and nothing falls through the cracks, with a transparent paper trail of all two-way communication.
pros_text: Cons:Zendesk is on the more expensive side, especially as you begin to add on additional features, which can be tricky. One thing that would be helpful is advanced analytics, beyond what's currently included, to back-up any assumptions on daily customer interactions.

title: Zendesk - Are there even other Customer Ticket Management Services Out There?
overall_text: Pros:It is my first software used for customer service management/contact. I do not know if there are others out there that are more expensive or cheaper or more reliable to use etc. so it is a tad difficult to say what I like or dislike as comparisons are not available to me. I do like the clean interface.
pros_text: Cons:Following a ticket is the only way to be able to follow a specific request and then again if you're working on a 100 tickets a day, it'll get hard to track if the only way to get updates is to follow a ticket. All you have is that this ticket number has an update to go on. Most won't remember which ticket just got updated until they go into it.I also wished there was a night mode function.

title: Awesome source for a Knowledgebase
overall_text: ZenDesk makes my life easier when I am learning new products. It is also makes the lives easier of my clients.
pros_text: Most of the products we partner with have a ZenDesk knowledge base embedded into the software, which perfectly exists on the cloud. The way in which ZenDesk is set up makes it so easy for new users to not only search for articles, obtain relevant articles and associated content, but also easily share the content via URL link to others. ZenDesk is ingenius and a necessity for self-paced learning in today's tech world.
cons_text: I have no dislikes whatsoever. ZenDesk is sleek, user-friendly, and necessary.

title: An old-fashioned customer-friendly product
overall_text: Zendesk feels user- and customer friendly, you profit from an accessible knowledge base but for a growing SaaS company we feel like there could be improvement in supporting more extensive workflows, processes and ITSM-aspects.
pros_text: I like that customers can easily profit from the knowledge base which helps reducing the amount of incoming tickets but also the simple things as replying, changing the ticket status and reading formatted text is so much easier. By the way, also you don't get easily lost in big threads.
cons_text: There isn't a full Self-Service Portal like other ITSM-tools and there is limited functionality to enable decision-makers and leaders to have control over their Change Management process.

title: It does it's job considerably well
overall_text: Zendesk was the first ticketing software I had experience with, which was perfect because it was so easy to pick up and get the hang of.But now that I've been using it more and have become an administrator, I'm seeing that it's more capable than I had previously realized as well.
pros_text: The ease of use especially when compared to some of it's competitors such as Service Now.Zendesk is foolproof.The interface is clean and while it may be more basic than it's competitors, it does pretty much everything you need it to do for a ticketing system.
cons_text: It could have a bit more customization integrated into the software, other than that though, it's very solid.

title: its multi-channel support and a reliable ticketing system
overall_text: This is the best ticket management software and It makes life easier to be able to share information or data. Simple and beautiful. User Friendly.
pros_text: I love the way that it manages customer purchase history, inventory levels, communication history from chats, email exchange, and call transactions and aility to create rules to automatically file requests and emails into groups or departments based on a number of valuesCreate a branded knowledge base for staff, users and customers also tool will Integrates with a large number of apps, including MailChimp, Trustpilot, Shopify, WooCommerce, Xero and many other solutions,powerful reporting and customer satisfaction surveys and Macros are a plus. Chat function is easy to use. Nice filtering system finally I can say Zendesk is great asset to any business for managing support tickets.
cons_text: Expensive if you want to use all features of ZendeskThe free tier has had functionality taken away over time, and adding lots of users can make it less competitive cost-wise.There is no place to put information about opportunities or leads.

title: They are one of the best...but we left them...
overall_text: It provided us with a great tool for supporting our users, but the support from Zendesk became lacking and so we moved on to a company that had better customer support.
pros_text: Zendesk is the ultimate when it comes to Customer Support systems.Email support and Knowledge Base are great ways that you can connect with your customers, whether they are internal or external.
cons_text: Over the last few years, they have tried to implement new features without keeping the support of existing products up to date.They attempted to update the mobile app and it was a bad experience at start (especially since it was a forced update by turning off the old app that worked).

title: Complex for our work purposes, but I can see the potential
overall_text: Has the potential to be really good, but for our day to day operations, honestly, it probably caused more headaches than solved!
pros_text: Visibility of all emails and times received was a good feature of this. Also could categorise the priority of the ticket request.
cons_text: With the visibility of emails, we had incidents where a mail was forwarded to another employee thinking it was just to them, but the customer could see the email chain! This could've massively disrupted our business for future shipments, and a big reason why we stopped using it

title: Zendesk Rating
overall_text: Overall it was pretty good since the product is so feature/function rich.Getting the support to understand how to best use the product was a challenge sometimes.
pros_text: I liked that it was designed as a trouble tracking tool and not as a CRM product trying to add trouble ticketing.I liked the multi-media support for sending in support requests.
cons_text: I found the reporting to be a bit cumbersome to use since it could not easily do a search to find what I was looking for but had to create a report for it.

title: Zendesk is a great option
overall_text: Pros:It is very easy to implement and unlike other alternatives allows the storage of documents
pros_text: Cons:The basic plan is sometimes a little more expensive than other alternatives
cons_text: Alternatives Considered:Salesforce Sales Cloud

title: Zendesk, the best resource for helpdesk needs
overall_text: Having been on board with Zendesk for over four years now, we have seen a lot of improvements to the platform. Zendesk has helped us build our support team to what it is today. I am grateful for the ease of use and functionality it provides my team. Their customer support is great, which is expected from customer support software. They have made a few updates that have enhanced the overall look and feel of the software too. I enjoy using Zendesk and highly recommend it.
pros_text: Easy tool to use. Great customer support. It is an easy way to build a helpdesk/knowledgebase system for our clients to rely on.
cons_text: Their widget update only allows for the option to chat, or email support, not both at the same time, like their old widget did.

title: Zendesk is the amazing customer success software and we have used this tool for complete 6 months.
overall_text: It was overall nice.
pros_text: It's the best as comparison to other tools like livechat or Freshchat
cons_text: The customer support was not too much supportive, we were getting the responses too late.

title: Zendesk is the software that focuses on your customers and that makes them happy
overall_text: This tool allows you to focus more on your customers, have them closer and the attention they receive makes them happy. Having your customers happy means that your company is going in the right direction. Without a doubt a very complete and efficient tool.
pros_text: This software is very efficient when it comes to serving your customers. Being based on the cloud does something intuitive, its interface is friendly. This is a tool that integrates everything, and that is precisely what Zendesk does. Zendesk manages to integrate all the activities of your company that are directly related to customers: online chat, social networks, emails, progress reports, telephone support and also applications to continue optimizing your work processes, according to the needs that you are developing.
cons_text: There is no problem or inconvenience with Zendesk. It is very efficient and easy to use. Everything you need to organize and maintain close contact with your customers.

title: Fast but can be messy
overall_text: As a user loved it. But on the backend side, I'm not so sure. When it worked, it worked. But when it didn't, it seems like that's when it went off the rails.
pros_text: I used this at my old company. As a user, I loved the fact that I didn't have to create a ticket. I just had to send an email and everything else was done on the backend. If I needed to track something down, like an old ticket, I could find it.
cons_text: I didn't do much on the admin side of it since it was mainly setup for engineering but we also had IT tickets setup there. For some reason, that part ceased to work and we couldn't get it fixed for some reason. It had something to do with the IT tickets going to an IT email alias that wasn't forwarding correctly or something, but the person who was doing admin on it couldn't figure out why this happened. You'd think that there'd be a feature where they could just remove and readd a user but apparently it wasn't that simple according to the admin.

title: Build relationships with clients thru Zendesk
overall_text: Can help us make our work more Effective and a reliable program.
pros_text: It is one of the most used in the market so I am convinced that we should have this too. What we found out is, this can help have a real-time communication with customers, Zendesk makes our support to clients more easier, as to reaching out to them. The more that we made them satisfied.
cons_text: This has more rooms for improvement, so I expect more from its updates soon. Plus, don't make it so pricey if ever there will be future great updates.

title: Rough with the smooth
overall_text: In general, this is a solid product that is used by thousands of companies. The only thing I wish was that some of the reporting could be more easily extracted.
pros_text: When set up, the features are intuitive and easy to use.The after-sales and customer success team is very supportive.It makes hiring and transferring new employees easier, especially if they work in support, because many similar companies in the field use it.
cons_text: Difficult to extract reports quickly It is not possible to sync notifications from Slack, which is frustrating when Slack is the main internal communication tool.Reporting accuracy can be affected by tags that cannot be disposed of or deleted.You may experience frustration when using the reporting and admin sections. In Zendesk, you could search for macros, triggers, etc., but it would open up a new tab. The new version opens up a whole new tab in your browser, which makes it all very confusing.

title: Easy to use, but with limits that didn't match small biz needs
overall_text: We ended up having so much feedback from clients who routinely had large file attachments that were rejected on our plan level, and who wanted to use the actual portal themselves to check their ticket status that we looked into other options before upgrading. We found an alternative that we switched to and saved over 50% in cost, and got all the features we wanted. I think this platform was simply made to be the right fit for larger enterprises and I'm sure it's the cream of the crop in those situations.
pros_text: The platform was extremely easy to get set up, the email notifications are beautiful and customizable, and the system is easy for support staff to use.
cons_text: The pricing, when compared to other options with just as good feature-sets, was just higher than it seemed to justify. We also ran into limitations in attachment size and some other logistical things that caused an issue for our small business and would have required an even higher tiered plan.

title: Facilísimo de implementar y completísima herramienta
overall_text: Pros:Desde el principio todo es muy sencillo, te dan tu número de teléfono, tu correo, tu panel personalizable y tu código para el widget. Luego tienes muchísimas opciones ya que es un producto muy completo al tener capacidad multicanal para ofrecer ayuda a todos tus usuarios y/o consumidores.
pros_text: Cons:La verdad es que no consigo sacarle fallos, sin embargo sí creo que el precio podría reducirse un poco, hay otras opciones bastante más económicas como LiveAgent, Jira Service Desk o Zoho Desk.
cons_text: Alternatives Considered:LiveAgent,Zoho DeskandJIRA Service Management

title: Non-Existent & TERRIBLE Customer Service. You are just a number to them.
overall_text: DISGUSTING. Would never recommend and will actively switch everyone I speak to from Zendesk to FreshDesk.
pros_text: Nothing... this system is confusing, difficult to implement, and is not user-friendly.
cons_text: Everything, especially the customer service, which did not exist. It took me 3 weeks to get my account rep on the phone. They do not have a phone number or email. Getting support is impossible, and when you finally get someone on the phone - they are useless, and laugh at you for requesting a discount (after paying full price for a whole year, adding 1 more user was going to jump my monthly from $47 to $94 USD / month! I couldn't afford that, and the Zendesk Account Rep laughed and said haha well, if you're adding an employee, sounds like you're doing well and can afford it!)

title: Great support ticketing and adequate help center library
overall_text: We significantly improved our user self-help experience by deploying and leveraging Zendesk articles and learning paths.
pros_text: Zen desk makes it simple to assign, communicate on and solve customer support tickets. Additionally, publishing articles is very simple. Our team created over 100 Help Center articles for our customers and they along with the ability to group into learning paths has created a significant increase in self-help with our app.
cons_text: I think that Zendesk help center us limited because competitors like intercom provide a less robust but simpler customer communication and education tool.

title: A great CX-software for starters
overall_text: Zendesk Suite isn't bad. Suitable for those who are into Customer Service, but may not be a strong suit for those who are into technology or highly familiar with features. Zendesk is best said to be beginner-friendly.
pros_text: Some things I like the most are:(1) Beginner friendly: Easy for starters to use for CX or customer service(2) Features are easy to use(3) The features are well organized and easy to navigate around(4) Shortcuts are very useful
cons_text: Some things I don't like the most are:(1) Search engine; lacks advanced features for enhanced ticket-finding(2) Rich text doesn't filter very well when particular inputs are included i.e. dash for bullets, numbering for numbered lists.(3) Automations have limited functionalities and logic. For instance, if the time interval is given, but not the precise value i.e. time > 7 weeks, then that is not allowed. That should be included for usability.

title: Better app for sure
overall_text: Much better experience that Freshchat. I faced many problem with freshchat and zendesk just made it easier for installation and support
pros_text: The easy integration into my website and livechat to support customer issues made my life easier. The applications helps me to track customer issues and resolve them on team side
cons_text: There is no option to export data directly into a CSV file which makes it difficult for team to do data analysis.

title: You need to use Zendesk for satisfied customers and agents both!
overall_text: I love Zendesk! I have used Zendesk for nearly all my clients and once you begin using it, you can’t go back to any other similar platforms. I even use it as an internal tool in my organization!
pros_text: Undoubtedly the market leader when it comes to customer service software. I like its numerous integrations with various other platforms. The ability to integrate seamlessly (and use the same logins) with websites, API support etc.
cons_text: There are a few. Earlier Zendesk allowed us to customize their support frontend using various themes which we could use to matchc to our websites. It was stopped later. I also don’t like the iOS app.

title: Zendesk Sell Review
overall_text: Overall Zendesk offers different app that can improve and help your sale team stay on track and it is less expensive then other programs.
pros_text: After program was updatedto Zendesk some features are better and database features are always improving. Issues are responded fairly quickly. Good tools that keep you organized.
cons_text: There are issues at times with uploading data and exporting data. Sometimes data is deleted or missing for no reason. Limited report section for data.

title: Zendesk Review
overall_text: My overall experience with Zendesk has been excellent and I have been using it within the business for 7+ years. However, as I outlined above, it can get quite expensive for a small business if looking to move to a better tier of functionality. Despite this, I would highly recommend the Zendesk support software, it has never let me down.
pros_text: -Easy to set up-Allows customer service team to manage tickets easily-Allows a customisable support workflow-Stay informed with in-app notifications-Good level of API integrations available - Jira, Harvest, etc.
cons_text: -Can get quite expensive once you look to increase functionality and move to a more premium version.

title: La soluzione giusta per l'assistenza dell'ecommerce
overall_text: Pros:Utilizziamo giornalmente il programma come chat per l'assistenza clienti, inoltre dà la possibilità di monitorare gli articoli visualizzati dai potenziali clienti e questo permette di avere uno spettro su quel che richiede la clientela.
pros_text: Cons:Il programma ad oggi non ha presentato problema e quindi mi ritengo molto soddisfatto.

title: Organized Application Support with Zendesk
overall_text: Overall, we are satisfied with Zendesk. The analytics are really nice and they also provide stats benchmarks based on all other users for example for First Response Time.
pros_text: Zendesk has allowed us to funnel internal employee app user questions and problems to an organized location vs a general mailbox. It has been easy to track a conversation from need help to the user received needed support. The Zendesk team has been very responsive when we had questions.
cons_text: We inserted the Zendesk SDK into our application and it requires a little work by our agents depending on how each ticket has been submitted. Also, we have 2 accounts - Customer facing and internal facing and there currently isnt a way to assign users to a specific brand - that is there language for different accounts.

title: Pleased with the organization tools provided
overall_text: Pros:Our support team has used Zendesk for the past 4 years and it is a major improvement from our last support system. The monthly statistics are great to see how we are doing as a team, as well as, the knowledge base feature for both in house and customer facing.
pros_text: Cons:Ourselves, along with a multitude of other customers, have requested to have the Spawn new ticket from reply feature added to Zendesk for longer than we have been using this service. It would be so helpful to be able to break off a new request from our customers, without the original request being overlooked or forgotten.

title: Zendesk- the Game Changer for customer care and customer support
overall_text: I really don't know I did things before Zendesk.It has honestly made a big difference in customer care.
pros_text: The chat features and ticket creation/tracking have been just a great business changer.Being able to live-support customers online is great- they love it and it works great for us.
cons_text: There is a bit of a steep learning curve, but it's doable.

title: Helpful for Customer Service Requests
overall_text: Very useful for my customer service requests when purchasing items from businesses that use the platform
pros_text: Ease of UseReplies come straight to my emailAbility to follow status of ticket
cons_text: Often connected to many different customer services representatives. That may be an issue on the end of the companies that set up an account with Zendesk and not actually with the platform itself. However, I prefer to deal with the same representative for one issue

title: ZenDesk for the extra layer of customer support.
overall_text: My company works with telecommunications companies all over the world. We currently have offices in the United States, Canada, Italy, Australia, and Germany. When our customers do not need to utilize our immediate LiveChat service they create support email tickets through our ZenDesk program. I am immediately notified of all incoming requests for support which allows me to quickly respond to the needs of our customers. There are lots of integrations and the reporting/analytics allows me to keep track of how we are doing compared to the industry standard. Since we are an expanding company ZenDesk has allowed us to constantly meet our customer demands without the normal growing pains.
pros_text: The pricing is extremely affordable for both large and small business- depending on your specific needs. Customer support staff is always available and eager to assist. Detailed reporting and apps integrations are added bonuses.Ability to add tags and even group ticket. Manage client needs quickly and with ease.
cons_text: I have not had an issue in over three years of using ZenDesk. There have been many updates and additions to the program and each of them has been beneficial to my company and customers.I have no doubt that if I do have an issue, complaint, suggestion- that the support staff will be right there for me.

title: Zendesk helps to communicate
overall_text: We recommend our clients to integrate Zendesk products on their websites to increase the number of leads and to make the communication easier. It really works.
pros_text: I have been using Zendesk products, especially Zopim for a while and can say, that there are very useful, well-developed and have fair prices. By integrating Zendesk products on your website you can significantly increase the number of leads and improve your business. Even free trials have all the functions that small business is in need of.
cons_text: Actually, I like everything about Zendesk products. I think they are the best in their niche now.

title: Overall best support ticketing system, but....
overall_text: Overall, I would recommend Zendesk for startups and larger companies as it covers a wide area and multiple use cases. Also Zendesk has easy integrations with other softwares.
pros_text: It can do an immense range of actions. Multiple teams can use Zendesk within a company (sales, customer success, support, etc.). It is a very diverse tool and also easy to implement API or other apps from the marketplace. Once you get used to Zendesk it is very good to work with on a daily basis.
cons_text: There are some actions which surprisingly you cannot do. Features which have been requested for over 3+ years on the community forums.

title: Zendesk as a useful helpdesk tool
overall_text: I have been using Zendesk for over 3.5 years and I find it pretty simple to use.The fact that you can respond via email is helpful as an agent for rapid troubleshooting and responding.Overall, I have had a pretty positive experience and just successfully integrated it into our single sign-on provider.Some areas to improve would be a shortcut to marking an issue as Solved.This could be helpful instead of having to log in to close issues.Additionally many users reply thanks when you close an issue and this automatically re-opens the issue which can be tedious for agents.
pros_text: Tracking issues in an easy to read thread.Email integrationSSO integration
cons_text: Need an option for thank you comments to not re-open solved issues.

title: Great ticket management tool
overall_text: Pros:Zendesk is great for managing customer requests, integrating with other tools, and working cross-functionally to make sure issues are resolved. It's also super flexible with a great support staff and help center.
pros_text: Cons:It's really easy to get disorganized and has a relatively steep learning curve. There are a lot of areas of the product that aren't super intuitive, but Zendesk's documentation definitely makes up for it!
cons_text: Alternatives Considered:Intercom

title: Zendesk is a great customer experience tool
overall_text: Great software for it's role in the customer experience niche.Solid analytics and chat feature for our nonprofits.
pros_text: I love the analytics regarding customer interaction.The Zendesk team is professional and engages with our visitors in a fairly timely manner. Pricing is appropriate for services provided.
cons_text: We don't like the automatic pop-up feature activating without customer interaction or requesting it.Response time has diminished since COVID-19.

title: possible search filters
overall_text: It is helping us communicate to clients and resolve their issues on time and hence keeping us more productive in customer service delivery.
pros_text: Search filters enables me to search any ticket in the system using ticket number and trace its status more easily for a resolution as well you can integrate the tool to almost all social media and communicate to clients from one tool.
cons_text: Zendesk have some downsides, while using custom theme, you cannot award community members awards for participating in forums, the tool keeps disconnecting you to offline status and if you are not using classic agent work space and classic chat widget, clients may not be able to reach you via live chat except through emailing

title: Started at the bottom now we here.
overall_text: The ability to serve our customer support inquiries with a valuable ticketing service that helped our support team stay on top of issues. We were able to sort these issues by urgency and follow up with customers who may not have had a great experience. We received a lot of valuablefeedback via Zendesk.
pros_text: I like the ability to have any support request ticketed as well as have our support documentation hosted on the same platform. A lot of the new features (2017+) that are available with Zendesk make it well worth thecost for supporting our apps and support documentation. The tickets are easily searchable and I really like the ability to submit as pending if there's an outstanding issue in support. This allows us to provide a better value for our customers since our team is able to see what's pending/outstanding if they need follow up help.
cons_text: Initially things were a bit hard to get used to. Usability wasn't very clear. It would have been awesome if 2 years ago we had the ability to connect to slack, as at the time we didn't have a way to respond right from our email client. These issues have since been solved.

title: Great Experience!!
overall_text: It was a great experience!!!!! Up until now we're still using it for IT concerns.. They perfectly provided effective resolution and resolved your issues!!
pros_text: This is where we normally used if we're having issues on logging in to our NT logins,VPN's,PW reset,etc.
cons_text: If they are handling multiple customer,tendency you will be waiting until your turn

title: Zendesk
overall_text: This software is amazingly simple to set up and it is so helpful in answering tickets that customers generate. It basically finds out the reason for the ticket and that way I can be prepared to help the customer in the most efficient way.
pros_text: I love that I was able to set this software up quickly and immediately start responding to customers tickets.
cons_text: There is not much that I don't like about the product but if I had to choose something it would be the automatic reply choices. They seem a little generic to me, I would like them to be more personalized at some point.

title: Zendesk Suite Review
overall_text: It is a very good system with little to no alternative. I wish to be able to see competition so that they team at ZD can up their game
pros_text: The functionality and the variety of reports that can be generated are very important. The system can be used not only to track and manage workflow and customer service but also in producing reports to help management with visibility into their teams' performance
cons_text: Creating reports and queries can be cumbersome. The system itself can also be glitchy at times, but the support always comes to rescue

title: Decent interface, though viewing all tickets relevant to a customer is not very convenient
overall_text: Pros:The Zendesk interface is user friendly and allows you to save customized form responses in order to quickly respond to common issues. You can easily assign tickets to team members and leave notes on tickets for internal use. You can automatically send out satisfaction surveys to gauge response effectiveness and easily disable the survey when you do not want the customer to receive one.
pros_text: Cons:Tickets are not linked by customer/submitter, so it's not possible to see all conversations with a particular customer on one page. In order to see previous messages, you need to open them each individually in separate windows, which is inconvenient if you need to reference a previous ticket when responding to a current one.

title: It is completely worth it.
overall_text: We switched to Zendesk Suite a few months ago, which has been a good decision as the workflow is now more comprehensive and simplified. It's a flexible, powerful and very secure CRM. We can organize and prioritize effectively.
pros_text: I appreciate that it allows for automated systems not only for ticket updates and status, but additionally for reporting. One of the features of this software that I appreciate the most is its user interface, which is not only intuitive and simple to use but also has a visually appealing overall appearance. Another is that it greatly facilitates organization through effective ticket assignment and simple control.
cons_text: So far I have not experienced any negative aspects, on the contrary, it has simplified tasks that I used to distribute with different software or platforms, which has saved me a lot of time and made my work easier.

title: Great tool for handling support requests.
overall_text: Pros:Zendesk has a very user friendly platform. There are a lot of different customization options as well making it more desirable than salesforce. The latest ticket features are extremely helpful for our business. Plus they are easy to read and utilize. They have a lot of great apps and they have great team support. The price is also very reasonable for what they offer.
pros_text: Cons:The reports don't offer a ton of customization- Also, they do not take into account your business hours so resolution times can be off which can make it difficult if that is one of your key metrics.

title: The chat box for typing is covered by randomloading or waiting messages.
overall_text: Someone's cheap idea of importing chat into games and programs, Needs some real coders to either implement it or fix the codeing.
pros_text: chat box loads,It seems to be inexpensive. I love the fact that they force you to write 100 characterstrying to make their product look good when it clearly has faults
cons_text: sloppy loading Titles are sometimes loadedTTEXT messages like >>>waiting for us30.zopom.com << block the chat box so you cannot see what your typing in full screen.when mousing over it switches to the other side until you move the cursor off then it automatically goes back over the chatbox

title: Swiss army knife of customer comms
overall_text: Pros:Love that Zendesk can be used by individual teams and then also for extending this to multi team collaboration and ticket transfers. Easy to use interface, highly customisable, with great plugins.Excellent and honest feedback direct from Zendesk as soon as a potential platform-wide issue is detected, with fast resolution to these problems.
pros_text: Cons:I would value slightly better control over integration with Google forms and specifically custom field detection, for free. Perhaps this is available though and I just haven't figured it out thoroughlyjust yet.

title: Zendesk shines but there are a few quirks
overall_text: Overall good, I still like the old Green design layout, the new one is very generic.
pros_text: The general layout and ease of administration as well as the design layout of the tickets is extremely easy to read for customers who are not tech savvy
cons_text: A lot of spam not being filtered from the system, it gets a bit annoying. There does not seem to be any way to select multiple tickets and delete them all at once.

title: One of the best ticketing tool in the market
overall_text: One of the of the best
pros_text: It's one of the best ticketing tool in the market because it's issue tracking in a systematic way helps solve the problems fasterAlso can view how many of them are viewing our ticket so we need not approach them unnecessarily
cons_text: There are no cons till now.The application is performing as expected

title: Very complete software but hard to implement
overall_text: Great so far. I wish their most basic plan had more features because it can get expensive if you want more features. But even with the basic plan there is lots you can do.
pros_text: It is very complete with lots of options to customize your experience and make your job easier. Private notes, Macros, auto translations and integrations with Shopify are a plus.
cons_text: Very complicated to set up at first, you really need someone from their team to help you do it right.

title: Quite good customer care with little glitches
overall_text: Pros:It has many pros but the biggest leverage is the automation. Using this functionality (triggers, automated tasks etc.) will let you respond faster to customers' need. The other stunning area of data analyse and visualization. Tremendous insights can assure you can measure anything related to your customers' care what you would like to.
pros_text: Cons:There are some limitation which are not upgraded even asked by its users for ages. Although improving of Zendesk is continous, so you can bet that you will not stuck to a once-good-but-now-obsolate customer handling system.

title: Not perfect, but the best
overall_text: Since I've been using it for years and now I am confident using the tool, great. But there's a steep learning curve for admins. For agents, this is Amazing. Barely a training is needed, very straight forward. There are a LOOOT of integrations available which is great.
pros_text: -How customisable it is. -Ease of use for agents: No need to train agents-Search is amazing-The structure of the tool-So many options-Marketplace/integrations
cons_text: -Not easy to setup at first-Reporting difficult to setup, not user friendly-Some missing features -Pricing scheme offer ''basic'' functions as very expensive addons (ex: Light agents)

title: Very Decent Option For Website Chat
overall_text: Overall it was a good experience. We ended up switching to a free service which better fit our needs. All in all it was a pleasant experience and we used it for 3 years to manage the chat on our site.
pros_text: I loved the ease of deployment and the UX on the admin end. It was very easy to segment and follow what was going on and was even fun to play with different options.
cons_text: There was a bug where the name of the cusomter would change randomly on occassion either to the name of the agent or the name of a different customer. It was really annoying and they weren't able to resolve it.

title: Zendesk Pros and Cons
overall_text: customer support very helpful with requests and will show you exactly where in Zendesk you need to look to implement add ons and to fulfil reports. Excellent forums to find answers which are answered by other end users and official Zendesk customer support.
pros_text: Very good add ons such as Answer Bot and Web Widget which all is integrated in the help desk. Allows for direct communication with end users who will get updated every time the status of a ticket is changed from open to pending to solved. Allows for tags which help segregate tickets and make it easy to use and look for information. This also helps with the add ons such as triggers to only send to certain predefined tags and organisations
cons_text: limited functions within Zendesk without buying add ons.

title: I have been using this software for 3 years now and feel it has more advantages over disadvantages
overall_text: Pros:Ease of use is first, the customer service can definitely be improved as they prefer more to share article links rather than explaining things. The marketplace has nice apps.The working of help centre is a little complex, particularly language related things.
pros_text: Cons:I will mention what can be improved.1) Customized report generation can be simplified2) Help centre can have many more functionalities3) The community can be improved, it has many limitations4) Price per agent is more5) When someone has purchased a licence, marketplace apps should be free

title: Zendesk ticketing system is the best
overall_text: If you know how to tag anything, you can pick up the whole process within minutes of using it for the first time. You can create contacts at the site of entry, which makes everything faster and easier. Even those who are not software-savvy won't find it a challenge. A plus if you're retro-fitting this process onto an existing business SOP. Zendesk is especially good for teams that work digitally, rather than meeting in a physical space, as it helps keep communication open and easy to access for everyone.
pros_text: It's easy to understand, easy to use, and doesn't take too much time to use. So many ticketing systems have propriety systems that don't translate to other software. And tagging / editing tickets can take a lot of time. Zendesk is intuitive. I personally like that you can add in-house messages to tickets without sending a million emails, or alerting the client to your communications, and yet it all stays on the SAME ticket. So convenient for keeping all that info in one place.
cons_text: It's truly very simple. If you don't know how to tag items, or have a tough time figuring out the priority of tickets yourself, it's more challenging. But the good news is that your supervisor or account manager can also have access over your shoulder, in case you need assistance in prioritizing according to the company's goals.

title: Zendesk the best supporting application
overall_text: It's a great working on zendesk suite as we can easily connect with our customer and customer can easily find us in case they really need us urgently.
pros_text: We can connect with our customers and customers can also find us immediately when they are in real down system situation. So for us customers system should be up all the time and they can reach us anytime for us to be a successful company
cons_text: There is nothing which is of least use. as far as technical member is concerned we hardly fetches any reports and that is Management work..

title: Good Experience. Fast Response.
overall_text: You get a great ticketing tool, manage to keep a great track of a client's single request and get back to him as soon as possible. Issues with Zendesk have been minimum and resolved in a rapid manner.
pros_text: Zendesk is a great tool to add to your business and resolve clients issues. Growing business need to address clients concerns and Zendesk helps on that. It keeps tracks of the tickets created, provides great charts and statistics, overall is a great tool to manage concerns and one you can count on.
cons_text: Zendesk sometimes makes it hard to keep records of account. It's great for tickets, but in my personal experience, it doesn't keep enough track users account, only of the problem or ticket it sends in. I've tried over tools that do, which now Zendesk is lacking.

title: The Zendesk Support Suite is a user-friendly and uncomplicated tool designed for customer support.
overall_text: The Zendesk Support Suite provides our team with a centralized location where we can collaboratively manage tickets without cluttering our personal inboxes or encountering confusion over who is handling which email. Additionally, it enables us to maintain and update our help center with ease.
pros_text: Zendesk's ease of use, customizable ticket statuses, seamless integrations, and intuitive layout have made it a straightforward platform. It has been effortless to onboard team members and get them working effectively within just one day.
cons_text: In my opinion, revamping Zendesk Explore for reporting purposes would be advantageous, as the only aspect I find challenging is creating customized reports beyond the existing options.

title: Smart for Business Management
overall_text: Pros:Its user-friendly interface makes it simple to operate. It can be integrated with social media networks. Users can utilise the software's capabilities with ease. Customer service and company management have an impact on a business.
pros_text: Cons:High price of zendesk suite it slightly tough for small business.

title: Integral in launching our support platform for our product
overall_text: Pros:Zendesk was very easy to setup and get started with.It was easily integrated into our platform through the REST API.Our customers find it easy to enter in support tickets with enough information and our agents find it extremely easy to work with and search for information.It has plenty of add-ons for linking to popular platforms like JIRA, Salesforce, Slack and so on.
pros_text: Cons:We've been unable to really integrate our own help documentation into the Zendesk platform which limits some of the powerful search features for both end users and agents.

title: What a great product great value for your money
overall_text: When we used his product it work very well, things plug in easily
pros_text: I liked this software and how easy it is to use big thumbs up.
cons_text: It's a product I would say is great for a new start-up business but not for a big corporate.

title: Zendesk Makes It Easy!
overall_text: As a user for 2+ years, it's great! The ability to make personal and team macros is a massive help with the speed of response and overall customer experience. We used to use Salesforce, and I can guarantee that Zendesk is a better experience for everyone.
pros_text: Zendesk's ticketing system is intuitive and easy to use. Utilizing customer inbound and outbound emails and internal notes are crucial to the way we operate, and Zendesk makes it easy! Using Macros for quick responses is definitely one of my favorite ways to use this software.
cons_text: Some emails will not come through if there are too many photo attachments. As a garment rental company, we utilize photos to help solve fit issues. This is usually resolved by having them send a couple of emails instead of one.

title: Excellent Live-Chat Offering
overall_text: Pros:Before Zendesk, our website had many carts abandoned, and it took us much longer to discover tech or coupon issues. Zendesk allows us to speak with our customers directly and immediately in real time, allowing us to fix issues as quickly as possible so other customers don't experience the same thing, and also to ensure they don't abandon cart simply due to remaining questions they want answered or technical issues. Has been instrumental for the growth of my business.
pros_text: Cons:There isn't anything in particular that I didn't like about this software - I wouldn't have it if I could find a better option. This is the best option around.

title: Powerful, reliable and easy to use recommended for customer support
overall_text: It makes handling customer queries and complains so much easier. And you can have ne agents up and running with it in no time
pros_text: I have been using it for over 3 years now in 2 different companies and the result is amazing. Used mostly for customer support Zendesk is a great ticketing tool. You can have an agent using it with just 2 days of training and the interface is intuitive and user friendly.
cons_text: Sometimes the down times can affect 24 hours customer support business.But they are few and far in time. Y would add a spell check feature. And improve the time shift integration.

title: Ótimo produto para avaliações dos clientes e consumidores
overall_text: Utilizado para compôr com outros produtos e serviços destinados na capataçãoe orientação de regulamentação para geriri novos clientes e ambientes de pesquisas.
pros_text: O produto é muito bom sendo de maior competênciana utilização de avaliação para pesquisas destinada ao clientes de mercado de consumo em geral . Fácil de usar sem nenhuma complicação de modo geral. Como utilizo destinado a pesquisas, a introdução foi de forma dinâmica esem senhum descompacto funcional.
cons_text: Somente em caso de geração de dúvidas o retorno direto ou indireto para atualização do programas e seus recursos secundários. Provém em um pouco de lentidão diante do retorno automático para questões e dúvidas pertinentes ao seu uso.

title: Best Ticket Tracking Software
overall_text: We solve a multitude of problems with Zendesk ranging from simple support tickets to advanced projects. We would be lost without this software.
pros_text: I love that this work order system lets you track tickets on pretty much any mobile device as well as computer. I use this software daily on my phone, iPad, computer, as well as my Mac and Zendesk has the same platform on all of my devices. When I'm out on the road, I can reply to work orders and it will update the requester via email right from the application.
cons_text: The only thing I didn't like about this software was the initial customization of the different views. It was a little challenging to get through, but once you're past this part of customization things are smooth sailing.

title: la pire expérience support qui soit !
overall_text: Zendesk est un excellent service de support.Malheureusement, en terme d'assistance technique ils sont aux abonnés absents.Alors qu'ils prévoient contractuellement une assistance téléphonique, celle-ci n'est accessible que d'eux vers leurs clients (impossible de les appeler). Il reste alors à faire une demande d'assistance avec le Chatbot le plus stupide du net ! Je cite à l'envie : demande de se connecter pour s'identifier alors que vous êtes connecté (donc impossible de s'identifier), demande de s'identifier par un code envoyé par email qui arrive une fois sur 4 et lorsque l'email arrive le code est absent (donc impossible de faire une demande), etc.Parlons enfin des délais de réponse de Zendesk : minimum 3 jours ouvrés pour obtenir une réponse le plus souvent demandant des précisions donc encore 3 jours pour avoir une réponse...En fait, il ne faut pas avoir besoin d'eux ! Si vous vous plaignez de leurs carences, ils vous proposent de vous communiquer les coordonnées d'intégrateurs !En résumé, si vous n'avez pas le budget nécessaire pour vous payer un intégrateur et que vous n'êtes pas hyper patient il vaut mieux ne pas choisir Zendesk.C'est paradoxal : un des meilleurs services de support client du marché propose à ses propres clients la pire expérience support qui soit !
pros_text: Performant et efficace. Procure une excellente expérience pour l'utilisateur final
cons_text: Service client Zendesk pouvant prétendre à être le plus mauvais du monde

title: Easy & Efficient
overall_text: Pros:Using Zendesk allows for equal distribution of work when it comes to phone calls so that each agent is still able to continue their job with working on the support tickets.
pros_text: Cons:Overall, I have no complaints - the wrap-up time after calls is a great feature & Zendesk keeps our work very organized!

title: Review of Zendesk Suite
overall_text: Overall, I'm happy because it offers great agent training and usage.
pros_text: Excellent locate and search features; it's simple to look up a participant's email address, and we can access a comprehensive history of every interaction they've ever had with us. able to store answers so that other staff members can use them as a general response to a particular FAQ.
cons_text: Sometimes, if the application is not opened from the back end, alerts and notifications do not arrive.

title: Flexible, easy and fully functional help desk system
overall_text: We’re able to more efficiently provide support to our customers using Zendesk.This is critical to our business.
pros_text: Very flexible.So many options to change how you interact with your customers.Also plugins and API can help you integrate your workflow with other solutions.Our techs use this to provide top notch support to our clients without missing a single issue if someone is out sick.
cons_text: There are some features missing around the ability to automatically set a due date.This is an annoyance and support isn’t very helpful helping customers request features.

title: I wanted to like Zendesk more than I did. It has a lot of functionality but isn't super intuitive.
overall_text: Though it's not perfect, the benefits of Zendesk outweigh the pain points. Zendesk makes collaboration across teams easy which is essential for global groups!
pros_text: Zendesk is a really helpful tool for managing ticket submissions. Multiple groups can be configured so tickets automatically sort to the correct group (based on conditional logic) so no one has to manually assign tickets to the correct group. Another pro of Zendesk is that it has some reporting capabilities already built in and ready to use. If one of those pre-set reports doesn't fit your needs you can also export raw data to get a more granular view if needed.
cons_text: My teams struggled a bit with ticket sharing in Zendesk. It's a wonderful feature that allows a ticket to be moved from one group to another but it seemed that sometimes tickets were duplicated rather than moving completely. This made it a little challenging to track if something had truly been resolved.

title: Solid product but expensive
overall_text: Reasonably good, just it was very expensive for the limited use we had for it.
pros_text: Easy enought to use once set up. Very powerful and wide range of features.
cons_text: Hard enough to set it up. Hard to know how tickets appear to customers sometimes.

title: very nice application
overall_text: from my own experience I recommend zendesk for users
pros_text: I like the fact that it is exceptionally easy to understand, use, promote and control
cons_text: I haven't found any complication yet with zendesk

title: Zendesk - buyer's review
overall_text: Overa a good experience with zendesk and looking to make the most of it
pros_text: User and administrator coexist at this platform and work together to resolve thw issue easily and simultaneously.
cons_text: It is like every other tool, a little expensive.

title: Thumps up for features and customer support
overall_text: We were able to easily implement process improvement suggestion/ideas into effect with the help of this team in Zendesk.
pros_text: I've been using zendesk in my previous company for more than 2 years, the major pros would be the availability of features that could be customized as per user request, good customer support whom we can reach out any time.
cons_text: We used to face downtime often which runs even for half hour and more. I am not a techie, so I do not the exact reason for the downtime but zendesk has the tendency to hang often and stop working which I would say a major drawback of this software.

title: Great Ticket Management Software
overall_text: My Service Provider Specialist team utilizes Zendesk daily to track tickets submitted by internal and external users. I am able to manage and report on open ticket times, see real time ticket queue counts, and assign tickets as needed to to members. Overall it has been a very smooth process but when Zendesk goes down it causes a lot of confusion an frustration to outside parties attempting to communicate to our company
pros_text: Creation of tickets via email submissionInternal and External party usabilityEasy ticket reporting and management
cons_text: Email formatting is clunky and may be hard to followAutomated emails cause confusionHigh price tag

title: Good depending on company resources
overall_text: I would not recommend Zendesk unless you work for a very large company that has the resources to create reporting and to manage such a robust software. Zendesk is not an out-of-the-box tool anymore and can be a lot to manage.
pros_text: It’s customizable and is generally one of the gold standards for support software. Zendesk is hipaa complaint and easy for customers to use.
cons_text: The support is TERRIBLE. I had an issue for months that the support team first caused and it was neverFixed. I switched softwares before it was fixed. The reporting is also very difficult to use.

title: Zendesk is that we have chosen to use as our chat software thru the company website.
overall_text: Immediately notified when being used, notifies us even when we are not online.This is a huge asset to keeping connected with people who buy our products.
pros_text: Easy to use, quick, helps us stay upfront and connected to those on our website who want more information right then.Even if we're not online, Zendesk sends us an email and we can quickly connect with the person needing more information.
cons_text: There is very little I can say in the con department - we are very happy with Zendesk.It has never not worked, and it keeps us in constant contact with prospects and customers.

title: Zendesk suitable for every work
overall_text: The best cloud-based customer service software, Zendesk, was created with customer service representatives in mind. Any channel, including text SMS, the web, a mobile app, the phone, email, and social media, can be used to quickly resolve issues and track customer complaints. Your support staff has access to all client interactions, including those tracked through 700+ app integrations, thanks to AI-powered processes. Learn how Zendesk helps businesses like Uber, Venmo, Shopify, and LendingClub reduce support expenses and improve customer happiness.
pros_text: Given how many features and functions the product has, overall quality was quite good. It could be difficult to get the assistance needed to use the product to its fullest potential.
cons_text: Their level of customer service was appalling. On signup, they enabled a £600 recurring subscription, and when we tried to cancel it a day later, they would not even consider it.

title: A complete customer support platform
overall_text: Zendesk has helped us to organize our customer support so that we are more attentive to our clients and can provide better support. It is a useful product, and as long as it doesn't become prohibitively expensive for small teams, we will continue to use it.
pros_text: It is much easier to organize our customer support requests through Zendesk than through email as we were doing things before. It is much more organized to to be able to assign tickets and make sure the support requests do not fall through the cracks because they all must be eventually marked as solved and closed.
cons_text: There are some recent pricing changes that caused it to be much more expensive compared to what it used to be. It is frustrating when price changes are very drastic that can affect our decision of whether we continue to use the product or not. I was not impressed by the customer support when I tried to ask a technical question about one of the integrations with Hubspot.

title: Zendesk: Your all in one platform!
overall_text: Zendesk let's us do phone calls, emails and chat to customers. Such integration of functions is big help, being all of these in one platform, that is superb!
pros_text: Zendesk was our ticketing tool at work and it helped us get organized with our new, pending and resolved tickets. This made our work on track and monitored. It helped us see what our standing is as client account associates. Zendesk as a customer support oriented platform is indeed very useful to call centers like Teledirect Telecommerce, Inc.
cons_text: Zendesk has aided in our job as supports and so it helped us a lot to be organized which made us more efficient too. We're able to help more customers, so perhaps there isn't a cons to dislike that I could that think of.

title: Easy to scalable support software
overall_text: Pros:I like how Zendesk grows with my business, If I expand the business I can expand my Zendesk in a few clicks
pros_text: Cons:I don't get how some of the features on Zendesk works and it's time-consuming to learn them.
cons_text: Switched From:HubSpot Marketing Hub

title: Good Out of the Box Solution
overall_text: Pros:Zendesk has enabled us to better support our millions of users in multiple geos, languages, and timezones. It has helped immensely in organizing our customer satisfaction department and to track their performance.The chat feature and help center has also reduced the amount of time our staff need to spend helping customers.
pros_text: Cons:Managing SEO performance on these pages is difficult. There's little that can be done to optimize them and there seems to only be an option to noindex everything or nothing.

title: Terrible Customer Support
overall_text: Pros:The software is easy to use, generally doesn't have downtimes or outages.
pros_text: Cons:The software is outdated, there is a lag with the social messaging softwares, reporting is difficult to customize, implementing new processes is difficult.Most importantly, their customer support is terrible. We asked to significantly downgrade our account almost 5 months ago- and nothing has been handled. We have been over-billed 3 months in a row already. Zendesk owes up close to $15K at this point, and they are doing nothing to handle it.

title: Zendesk Review
overall_text: My experience surf Zendesk has been nothing but great, I feel supported and I can trust the customer service!
pros_text: I think the products were easy to use. Very impactful for daily life. Helpful. Love this software!
cons_text: I have nothing bad to even say about this software.

title: EASY TO USE – COMMUNICATION AND SERVICE
overall_text: I have known Zendesk for a long time and Zendesk has already proven that their software is easy to use, not complicated like other software. I’ve used it for years when I provide customer service support to clients. It’s efficient and I know they have proven their service for a long time in customer service industries.
pros_text: I have use this before with my previous job. This software was used when I was in customer service and technical support, just like how I summarized the experience I had with Zendesk, it they really have provided Easy to Use service and the platform is really understandable. For first timers in customer service it will be very helpful for them to use this type of software.
cons_text: The thing that I don’t like Zendesk is on how it look like, it does not make it so complicated for me, but maybe for new users it will be confusing at first but you will definitely get used to it, especially if you have used the software for a long time. Another cons is their technical support is very poor, it’s not that often you’ll need it but when you do, it’s hard to get it.

title: Pepijns review Zendesk
overall_text: Ik heb erg fijne ervaringen met Zendesk, ik kan erg makkelijk mijn klanten van dienst zijn en zie het erg overzichtelijk.
pros_text: Voorheen gebruikten wij MessageBird en dat was een lastiger programma om mee te werken. Nu we Zedesk hebben kunnen we de klanten beter van dienst zijn. Het mooie aan Zendesk vind ik de gebruiksvriendelijkheid.
cons_text: Er worden kleine 'stickers' gebruikt achter de naam van de klant. Daarmee wordt aangeduid of de case open, geparkeerd of closed is. Dit kan duidelijker.

title: Communication Master
overall_text: Zendesk is one of the best tool i had ever used. It’s stress-free and less hassle when communicating customers.It also made me more productive at work by utilizing its feature.
pros_text: I really love zendesk because it has a lot of support to my job especially since we have a business channels like chat, email, voice. It used to those mentioned channels to have a better interaction with customer and give a great customer experience.
cons_text: I haven’t notice any feature that Zendesk suite needs to improve. In my 10 months of using this zendesk suite, I really felt like I’ve been motivated all day. I really enjoy using it and doing my jobs.

title: Solid and reliable!
overall_text: It helped improve overall response rates and it never crashed on us. Very responsive software and their support is great!
pros_text: I used this software for 3+ years in a previous job, and it always performed at its peak. I never had a problem with it. Its integration capacity works perfectly, including Facebook integration. All companies serious about looking for a very responsive and solid solution to managing their customer support tickets should look into it. The mobile app works great as well!
cons_text: Can't really think of any cons regarding this software!

title: Solves our Access Administration and Approval needs for audit
overall_text: Pros:Our whole org can go to one piece of software to request access to various applications. Zendesk also stores the approval chain so it is easy to produce reports for Auditors.
pros_text: Cons:Users don't always know that they are replying all or replying to one when using the Gmail integration.

title: Gives the features you need
overall_text: From my perspective, its great at what it is supposed to be - a very easy to use and simple ticketing system.The API is straight forward and has most of the fields represented on the main Zendesk ticket screens.Overall, it is cheaper than Freshdesk and I feel like it accomplishes what we need it to for the most part.
pros_text: Zendesk user experience is simple to navigate and has a modern look and feel.The thing I like the most is the simple navigation, great use of colors where needed, and the ticket history.
cons_text: The client portal (Guide) offers a lot of great features but one that is lacking would be showing custom fields to end users in a list form (allowing end users to search and organize their ticket list).One of our particular scenarios is needing this feature and due to it missing, have had to rely on other 3rd party services to surface up that information in a searchable form.

title: Really good software for customer support
overall_text: It is nice and smooth to use, it has notifications and built-in key phrases that makes it easy to use.
pros_text: It is easy to use. There pops out all the necessary information about customers when they reach out (like name, their location etc). Customers can leave feedback after the chat.
cons_text: It could be better to upload a files when chatting (images or other). usually costumers write when there is a technical problem and it is always easier to understand by image so that feature could be more UI-friendly.

title: Basic Organization of Customer Service Tasks
overall_text: This software is perfect for 1-3 customer service agents. It allows easy organization of tickets, and keeps agents efficient when they are answering inquiries. This is a great option for brands going from answering CS inquiries via email.
pros_text: The reporting is able to give you a lot of information, and my team has been able to use the reports to make data-driven improvements to our website.
cons_text: You are unable to initiate an email from this software. Say, you wanted to reach out to a customer to let them know that a style you know they would like is now in the store. You are unable to send an email like this from Zendesk, unless you are replying to an existing ticket. You have to send it from a normal email account. So not good for clienteling.

title: Customer Support made easier
overall_text: Zendesk was crucial to our customer support team. It provided a lot of functionality that cannot be seen in other apps.
pros_text: It is a powerful app that has ALOT of features. Chat, text, email, call, it does it all. Zendesk also has automations that play a key part in reducing workload without minimizing the quality of support a company can provide.
cons_text: It is bloated and can be tedious to setup and tweak.

title: STOP clogging your email inbox!
overall_text: Zendesk helped our customer support team to become an efficient machine. Knowing exactly how many tickets needed to be tended to and the importance each was something that a regular email inbox could not have taken care of.
pros_text: What's not to love?! I'm sure if you are reading this you are looking for software that will help you manage the insurmountable problem you are facing with the many emails that are in your inbox. Zendesk is GREAT when you are looking for an organized way to tackle this mess. With the ability to name your contacts and respond to emails that come in through Zendesk you customer service department just regained their lives. Email inboxes are often times flooded and it is difficult to decipher whether or not you have responded. Here you can see just that by marking the tickets at different levels (closed, pending.. etc.). These feature among the many others are what makes Zendesk so great! The add-on's and the ability to sync with other systems is great as well!
cons_text: Honestly loved everything about Zendesk. Never had an issue with what I was trying to accomplish.

title: Versatile customer service solution
overall_text: With Zendesk, we are able to receive feedback from all web, iOS, Android and email channels. Thus, we can improve our communication with our users and their satisfaction.
pros_text: Zendesk offers detailed solutions for different customer service functions. For example, by creating a Knowledge Base, users can access the information they need before opening a ticket. At the same time, all e-mails that come to a support e-mail can be opened automatically as a ticket. Besides, it has very useful functions for agents. Templates can be created to respond to tickets on similar topics very quickly. Offers a handy API for collecting tickets through website and mobile applications.
cons_text: Since it is a comprehensive solution, it can be difficult to make the same setup in different environments such as web and mobile. Installation on the API side, in particular, is troublesome.

title: Horrible Cusomer service
overall_text: 2 thumbs Down
pros_text: Features seem great if they actually had people that took accountability for their ways and actions.
cons_text: I scheduled appointment for a demo I briefly message a sales rep she told me that we would do a demo at a time that worked for her schedule.I blocked out my time for myself and I asked my CFO to be and on the callSo if we liked the product then we would proceed with purchasing it.We waited for 45 minuted and we heard from nobody from Zendesk. I later on got a email from the same sales rep saying that she apologized for being late for the call and I message her back trying to work with her, byReplying back to her email but I never got another response back from her again. A whole week went by when I decided to call Zendesk 1 800 number. I spoke to a Rep on a phone about the situation she acknowleged and apologize for the inconvenience that this caused me. She told me she would get in contact with the same Rep that's when I specifically told her that I did not want to speak to that Rep anymore, She said that she understood and would have somebody else call me and we set up for an exact time for a new Rep to give me a live demo call. I waited again for this phone call at the time that we both agreed on and a whole hour went by when this same rep that I told I did I want to speak to called me. She never apologized nor did she acknowledge the fact that she was wrong with standing me up. I had to remind her that she's sent me a emailSaying that she was sorry for missing our first appointment. (Still no apology)I never even signed up with this company yet

title: Powerful but complicated
overall_text: Pros:It’s a centralized communication and ticketing system. It allows us to keep track of customer comms and link them to specific items within our systems.
pros_text: Cons:It had quite the learning curve. It’s a sometimes complicated tool and new agents often need hand-holding when onboarding.

title: Admin Review
overall_text: Overall, my team is very satisfied and can learn this on first time use.
pros_text: We can easily chat with our client and get their details to add in our portal.
cons_text: The sound of the app. I don't know if I am the only one who doesn't like the notification sound.

title: Great Ticketing Tool. Easy to use
overall_text: It's very easy to use. Especially at Support for L1, L2 and L3 Zendesk play a big role as a ticketing tool and customers query, complaint and request can be handled in a polite way. There are two sections called Public reply and Internal note. A public reply is nothing but a formal reply to a user and in the note, we can add the required details in order to escalate the case to a further level.
pros_text: Easy Ticket creation.Easy data analysis.Not much training required. Very few minitues require to understand the tool.
cons_text: UI/UX can be improved a lot. Also, there should be option to send reply and internal note together.

title: Used for TONS of customer relations needs/communications.
overall_text: Overall great experience. Integrations are fantastic. So far have never had a need to speak to customer service but I assume its great too.
pros_text: I love love love that there are plugins. The one we use the most is for Olark. Anytime theres a customer chat where a rep needs to take it higher up, that can be done with a few keystrokes. If a chat goes unanswered during non business hours, the message goes to Zendesk.
cons_text: The absolute only thing I can think that I like least is the tabs sometimes can be confusing to switch through looking for support tickets.

title: Best Help Desk Software I've Used
overall_text: Pros:I love how easy Zendesk is to use! The macros make my life so much better. Hotkeys allow me to very quickly select the macro to use and I'm able to customize the messages to my customers.
pros_text: Cons:There really isn't anything that I dislike about Zendesk. I wish everyone used it!

title: Self ticketing facile e immediato
overall_text: Abbiamo ottimizzato e reso efficiente tutta la gestione del customer care e ridotto al minimo le chiamate telefoniche verso l'operatore. Ciò si traduce in ottimizzazione delle risorse e migliore customer satisfaction.
pros_text: La possibilità di poter snellire il processo di assistenza mediante triplette che instradano il ticket direttamente verso l'ente risolutore preposto.La possibilità di generare escalation veloce per ridurre al minimo i tempi di risoluzione.Ottimizzazione del call center è di conseguenza, dei costi.
cons_text: Al momento non ravviso problematiche tali da dare un giudizio negativo nell'uso quotidiano dello strumento.

title: Zendesk - Perfect all in one software
overall_text: A perfect tool for every size organization or even for freelancers as well. All kind of Support and Training are available. A very good software.
pros_text: Zendesk has a great deal of highlights, and adjustable layouts. It's truly simple to answer 100 tickets simultaneously, utilizing layouts that will show the customer's name and data, Overall a great item.
cons_text: It isn't so natural to use as other CRM, so it might required preparing, anyway this is on the grounds that the profoundly adaptable settings, and alternatives the items offers.

title: Good crm solution but needs customization
overall_text: Having moved to Zendesk from using a single Gmail account this was a much a needed improvement, though we frequently find it does require a decent amount of time to make sure we're getting the most out of it. The ability to run reports is very helpful though we do have some doubt in the accuracy of some of the info provided.
pros_text: I really like how this can be customized to meet specific needs. I think this makes all the difference in terms of ease of use and what the customer sees. I also really like the number of apps available, using them has greatly helped with workflow.
cons_text: Straight out of the box it's not ideal. I think the customer facing side is visually confusing. It really does need a certain level of work to be able to use it efficiently.

title: Le bon Pump de service
overall_text: Les problème qui nous permet de résoudre sont beaucoup mais la manière dont l'offre des tickets est faite est bonne
pros_text: La manière dont la gestion des tickets est faire est bonne
cons_text: Ce que j'ai le moinsapprécié sur ce logiciel c'est le tarif plus élevé pour l'entreprise qui le plus de besoins

title: Lightweight & Easy-To-Use CS Platform
overall_text: All in all, it's been working great for us so far and it's been our 2nd year with Zendesk. I recommend it to every businesses.
pros_text: We use it to manage customer queries coming from multiple channels and it has been working great so far. It was very easy to set up and agents were familiar with it in an hour. Administrator functions are also very managable and understandable.
cons_text: User management can be a bit easier and analytics package should be a bundle product. What's absurd is that they sell the analytics as a seperate product and if you don't buy it, you don't see any reports whatsoever. Imagine you are using a platform to manage customer services and you don't have analytics.

title: Excellent lightweight service desk tool for a great price!
overall_text: Excellent tracking capabilities with built in reports for industry standard service desk metrics. I love the ease of use from both a customer's standpoint and from a technician's point of view.
pros_text: Zendesk is easy to setup and out of the box it provides you with an excellent ticketing system. They offer plenty of recipes to implement more complex service desk operations, and the system is very easy to configure to ensure full ITIL compliance.
cons_text: Because the tool is lightweight, it does not start out 100% ITIL compliant, but it doesn't take much effort to get it there.

title: Great for Day to Day operations
overall_text: Overall I've been very satisfied with Zendesk and look forward to seeing what they come out with next.
pros_text: What I like most about this software is the ability to use Macros which really speeds up our customer interaction processes. When using this for support, getting back to our customers in a timely matter is pivotal to our success so having that feature really is helpful.
cons_text: My least favorite feature is how tedious using the reporting functionality. A little more streamlining and overall ease could really improve this area in my opinion.

title: Great ticket management tool!
overall_text: Overall, Zendesk is a very flexible tool and very responsive to suggestions in making improvements.
pros_text: As a CSR who is responding to dozens and even ahundred tickets per day, Zendesk was able to provide optimum performance in Ticket and Email Management. It is very easy to use and won't let you get lost in navigating the software. The macros and templates can be easily saved and edit.
cons_text: I had this experience where I was working on a ticket and someone opened the same ticket. Although there's an eye indicator that shows there's already a person working on the ticket, others still tend to access the ticket and sometimes even close it without resolution or response.

title: Pro tool for pro price
overall_text: Our customer care center and IT use this tool on a daily basis and is rather satisfied.
pros_text: We could get a jump start and now have over 100.000 tickets. We also use the knowledge base part, though the tricky thing is to keep this updated. All user tickets stay listed next to their latest ticket, to give you a good overview. Tickets can also automatically created by Twitter posts with @mentions; including replies to the complainer'schannel.
cons_text: It's a very expensive tool with many upselling functions.

title: Definitely a must tool for Customer Support.
