title: Good Solution For Growing E-Commerce Company
overall_text: Pros:Zendesk offered us a complete solution to manage our customer service experience.
pros_text: Cons:We used a recommended implementation partner from Zendesk and our experience was less than desired.

title: Making customer service more efficient
overall_text: It's hard to imagine going back to our pre-Zendesk process. This has made customer service as quick and efficient as possible.
pros_text: I respond to many customer inquiries and complaints using Zendesk. It has streamlined the customer service process so much and made it far more efficient thanks to ticket tracking and customization options. It's user-friendly and also gives customers more control, sending confirmations when we've received their messages, allowing them to follow up and giving them the option to choose whether they're satisfied with our service.
cons_text: This isn't really a con, but there are so many features that it can be difficult to learn them all and figure out which would most benefit our workflow. I could still use more training on that front.

title: Zendesk keeps a record of all our service requests
overall_text: Clear, easy way to manage all your service requests with the ability to assign status and due dates for follow up.
pros_text: I like the fact that you can easily see internal and external notes and have the ability to print out history.
cons_text: I wish there was the ability to print out just the external communication sometimes as I use this when a customer disputes an invoice and sometimes the internal notes aren't appropriate for customer to see.

title: Zendesk is a suitable help!
overall_text: Zendesk to me is a great platform where you can help customers in a friendly interface. You can use it in various channels, in my case in chat and emails.
pros_text: I really like Zendesk because it is easy to navigate and offers automation tools that help you save time and improve.
cons_text: So far there is nothing I do not like about Zebdesk. It is an awesome customer service platform.

title: Very affordable chat function
overall_text: Very affordable chat function for your website.
pros_text: Fairly simple to setup.I do recommend calling customer service to make sure you find all the settings you might need.Once it is running, even if you don't have someone manning the chat feature, it will send an email.Extremely reasonable on price for one user.
cons_text: Can be confusing for settings.Really need someone that is dedicated to manning the chat feature at least during the day.

title: Love Zendesk
overall_text: Overall my experience of using zendesk is great and i would definitely recommend a zendesk as a crm tool to my colleagues
pros_text: I've been using zendesk for over four years now and i really like the crm feature of zelda scoring it helps us organize the tickets and the chat feature of santos is well integrated into the email ticketing system which allows us to send out copies of the chat transcripts of our interactions with customers into their email addresses that so that it will be documented as proof of the interaction that we had with our customers
cons_text: So far i do not have any issues with using dentist at the moment i'm currently enjoying using dentist and will continue to patronize this product.

title: good tool for small companies starting out
overall_text: Overall nice product for managing support incidents. Would like to see better integration with SFDC.
pros_text: Clean UI, search works relatively well. Easy to distinguish between external and internal posts. SSO fairly simple to setup and configure. Integrates well with tools such as JIRA.
cons_text: The UI is tab based which can get quite busy with the number of open tabs. Occasionally had issues where customer submitted tickets but did not get the correct ID pulled in through SFDC, which resulted in their name being incorrect. This caused confusion since we didn't know that the customer was in fact submitting ticket requests.

title: Pire support d'un SAAS
overall_text: Pros:Outil efficace.Bonnes fonctionnalités (moins bien interconnecté que d'autres)
pros_text: Cons:Support inexistant : à la fois côté commercial, côté comptable et côté aide au paramétrage.3 demandes en 3 ans : à chaque fois, un enfer administratif.Et meme une coupure de service, car Zendesk rejette 3 de nos CB de 2 banques différentes, tout en ne nous proposant aucune alternative (virement,...)

title: An excellent tool for support and customer service attendance
overall_text: An easy to use tool for customer service that bringed us a way to prioritization according to the time and difficulty of any case of support.
pros_text: In a Software as a service company, we added a standarized system of tickets to priorize support and asistency in many ways. This bringed us a way to care our clients and we could provided a service with a great quality proved. In other cases, we could provided information for sales and attention for alliance with other businesses.
cons_text: The integration process needs a specialist in software development. This increase the cost of acquisition in a startup with a low budget.

title: The default Customer Relations software
overall_text: Pros:I like how well documented tickets are searchable and help to resolve future issues for my customers.
pros_text: Cons:I didn't like the way a change was pushed to the users a few months ago.

title: Yes to Zendesk!
overall_text: Zendesk helped in providing excellent tech support to our clients.
pros_text: Zendesk is a splendid ticketing system, it is easy to use and configure. There are several things i like about Zendesk;we can assign tickets to support engineers and follow all the troubleshooting process from end to end. The interface is intuitive, we can view the status of multiple tickets at the same time.The best thing about Zendesk is that it is very stable and we have never encountered any crashes.
cons_text: We can only use the preconfigured statuses, we should be able to customize them according to our needs.

title: Un logiciel complet et simple une fois bien paramétré
overall_text: Pros:L'outil est fluide et efficace a condition que chacun soit bien formé à la nécessité de la saisie de données.
pros_text: Cons:Le logiciel est assez lourd a paramétrer au départ et demande une réel expertise technique.
cons_text: Alternatives Considered:Freshdesk

title: Zendesk - Customer service at it's finest
overall_text: An effective way to solve tickets and problems for both internal and external clients.
pros_text: I love a ticketing system - and the cost of Zendesk is just right! The functions are endless, even for the basic subscription.
cons_text: Setting it up can be a little tricky if you are not analytical or have some tech background, but once it's set up, it runs smoothly. Also, I don't like that only the owner can change the subscription, it would be nice if admins had that ability too.

title: Excellent CRM for support teams
overall_text: Pros:Zendesk is easy to use, user-friendly and intuitive. It is really easy to manage conversations with customers, work with other teams and manage own workload.
pros_text: Cons:Their reporting is very complicated, and they take long time to implement changes that are necessary (some changes have been asked for more than 3 years and still pending)

title: Zendesk Review
overall_text: Zendesk is a really amazing tool when it comes to customer services, since it offers a lot of features and ways to use it, it will fit every need your company might have.
pros_text: It's a really flexible system, it offers a lot of different options depending on what your company needs. Also, it offers extra features that adapt depending on what kind of support your company needs so your agents or whoever is using Zendesk can perform at their best.
cons_text: To be honest, is the best system I've worked with so far. Maybe the only thing I would change would be their design, it could use an update.

title: Great support tool for ticket style task management
overall_text: We love Zendesk and appreciate the growth in integration possibilities.
pros_text: The app is pretty intuitive considering all of the different functions Zendesk offers and that a fully functioning support team needs. We can sit a new person down in front of Zendesk and they'll be functioning at a high level within a day.
cons_text: I don't feel like the workflows are quite as efficient and user-friendly as I've experienced with other support solutions.

title: Easy and pretty simple to use.
overall_text: Pros:I like Zendesk because it is user friendly, and pretty easy to follow. I would recommend this to friend or colleague.
pros_text: Cons:Sometimes the system will crash, but it isnt often.

title: Perfectly Fine Ticketing System
overall_text: Whenever I, as a customer, see that the company uses Zendesk, I'm preparing for a rocky road ahead.
pros_text: We used it for custom templates for customer responses.Our templates could also update ticket statuses in batches if necessary.
cons_text: Zendesk is not for the faint of heart or a novice.It took a while to get used to navigating it as a first time user.

title: The absolute best ticket management system out there
overall_text: I wouldn't want to use anything else but Zendesk. I couldn't imagine doing my job without it honestly. 1000/10 would recommend!
pros_text: Zendesk is by far the BEST ticket management software that I've ever used. Basically my entire job is based in ZD, so I've had lots of time to really get a feel for it over the last year. It's well laid out, intuitive, has a million and one features (but not to the point where it's overwhelming) and it's just overall really easy to use.
cons_text: Nothing! I've used ZD every single day, all day, for just over a year now and I can't think of a single issue I've had with it.

title: Zendesk Top Option for Responding to Customer Chats
overall_text: Zendesk has improved my efficiency at work by allowing me to easily see if a chat has received a response. I like that you can also assign a chat to someone else for follow-up!
pros_text: I love that Zendesk organizes incoming chats in one singular place. It keeps my inbox clean and is incredibly user-friendly.
cons_text: I have not had any issues with Zendesk. The price can be a barrier as I wish more people in my organization could have access.

title: Robust Customer Service Platform
overall_text: Since we started using Zendesk, it's been easier to keep track of and report on all the types of tickets that we receive. This helps us improve our product based on the data and feedback!
pros_text: Once you have this program hooked up onto your selected email, it's easy to assign tickets and make sure none are missed. I like that you can create canned responses to save time and create standard responses across the team. I also like that once you've assigned the ticket to someone, they will automatically receive the response in their own inbox to make the user experience even better!
cons_text: There is an extremely steep learning curve for this program. Thankfully, there are lots of tutorial out there! Inaddition, the reporting feature isn't as robust as we had hoped.

title: Pretty good IT Service Desk Ticketing System
overall_text: My overall experience with Zendesk is positive. Charging on a per agent per month basis is pretty good as our workforce fluctuates.
pros_text: I do like that when you reassign the ticket from the original queue to another, the entire audit trail stays intact.
cons_text: Trying to put together some of the standard reports is not the easiest. I would also like to be able to be able to export all the tickets in order to perform my own analysis.

title: Really helps Customer Support Team
overall_text: Pros:Zendesk allows us to track, create, and update support tickets or customers. I like the ability to assign and cc different individuals. My favorite feature is the internal note as you can ask someone on your team a question without having the customer see it.
pros_text: Cons:Nothing, all of our tickets are organized and have found that our customer satisfaction has dramatically increased with the introduction of Zendesk.

title: I used to love Zendesk
overall_text: I used to recommend Zendesk all t he time to employers but now I am not sure whether I would just because they have made so many changes.
pros_text: I love how clean the dashboard is when you are a CSR and navigating through the different tickets and departments
cons_text: I used to really like this software but now it seems like they charge you even more for each feature you want. They have changed the customer feedback reporting so it is only enterprise and if thats not the case then its impossible to find. Sometimes the setup is just so random, if you delete users from your team you have to downgrade your seats otherwise you still get charged for them

title: Solid platform for emails and customer support functions
overall_text: Solid product for a medium sized customer support team like ours. It's been serving us well for about 4 years now.
pros_text: Robust system that offers a lot of features and is pretty easy to use. I like the reporting and the organization that is able to be customized for easy viewing.
cons_text: Some of the features and setup is complicated and not well explained. Takes some time to figure out, but it's pretty straight forward once you get used to it.

title: Zendesk is a great way to answer customer questions in a timely manner
overall_text: Pros:Zendesk is great to use for instant chats and to answer customer questions quickly. I enjoyed the customer service Zendesk provided. Their support staff was always friendly and willing to help.
pros_text: Cons:I did not enjoy having to customize reports to pull specific information for each agent. I can say that everything else with Zendesk was great, we just weren't able to customize the reports as easily as we would've like to be able to.

title: My favorite trouble ticketing software.
overall_text: Pros:The software as a service is very easy to use.It supports the ability to raise tickets in a number of ways including email.Integration is simple using REST APIs and various authentication methods.Pricing is attractive with licenses only required for agents.
pros_text: Cons:It is easy to adapt and make the software fit onto your web site using CSS.However, in the past I've had new versions break the CSS overides that I had done.

title: Used Zendesk to convert a single shared mailbox with 3 agents to a full system with 30 agents.
overall_text: We normally handle 6000 cases a week using Zendesk and Zendesk Chat.
pros_text: Rules and Automations allow traffic flow and triage before an agent gets involved.Reports are highly customizable.Macros are simple to create and can be used to control tagging.
cons_text: Light agents and accidental email forwarding to customers are a gotcha!(Very rare circumstances once you figure it out.)Exporting large amounts of data is limited.(Also rarely needed.)

title: Very user friendly
overall_text: We are able to receive messages in a timely manner from our website.
pros_text: Easy to communicate with customers through our website. Have had no issues. I've also noticed that alot of companies that I purchase from when I have to contact them they utilize the same software and it is very convenient to communicate through this method.
cons_text: There really is no downside I've noticed yet. No lag time that I've observed.

title: Zendesk
overall_text: customer communication has been good
pros_text: Chat has worked very well for us on a daily basis.
cons_text: Nothing not to like. Chat has worked very well for us on a daily basis.

title: Total Sales Tracker
overall_text: If you use all the features it will totally track everything you have done and what you need to do on all your accounts.
pros_text: Tracks calls and you can write in all your notes and keep tracks of revenue.
cons_text: Moving the deal in your pipeline sometimes I forget to do that.Also, when logging calls on your phone (I have it installed on my cell phone too) it doesn't give you enough time to type your notes.

title: ZenDesk is one of the good CRM in list that i have used.
overall_text: Pros:It is a good cloud based CRM tool with simplified functionalities and options, easy to navigate through, it's ability to search a ticket by contact, user or subject and merge those tickets into one are much appreciated. it provides ability to mass select and close the tickets at a time.you can close them all at once when the issue is resolved or if you have an update. Since we receive so many tickets, the best features Zendesk has to counter this are Triggers, Automations and Macros.
pros_text: Cons:Certainly ZenDesk is not the best among category also they continue to make changes without telling you, functionality disappears and they have always lacked some key metrics for reporting. Sometimes the app loses the link. I have to Sign Out & log back in.

title: Quality of service?, organization?, communication? ... this is what you get when you incorporate. ZENDESK to your company
overall_text: Pros:you can manage multiple support areas, with multiple service teams without problems, it is easy to understand and use, the interface is light and very functional, excellent integration with social networks and other platforms (like Wordpress), it is extremely easy to track the behavior of a ticket, the dashboard is very very explicit. Excellent..!
pros_text: Cons:is very centralized, without the tool you can not interact (mail) with anything, nobody .. As it is multi-support, the interaction between tickets can be cumbersome. The Mobile App lacks important features of the web App .. It is expensive (for the Latin American market), I would like more possibilities to customize / adapt the UI appearance to my business standards

title: One of the best helpdesk out there!
overall_text: I use Zendesk every day as a customer support to answer customer's tickets. Really easy to navigate and learn, and one of the best helpdesk out there.
pros_text: -Basic function of replying customer (macros, internal note, plugin, live chat) is working well. -The ability of opening multiple tickets on one window is really helpful.-Smooth, no lag or long loading.
cons_text: -Opening multiple tabs is really helpful but it's a RAM eater. If possible, don't open many tickets at once.-Not a fan of pay more buy adding more user. Prefer a subscription based because it's more fixed and planned.

title: Use of zendesk in handling Customer service support
overall_text: Overall, I can say that Zendesk is good to use in customer service support. It is convenient and easy. Will definitely recommend it.
pros_text: It is easy to use, search and view tickets. You can also view all the past tickets with the customer to ensure that you can provide the right process and solution. It also easy to escalate tickets to the right people and management. You can also create your own macro or KB to provide an accurate and right response to a customer.
cons_text: There are times that the system will lag especially if there are so many tickets. There are also some chances that 2 or more agents will handle the same ticket and provide different solutions which will confuse and frustrate customers.

title: Zendesk - Best ticketing system
overall_text: Overall great product helps us complete client assignments really fast and in a quick manner
pros_text: We have been using Zendesk for a client project to help us receive and assign tickets from our client. The system is great and easy to use. You can easily assign people to tickets and easily structures the ticket for you. Also great thing is that you can enable notification system which keeps me up to date whenever I need to review any tickets
cons_text: I do not think this has been added, but maybe a dashboard that breaks down the types of tickets rather than just the number of tickets open and solved. It involves more data analytics helps companies a lot in figuring out where should more time and resources be focused towards?

title: Good feature packed SAAS CRM system
overall_text: We implement CRM softwares and solutions for the clients using Zendesk. It is loaded with a lot of features which gives it an edge over major CRM companies. It is quite cheap too so many companies adopt the Zendesk CRM solutions
pros_text: Zendesk has many features which makes it a competitor to the big CRM SaaS providers such as Salesforce. Zendesk has many critical features like ticket management, automation tools, data import and export tools, continuous telephony integration etc. These features gives a 360 view of the customers and also helps to manage and convert leads effectively.
cons_text: The support team for Zendesk is a little slow as compared to it's competitors. It could take a long time for them to help you in case you get stucked.

title: Zendesk is a great way to interact with customers and users who enter your site
overall_text: My overall experience with Zendesk has been very pleasant. I have had many insightful interactions with customers which helps with customer service and the product in the long term.
pros_text: The feature I liked most about Zendesk is how intuitive it is to set up. Being able to customise the features was a great bonus to me.
cons_text: There was nothing about Zendesk that I dislike apart from the pricing. The pricing could be a little bit cheaper.

title: Allows you to implement a custom workflow and structure.
overall_text: Zendesk allows you to set up your escalation structure however you'd like. There are groups and tiers, and you can set up triggers to grab incoming tickets and give them to those responsible. You can also mark tickets clearly as open/pending/on hold/solved.With this and the internal note function, we never need to communicate outside of zendesk on the status of a ticket. We can also track these tickets and our overall success rates using these classifications.
pros_text: Triggers and automations. Built in macros= canned responses.
cons_text: A bit expensive.

title: Awesome helpdesk, but pricey.
overall_text: Pros:I really like that it is very easy to integrate into the software and workflow that you already have and it is pretty easy to train people on how to use it.
pros_text: Cons:It is pretty pricey for what you're getting depending on the tier of the service that you bought. Is it really worth it? Probably not, but the ease of use and integration puts it above other services.
cons_text: Alternatives Considered:FreshdeskandZoho Desk

title: Great for customer experience tickets
overall_text: We use zen desk daily and need this to respond to the customers
pros_text: This is a great way to organize SMS and Email. They also have a sandbox option which is for training and testing tickets so new people do not have to be on real ones right away.
cons_text: As an admin, there are many features to use. It is overwhelming how much can be adjusted and customized that I don’t know where to begin

title: Great Way to Have Clients Text Direct from Website
overall_text: Pros:Easy to use, easy to have multiple people be able to see messages and respond. Great way to handle live chat on your website for a smaller company.
pros_text: Cons:Wish the text program could force more information from the user. Sometimes we get random messages with little information. Would be helpful to have to have them fill out a tad more before they message.

title: Zendesk by Zendesk Value of Money for all your Tasks
overall_text: Pros:Overall it was great because the product is so rich in features/functions. Getting help to understand how to make the best use of this product can sometimes be a challenge, It makes your users happy to be able to text, email, live chat, and text on social media. Great software because it is available in different languages.
pros_text: Cons:Help, or lack thereof. If you need help with this software, they take a long, long time to get back to you. You know exactly what you are doing because if you need to stop them, I wish you well.

title: Inadmissible leur gestion des clients !
overall_text: Je suis totalement dégouté de cette entreprise. J'ai eu une offre d'essai startup afin de tester le produit et voir la valeur de l'outil. Les codes fournis pour la réduction ont mal fonctionné, j'ai donc mis du temps à mettre en place l'outil. Ensuite au bout de 6 mois, pas de mail de notification, il est compliqué d'avoir un Sales disponible. J'ai résilié et 2 mois après, à ma grande surprise ils m'ont débité 2,x 222 € !!!! pour un outil que je n'ai pas utilisé et que j'ai résilié. J'ai fait un ticket support et ça a mis 1 mois pour avoir un retour ! (ZENDESK vend des solutions de gesetion de client et support et leur niveau interne est proche du néant, j'ai rarement vu autant de médiocrité).J'ai demandé le remboursement (tout du moins un geste), voici leur réponse :Upon checking, I see that the subscription renewed for service period 12/07/2021 and the account owner cancelled the account on 01/07/2021. Kindly note that cancellation must occur no less than 30 days prior to account renewal date as is required by the terms of our MSA. With this, my sincere apologies, but we are unable to provide your refund as requested as your cancellation did not occur 30 days prior to your renewal date as is required by the terms of our MSA. > Donc en gros, support Froid, pas d'empathie, ils veulent juste gagner de l'argent et se moque de leur ecosysteme de startups partenaires. Des VOLEURS!Je n'ai jamais écris un avis sur une entreprise, mais aujourd'hui je suis révolté.
pros_text: Multi produits intéressant avec plusieurs fonctionnalités
cons_text: Difficile à appréhender, et très couteux.Le support client (un comble) n'est pas réactif et ne connait pas bien son produit

title: Great quality product
overall_text: Overall experience has been good. We primarily use ZenDesk Support and it provides us all the required capabilities.
pros_text: Diverse feature set and a software full of capabilities. ZenDesk is a professional software and provides you a great platform to serve your customers.
cons_text: Customer Support could have been better. Response times are generally slow and multiple follow-ups are to be made to get a response, at times.

title: Great customer support tool!
overall_text: Immensely positive, highly recommended customer-product-developer interface.
pros_text: Easy to learn and easier to teach for CS teams and incident management protocols.
cons_text: Can be overwhelming at the start utilizing and setting your desired flows, users, escalations, and managing team schedules. But once these parameters are set you need not worry about missing a customer contract point!

title: Zendesk, a great ticketing tool
overall_text: I am globally satisfied with this solution evec if the price is a little bit expensive
pros_text: software easy to use and to implementpossible to integrate native applicationswe can use triggers and automations to optimize the workflow
cons_text: I did not like Zendesk explore because it is a little bit hard to use and understand how it worksFor a beginner, it can be difficult to get some reportingsPrice fes are high

title: Integrated customer service chat solution
overall_text: We've been using Zendesk Chat since it was Zopim. And while it's not the cheapest customer service chat out there, we've stuck with it, since it provides great integration to Zendesk, allows for shortcuts, integration of chatbots, and many more features.
pros_text: Great integration with Zendesk (and all of its features)Simplicity and ease of use for the customer
cons_text: Not the cheapest solution out thereUsing more than the most basic features can require some effort on the admin side

title: Pretty much the leading company for handling support tickets.
overall_text: Pros:Very useful for companies to handle the support of their customers. If you establish good guidelines that everyone in your team can follow, it can really improve your handling time.
pros_text: Cons:They should really rework the setting section, it is a mess and it is very hard to find the settings, they seem to be scattered around and not super easy to find. The reporting also needs to be made easier to understand and to create your own reports.

title: the tool is too expensive depending on numbers of operators
overall_text: We use it to communicate with clients on live chat, emails, social media and Zend talk
pros_text: The bot feature handles inquiries for clients and hence saving us more time on tickets and the help center is so good that you can post support articles for the client to start with. I like the community that our clients can discuss a topic and guide new clients to troubleshoot some issues
cons_text: The more operators you have, the more expensive it becomes, It takes a lot of time to deploy the tool due to too much integrations required

title: Great Helpdesk Software
overall_text: This software provided our team with all the helpdesk related items under one roof, no separate tools were needed to achieve a greate helpdesk!
pros_text: Easy to setup and configure, big community forum to gain more knowledge of the product.Integrates easily with various third-party components.Outstanding customer support provided by Zendesk
cons_text: it would be good if you could configure some of the Ticket Status's but that is not a big thing.

title: Nice ticketing system with too many bells and whistles.
overall_text: Pros:This is a very good product for keeping track of tickets.End users can easily track their issues and see what state they are in (if updated by developer).Most modifications are very easy.Interfaces great with JIRA.
pros_text: Cons:Some of the features are difficult to turn off, or impossible to turn off, so you are stuck with them.Most don't interfere with performance, but they are a pain to navigate around.

title: easy to integrate with social media
overall_text: Pros:The ability to chat with clients from one Zendesk to their favorite socialmedia platforms like WhatsApp, twitter, Instagram, Facebook and google my business help us to respond to more clients in less time and keep us more productive on tickets
pros_text: Cons:The tool is only suitable for bigger enterprises especially when you have large number of support operators,

title: Zendesk is the one-stop for customer service and support software, comprehensive features
overall_text: One stop shop
pros_text: The interface is clean, cohesive and easy to use. Zendesk offers comprehensive features and customization and offers all the features you need to run a customer service department of any size. Chat and in-app help are great features.
cons_text: The pricing model is not transparent, the standard included features are OK, but you'll want to upgrade at least a couple of modules. iOS apps are dated

title: Zendesk gives great help to businesses
overall_text: Great tool to have a great communication to customers, easy to navigate, and this is what every businesses must have.
pros_text: I find Zendesk to be really of great help for businesses, I first seen it on Ads in Youtube, realizing its benefits to have a great relationship with customers. Customers is the main source of income of all businesses. Upon using the application we found out that it is really helpful, having its functionalities and features for as Helpdesk, the more we can easily comply with the customers needs. I great tool indeed!
cons_text: Overall, its quality is nevertheless outstanding and useful. This is what businesses must have. I will come back to give a review if I found out there's bad thing about it.

title: Zendesk the support suite
overall_text: This is a complete suite for customer services you can do anything and you can select wich module or product family you requiered you have available Support , Connect , Explore , Chat , Talk , Message , Embeddables , Relate each of these have it features and work for certain campaings aspects.
pros_text: You can track support tickets , assing priorities , will create a hub for comunications this will lead to more productive agents and satisfied client.You can select for a range of customer service approaches. Eliminates the need for emails and easy to filter messages. it has a powerful reporting and customer satisfaction surveys
cons_text: because you can select wich module to use it can be expensive if you want to use all features of Zendesk. You should take at least some crash courses to have the team working with this.

title: Zendesk review
overall_text: I have 4 different accounts for different countries.I am very pleased with the performance and management of the systems for managing my clients and my application users.
pros_text: Effective ticket management can be run automatically without human intervention if you define it correctly.Thinking for the little details - I have features that I use where I did not think about their existence that help me to manage the tickets.
cons_text: There are a lot of features that can be done in the system - that you encounter a problem, it is very difficult for their support team to give a solution to the problem.

title: Zendesk is one of the best softwares to use in a customer service job
overall_text: I've been working with Zendesk for over 3 years already. It has been a smooth and great experience. I would definitely recommend people to use it!
pros_text: The platform itself it's very neat and the tools are very easy to use. Even a non-tech person can find it easy to work with!
cons_text: What I dislike about Zendesk is that there are times on where this software stops working and the overall date is inaccurate. I've found myself having to fetch this data manually.

title: Great work but missing very basics stuff
overall_text: Pros:Great versatile and agile product. Love the focus of Support and it makes so easy to onboard new agents in my growing team (started 2 agents 2yrs ago, now we're more than 20).
pros_text: Cons:Missing VERY basic functionality. This is very weird though, spending time on complex features but missing the very basics just like CC ticket isn't handled very good. Ticket mentions as well, can't create business logic around it.

title: Our small manufacturing firm LOVES Zendesk and our customer/distributor base loves it as well!
overall_text: This is the backbone (or killer app) of our customer-facing organization.
pros_text: Cost/benefit for features, EASE OF USE, happy and helpful support for the rare moments we need it. We probably only use about 10% of its features and we continually find new ones weekly. AppStore is incredibly robust as well.
cons_text: Some of our other systems, like CRM, are not up to date so we can't integrate them easily. That really isn't a Zendesk problem, it's ours.

title: The Gold Standard for a Support Ticketing System
overall_text: Pros:Zendesk's Ticket management solution and Help Center are Industry Standard: if you know how to use it, you know how to manage any other customer platform. It's super versatile and allows integrations with most modern platforms (via an API)
pros_text: Cons:With lots of features and integration potential comes some sluggishness or a sense that there are too many things available : it can be overwhelming at times...

title: Reliable for business communication
overall_text: Pros:Zendesk support suite offer a variety of categorized integrations like social media for communication and feedback tool that enables the business to grow. I like the macros features that I use to solve tickets easier and faster by applying them and the knowledgebase that you can develop support articles to clients
pros_text: Cons:The tool is expensive for sure, to verify DNS is very hard depending on the DNS management tool you are using, for example it is hard to verify SPF in direct admin panel but easier in Cloudflare

title: Zendesk Help Desk system
overall_text: We are satisfied with the software meeting our current needs. In the Future we will be exploring other features of Zendesk to see how they can help us in our Day to Day business
pros_text: Cost was low. The system does what we need. We have not explored more features of the software yet.
cons_text: Since we have not explored more features, I don't have any cons at this point. The software has met our current needs

title: Gets the job done
overall_text: Efficient, but not super exciting.
pros_text: It was organized, easy to sort, and easy to update. Often customer support tickets piled up at certain times, and ZenDesk helped keep everything manageable. Everything from reassigning tickets to marking them as complete/closed helped our customer support team work fast and efficiently.
cons_text: The interface is quite boring. I know the work to be done is straightforward - answer and close tickets - but I think for CX associates, they need all the color/levity they can get. I was never excited to open Zendesk.

title: Just Zen
overall_text: Pros:Centralised support, income and frequent enquiriesAbility to create policies to routinely file requests and emails into organizations or departments based totally on a variety of valuesCreate a branded expertise base for staff, customers and customersIntegrates with a massive wide variety of apps, such as MailChimp, Trustpilot, Shopify, WooCommerce, Xero and many different solutionsPowerful reporting and consumer pleasure surveysEliminates the want for emails and effortless to filter me
pros_text: Cons:Zendesk to get the most usage, or e book onto a coaching path if price range allowsTechnical setup required, luckily there are Zendesk specialists to helpExpensive if you favor to use all points of Zendesk

title: Zendesk
overall_text: As an administrator I would say, Zendesk chat is a good platform to assist customers through chat and monitor customer service representatives.
pros_text: Everyone logged in on Zendesk chat will receive a notification for incoming chats and you can see on visitors how many people are viewing your website.
cons_text: No option to leave the visitors' information. It should help support to pull accounts easily instead of visitor1232.

title: Zendesk is great for Chat and Call Center Services
overall_text: Great overall product and experience.5 stars. Highly recommended!
pros_text: Easy implementation and robust features.We love the real-time updates!
cons_text: Hard to get in touch with Customer Support after initial implementation

title: Must have if you have a website
overall_text: Pros:This software not only allows for chats coming from the website but it also has the ability to let you see where your customer is writing in from to what product and page they are on from your website. Bonus is if they are a current customer and in your data base then that information pops up as well.
pros_text: Cons:Sometimes we have had issues with being kicked out of the app but nothing more.

title: ZenDesk Ticketing
overall_text: Beyond efficient way to organize tickets between departments. Will continue to use for quite some time
pros_text: Ultimate solution for ticketing system. Quite detailed in how it allows users to simply email/create tickets. Has definitely increased productivity and in helping ensure IT issues are known and resolved.
cons_text: At first some of the setup can be a bit confusing, but after playing around you realize how well featured ZenDesk is.

title: Zendesk functionality wins in support
overall_text: Overall, good experience. I have reviewed and used other products and Zendesk is the best.
pros_text: I love macros, reporting, mobile functionality, and list views. I use the views to quickly review what open tickets there are and how they should be managed.
cons_text: the email threads don't show a link to the ticket number in every message, so in gmail I have to do a lot of searching to get the ticket number.

title: Zendesk
overall_text: Pros:I love that Zendesk integrates with our phone system, tickets come up per call. You have the option to merge tickets, information on users can be updated easily, its a great system.
pros_text: Cons:My only recommendations would be an option even if time sensitive, to un-merge tickets, when its done by mistake. The other thing I would like, an option to Solved tickets, without triggering an email to the user.

title: Good tool to manage my customer issues and questions about my product
overall_text: Customer centralized issue solver software
pros_text: Zendesk is a good centralized tool to keep the tracking of my customer questions and doubts about my product. We can easily do administration and customization of custom fields.
cons_text: Some user experience could be improved regarding the interface to bulk delete users, we also should have a bulk delete for companies. Some basic iterations should be reviewed because it doesn't have the best user experience.

title: Excellent ticketing and support platform
overall_text: Pros:I have had positive experiences using Zendesk on a regular basis as the platform for internal user assistance. I enjoy how easily tasks can be completed, files can be attached, and a record of users and tickets is kept. I also like how Zendesk sends notifications and how the platform is maintained by the tickets.
pros_text: Cons:Zendesk limits the number of agents that can be added to a team to three to five under a single licence, even if there should be some way to add a team inside the same licence.

title: Ease of use
overall_text: Pros:zendeskui is friendly and easy to use, navigation is not a hassle.
pros_text: Cons:Individual licenses is a bit expensive, especially for small teams/ companies.

title: Zendesk Review
overall_text: Overall, Zendesk has been great for us, though I do find it difficult to configure and administer.
pros_text: Zendesk is a bit overwhelming at first but once you get to know it, it is easily one of the most powerful customer-facing ticketing services that exist.
cons_text: It will take you a substantial amount of time to configure and set up to ensure it is effective in it's use.

title: Service client catastrophique
overall_text: Pros:La documentation exhaustive sur internet
pros_text: Cons:Cela fait 1 an et 4 mois que nous payons pour une intégration que nous avons demandé de stopper. Le service client a un temps de réponse de plusieurs semaines pour chaque retour (dingue pour un vendeur de logiciel CS). Les interlocuteurs se passent le ticket, personne ne fait quoi que ce soit. Je n'ai jamais vu ça. 1 an et 4 mois pour demander d'arrêter l'abonnement sans engagement d'une de nos options. Que nous continuons donc à payer car Zendesk nous prélève depuis tout ce temps. Une honte

title: Avis sur Zendesk
overall_text: Pros:Moins cher que les concurrents.Intégration développée avec Aircall (fiche de contact du client qui apparaît automatiquement sur Zendesk quand il appelle)Meilleur suivi des tickets entre équipePermet de personnaliser les rapports générés
pros_text: Cons:Pas user friendly et intuitifPas d'outil gratuit pour importer les données depuis la concurrence

title: 2 Way communication
overall_text: Overall i am happy with Zendesk and using it from past more than 8 years now.
pros_text: Its very easy to use, you can track the customers and send messages. Also can customized canned messages for fast responses.
cons_text: When you apply the code either direct to your website or using Google Tag Manager. It leads to slow down your web page speed. The code should be optimized.

title: Great functionality but poor customer service
overall_text: If you are a large company, then this is probably the ticketing software for you. I would make sure I had them agree to some kind of SLA with you on any issues or questions you have before signing on the dotted line for this software because otherwise you will have a lot of frustration. The integration and adaptability of the software is awesome.
pros_text: The software was easy to implement.It integrates with every software we needed.The integration is pretty impressive. The functionality is awesome because there are just so many features you can setup and make it customized perfectly for your company.I think this software is perfect for the larger businesses that need a lot of options and customizations.
cons_text: The customer support was very bad.It was very surprising considering on how good the software is. Getting help with some of the customizations or even just getting answers to some general questions was pretty bad. I got the run around and I had the impression that I wasn’t a large enough company to merit time with their customer support.

title: Champions of customer service
overall_text: Very useful software, customer experiences are powerful and innovative as it helps to connect successfully. It's everything you need in one package. I recommend it 100%
pros_text: Zendesk offers a package with multiple benefits such as email, phone, social networks, customer support chat, built-in phone support, a Tabbed interface to view multiple tickets at once and a very important application is the creation of a help center with documentation and a self-service portal for customers and finally, this platform is suitable for all types of companies: large, medium, small as it is quite easy to use
cons_text: On very few occasions there are difficulties with loading and sending data

title: Ein sehr gute Software (Enthält viele Funktionen und Futures)
overall_text: Sehr gute Software aber wünsche noch mehr Verbesserung
pros_text: Echtzeit Benachrichtigung ist top, also hat uns als Team sehr gut geholfen. Außerdem hat der Software viele hilfreiche Tools, die man nutzen kann, um der Zusammenarbeit zu verbessern.
cons_text: Von mir aus war kostet einbisschen höher als die anderen Software

title: Streamlined CRM
overall_text: Pros:Zendesk is a feature rich CRM suite that scales effortlessly as your startup grows. The whole suite is available for free for one year for all qualified startups. Whether it's live chat or ticket management or knowledge management, Zendesk has a solution that simply works out of the box. Zendesk also provides integrations with social media accounts which means users can reach out over Twitter/Instagram and get resolution for their issues instantly.
pros_text: Cons:It's a feature rich product that has a solution for virtually every CRM requirement you may have. There's nothing I can think of that Zendesk doesn't offer. I love this product!

title: a melhor pexperiencia do mundo
overall_text: Pros:facil usar bom impacto, tendo melhor agilidade
pros_text: Cons:de alguma forma, sempreprecisamos mudar para evoluir
cons_text: Reasons for Choosing Zendesk Suite:Melhor preço e trabalho na perfomance

title: Professional help desk

pros_text: Cons:The tool is expensive and takes a lot of time to deploy especially when you are not so much technical in IT

title: Very useful tool for managing customer
overall_text: I am very satisfied using Zendesk daily, I also like how they interconnect with other platforms.
pros_text: I like the ease of use of Zendesk, it makes all the connections between the client and service easily connected.
cons_text: So far, I cannot complain any of the services from Zendes, they seem to find way to improve all the time.

title: Zendesk makes customer service easy!
overall_text: Zendesk makes it easy for businesses to manage incoming contacts easily and quickly!
pros_text: No more getting lost in emails! Zendesk makes it easy to organize and manage incoming mail, especially in a team setting. Easiest system I've worked with.
cons_text: This software is quick, efficient, and has all the features I would expect. I wouldn't change a thing!

title: Definitely Recommend

title: it is okay but could be better, as a user I see areas of improvement

title: La migliore piattaforma di chat
overall_text: Aumentare la conversione alle venite.
