title: Great product!
overall_text: I liked it! It was easy to learn to work with it. I liked the possibility to see my overall performance for the month or for all the time I was employed. I would choose to work with Zendesk again.
pros_text: In my company, we used Zendest for emails from customers. I loved the possibility to customize the view for our team and the possibility of creating multiple folders for emails. It was convenient
cons_text: I can't think of any at the moment. After using another product for another temporary job, this one looks perfect for the purpose.

title: Improvements Needed but Good Experience Overall
overall_text: Using Zendesk everyday both for internal communication and for contacts with customers. Overall the experience is positive but could be much better with improving some specific features as mentioned above.
pros_text: The possibility to give different statuses to tickets makes it easier to keep track of emails and correspondence. Also like the feature that allows to (re-)assign these tickets to different peers.
cons_text: - Not easy to forward emails.- Design is not very catchy.- Extension Zendesk Talk is not easy to use (difficult to add contacts and not possible to have two calls at the same time)

title: Great for customer service communication and measurement
overall_text: Solving customer issues, quick to use means out response time is short.
pros_text: Once you know hoe to use the features, it is easy to use and a great way to keep track of customer enquiries enabling us to respond accordingly to solve any issues
cons_text: Merging enquiries raised from different platforms. Out of office option also doesn't work on occasions

title: Zendesk
overall_text: Pros:I like how versatile the platform is, from email support to chat to phone. You have the ability to construct and manage your own knowledge base. The amount ofAPI/KPI statistics that are provided are beneficial to my role specifically.
pros_text: Cons:There aren’t too many cons except how you have to pay for EACH feature and license.

title: Personalized CS support, 1 platform!!!
overall_text: Pros:One platformthat takes care of all my customer service needs. There are also multiple ways that customers can contact and receive support. And the opportunity to look up the answer or solution yourself. The Real-time assistance is amazing!
pros_text: Cons:I did have a couple issues integrating this with my previous platform, transferring over the information. Basically, I put all of the complaint and issues that were brought to my attention before zendesk those were handled by management personally. And then we started fresh with the zendesk previous issues and customers information and then created a brand new customer support with Zen desk.

title: Great application for live chat with customers
overall_text: Pros:Great application for live chat with customers with good real time metrics
pros_text: Cons:Incident raising can be delayed in getting resolution

title: Zendesk
overall_text: Pros:Zendesk est un outil pratique et facile à utiliser.Une bonne documentation utilisateur et également technique est à disposition.Possibilité d'utiliser API Zendesk depuis d'autre outils pour créer par exemple des ticket automatiquement, ou pour synchroniser des donées.
pros_text: Cons:Le service client Zendesk n'est pas réactif.

title: Zendesk Review
overall_text: It's useful when it comes to communicationsvia emails. In think it's more reliable if they will put some label if which team that specifically agents coming from. In that way you will identify if that is coming from fraud Dept, CSR dept, etc..
pros_text: What I like the most about this software is that we just needing to accept the request call first before we spoke to the customer. Unlike other tools that its automatically received calls.
cons_text: What I did like least in this software is the option were where you can't put collor on it.

title: Great CRM solution
overall_text: Great and it had added great value to our services and certainly made our life much easier.
pros_text: Easy to create and gatogrise our customers.Can be linked with our billing.Can add call feature and call clients directly.Easy to create tickets.Easy to be linked to other platforms
cons_text: Nothing much, it work greate and fulfill our company needs.

title: Good ticketing system
overall_text: Zendesk platform allows us to manage tickets from customers
pros_text: Many integration options, nice user interface with intuitive navigation. The easy to operate and convenient ticketing system helps us to improve our customer service
cons_text: Price is pretty high, most great features are available just in the high priced plans. Do not like their customer support, you should look for most answers on the peer support forum.

title: An Easy Tool For 24/7 Support Request
overall_text: Overall, we love Zendesk and are always happy to see it supporting other sites we come across and engagement with.
pros_text: When developing our public facing knowledge-base and support system, we search for nearing 3 years before coming across Zendesk.Outside of the time commitment to create the content, we were up and running in a matter of hours.
cons_text: Nothing specific about the platform.There were numerous occasions where I was receiving sales emails from Zendesk for a product we were already subscribed to.Not a big deal though.

title: Support Made Easier
overall_text: Offers a number of tools to support clients, though quite overwhelming when setting up since it has so many options.
pros_text: A great client support system that provides multiple channels to reach out to clients for issue resolutions, eg Zendesk chat/talk/connect.It was quite easy to integrate with our project management system
cons_text: When end users read an email, maybe three days after it was sent out and the issue had been closed, I always get the read receipt notification, and a ticket is created, hence the need to close many tickets.

title: Love this software!
overall_text: Pros:We use this product every day as our ticketing system at work. We are able to give employees their own login, they can work on their own projects, etc. One of the most underrated parts of this software is the capability to use triggers and filters. Makes work much easier!
pros_text: Cons:Can be a little confusing to use at first, but the learning curve is very short and well worth it! This software is amazing.

title: Great, Easy way to manage service requests.
overall_text: It is an efficient way to manage both past and present service requests.
pros_text: As a user, I love the way it manages requests and how you can easily see what stage the request is in.I love the out of office feature, and knowing that if and when someone replies to my ticket, it will not get ignored but will go into the queue for someone else to look into it.
cons_text: When searching it does not bring the currently open tickets to the top automatically. You have to apply a filter in order to find a currently open ticket which can get annoying. Also on the phone application you cannot see when someone is viewing a ticket or responding , which has caused many issues with multiple responses. It just frustrating and makes us look unorganized.

title: Great way to optimize customer support!
overall_text: As far as ticket management systems go, Zendesk is hard to beat.
pros_text: The program offers a lot of easy solutions to optimizing and organizing help desk tickets and customer support issues. After replacing our legacy system with Zendesk, we saw an immediate improvement in our process for handing and responding to customer issues.
cons_text: The differing price levels do not make sense for our organization. Some key features that used to be free are now part of a higher pricing tier. The features at the different price levels seem to change quite frequently.

title: Zendesk is an amazing tool for CRM
overall_text: Zendesk customer support is fantastic, as you would expect from a CRM company.
pros_text: Zendesk is easy and intuitive to use, and provides a great solution for CRM in our real estate business. We have it set up to sync with our internal helpdesk email address and Facebook tickets, and this works seamlessly.
cons_text: Nothing - it is a great solution for small companies with a helpdesk system.

title: zendesk is it for customer care
overall_text: We use Zendesk to connect with and answer customer questions on Amazon primarliy and also on social. It's been a great tool and we couldn't be happier.
pros_text: Ticketing, reporting, integrations with social and amazon are all critical for the success of our customer care team.
cons_text: I can't really think of anything. Maybe that it leaves unread messages on some platforms which lead to double responses or a lot of did you answer this

title: One of the best ticketing systems
overall_text: Zendesk is great, ticketing systems in general can be frustrating to use, but Zendesk keeps it simple and as a result, people use it more.
pros_text: Doesn't include a ton of extra features that you don't need, Zendesk is defined by what it doesn't include. Most ticketing systems include way too much clutter.
cons_text: Price. The cost for the service if you need analytics is too high, and there isn't good educational pricing.

title: Efficient Communication and Customer Service Tool
overall_text: Pros:The Zendesk platform has been used by two separate companies that I've worked with for customer service communication. Overall, it's an effective method of soliciting questions and feedback in a way that allows for efficient response management. There's no reason for a customer to fail to receive a response or to receive duplicate responses, as might be the case with a customer service email address.
pros_text: Cons:The main issue I have is that Zendesk isn't integrated with industry software that I'm required to use every day. It can be very tedious to swap between a dozen different platforms depending on the task at hand. If you do have the option to build customer service tools into your proprietary software, I would suggest doing so.

title: We've been using Zendesk for our customer support requirements, overall, excellent experience.
overall_text: Provides a great cloud-based solution to support our customer base.
pros_text: Very intuitive to use and set up, our customer base is very complimentary of our support solution. Provides a great user interface and an important interface to our customers who require support. Easily customizable to our requirements.
cons_text: The initial administration log-in can be confusing if you're not familiar with the software.

title: simple in a good way
overall_text: Pros:Super clean interface without a ton of clutter.For what we use it for, it's easy create and update tickets for requests that come through from support.
pros_text: Cons:This is nitpicking, but since everything gets stacked up by most recent, it would be great if there were a feature topin certain notes/comments that are important or relevant. An example would be if an action needed to be handled on a certain date

title: I've used this daily for the past year and a half.
overall_text: Support System
pros_text: Easy system to use to track support tickets from clients and other employees. It's a pretty easy system to set up and maintain.
cons_text: Internal notes are a little confusing as well as needing to send the ticket back to the client for more info. If I need to send the ticket back for more info my options are open, pending, or complete. Needing more info doesn't fall into any of those categories.

title: Powerful and yet simple to setup chat software for intense chats that may span many interactions
overall_text: We were able to increase customer satisfaction by giving real time support for our VPN software product. The chat connections were very stable and reliable even when our clients would click away from us and turn on their VPN which would affect their IP address. We also understood what part of the world chats were coming from which explained language barrier issues that we may encounter
pros_text: The software allowed pre-programmed responses that would save our agents much time when dealing with clients. It was overall easy to configure and use and it saved many clients as they didn't have to wait for responses back to emails.
cons_text: This is no longer an issue but back when the software was owned by Zopim, it ran on flash ( years ago ) which would sometimes cause performance issues in my browser. This is no longer an issue .

title: Zendesk - Difficult to Master, but Worth It
overall_text: As our company grew, switching from Freshdesk to Zendesk was like using a kids toolset and then transitioning to a real workshop!
pros_text: Zendesk is the most powerful helpdesk software that I've used - and absolutely blows Freshdesk out of the water. For example, the capabilities of their analytics and customizable dashboards are overwhelming, but so incredible and definitely worth it if you're looking for a step up from your current software.
cons_text: The cost of the training courses is very, very high. Their free knowledge base is extensive, but can be a bit of a rabbit hole.

title: Zendesk
overall_text: Overall it's a great software and helps make your job a little less stressful.
pros_text: I used this product for the first time about twoyears ago and I had never heard of it before.I loved how easy it was to use and adjust to.Part of my job was frequently sending emails and we were able to make quick keys for just about anything and they saved us so much time!
cons_text: N/ANo complaints, I really did enjoy it and there wasn't a time I was frustrated with it. Sometimes I would need to search for a specific email and I was always able to find it. Pretty cool software.

title: Great software for client communications...as long as clients are okay with it!
overall_text: This tool made it really easy to manage over 50 clients at a time and direct the inquiry to the right person. The ability to have internal notes / external notes and control over that was cool too.
pros_text: Really loved the ability to set automations and rules.
cons_text: The software is really built for customer service but we used it for client communications. Clients were sometimes unhappy w/ the formatting / ease of use on their end.

title: Simple easy but also full featured great software
overall_text: Easy setup up for support email system. Easy set up and maintenance of support webiste.
pros_text: I love how easy it is to set up a support environment that records information. I also love the knowledgebase template and ease of creating a support site.
cons_text: Occasionally I want to do something more involved and it's not always easy to find the relevant information, but all I have to do is contact support and they help me out.

title: I love using Zendesk
overall_text: Pros:I like the ability to be able to track open tickets that require additional follow up.Additionally, I like the integration with Outlook that allows me to just send an email to Zendesk without having to open the software separately.
pros_text: Cons:Honestly, there is not much I do not like about Zendesk.I use Zendesk strictly for monitoring open issues and I have not had any issues doing that with Zendesk.

title: Good customer management service software
overall_text: We have been using zendesk for our customer management service for our products and it seems going well for past 6 months.You pay per agent. It provides a widget system to implement on your website to easily capture any customer issue directly visited from site and email system is another good side of zendesk which we found very professionally managed with integration with several third-party apps. Also, it provides multi-device support and mobile, which is a handy tool if you are on the run.
pros_text: Professional features to well manage customer support providing system at cheapest rate with several other free products out of the box! eg: talk, explorer.
cons_text: So far we are we haven't found anything yet. They are very old in the market and don't think will be seeing any cons in the future either.

title: Zendesk is the best tool for customer service organizations
overall_text: Pros:A turnkey product that is readily designed for support managers. I've leveraged numerous support service platforms and Zendeks understands what managers needs and implements with delightful solutions.
pros_text: Cons:Sometimes features are slow to develop. It can take a long time for Zendesk to develop a new tool, but once it is developed it is a bigger feature than I initially requested.

title: Zendesk is the ultimate tool for Wow Customer Service
overall_text: We have really enjoyed using Zendesk and continue to use it today.Its a robust platform that he enabled our team to meet our customers' needs faster and with better coverage without having to increase staff.
pros_text: The collaborative approach to offering customer service has helped my team and our organization exceed our SLA deliverables.With the round table functionality it enables us to ensure maximum coverage to all support specialist even while other take breaks and or leave the office for lunch.
cons_text: I do think that overall the solution is rather complete.Nothing jumps out at me as a glaring issue.Sometimes we have experienced missed chats and or duplicate chats but this is not common and has not been reoccurring.

title: It does a pretty good job for our business, but sometimes struggles
overall_text: Speeds up some processes for us which is great.
pros_text: I really like how I can use Macros to make so my responses don't take a long, and also I am able to integrate some of our other solutions with Zendesk. This helps to speed up our support process'.
cons_text: I have trouble sometimes with it being really slow, and just seeing little glitches here and there. Like right now as I am using it my apps bar on the side of the screen just disappeared and I can'tbring it back. I am sure it will be back later, but this is the kind of things I see here and there.

title: Must have software for a busy body
overall_text: I was having issues keeping up with my work, I guess you could say I am a fixer. If its broke or doesn't work, I'm the person you call. I am the only person in my department, so I was getting post it notes, calls, chats, texts, even people stopping me in the hallway telling me something they needed fixed. With over 70 employees it was a lot. I often lost a post it note or forgot that so and so saidin the hall this wasn't working. With Zendesk I just create a ticket and viola its there until I get around to it. No more lost notes or forgetting what someone said.
pros_text: What I love most about this software is the ease of access. You can use it via computer or via app on a tablet or cell phone.
cons_text: I would say its a con, its just that the tickets go away after a certain amount of time so you have to go search for them.

title: We Love Zendesk
overall_text: Pros:We use this software for our Helpdesk system at my university.The ease of use and features are what we enjoy the most.Even the most technology challenged individuals can use Zendesk with ease!
pros_text: Cons:One time we had hackers send over 80,000 emails to Zendesk and we had to delete them all one by one.WE called Zendesk but there was no way to mass delete so that was frustrating.

title: A Competent platform with all the basics
overall_text: We've been able to successfully look after clients visiting our website and manage their queries and concerns without any difficulties.
pros_text: Using the platform on a daily basis is quite straightforward. Chats are archived in a reasonable manner, and user tracking is pretty good.
cons_text: Trying to monitor and analyse historical activity is quite limited and could be developed for additional functionality.

title: A better experience for your customers
overall_text: However it is a very recommended tool to support your customer service experience.
pros_text: Very helpful in reaching out your customers. Its live chat and messaging help us to get in touch with our customers and vice versa. Customers no longer need to email us when they visit our website and come up with questions in their mind.
cons_text: Not really understand is that how Zendesk works or not, but my office at that time, every time a customer say hi through our live chat feature, the message will be sent to our internal email instead of a direct chat dashboard.

title: This is the best CRM that I have ever used. Been using it for three years with hardly any downtime.
overall_text: Pros:It's very easy to learn, even for new people and does not require any special technological skills. It has been very consistent over the time. It's very easy to search the database by ticket number, Customer name, Category etc. Overall good value for what you pay for.
pros_text: Cons:Could introduce some new features like setting reminders for tickets claimed. Overall very satisfied with the product.

title: Overall an awesome tool for customer service!
overall_text: It helps us to address the needs of our users; we receive thousands of tickets a day in queries and Zendesk makes that process simpler.
pros_text: It's easy to use and easy to address our clients needs. Their support team is very quick to respond which is beneficial for our business. It's easy to file tickets and solve them. I love the feature to save auto-responses.
cons_text: The overall design of the product can be a little confusing to new users. Responding internally needs to be better marked so you don't accidentally respond to the customer if you need to talk to your team.

title: A versatile ticketing system to meet many business needs...
overall_text: Pros:Zendesk allowed us to immensely improve our support ticket workflow. Previously our process made it very difficult to keep accurate records of incidents and generate reports against them. Now we are able to manage our support traffic in-flows, assign them with a few clicks, monitor progress to solution, and generate insights to improve our support performance.
pros_text: Cons:We did want to try and integrate this with our existing VOIP phone system, but found the integration to be a little less than useful for what we were trying to achieve.

title: Zendesk is the best known format for online customer service
overall_text: Pros:It takes emails and converts them into an easy to read and approach customer service hub. It is easy to keep track of & manage all past, present and future inquiries.
pros_text: Cons:Their customer support team can be seemingly uncaring of the issues that come up. Fixes to common issues seem to go unresolved for years, at times. The price gets really high with multiple support agents as well.

title: Zendesk is a must for good customer service
overall_text: I think this tool is great and the company itself does a great job of being transparent and supporting their own clients. They set the bar for good customer service and are enabled by their own app.
pros_text: The interface is clean, simple, and easy to use. At the same time, the app is comprehensive and offers all the features you need to run a customer service department of any size. Our support team is humming and we use the feedback feature to keep them accountable. We use the Help Center and it is super useful for our clients. Chat and in-app help are great features that we haven't started using yet.
cons_text: I can't think of too many serious cons. Every once in a while the automatic ticketing email system gets confused with forwarding and CCing, but that is usually caused by user error.

title: Software to keep your customers happy
overall_text: The use of the software has improved the customer service time, in addition there are records and reports of the most common failures to improve the strategies. It also has a history of all tickets attended to solve major problems. The best thing is that they are updating the platform to incorporate new attention functions.
pros_text: The best thing is that the system centralizes all communication channels clients, to manage the service, from an email or a chat, you can follow up on the problems of the clients and their timely response.
cons_text: The free plan has some limitations to explore all the functions, but once you pay the plan that suits your company, you can verify that it is worth the investment, since you will serve the clients in a more efficient and faster way .

title: Great Tool for Managing incoming customer requests
overall_text: Allowed us to increase our response time with our clients.
pros_text: Love that we are able to bring in several different platforms into a very manageable queue system. It really adds helps in making my workday more efficient.
cons_text: We've experienced downtime when using this software due to issues with the site which for us caused large delays in us being able to respond to customer inquiries in a timely fashion.

title: Delivering support at above industry standard, made easier and fun.
overall_text: Pros:Very customisable and allows for differing configuration according to different organisational needs - especially with product add-ons where features aren't forced on as part of the complete solution, resulting in a reasonable price point.We love the Answer Bot which allows for us to free up support manpower to focus on other tasks and projects.
pros_text: Cons:The customisability of this product would mean a steeper learning curve for some, especially to get to optimal configuration. Also, triggers sometime may not work as expected.

title: Zendesk Review
overall_text: Pros:Easy to use and simplified customer service
pros_text: Cons:It seems too busy and staff took too long to train.
cons_text: Switched From:HubSpot CRM

title: Why I Chose Zendesk Suite Over Other Customer Engagement Platforms
overall_text: Pros:Zendesk Suite is an exceptional solution that offers a unified workspace with a contextual interface. This means you can manage and access all your customer interactions across multiple channels like email, chat, phone, social media, and more, from one place. You can view the complete history and profile of each customer, as well as relevant information from other sources such as CRM, e-commerce, or billing systems. With Zendesk Suite, providing personalized and consistent service to your customers has never been easier, irrespective of how they get in touch with you.
pros_text: Cons:I find the Bot feature of Zendesk Suite to be one of its weakest points. Specifically, the Answer Bot falls short in its accuracy and usefulness, especially when it comes to handling complex or specific questions. Furthermore, customers can become frustrated with Answer Bot, as they may prefer to speak with a human agent instead of an automated one. I recommend that Zendesk invest in improving Answer Bot's natural language processing and machine learning capabilities, while also giving users more control over its behavior and customizability.

title: They outperform every other tool out there!
overall_text: Pros:The customization and the scalability is great! They truly have thought of everything and seem to always cover our needs when they come up. We use the API, and love the training when hiring new staff.
pros_text: Cons:Maybe too complex for startups if that is a negative, apart from that I cannot think of anything they have let us down on in the many years we've been using them.

title: We use this software and are not disappointed
overall_text: Pros:We use our chat feature more often than our phone calls- customers seem to really like being able to chat more than pick up the phone these days. Love that any of our agents can join the chat when needed to give feedback or a helping hand to the chat.
pros_text: Cons:None at this time we are very pleased with this product

title: It's simply the best on the market
overall_text: Pros:This is it, it's the ultimate customer service tool
pros_text: Cons:I can't think of any cons for this software, it's just amazing seriously

title: Great for providing customer support
overall_text: Overall, it's a fantastic platform for e-mail support while also offering the ability to have everything in one place.
pros_text: It's a solid and stable platform, with various integrations so you can centralise and provide support for pretty much alls channels.
cons_text: It is not that optimal for handling certain type of tickets (e.g. from social media) and can be time consuming to setup.

title: Totally recommend Zendesk
overall_text: We use Zendesk to help resolve customer requests and so far it has been working great.
pros_text: I've been using Zendesk for about 5 years and it's user friendly interface and the fact that we can easily create macros so we can answer to customer's requests makes our work efficient.
cons_text: It takes a bit to get used to the user interface, but once you do everything is easier

title: Zendesk Suite
overall_text: En términos generales mi experiencia ha sido muy positiva. Es una aplicación muy útil y eficaz. Su facilidad de uso, lo intuitiva que es y fácil usar es lo que más valoraría. Con una curva de aprendizaje inicial sencilla. Una aplicación muy recomendable.
pros_text: De inicio su facilidad de uso, es una aplicación bastante intuitiva, sencilla de aprender y usar, incluso para personas que no tienen experiencia en atención al cliente. Con una interfaz del sistema bastante amigable, clara y como digo sencilla. No tiene una curva de aprendizaje muy elevada. Tiene un amplio margen de utilización, desde pequeños proyectos hasta grandes.
cons_text: Aunque los planes de precios son bastante flexibles puede llegar a ser un poco caro y si deseas opciones de configuración avanzadas y personalizadas se puede llegar a complicar si no tienes experiencia.

title: Decent support software with a confusing UI
overall_text: It looks good but perhaps not in my personal taste to use.
pros_text: Effective tool for end-user support. All the necessary tools and details are available.
cons_text: I felt that Zendesk has a large learning curve for it's basic functionality.

title: Great ticket management platform.
overall_text: I love Zendesk. It's really easy to use and doesn't take long to learn. My favorite feature is the pre-written macros.
pros_text: - Works well with our Microsoft MFA.- Easy to use macro system for pre-written responses.- Nice-looking interface (for the agents and for the users).
cons_text: Zendesk seems to be more geared to answering customer questions and concerns but has been adapted to work as an IT solution. It's not an all-encompassing solution for IT ticket management because it doesn't track assets but it is great for everything else.

title: An excellent solution for customer support requirements.
overall_text: For the past two years, Zendesk Suite has helped us set up a high quality customer support department which is effective.
pros_text: We use Zendesk Suite to build a quality support department that replies to queries of customers on time. We integrate this software with slack and the integration is excellent especially when we get notifications every time events on tickets happen.
cons_text: The mobile application interface has limited features and is difficult to navigate through. I wish this was improved.

title: Zendesk make supporting easy
overall_text: Pros:Zendesk has a easy and intuitive interface, that makes answring emails and support tickets so easy. Its mades me get more free hours to other important things.
pros_text: Cons:The price got too high on th recent years, which its something that in a Country like Portugal, its really expensive paying so much for this service.

title: Mon experiences a zendesk
overall_text: Tres belle experiencesmerci
pros_text: Gestion des donnes , j’adore cette tache
cons_text: Il faut faire une solution a l’assistance des clients

title: I must agree with most reviews here; one of the Best help desk ticketing system
overall_text: Pros:Zendesk makes it really easy to organize all requests no just in-house team but outside customers. Not a great fan of cloud base solutions but everyone is jumping on Virtual Servers and Cloud base solutions is like a force movement like me writing this review when Im just evaluating a solution and alternative to G Suites from Google. Workspace from Facebook calls my attention eventhou is also cloud base but is the closes in Features. Just like the Standalone version of Zendesk that we all learn too user the codes and independency of running the software on the local network overpasses any cloud base solution in my opinion. Automations and Macros are great working locally without the need of High bandwith which we can afford in USA but on other locations in the caribean is a luxury even for big business to have the bandwith we have. OOOOhh And what happens at hurricane season? when we had blackouts we still ran the Zendesk locally. An example of such dependency of cloud based systems is the Automations function doesn't flow in a similar way but are timed instead of instantaneous compare to local run version of the software. Macros allow you to update a ticket's tags, message, and other information with a click of a button. Zendesk has done a great job to make a ticketing system and keeping up the standard with the growing number of completion.

title: Great for cross-communication
overall_text: Pros:I use Zendesk from a Customer Success perspective. So I am primarily using Zendesk to see where tickets are at, look at help articles, etc. Zendesk streamlines our communication and makes it easy to loop customers in or out of these communications.
pros_text: Cons:I can't think of anything I dislike about Zendesk.

title: Very helpfull

cons_text: Boring design for the chat message boxno desktop notificationsNotification sound only played once. Since we are not at the reception desk all the time, it would make our work more difficult since we needed to keep checking the website.No mobile appIf we closed browser window we would be immediately offline.

title: Newsletters

cons_text: Zendesk is it to deploy and to use I have a good API for integration with other softwares. It has all the functionalities and all that is software has been used effectively for effective work.

title: best business management program

pros_text: its very user-friendly and also I'm able to use it both on my laptop and phone

title: Zendesk Suite - Great Features, Horrible Service
overall_text: The product allows us to manage our customers needs and expectations well.I just wish the customer service provided by Zendesk matched the capabilities of their software.
pros_text: The ticketing features are outstanding with this product - they allow you to manage your customers' requests and problems quickly and accurately.
cons_text: The customer service provided by Zendesk has gotten really bad.It's hard to get a return call or an answer in a timely fashion any more.

title: Best task tracking
overall_text: I enjoy zen desk a lot and it really simplifies my tasks and makes everything easier to tea k
pros_text: Zen desk makes it so easy to track short or long term tasks. They have tools to organize and sort tickets, as well as different statuses based on what needs to be done. You can also see visibility into others’ tickets which helps with clients l
cons_text: It does get buggy sometimes. About once a day or so I have to refresh the page because of some type of error. Not a huge drawback though

title: Great app for reaching out for sales, but needs to be more intuitive on managing tickets
overall_text: Overall, a good experience using Zendesk, especially for my first time in a remote sales position. Easy to procure tickets to reach out to people, although keeping track of them was a bit of a hassle and it was too easy for people to mess with the tickets so you couldn't see your saved progress with them.
pros_text: I like that the features displayed were pretty straightforward and also simple to use, at least for the realm of what I was using it for. The ability to pull up information on a ticket and make calls or emails to the specific party was quick and easy.
cons_text: Managing tickets was troublesome, especially for the company I worked for where there were many people on the same tickets. Tickets can easily be lost and not organized in your field, and there doesn't seem to be much preventive measures from someone accidentally unselecting you from a ticket and thus you lose your history with it. I think there should be a record log of what tickets you encountered, so even if you don't need the ticket anymore, you can rest assured in case you need to pull it back up.

title: ZenDesk Review
overall_text: Pros:Powerful AI tools to support the scaling of our CX function
pros_text: Cons:Set up was more difficult than expected early on.

title: Zendesk Suite

title: Atendimeto via E-mail
overall_text: Para mimo sistema foi ótima para exercer meu trabalho, no tempo que fiquei utilizando pude desenvolver minhas atividades de maneira bem dinâmica e com uma agilizada maior, devido à facilidade na utilização que o sistema disponibiliza, além disso, meu processo de treinamento e conhecimento do sistema foi bem rápida, por se tratar de um sistema muito didático.
pros_text: O sistema da Zendesk é bem fácil de se manipular, muito didático, isso ajuda no dia a dia para atendimento ao cliente, além de proporcionar a criação de scripts nele. Dessa forma conseguimos ter um atendimento mais dinâmico e atender uma maior número de usuários, dando vanzão ao nosso fluxo de acionamentos.Por ser um sistema bem didático, conseguimos ensinar para os novos funcionários a utilização dele de uma forma mais tranquila, isso permite que eles consigam ter uma produtividade alta nos seus primeiro contatos com a plataforma.
cons_text: Creio que a plataforma poderia fazer uma ligação a mais com os apps disponibilizados pelo Google, isso ajudaria no dia a dia de atendimento e rotinas.

title: Gestion de tickets

pros_text: Cons:Le système de ticketing peut engendre la réticence des utilisateurs, la mise en place d'une phase de transition et de politique du changement est nécessaire si vous ne souhaitez pas perdre le terrain

title: Simple and effective.

title: A Review on Zendesk Suite.

title: A scalable and flexible Support Desk

title: Customer Service lacking - the irony...
overall_text: Pros:It is the simplest to understand and to begin implementing without much hassle.
pros_text: Cons:Firstly, the first tier of subscription does not have any phone or chat support. So if it is the first time you are going to use a system like this, you are on your own sorting out issues, despite all the articles available. Secondly, when you do have a higher tier of subscription, they still take forever to respond to your requests over email. I had to call on multiple occasions to follow up on the issues I needed help with.

title: Easy to use customer support flow
overall_text: Pros:We primarily use Live Chat and Offline Contact Form. It is super easy to set up and integrate with almost any CMS. Needless to say, you are able to customize the appearance and features from admin panel - it's intuitive and flexible.
pros_text: Cons:All parts related to customization are well documented. However, we found it hard to deal with specific translations that must be done through reference code (or widget script). It would be beneficial if there was a 'string translation' feature.

title: Solid platform!
overall_text: Overall zen desk is solid for archiving information and calling clients.
pros_text: UI is easy to navigate. Provides a wide variety on how you want to store information. Custom template messages is a huge plus in automating certain workflows.
cons_text: Emails seem to very inconsistent at times. Experienced issues where cced clients never received my emails.

title: Great software
overall_text: Pros:I like that we could create very customized forms in a help center for thet ticket opening. This really optimized the attendance and have reduced our SLA.
pros_text: Cons:It's not very intuitive to configurate and change ou creatie new settings. It took a lot of time studing the Zendesk help center to be able to set the forms as we like.

title: A great communication avenue for your userbase

pros_text: Cons:Reports could be more robust. There is some data we are not able to pull and manual calculations are not ideal.

title: Highly NOT recommend....
overall_text: Horrible experience. I contacted them to get a refund for our service since we paid a full year off, and they basically said no, that its in their terms that they dont offer any refunds at all. Waste of time and horrible support!
pros_text: Nothing...They charge you a ton of money, and yet offer nothing.
cons_text: Let's list it.1. They charge you a ton of money, but if you are on their essentials plan, they dont support you. Period. 2. They only allow 1 agent for the essentials plan. Still a waste of money for 1 agent. 3. When you ask for your money back after paying a year of service, they reject you.

title: great
overall_text: nice
pros_text: very useful for CRMeasy to use use to track the application form
cons_text: there are some which must be implemented like updation

title: Good Tool for support
overall_text: Pros:Ease of use, Friendly user interface(UI)
pros_text: Cons:I do not have any negative experience with this tool yet.

title: It is easy to organize all of the emails from my clients.
overall_text: Being able to quickly and efficiently organize client emails and responses. I am able to prioritize who to contact when helping a client with an inquiry. I am also able to quickly respond to clients using the handy maco tools and canned emails.
pros_text: The ability to create macros, which makes replying to many clients a breeze. Also, I really like the different queues that we are able to create, which helps us prioritize our responses quite effectively.
cons_text: The only thing I can think of is being able to search for emails by key words and/or phrases, other than that... no real complaints.

title: So helpful
overall_text: I had a pretty good experience with it and liked it
pros_text: This is a great product for creating more efficiency around tasks, even in a small office environment
cons_text: I cannot think of any negatives. It was a good product overall and served its purpose in the office setting

title: Good tool for interfacing with customers
overall_text: Pros:It is easy to use and keeps our clients and team members informed and up-to-date on client-related communications.
pros_text: Cons:I wish it had the ability to set out of office responses that then directed open tickets to other team members. Sometimes tickets get lost in queues because ticket types are incorrectly set and so reminders of who it went to or what teams would be helpful.

title: great tool for managed shared mailboxes
overall_text: better support tool that shared mailboxes.Can assign tickets to any team member.When staff is vacationing very easy for others to pick up the work.
pros_text: Easy tool to track interactions between vendor and my support team in one place.Monthly KPI's are right in the dashboard and the mobile capabilities are there so tickets can be resolved easily when not in office.
cons_text: Generates a lot of emails.Whoever is copied on original email.Need to configure system to eliminate all but the initial email that generates the ticket and all would work much better.

title: One-Stop Ticket App
overall_text: During the Christmas season we get thousands of inquiries about glitches, complaints, compliments, etc. and this is the tracking software used.
pros_text: It literally covers every single solitary aspect of taking a customer ticket issue by telephone or email.
cons_text: The idea of switching to Remedy or one of the other top companies trying to pitch us has been brutal ... the cost of switching is too much.

title: Highly Recommended.
overall_text: Pros:As a human resource analyst it is my job to see to it that employees are happy and approach their Job with ease and that it is exactly especially the customer service representatives. This is exactly the impact zendex has on our company. It is very easy to use and very user friendly. Just love all the reporting it does provide. I will highly recommend.
pros_text: Cons:Though fascinated by all the reporting modules. I believe that there is more room for improvement as more options can be added. Besides this. Great program.

title: Zendesk has helped all of our team members to reach the weekly goal!
overall_text: The metrics page is so accurate and offers so much information that we had no need to track out metrics individually. We are now programming our metrics through Zendesk reports.
pros_text: It's great that Zendesk offers the option to color code the incoming message in the queue. Thanks to this our team's time of response are excellent and their productivity has increased. Emails are now answered according to their priority.
cons_text: I have no complaints about Zendesk. What I like least is that maybe finding old conversation is kind of difficult because there is no advanced search.

title: Very good software as for customer support
overall_text: Pros:It has been used one of my vendor and he is very happy from the day he has purchased this software.No communication gap value of money.Easy to use. complete automated software.
pros_text: Cons:Now customers put up their questions on social media also so it should be connected with social media also.Once any costumer inbox to company it should be converted in to ticket.

title: Very optimized, easy to use, gets the job done
overall_text: It integrates with other programs I use, to make my job much easier.I never lose track of anything and I never forget how to get something done.
pros_text: How intuitive the whole system is. Very easy to get the hang of and remember how it all works. Like riding a bike!
cons_text: Once in a while it will slow down or get stuck. Perhaps we just use it too much, but usually their support is quick to address it.

title: Pricy app, not a lot of customization out of the box
overall_text: Fast return on investment, better service to our clients. Very good things.
pros_text: Ease of use made sure the implementation in our company went very smoothly. Our team was very quick to adopt and master the app which helped us improve our bottomline very fast. Fast return on investment, better service to our clients. Very good things.
cons_text: My so far only problem (apart from the app being quite expensive) is that there is no way in my price plan to customize the emails being sent without programming the entire email myself.a simple plain text, htlm or rich text option might already do the trick for me and this is not possible. which is a shame as it would be quite easy in my opinion

title: Great Ticketing/IT Solution
overall_text: Pros:There are so many tools out there to help companies manage tickets and work orders. Zendesk really does a great job of making this process simple to both use and manage. The various configurations will let you set it just to your specs and be successful.
pros_text: Cons:I don't really have any cons. I wish it were free for every user, but then it wouldn't be around much longer.

title: Easy To Communicate with Clients
overall_text: Pros:Zendesk made it easy to communicate with Clients and stay organized. I really liked that we could designate things to certain team members and see who was working on which email/ticket.
pros_text: Cons:I didn't like that Zendesk required us to mark the email thread/ticket as complete or still pending. Sometimes we would send a customer a feedback email after accidentally marking something as complete when it wasn't and they would get upset. We also wanted to create 2 help centers. 1 that was focused on clients and 1 that would be internal for our company but Zendesk doesn't allow that. We would have had to create a separate account because we couldn't dictate who had access to what articles.

title: Great, secure helpdesk solution
overall_text: It's great, it's reliable.
pros_text: Besides the basic helpdesk functions, you can almost use every function you want with the help of apps in the Marketplace.Zendesk supports sending mail from your own domain with SPF and DKIM which I think is needed, but not offered by every competitor.
cons_text: The main function I miss is recurring tickets.

title: Love Love Love Love Zendesk
overall_text: Pros:I love Zendesk! I have used so many different ticketing systems and this is by far the best. It is easy to navigate around, easy to setup things such as rules/triggers/departments and macrosAnd I highly recommend this system
pros_text: Cons:You need to remember that if you delete a CSR that you go to you settings and downgrade your plan otherwise you still get billed

title: Zen Desk/Help Desk Evaluation
overall_text: We use Zen Desk for our internal IT ticket management system.We have found that when dividing the desk into different groups in the base package there are some limitations.However, the product as a whole does a good job meeting our needs.
pros_text: I like that I have reporting and analytics on our ticketing history.
cons_text: We have two different desks in use in our system.The tickets can't be submitted to both systems at once creating some minor issues.

title: Great platform but expensive
overall_text: I've been using Zendesk for 3 years now and im content i had to downgrade my package because of the high price point but overall im happy using it!
pros_text: Easy to use, have everything you need in the customer service domain so you don't need any additional services.
cons_text: It is very expensive and if you want a simple feature from other package you need to upgrade the whole team for this package

title: Avaliação zendesk CIEE
overall_text: Os atendimentos dos chamados são mais ágeis,a inclusão de informações para abrir o chamado e muito simples e bem intuitivo.
pros_text: A facilidade para utilizar o produto, e muito simples e intuitivo
cons_text: Não tenho nada contra, o zendesk atende muito bem as necessidades do serviço de chamados

title: zendesk by Bucc
overall_text: Overall, the experience and usage is exemplary. The only thing I don't like is that the original analytics and reporting is being retired
pros_text: there's a lot of great things to say about the app. easy to use, easy to manage, macros make life easier and so on
cons_text: the fact that the reporting is being removed from insight (being retired) and being migrated to explore it not favorable to me

title: This service continues to improve let alone offering outstanding reliability
overall_text: It is our primary help desk software!
pros_text: Offers outstanding reliability, amazing features and offers a phone/tablet app for both iOS and Android.We use this app daily and get notified of all updates as needed!
cons_text: The answer bot feature has been considered for our needs but we're not certain that it'll work for our needs.Unique feature that has potential though!

title: Use of ease
overall_text: I am overall pleased with Zendesk. I would like to be able to email outside the company and attach documents easier
pros_text: It routes all emails to one email address that all my team members can see and reference
cons_text: We cannot email outside our company. I would like to be able to do this

title: This is the best customer email support tool out there
overall_text: Zendesk allows us to professional communicate with our customer base, provide a help center of support articles, escalate issues to our engineering team via their Jira integration and improve our customers' experience through Zendesk's reports and analytics.
pros_text: Zendesk allows our support team to quickly reply to our customers, track our communications and escalate issues to our engineering team.
cons_text: The system is powerful, but not as customizable as we'd like for our various team members. Also, the help center templates they provide can sometimes have formatting issues.

title: zendesk un logiciel CRM complet
overall_text: zendesk me facilite beaucoup le travail
pros_text: _Logiciel très facile d'utilisation ; _Offre un réel gain de temps; _la possibilités de mettre le logo et les couleurs de l'entreprise _Permet l'intégration d'autres applications
cons_text: Prix élevés ce qui peut compliquer son achat pour des petites entresprises

title: Zendesk for Support
overall_text: I have a great experience with Zendesk and used it for over 2 years. It is simple and easy to track your work.
pros_text: I enjoy the thread of the emails and that all the information for a customer is in one page. The emails continue to roll through and the internal notes are visible in the same thread.
cons_text: There are some limitations with the software and tracking certain data.

title: Assistenza clienti nel miglior modo
overall_text: Pros:Se sei alla ricerca di un software completo per l’assistenza clienti tramite chat sul sito e per la gestione di un eventuale sistema di ticketing come lo abbiamo noi, Zendesk è una buona soluzione. Ci ha permesso di mantenere una buona sinergia con i nostri processi aziendali e allo stesso tempo ci ha permesso di sostituire il nostro servizio di ticketing in house con un software decisamente più completo e funzionale
pros_text: Cons:Il costo del servizio è decisamente elevato rispetto alla media dei servizi affini ma c’è anche da dire che a livello di servizio, per quello che ho potuto vedere sino ad oggi, Zendesk è più completo.

title: Zendesk is really good!
overall_text: Very satisfied, it works well to allow teams to come together and solve tickets.
pros_text: It’s easy to manage tickets and keeps everything easy to find. Internal notes can be left on each ticket as a sticky not for coworkers. Customers cant see these.
cons_text: Creating macros could be easier, but it’s no dealbreaker.

title: A good help desk
overall_text: Pros:If you are using the Atlassian suite of products, especially Jiram then it just make sense that you should be using this as well. This helps you organize your support emails automatically with little setup. The history tracking is great as well.
pros_text: Cons:History tracking is great but can be too verbose. I hope there's a way to delete some of the history. Also, we always seem to have a problem with images in emails. They never get automatically attached to JIRA or to a ticket when forwarding emails from it.

title: Ótimo para troca de informações e armazenamento
overall_text: Até então é a ferramenta principal de trocas com o cliente, tem atendido todas as necessidades bem.
pros_text: Grande capacidade de guardar histórico de tickets, trocas de e-mail e contagem de SLA dentro da plataforma.
cons_text: Um pouco complexo em detalhes, tenho alguma dificuldade com pesquisas especificas e palavras chave.

title: Zendesk is a life saver
overall_text: LOVE LOVE LOVE ZENDESK
pros_text: There's no better product on the market than Zendesk. It has all the features you could ever want. It's super easy to setup. Great customer service and integrates with just about anything. I'd highly recommend Zendesk to all companies.
cons_text: There's not much I don't like about it. I think they've made an amazing product.

title: Zendesk: my review
overall_text: Overall, I'm quite satisfied with the software. The mobile access allows me to manage my business at any time.
pros_text: Being able to provide our customers with fast, efficient support. It brings us closer to our customers
cons_text: For my taste I find the product a little too expensive

title: Outstanding ticket management tool
overall_text: Pros:One of the best ticket/support management services in the market. Great integration options as well as social-media profile use. We've been using Zendesk for our sites for a couple years now and it never disappoints.
pros_text: Cons:Important features are only available for higher price memberships, but overall Zendesk is a great ticket management took.

title: Zendesk is a good tool to communicate with customers!
overall_text: The benefits of using Zendesk include receiving discounts once a subscription is selected and billed annually. Zendesk is available with integrative API's and other software applications. Zendesk is available upon request as a demo for organizations. Zendesk is a good tool that allows organizations to communicate with customers. Zendesk is a good tool that offers services such as chat and telephone communication to resolve ticket issues regarding purchases and transactions.
pros_text: Zendesk is a cloud based customer support application. Zendesk hires contractors to fulfill customer support roles. The Zendesk representatives can contact clients or customers regarding ticket request of orders. The Zendesk representatives helps users resolve issues regarding shipping, and order transactions. Zendesk is a customer service software that has five varying subscription types per products and features with a 30-day free trial.
cons_text: Zendesk representatives may need more than 1-2 business days to respond to a ticket request. Zendesk customer representatives varies around the world. Zendesk customer representatives may not be knowledgable of the company's manufacturing inventory. Zendesk does not offer refunds for downgrades or cancelations. Other fees may apply depending on the additive features of a-la-carte.

title: Robust customer service platform with a few small caveats.
overall_text: It's a robust platform thatMy only immediate complaints are occasional service outages that always seem to impact us at high priority times, and not having more control over certain ticket types reacting dynamically(for example if a set ticket reason code required certain values or fields to be filled out).
pros_text: Simple user interface and easy ability to write and modify macros.
cons_text: Service outages and lack of control over ticket fields.

title: Capabilities within Zendesk
overall_text: Overall, a generally positive experience to use this product every day for work. Allows us to provide quick support for users and does have several good features.
pros_text: This is a great resource for providing customer support and for publishing Help Center content. It is generally easy to use, though some functions can be hard to find within the product.
cons_text: Some of the features, like the analytics and reporting options, feel like they could be a lot more built out. There is definitely room for improvement.

title: Busy UI, Lacking Knowledge Base Integration
overall_text: For a very basic CRM it's fine, but get to an organization with any real scale, and I think Salesforce Service Cloud is a much more compelling option.There seems to be little to no capability in Zendesk to really build custom applications + flows to support business processes.So you end up trying to fit a round peg in a square hole.
pros_text: - I think what they try for is simplicity, but I don't think it succeeds very well.- UI is relatively reactive and speedy.
cons_text: - Overly busy user interface.- Lack of customization for views.- Poor integration with knowledge base- Interface for viewing parent accounts + child accounts of those accounts just doesn't make sense, it isn't intuitive.

title: Light, easy to use and plenty of integrations
overall_text: Working in customer support, I have encountered many ticket management systems and all of them had at least one thing missing. When we started working with zendesk, the productivity hit the roof.1. Easy to search for archived tickets2. Easy to make different ticket queues3. Integrations with systems such as JIRA4. Integration with VoIP, having the case for your customer automatically created5. Building a customer database6. Building a knowledge base7. Building a community forumI would definitely recommend Zendesk to anyone!
pros_text: Zendesk is by far the best ticket management system there is. It has plenty of integrations that help you keep all the records safe and easy to access.
cons_text: There is absolutely nothing I dislike, almost every aspect can be customized.

title: If you want to ease the process of communication with your customers, this is a must!
overall_text: If you own a business, you have to have Zendesk. It's an amazing platform for your respondance with your customers.
pros_text: I love how it's easy to keep organisation in place when you use Zendesk. If I didn't use this, I would be all over the place and did not know where to turn and whom to respond. This is such an easy to use platform and it does half the work for you, I am really impressed.
cons_text: I didn't have anything negative to say about it, I love how it does all the work for you. Customer support is amazing as well.

title: Best support desk from small to big companies
overall_text: Pros:- Very helpful and feature rich software to handle all the customer related queries- The thread feature which will make the internal communication and external communication clear is best thing
pros_text: Cons:- UI can be improved for ease of use. Great UI will definitely make a great software- Pricing can be reduced and much more startup supportive

title: Keeps Communicating Easy
overall_text: I would say Zendesk is a great tool for handling communications with customers from all over the world. It enables your team to take ownership of the messaging and streamlines the emailing process.
pros_text: We use Zendesk to manage communications with our customers. It helps us manage all questions and concerns in a timely matter without cluttering an inbox.
cons_text: Occasionally we have issues with not all communication from a customer coming up when replying, but it rarely caused an issue.

title: easy to use, good to reporting activities
overall_text: Good reporting for support activities, easy to use for users, good custom field on ticket
pros_text: There are many possibility to custom field, and reporting view too.Good tracability for activities, and users adopt very well Zendesk
cons_text: Attachment like jpg is not display on comment in the ticket, you must to go at the end of ticket and click on the link to display attachment

title: Everything You Need to Scale Customer Support
overall_text: We wanted a response time to decrease with our business and were able to do so with Zendesk.
pros_text: Their interface is extremely easy to use and is geared towards making the support process efficient. Follow ups and canned responses went a long way with making our team quick.
cons_text: The setup process can take time, but when done right it sets your team up for success.

title: Great tool for customer support
overall_text: I have used it to communicate and resolve issues of my company's customers.
pros_text: The thing i like most in this tool is that once a customer revisit your site this automatically detect the revisit and can show the conversation which you had with him/her before. It can also track on the basis of customer IP address which help to identify customer even if customer does not provide email or name.It also automatically generates customer ticket once the customer start chatting with the support.We can also form a pre-library of help section in it, from where a customer can search for his/her query and if he/she did not find the answer he/she is looking for then in that case, customer can continue to chat with support.
cons_text: let me share an experience with you.In my previous company where I have used this tool (glad I am not working their anymore).One customer came to support with a particular query and he did not mentioned his email or name. I resolved it. Few days back I got a different query from the same IP address (somehow i remember that ip address), which led me to believe that the customer is same and I have shared info with him which is of another customer (you can imagine what happened next). This was the confusing thing which happened with me. I am not saying its the fault of the software, its just that this should give some disclaimer.

title: Single tool for ITSM
overall_text: Pros:Tickit handling and SLA management in customer info on ticket level
pros_text: Cons:UI and account information display, complicated setup
cons_text: Alternatives Considered:FreshdeskandKayako

title: Zendesk has been a Great Product for our Company
overall_text: We track how quickly and how the customer experience was with out customer service group.
pros_text: The software allows for great tracking and timely results to our customers.We immediately know how our agents our servicing our clients.
cons_text: I have not had any issues.The people at Zendesk are easy to work with and help resolve issues.They offer great support.

title: Very solid cloud-based support ticketing system
overall_text: Overall a good platform to start out with but may not be for those who require more advanced capabilities.
pros_text: Provides a complete customer service support platform, for both users and administrators. Very straight forward to login, file tickets, and follow them. You can easily locate tickets by case ID or search for keywords in the UI. Conversations can be either public (customer can see) or internal (only employees) so be careful when posting internal messages. Zendesk supports most common features like uploading logs and other artifacts.
cons_text: Needs better integration with other systems, such as Salesforce. It was not easy to pull or push data into Salesforce and we ended up having to write complicated scripts to do so. In the process we also ended up losing the bulk of our tickets which was valuable data that is not recoverable. The navigation is tab based which sounds nice in theory but occasionally the speed of the UI made the UX a bit painful. At times, search can be slow and not comprehensive enough.

title: My I.T department uses Zen Desk
overall_text: I love how the ticket submitting process is integrated into email so I can do it from anywhere that supports email. saves time and hassle.
pros_text: I love that anyone can jump on a ticket I submit and I don't have to worry about sending it to a specific person and figuring out who the person is.say have a networking problem, I just need to send it out to the generic email of zen desk and the person needed for this ticket will get figured out on the other end, not mine.
cons_text: I hate that each ticket has its own email address and when I want to send another email to the zendesk, it will try to auto populate the email to a ticket specific address and sometimes I wont notice and send my ticket as a replay to an old ticket.

title: Keep track of support requests across multiple channels
overall_text: Pros:I love that it can collate support requests from email, Twitter and other channels so that there is one single place to respond to customers. Also like the filters that can be set up to alert you to particularly important requests.
pros_text: Cons:Probably an edge-case, but bulk selecting every ticket is not possible and you need to do it page by page.

title: Daily use of Zendesk
overall_text: Customer service satisfaction is really guaranteed if we are using this because we can identifywhat tickets need more attention
pros_text: It organizes the tickets that I worked. It classifies the tickets if it's already solved, open, new, pending or closed.
cons_text: I like everything about this software because even if the ticket is already closed, we can make a follow up ticket, indicating that the follow up ticket is related to the closed ticket which is essential on the organization of ticket requests.

title: Exceptional price performance
overall_text: We have Zendesk for customer facing interface for its clear and simple look & feel. Salesforce are kept as back end for its powerful workflow and automated notifications.
pros_text: Good case tracking tool for team collaboration. Flexible API for integration in our company website.
cons_text: Background workflow good but still not as flexible as others,Salesforce service cloud for example.

title: Great Customer Service Program!
overall_text: Easy to see and monitor customer emails and agents responses.
pros_text: Links with our Live Chat so easy to create tickets from live chat.Great search function.Easy to navigate.
cons_text: Setting up was a little challenging, but once I got used to it, it was easier to navigate. I do forget where to go sometimes to make adjustments but they have a great help section.

title: Great for help desk, pricy
overall_text: We are able to funnel all email communication, social media channels, comments, direct messages and live chat from our website into ZenDesk so our customer service team can easily handle the communication from one centralized platform.
pros_text: Zendesk is very user-friendly, easy to set to and integrate with email addresses and social media channels and works as a hub to collect all incoming communication.
cons_text: The package only allows certain users (compared to Gorgias that has no limit on users) so we decided to go with Gorgias for that reason.

title: Feature Reach Customer Service Software
overall_text: Zendesk has been a game changer for my customer support operations. After switching from a different service, I have been able to cut my response time in half, and increase my customer satisfaction by a healthy margin. With the ability to manage multiple support teams, I am able to answer questions, solve problems, and help my customers in a matter of minutes.
pros_text: Zendesk has been the best customer service tool I've used. The easiest part of using Zendesk is the frontend. It's easy to navigate and makes it easy to see all your tickets and responses in one place. The backend is also easy to use.The best part of Zendesk is the automations. There's a ton of automations you can use to make your life easier. I've had success using these automations to keep my tickets at a manageable level.
cons_text: It has very high learning curve especially advanced features such as automations and custom dashboards

title: Zendesk is a terrible CRM for Chat Support
overall_text: Terrible experience to say the least had to shell lacs of rupees without even using the product even for a single customer conversation.
pros_text: Nothing positive to share. For a year we struggled to use it.
cons_text: I had the worst experience of buying, implementing and coming out of the Zendesk contract. Within 1 year everyone right from the technical team both Indian and foreign and the Salesman had all left the company due to extremely poor product and policies of the top management.

title: Zenedesk...
overall_text: My experience with Zenedesk has been an overall positive one!
pros_text: What I most like about this software is being able to connect with many customers on a wide range of platforms all in one place.
cons_text: There is nothing that I dislike about this software, it has been a good one for me so far, so no need for any kind of change.

title: Why use Zendesk Suite?
overall_text: Overall, I'm quite happy with Zendesk.
pros_text: One fantastic feature is the ability to interface with major social networking sites like Twitter and Facebook, which enables CC to answer promptly.
cons_text: Everything is good but if there will be an enhancement in the future, that would be amazing

title: Zendesk Suite Review
overall_text: I am very happy using Zendesk since it makes my work easier.
pros_text: It is very useful to communicate with customers and it is easy to access the previous conversations.
cons_text: Since it doesn't always appear when I want to look for anything, it's hard to do so.

title: Très bon logiciel !
overall_text: Pros:Logiciel très simple d’utilisation. Il permet de soutenir la partie service client, service après-vente et conseil client.
pros_text: Cons:L’interface pourrait être modernisée en terme de fonctionnalité, néanmoins il y a déjà tout le nécessaire.

title: Great Ticketing Solution
overall_text: Pros:Great search engine for any text in the ticket. Great for keeping multiple people updated of status updates.
pros_text: Cons:When people would reply back to specific email addresses it would create duplicate tickets but for the most part if the user just hit reply it would automatically add to that specific ticket.

title: Great for those with heavy incoming ticket loads.
overall_text: We receive tickets from a variety of sources, and Zendesk allows us to send them to the right person so we can answer our clients promptly and accurately.
pros_text: We get a heavy load of incoming tickets at our large global company, so it's very helpful to have Zendesk, which allows you to easily sort and assign tickets to either individual employees or departments. This creates an organized ticketing space, which makes it easier to respond quickly and appropriately.
cons_text: A few glitchy hiccups, nothing major, but occasionally there will be random buttons or functions that won't work. I'll generally just try again an hour later, and it's fine.

title: Good once the ball gets rolling
overall_text: Pros:I like how organized and customizable this software is. My company was able to place custom macros for responding emails. This allowed for responses to be sent out conveniently faster.
pros_text: Cons:The only thing I didn’t like was how complex it was to me initially. It seemed a bit overwhelming but once I got the hang of it, it was easy.

title: Zendesk does exactly what we need it to do.
overall_text: Pros:The reliability. In 4 years of using it we've rarely encountered any issues. The integration with other programmes is seamless. The best ticketing system that I've used.
pros_text: Cons:Sometimes it's not apparent that a colleague is responding to a ticket (the icon doesn't appear, or appears greyed out) but refreshing the page fixes this.

title: Good, beautiful and expensive
overall_text: An environment full of options to create a first class ticketing, chat and incident management system. They have a support team that is always attentive and willing to help.
pros_text: It is undoubtedly one of the best. Full of options and with a company behind it that has experience in the sector. I have used it with clients for web development and it works really well.
cons_text: In my view the price. Maybe there should be a version with the same functionality, but more limited for very small companies like mine. For a large company, it is essential or for a medium-sized company, but for small companies it is expensive.

title: How can Zendesk can change your Customer Services Team lifes
overall_text: By making efficient customer services we optimize the time of using Zendesk instead of a thousand e-mails that could be easily forgotten in an inbox. The ticket system works so well and we can validate the satisfaction of a client by the time and feedbak
pros_text: Definitely, the Whatsapp integration makes the customer services team faster in problems resolutions that in other software maybe will take a lot more time. That's my favorite function.
cons_text: We live in Brazil so we pay in Reais, which makes the cost higher.

title: Customer Service Team On ZenDesk
overall_text: We have been able to successfully deliver live chat for our customers, and they interact with it frequently, and I feel it helps us stage ourselves as a more dependable company by offering so many methods of fast contact.
pros_text: Our customer service team uses this software daily for live chatting. I like that when we are outside of business hours it takes the messages and sends them to an email where we can answer as soon as we return back from the weekend. I also really like the stats on where our customers are contacting us from as well.
cons_text: I wish it had a texting feature. As there are many apps that have this same functionality, but are able to also interact through text too.

title: We Love Zendesk
overall_text: amazing, other than the deals issue, their customer service is great and the program fills our needs.
pros_text: love that you are able to track sales, and input all information for customers/patients online without needing to go into different pages
cons_text: the fact that I'm not able to preset deals and just choose them rather than having to write them in every time

title: So easy to use & simple interface!
overall_text: I would recommend Zendesk overall as a simple and easy-to-use ticketing systems. It works for our organization and we are in the medium to large business size, but I bet it would work just as great for smaller businesses.
pros_text: I love how easy this ticketing system is to use. There are not a ton of screens you need to go through in order to get the task that you need to get done completed. Fields are simple and straight forward & tickets are searchable. You are also able to check the status of your ticket at any time.
cons_text: I dislike that unless you are communicating within the actual Zendesk software with your admin/technical support team, it comes through as a confusing email thread that is hard to follow. I dislike that I have to rate each ticket as satisfied or unsatisfied, because 1) there should be more rating options, 2) not every ticket should have to be rated.

title: Very good customer support
overall_text: Immediate support. easy tool to implement
pros_text: A simple tool with strong customer support that solves any problem in minutes. We are using them since thy started as 'Zopim' and not planning to replace.
cons_text: Chat window design is a bit outdated. I'm sure their great designers can come with new designs or ideas how to make the window chat look much more modern

title: Zendesk for support teams
overall_text: Its been a very useful tool mostly because of the storage of the emails, in the support branch keeping track of every email and have it for future reference is a must. It has simplified the communication between customer and support. Every ticket shows the person who replied which is a plus since this way the customer won't receive different replies from different people.
pros_text: It is a great way to keep track of your incoming emails, also you can organize your emails by priority or department. The storage of the emails is a great way to have them for future references.
cons_text: Is not as user-friendly as other apps, sometimes the system gets stuck when you are writing a big response and this can minimize your production time.

title: ZenDesk is functionally sound and innovative.
overall_text: Over my experience was nice. Customer service was responsive and the product is well on its way to be the best in the market.
pros_text: I like most that I can send emails, texts, and calls and keep track of them over long periods of time. This helps me stay organized in a high call volume environment.
cons_text: Sometimes the system was easy overwhelmed by the size of our office and there was no technical solution. At times we’d have to restart our systems several times a day.

title: Easy to learn and use Help Desk software
overall_text: I was able to set up Macros and were able to use them on the mobile client. This made updating/closing tickets fast and easy and the clients notified right away.
pros_text: The mobile client and macros allow you to open and close tickets on the go
