cons_text: There were not a lot of bad things with this software once you customize the home page to see the things important to your job.

title: Support ticket management at its best
overall_text: Pros:The organizational features to handle your support tickets are second to none and can't be beat. Easy to use features for employees to easily submit tickets different ways.
pros_text: Cons:The amount of emails automatically generated can be a bit overwhelming at times, and we haven't figure out how to control those.The price is also hefty.

title: Suporte ao cliente
overall_text: Pros:O Zendesk é excelente para gerenciar o contato dos clientes de maneira assertiva e automatizada. Possui recursos variados e um suporte presente para solucionar possíveis dúvidas.
pros_text: Cons:O Zendesk possui muitas funções e por vezes elas não estão tão claras no layout, portanto, não é muito intuitivo.

title: Easy to use and set-up
overall_text: Pros:I have implemented Zendesk for my business as well as several of my client's businesses as well. It's easy to integrate with other apps in their marketplace too - and beyond. I like that you can easily organize and assign tickets, and also have any messages or mentions for Facebook/Twitter create a new ticket. Helps you stay on track and reduces any messages falling through the cracks! Also, it's versatile depending what your needs are.
pros_text: Cons:The only con that I can think of relates to their chat feature - there's Zendesk chat that you can integrate with support. I did try it and quickly cancelled. Maybe it was a glitchy thing at the time (which was within the past year) I wasn't able to integrate the chat with the support, and had to use 2 separate logins. I ended up cancelling and now use a different company for chat.

title: I used ZenDesk to track complaints for a large financial company
overall_text: I am able to track and preserve the cases I need to. It also allows my company to measure employee output in an objective way.
pros_text: I like the ability to create custom fields and easily export data. I also appreciate the willingness of ZD support to assist when I have a problem I need to troubleshoot.
cons_text: Free form fields cannot be incorporated into macros. This functionality would be helpful to me and others who use it. Also, the interface can be intimidated as there is a lot going on in even the most basic of views.

title: Its the best
overall_text: With Zendesk we are able to provide an interactive website as its connected to our website,clients can get help online as they will be viewing our website.
pros_text: The software is user friendly and has more informative reports
cons_text: When on trial it doesn't offer more functions as a result you wont really know if those functions are working before committing to the software.

title: One stop solution for all customer support related requirements.
overall_text: Pros:There are many many features, its upto you till what level you want to use it. Also, mobile dashboard for agents provides very good flexibility.
pros_text: Cons:Pricing is bit higher of small companies; however free lifetime trail available (ofcourse with limit of max1 agent)

title: I love ZenDesk and how it integrates into our other products!
overall_text: This software allows my daily activity to be tracked, which helps when we need to go back into tickets if there are recurring issues.
pros_text: I love the features that ZenDesk has. The chat is great for connecting customer browsing our website to us. The ticketing system helps us keep track of all customers and staff. I like the macros that we can make. It really helps saving time when answering tickets fast. One other feature that is great is that we can turn an email into a ticket due to the integration of ZenDesk with our work emails.
cons_text: One thing that is a little frustrating is that ZenDesk chat will sign me out sometimes when the website is refreshed.

title: Zendesk - Overall highly recommended
overall_text: Overall experience of using zendesk is Excellent.
pros_text: This software is very user friendly, even the first time user will easily familliarize the options and instructions. Well recommended software.
cons_text: The software sometimes has a maintenance which last around 24 hours.

title: Helps with my daily work
overall_text: I am very pleased with the overall experience using the
pros_text: Every day I’m using the software and it makes my life so much easier knowing that the product has what I need.
cons_text: The only cons is that like most software we use we always want the next version sooner than it is available.

title: Zendesk is the only thing that comes to mind when I hear Customer Support
overall_text: Pros:The overall integration with most of the well known 3rd party apps and services. The Zendesk chat (earlier Zopim) has been the best friend of our support team since the last 5 years now.
pros_text: Cons:Probably the pricing when you plan on using some advanced features or when your support users count increases.
cons_text: Alternatives Considered:Freshdesk,LiveChatandJIRA Service Management

title: Nothing out of this world
overall_text: It was my first experience with a chat room on my site, it works fine but it iss too expensive, i prefer to use a free chat room like Tawk.to
pros_text: No pros compare to other free chat apps, there are few free chat app that has more features and are free
cons_text: It is too expensive, there are some better alternatives wich are free, that have more features that makes chatting more easy

title: Excellent Service Desk Ticketing Tool
overall_text: I implemented Zendesk as CIO of a medium sized credit union. Previously, requests were handled in a chaotic manner via email and phone messages. Zendesk elevated our IT team to a customer service group receiving rave reviews from our customers!
pros_text: Easy and intuitive setup and workflow automation capabilities.
cons_text: Honestly, I can't think of anything I don't like about the software!

title: Zendesk Feedback
overall_text: I have an awesome experience with Zendesk. It is very user friendly.
pros_text: I like that Zendesk is customer focused. It provides an ease of communication to the customer.
cons_text: I would like Zendesk to offer tutorials in the Help library. The tutorials should be on the software upgrades.

title: Most practical ticket system ever. Consist of many helpful & customizable features.
overall_text: Overall, Zendesk is an excellent help desk that offers a variety of services that a business needs to manage a sizable client base, track tickets, and respond to consumer concerns immediately. Zendesk gave us a lot of flexibility in how we handled client requests and inquiries, helped us respond more quickly, and allowed us to automatically document all procedures. The reports it gives us are thorough, and we can always use them to improve our operations.
pros_text: Compared to the outdated ticketing service we previously utilised, the ticketing platform was significantly simpler to use. In comparison to some of the other firms out there, I enjoy the variety of options and services that Zendesk offers. It is extensive and full of features. Because it is such a big firm, the work of the support reps is straightforward, to the point, and interacts effectively with numerous tools. It is intended for a large company.
cons_text: Due to all the options they provide, it can get highly complicated or tough at some point.

title: Easy to use and to integrate with other apps and services.
overall_text: Pros:Zendesk eliminates the needs for emails and easy to filter messages.Integrate with Salesforce and many other applications.Provide powerful reporting and customer satisfaction surveys.
pros_text: Cons:Can be expensive for all the features.Simple to use, but takes time to train staff to really take the full of advantage of Zendesk.

title: It is used to our customer's report issues on our app
overall_text: Customer tickets managements
pros_text: It is good to address our customer issues, it keeps all the tracking from the beginning of the issue until the end.It allows us to integrate with multiple other applications.
cons_text: It has a lack of multiple features that will be useful if they were implemented mainly bulk action to avoid some repetitive work.

title: Great tool for customer support
overall_text: Great experience, great product! Highly recommended to companies with customer support.
pros_text: If you are doing customer support, Zendesk is what you need! It allows you to customize the tool based on your product preferences, you can track statistics with ease, have useful insights and learnings thanks to the many features of Zendesk!
cons_text: There's nothing I don't like about Zendesk. I've been using the product for almost a year when I was doing customer support. It can't get better than that!

title: Ticketing tool for your service
overall_text: Pros:We use Zendesk daily in our technical support. Brand options, dividing agents into groups, internal notes or connecting other agents to each other are useful.
pros_text: Cons:I can't think of anything fundamental. The price may increase depending on the number of agents.

title: Zendesk or why haven't you started using the best webbased ticket system ever!!
overall_text: We plan on using this software for as long as possible. We like all the features in the package.
pros_text: Very easy to use. New add-ons add new features and customization . Tech support is amazing. Insights(the reporting feature) is a must to track trends and for future planning for your IT team. The knowledge base is another great feature for quick solutions for your team.
cons_text: The pricing can be steep for a smaller organization but the tiered price structure more than makes up for that.

title: Truly the best product for Live Chat, Presales and Customer Management
overall_text: It is really amazing and easy to use for live chats and customer management. I use it for presales, visitor, and customer management for my daily use. It has been really great using it till date.
pros_text: I liked the various features like saved replies, language translation in conversation, IP blocking for spam visitors, visitors' history, paths, and everything. It is simply the best.
cons_text: The UX might need to improve as it might be difficult for the first time.

title: Zendesk Review
overall_text: Zendesk is a great standalone ticketing system that is easy to use and easy to see every ticket that has ever come through the system.
pros_text: Zendesk is a great ticketing system. Very easy to use and easy to keep track of different tickets for users, managers, operations, and whoever else may need to look through past and current tickets.
cons_text: We did not use all the functionality of this product to the fullest extent, and ended up replacing this with Salesforce Cases so everything would be in one place.

title: Surprisingly Raw and Difficult to Customize
overall_text: Pros:Allows us to email and call our customers.
pros_text: Cons:The emails look raw and unprofessional. Support and customization are horrendous, it’s necessary to dedicate hours on end to reading their help posts. Reporting isn’t user friendly. The mobile app is difficult if not impossible to use.

title: Zendesk lice chat
overall_text: great customer support
pros_text: this product is great for integrating live chat on your website, it is easy to use and implement
cons_text: video chat is missing from the regular licence

title: amazing software
overall_text: overall experience is good, have used other crm tools as well but this one is more user friendly and modern. daily base needs made easy and less time consuming at the same time
pros_text: a great CRM tool which enables to manage task easily and effectively. chats are seemless and connecting with someone is hassle free. resources are also there to help you navigate
cons_text: since the tool needs to be understood properly for better consumption, its bit time taking.

title: great support software but lags behind on some features that competitors provide out of the box
overall_text: Pros:- ticket management- SLAs and routing support is great- hierarchical and granular access controls
pros_text: Cons:They increase the pricing very much and recent times, making it unaffordable for SMB and midmarket companies. Also, their support team needs to up their game
cons_text: Switched From:Freshdesk

title: Zendesk ticketing system
overall_text: Pros:I do like how easy it is to navigate the system and to setup features.
pros_text: Cons:I like the ease of use but would like to see more functionality built into the platform at mid-grade subscription tiers. Zendesk almost forces you to pay to play type of subscription service.

title: Super tool
overall_text: My overall experience is good. We get to learn new things daily while using a tool like this. Customers also liked the options they had at their hand. Its interactive and easy to use
pros_text: Its a very good tool for managing customers chat.CRM is awesome and chatbor support is also effective. Live chat helps to interact without any hassle and gives real time experience
cons_text: Big tools like these sometimes stuck or hang for a while but its not that frequent

title: great for support teams
overall_text: Pros:Overall, Zendesk is great at what they do. They devote a lot of energy into thinking about work flows and usability and it shows.
pros_text: Cons:There are several features across a few of their different tools that I think are absolute necessities (that are offered by competitors). I think they should focus on some of those things.

title: Full featured and powerful Help Desk Software!
overall_text: Pros:Many 3rd party integrations make it is easy to incorporate help desk tickets directly into your companies systems.Easy to use for agents.
pros_text: Cons:Zendesk can get fairly pricey dependent upon how many agents you would like to add to your account. Licensing can be a little confusing as to how many people can be on the system.

title: Powerful but expensive
overall_text: The benchmark software most other companies are compared to. Does not live up to its price and reputation.
pros_text: Very powerful software capable of tying in with many other software as well as having an API to tie into anything.
cons_text: Expensive, very expensive and sometimes not as reliable as it could be. Often changes are made with no clear benefit to them.

title: Overall a great product for Ticketing
overall_text: I think it's a great product.
pros_text: Zendesk seemed to do quite well from both the management side as well as the customer side.
cons_text: Tickets being incorrectly labelled as Spam was a significant problem and often live tickets would sit there unanswered for periods of time.

title: Good, buggy, but good
overall_text: It's good overall. They just need to work on getting out bugs better
pros_text: Relatively easy to use and manage customer questions/issues. You can send in a ticket/email, call, and text questions via Zendesk.
cons_text: It is super slow sometimes and will randomly go down.tickets can disappear and phone calls are directed weirdly sometimes.

title: Intuitive platform for Customer Support
overall_text: Easy, cost effective and not hard to implement.
pros_text: I like how easy anyone can be trained to use this, making sure clients are taken care of is a huge priority so this is a wonderful platform for that.
cons_text: I think the customer support could be a little easier to reach but besides that it’s great!

title: Easy Way to Communicate with Customers
overall_text: Pros:Fairly customizable as far as front end view for customers. Easy to use overall and intuitive on the customer end. Mobile app was well developed for both Android and iOS platforms, making on the go ticket management and requests easy to fulfill and manage.
pros_text: Cons:Integration with other systems could be challenging. Customer support was very slow when we did run into issues with the platform, which impacted our ability to respond to our customers in a timely way.

title: Top customer service platform in the market
overall_text: Numerous extraordinary things to like about the suit, yet certainly the incredible client care experience is the main that rings a bell as each time I had an issue and have been in touch with the item support group, I've had the option to find solutions and arrangements rapidly and with fulfilling replies to my inquiries. Likewise, the chance of including various undertakings inside a similar work area has been extremely useful in working with the centralization of data. Commercial center applications and various joining prospects which helps project the board
pros_text: Highly effective for me and my team to communicate.
cons_text: Took a little while to figure out most features, not beginner friendly.

title: We use Zendesk as our inhouse ticketing system.It is great for indexing issues and mass managing.
overall_text: The ability to index issues and recall them at a later date.
pros_text: Mass managing, automatic responses, cataloging are just some of the pros with Zendesk.Also, we are able to set up Teams that can respond to issues quick.
cons_text: Cons of Zendesk would include the attached files do not load on my app.But they can be accessed when on my desktop.

title: High Volume Customer Service
overall_text: For doing lots of customer service, Zendesk definitely got the job done.
pros_text: I liked the way that Zendesk could categorize customer inquiries for open, closed, pending, etc. There were times when there were hundreds of unanswered inquiries and the layout of Zendesk helped to do a lot of work efficiently when it needed to be done.
cons_text: Although the layout was not difficult to use, it definitely could have used an update to look more modern. The appearance seemed very antiquated.

title: Zendesk is a robust chat platform.
overall_text: We use this software daily.This is one of the most robust and versatile platforms available.
pros_text: Zendesk is our go to chat software.We use the platform across multiple domains to share chat resources among our digital properties.
cons_text: The cost of chat can quickly add up when trying to add part time and casual users to help with chat.

title: Managing customer requests made easy
overall_text: Pros:We did not have an up to date easy to manage system set-up to manage customer requests before using Zendesk. Now it is easy to stay organized. Now we can sort by tags and themes and track the response status, leading to a better experience for the customer.
pros_text: Cons:It took a while to get used to working with Zendesk, it is not always self explanatory and the customer service could be better reachable.

title: Un outil très simple et pratique
overall_text: Pros:Facilité pour fusionner les tickets, retrouver des contacts. Rangement par dossiers. La création de modèles pour les emails est très simple.
pros_text: Cons:Parfois peu pratique de ne pas pouvoir accéder sur la page d'accueil aux tickets assignés à un collègue.

title: Because of Zendesk our team provides great support
overall_text: We're able to centralize our support structure and set parameters for good support and report on those metrics.
pros_text: It's intuitive and they make it easy to get started and start communicating with customers. The different statuses and automation make support reps much more productive and efficient. The Help Center gives us a way to answer customer questions without them having to reach out.
cons_text: Tags are not very useful unless you set specific criteria for using them. Searching can be difficult sometimes.

title: Zendesk review
overall_text: I have been using it for 2 + years and I am satisfied with what Zendesk is capable of.)
pros_text: I use zen desk at my current job. Its the best software to track customer interactions and helps in keeping on top of everything.
cons_text: I do not dislike anything about this software.

title: Zendesk
overall_text: Pros:It is a paid application, but it is worth it, it allows you to connect with your clients in a simple and direct way, it is a multiplatform application, so it is easy to give support to different areas and needs. You can configure triggers for automated responses from the system, while you can have a list of predefined responses to use at any time.
pros_text: Cons:It's a little complex to handle at first, but once you get used to the system, it becomes very easy to use

title: Pretty comprehensive ITSM tool
overall_text: Pros:Using Markdown and some Zendesk Fu you can easily update ticket status from your inbox. Zendesk makes it easy to customise with ticket fields, categories, tags to personalise support for customers
pros_text: Cons:It does get more pricey when you want to use additional features in Zendesk. Customising the look and feel of your own help centre is limited when it comes to changing appearance which can be frustrating.

title: Great Help With Customer Service
overall_text: There is not much to complain about. It's well priced, easy to use and has good support channels.
pros_text: It's a great help to our CRM team because it allows you to organize processes, workflows and tracking of customer issues. It's easy to use and understand.
cons_text: I wish you could edit replies, but other than that I have no complaints.

title: Uncomplicated and complete
overall_text: Better than most tools I've used during my experience as support technician.
pros_text: Has an uncomplicated layout, much better organized than most tools.Basically, it's easy to use, without sacrificing quality.
cons_text: The SLA control and alert system have room for improvement.

title: Great system for ticket tracking
overall_text: Pros:Great software for ticket tracking and commentary on live issues. The collaboration feature allows my team to work on an issue in tandem.
pros_text: Cons:I dislike the search function. You must scroll through the timeline to find mention of a specific issue.

title: A Perfect Suit for Customer Support
overall_text: Zendesk has been quite simple to learn and use for basic tasks. It offers good reporting features and a comprehensive range of support options. People who works in customer service department will love to use this tool.
pros_text: It gives you the power and resources to organise your customer service channels while retaining the adaptability to meet your demands. Competitor evaluations revealed a higher level of personalization.Help genuinely starts with the problem and works up to its resolution.
cons_text: Although all the tools and settings I have used thus far are really helpful and I feel that those features are included in the list after much research and user input, I truly don't think of any such options or features on Zendesk.

title: We love Zendesk
overall_text: Team collaboration and project management
pros_text: It has everything you need in one place, it allows to switch between teams and projects very easily. UI is great and software itself works perfectly.
cons_text: No real complains I can think about. May be I would suggest to improve the mobile version. Other than that everything is great.

title: ZenDesk is far and away the best solution for customer service for ANY size company.
overall_text: Streamlined the customer service activities.
pros_text: This customer service platform integrates with just about any of the popular ecommerce platforms making the setup extremely easy.The ability to upload and host help docs saves the customer service team HOURS a week.
cons_text: The support agent portal UI is fairly confusing . I understand there's a ton of capabilities but it becomes more of a hassle to setup any auto-reponders, or filters than just manually completing tasks like these.

title: Ferramenta excelente para gestão de jornada do cliente
overall_text: Pros:Software bem completo para atendimento ao cliente, consigo conectar todos os canais de atendimento que minha empresa possui (Whatsapp, Instagram, Facebook, WebChat, Site, Telefone, Email) e ainda possui ações de disparo em massa nesses canais, além de personalização.Tivemos um ganho significável em experiencia do cliente após adquirir o Zendesk
pros_text: Cons:Implementação um pouco complexa, foi preciso um desenvolvedor para nos ajudar
cons_text: Switched From:Zenvia Conversion

title: Zendesk Suite helps me keep track of customer support tickets and manage communication efficiently.
overall_text: Pros:I love the user-friendly interface and the ability to customize ticket views to fit my needs.
pros_text: Cons:Sometimes the reporting features can be a bit confusing and I wish there were more advanced analytics available.

title: Effectively track any problem with your customers
overall_text: Zendesk, effectively helps in solving any problem of our customers, allowing us to create automatic responses of different forms of communication. In addition to making work more efficient, it allows you to monitor the performance of the team and in the company's decision making.
pros_text: It allows you to identify customer behavior patterns through calls, and facilitates data management.It works in several internet browsers, which is very good.It has a dashboard that allows viewing reports and graphs that facilitate management.It has automation that allows you to create pre-defined responses.
cons_text: The charge is made in dollars.Limited support for the simplest plans.

title: A good low budget option for those needing a help desk.
overall_text: Pros:It allows someone with a low budget access to a decent help desk. It is not as fully featured as some hosted solutions, but a great compromise for the cost.
pros_text: Cons:Being a self-hosted solution it takes a bit of setup. Of course there is setup and customization with all solutions, so this is not a huge deal.

title: Chat et relations clientèles
overall_text: Pros:Automatisation des tâches : zendesk propose des fonctionnalités d'automatisation qui permet de réduire la charge de travail Manuel, d'accélérer les processus et d'améliorer l'efficacité opérationnelle.
pros_text: Cons:Support client limité : des problèmes de support client notamment des temps de réponse lents et des difficultés à obtenir une assistance en temps opportun.

title: Helping you keep your ZEN when dealing with trouble tickets!
overall_text: Zendesk is a great tracking tool for handling all kinds of issue tickets from customer issues to internal IT issues. It's been a lifesaver for being able to keep track of all client issues in one place.
pros_text: Zendesk is a great tracking tool for handling all kinds of issue tickets from customer issues to internal IT issues. It's been a lifesaver for being able to keep track of all client issues in one place.
cons_text: Nothing so far, it's been a great solution.

title: Great tool for live chat on website
overall_text: Pros:Pereless uses Zendesk to monitor and respond to client issues. The software is easy to use from our team and we like having the feature.
pros_text: Cons:At the time, there are no major functionality issues with the software. We would recommend it to another small business who wants to have a live chat feature on their website.

title: Poor customer support from the Zendesk Support Team
overall_text: Pros:Zendesk has a clean interface and many features (maybe too many). It takes time to understand how it works and the logic behind the software.
pros_text: Cons:During the free trial, a live chat was available for technical support and the support provided was exceptional. As soon as we upgraded our free trial to a paid account, the live chat was never available for our account and when we have an issue, we have to send an email. The Support Team replies after many hours (even to critical issues), with answers that do not solve the issue. They reply once a day (one email per day), and it usually takes about 6 days to solve an issue.

title: Easy to customize and integrate with other tools.
overall_text: Pros:Zendesk is flexible and easy to deploy, and you can install it quickly and get started in minutes. It integrates all your main support channels to enable fast delivery and effortless tracking. Plus, the platform is supported by time-saving widgets for streamlined conversations, automation, sharing, ticket views, and triggers.
pros_text: Cons:It's very robust and with an excellent performance. Maybe the user experience could be reviewed in the way the threads are shown.

title: Zendesk, I quality product but there are better options.
overall_text: Pros:Good base functionsEasy to useEasy to operationalizeEasy to implement and trainZendesk has some great initial features (base features) and is easy to setup and to use.
pros_text: Cons:The cost is too much for most companies to absorb for the functions available. Some functions should be included in the base product but aren't.

title: Great to use.
overall_text: Really great experience usingthis, can't fault Thai at all.
pros_text: Has loads of features and allows fast and accurate feedback from our customers. Once you master it it becomes essential.
cons_text: Requires some coding knowledge and can be hard to use of you are a brand new user. But nothing too bad.

title: easy to use - allows for collaboration with others
overall_text: Pros:I liked the notes feature the most - it allows you to add notes/comments to an item, and allows for other users to see and comment as well. The simplicity of the tool made it very user friendly as well.
pros_text: Cons:It's hard to identify something that I least liked from the software - as I used it in such a limited capacity (email tracking for support) - however, with that usage purpose in mind, I wish we could have prioritized items, and filtered by that prioritization

title: Usamos Zendesk hace 2 años y funciona correctamente
overall_text: Es bueno para lo que vale, y para lo facil de su integracion
pros_text: La facilidad de la integracion con nuestro ecommerce
cons_text: A veces el panel es engorroso, no es tan facil poder ver lo que los usuarios (personal) hace en su trabajo

title: Easy to Use - Our Enterprise-Level Solution for Customer Service
overall_text: We have had this solution in place for 2 years and are satisfied with the ease of use and capabilities.
pros_text: Very easy to use, training was minimal to get the team up and running. Particularly the division between replies internally and to the customer is very clear.
cons_text: Generation of emails can create too many notifications

title: Great way to support or customers
overall_text: It has been great.We have been using zendesk for 7 years now.
pros_text: It is a very easy system to learn and their macros are great to help answer questions quickly.
cons_text: The only issue is sometimes our customers are confused by how the email looks that they get and they think they need to log in.

title: Good, but expensive
overall_text: Pros:It's very easy to use. You can set it up without having to be an IT expert.
pros_text: Cons:Throughout time they have become very expensive. We are not using JIRA which can do a lot more, but is also more difficult to set up.
cons_text: Reasons for Choosing Zendesk Suite:We could get up and running in a short period of time.

title: Zendesk Experience
overall_text: Pros:Zendesk has a really nice system interface and It's not complicated to use. Overall, I find Zendesk really helpful.
pros_text: Cons:Probably, the errors we encounter when solving a ticket but those are due to system maintenance which don't usually happens.

title: Great!
overall_text: Pretty good - we use this to serve existing readers on our subscription site who have sales and billing questions and also use triggers to drive sales for potential custoemrs
pros_text: Its a really good chat tool for sales and customer support - i have used this with my assistant to help manage sales and support for site visitors
cons_text: If you use in bulk the pricing really adds up like lots of agents you have to pay for each one - however, the ROI if you use it well and have a good product is pretty high

title: Great Tool
overall_text: Help keep track of problems on our site makes my life easier!
pros_text: Love the accuracy and efficiency of this software.Makes my everyday work flow so much easier and more efficient.
cons_text: Nothing.I love this software.the turn around time is always super quick and makes it easy for our tech guys to fix our problems.

title: Zendesk review
overall_text: I love zendesk and use and need it in my everyday life at work. I believe zendesk is going in the right direction for sure and should be utilized by more people.
pros_text: I enjoy that this product easily allows me to communicate with my customers in an easy, organized and an efficient way. I can respond back to them within minutes of them sending an email in.
cons_text: I don’t like verifying everyone’s emails. I believe it is a hassle and waste of time. Also we do not receive their emails sometimes.

title: Support ticketing has never been that easy!
overall_text: We use it for our company support for our several products and general information, and it's very easy for us to follow our clients' needs and questions. We can easily attribute the ticket to the correct person and see the story of the client. All the team can follow the state of each ticket and interact if necessary.
pros_text: Very clear and easy to use. Tickets are categorized and assignation is easy.
cons_text: When several people are assignated it's difficult to follow internally and we can loose some time in the process, which is valuable and bad for the client's need.

title: The only CRM you need!
overall_text: Pros:Zendesk has been a game changer for my company. Timely customer support is crucial to our success and having everything in one place makes sure nothing gets lost and we give consistent responses. One feature I love is the internal notes that can be shared within the company, but not to our customers. Creating customized marcos for quicker response times has been awesome as well!
pros_text: Cons:One of the things that I don't like about Zendesk is if you are tagged in a ticket, there isn't a place on the dashboard where all of these tickets live so that I can revisit them and make sure you have responded.

title: Top level support management
overall_text: I make frequent use of Zendesk in the process of managing several externally-produced digital learning resources. Our range of suppliers all use Zendesk for support management and it really helps us all to stay in the loop, manage requests and priorities, and build a knowledgebase of solutions. I thoroughly recommend.
pros_text: Zendesk is an excellent support management software. The layout is clear and easy to use. The direct integration with email is helpful and there is a good level of functionality. It really helps keep track of support tickets and progress. It is a simple yet effective tool.
cons_text: It would be helpful to be able to re-open tickets on the client side but apart from that, there is little to fault.

title: Champions of customer service
overall_text: Beautiful solution. Great user interface and easy to use.
pros_text: Ticketing management system, Customer relation management and messaging/live chats
cons_text: User security.More work on user security should be look into.

title: Zendesk
overall_text: é leve, intiuitivo e limpo, de fácil utilização e customizavel.
pros_text: é prático e intuitivo, sistema leve e com informações bem organizadas
cons_text: Gostaria de ter acesso à relatórios e resumos de chamados para termos métricas

title: Enable Your Customer Service Team to be the Best
overall_text: Pros:Our customer service/community team utilizes Zen desk to address issues raised by our large community and generally track and manage tickets.We particularly appreciate the strong analytics platform behind Zendesk as we are a metrics and data driven organization.
pros_text: Cons:Email alias for ZenDesk can be nondescript and confusing for customers.The nature of ticketing can feel impersonal for our end users despite live CS agents answering the threads.There are more needs for AI (for smart tracking and smooth transition between CS agents) and general logistics when multiple agents are handling a single thread.There is a steep learning curve as well.

title: Chatting got easy
overall_text: Great experience till date
pros_text: Connectivity is very good, live chat features are great, to connect anytime with anyone, customers are happy chatting and resolving solution
cons_text: There is nothing to specify here as a dislike, it's a great platform

title: The customer support Zendesk provides is an embarrassment to the product.
overall_text: The negative customer support experience far overshadows any product benefits. I would recommend a complete overhaul of Zendesk Customer Support. Management that implemented the current customer support system should be replaced. A company supplying customer support software should set the standard, not be the reason people discontinue use. I would not recommend Zendesk based solely on Customer Support.
pros_text: I enjoyed everything up to having to interact with Zendesk customer support.
cons_text: Zendesk customer support is non-existent. They will not provide a number or call you. They disabled our account because our card experienced fraud, even though we had a valid ACH connection at the time of disconnect.

title: The best chat tool out there
overall_text: Very happy with the tool and overall performance. Our client service team uses it daily to manage any concerns clients may have.
pros_text: This chat tool integrates easily with google analytics and google ads campaigns. It helps keep track of incoming site visitors and it's really easy to interact with them online. Installation is super easy
cons_text: I needed to know how to edit website code, nothing too complex, but once you install the installation code on the website you're good to go.

title: Did a trial and did not proceed
overall_text: We use a different platform and considered switching but ultimately decided not to because it costs more but has the same amount of features.
pros_text: Zendesk has a lot of great features. Tabs for tickets, time clocks, free add on apps, data is next level!
cons_text: Bad mobile app, nothing different than competitor. Data seemed cool, but wasnt worth the switch from what we use now

title: The perfect tool for customer support
overall_text: An effective and efficient customer support ticketing solution
pros_text: I'm part of the customer support team of an internet marketing and SEO software company. Zendesk has been a great tool for our team as it's simple, easy and convenient to use. We're able to effortlessly communicate and track correspondence with clients across the globe using an email ticket system. Highly recommend.
cons_text: Sometimes tickets go missing within the software (somehow disappeared)

title: Zen desk Suite Review
overall_text: Very happy with it and would recommend to others as well.
pros_text: Zendesk was user friendly, Works very well with all the existing softwares we use.
cons_text: Have not had any issues that I don’t like thus far using zendesk

title: Great for small businesses
overall_text: It has been great and a real game changer for our company.
pros_text: We use support and chat. Great and easy way to handle customer support and keep everything in one location.
cons_text: On zendesk support, it would help if people were notified they were sending in a ticket after business hoirs.

title: I Love ZenDesk!
overall_text: I've used ZenDesk for over 4 years, and it's the best help desk tool out there!Whether you just need a simple email-based help desk or a full-on enterprise-level multi branded instance with voice and chat (I've had both), it never feels overwhelming to configure. It's easy to navigate, it's super customizable, and has tons of ready-made integrations with the other applications you already use (that work perfectly out of the box). They practice what they preach: not only will you get amazing service every time, but access to a treasure trove of well-written product documentation plus other soft-skill resources to help your team refine their customer service chops.
pros_text: *intuitive interface*fully-customizable workflows*integrates with everything, and if it doesn't, they have a great API*amazing service*impressive, detailed documentation*free learning opportunities, and occasional local community networking
cons_text: Only one: price. But you WILL get what you pay for, and you won't regret the investment!

title: Zendesk has been very helpful. Great ticketing system.
overall_text: Pros:Updating tickets is very user friendly and you can also build reports based on datas. Enabling chat to assist customer has been huge and helps interaction with customers.
pros_text: Cons:Price per user can be costly. Creating reports can be complicated as there is a lot of trial and errors when you create them.

title: If you want to improve your customer service - Zendesk is a must have!
overall_text: We've tried a handful of ticketing systems, but Zendesk has been the most user friendly and almost fully functional immediately upon sign up. Zendesk also integrates with numerous other options to improve the communication between platforms. The only downside is they don't offer customer satisfaction reviews with the lower plans and as a newer user to ticketing, it would be very helpful to have feedback on our client's experience withZendesk ticketing.
pros_text: Ease of UseElevated Customer Service
cons_text: No consumer survey option for lower level plans.No chat support on lower level plans.

title: Great For Ticketing, With Some Quirky Annoyances
overall_text: Pros:I like the ability to create robust triggers and the ability to get robust and created metrics for reporting.
pros_text: Cons:Light Agent's replies are internal and don't change the status of a ticket to 'open', which means that any internally escalated ticket may get missed as part of the support process.

title: Good for inbound queries
overall_text: Pros:I used this system in my previous role at access, as a sales development rep. We used it to facilitate our website live chat, mainly to attract leads but also to direct support queries to the right place. It works well for the job, notifies when a chat comes in and rarely if ever crashes during a chat
pros_text: Cons:It is quite ugly, outside of the live chats its not that easy to navigate

title: When you're the complaint department
overall_text: Overall it was a solid solution for our team.
pros_text: Zendesk was easy to use for our small team where we managed an app with over 2 million active monthly users. It functioned as our hub for IT issues, customer success, and managing complaints. Being able to easily open a ticket and assign it to the correct team member made sifting through hundreds of messages a day easy and less time-consuming than it could have been.
cons_text: Honestly, we had very few complaints with Zendesk and when issues arose we were able to get in touch with an account manager to assist us fairly easily.

title: Traditional Problem Solver
overall_text: Pros:I like how Zendesk Suite keeps track of all needed activity.
pros_text: Cons:There wasn't anything that I didn't like about Zendesk Suite. It's most reliable and a traditional Problem solver thank you very much.

title: Excellent for clients, easy for the team!
overall_text: Just delightful! Live chat is amazing and closes sales much faster - I’m way more likely to buy after chatting via ZenDesk. As a company user, it helped us communicate with our clients so much!
pros_text: I love the live chat feature. They added this recently and it helps to make you feel like it’s a more human interaction than the emails that can take a long time back and forth.
cons_text: At first, the emails sent from ZenDesk felt less personal than one coming direct from Human Resources, and it seemed like the response time was slow. But I realized that was just the perception caused by having ZenDesk as a middleman - each staff person responding via ZenDesk determines the communication speed.

title: Efficient IT Help Desk Program
overall_text: Pros:Love this software! Used it to run a small Help-Desk allowing just 2 IT staffers to keep track of all the companies in-house and remote employees.
pros_text: Cons:Takes a lot of data entry to get everything going. But if you're patient you'll be rewarded with a program that is cost effective and super streamlined.

title: Zendesk - Overall solid Platform
overall_text: Overall it worked great while we were growing before we switched. They integrate with a lot of partners.
pros_text: Worked really well while we were growing. Overall was easy for our team to use.
cons_text: Separate tickets would make us less omin-channel than I would have liked.

title: My team uses Zendesk for our customer support ticket system.
overall_text: Pros:Zendesk makes responding to customer service and support issues super easy and efficient. The tools built in to the system give us a way to quickly respond, and I love the mobile app too.
pros_text: Cons:on rare occasions the system goes down for Short periods which is a pain, but it's never a major issue.

title: Great for customers, internal or external
overall_text: Zen Desk was very easy to pick-up and understand. The software ran very smoothly on our systems with little to no lag.We also found it very easy to deploy both to our customer service team for customers and our IT team for internal support.The additional products just plug right in and make the solution even better.
pros_text: We like how the software can easily integrate with chat and talk features.We find that our customers and internal users still enjoy contacting their support teams through multiple methods and these are two of the most commonly used.
cons_text: We had some issues with the analytics initially. It looks to be something that we just have to wait out until we have enough new data created in Zen Desk. It would be nice to run against historical but we are ok with what we see even if it requires 2 systems for a while.

title: Great tool to provide a great customer success
overall_text: For us it helped making our customer support more agile in responding to tickets. We have improved response time and as we have history on support cases we can track conversations with our customers and give a more tailored response to them.
pros_text: I highly recommend it if you want to provide 24/7 support on your website or product. It's very flexible meaning you can adapt it to your team'sway of working. Good UI also.
cons_text: Making bulk changes could be improved. Mobile version could be improved too.

title: Great way to track service
overall_text: Great way to track service and work.Easy for use with internal or customers or both.
pros_text: Good way to track service items internally and with customers.Lots of features and clean look for the agent interface
cons_text: tough to understand from the end user interface.sometimes hard to search for tickets and info as a whole.

title: I really like Zendesk
overall_text: Overall it's an easy to use solution with the exception of reporting.
pros_text: I think it's a great product for customer support.
cons_text: I don't like how it doesn't have a good solution for auto assigning tickets and also it's reporting center can be confusing.

title: Customers and agents are the focus
overall_text: Pros:Easy to use and to customize.Providing agents all the tools they need to manage requestes.Giving customers many channels to self-response their answers or get in communication with agents.
pros_text: Cons:I don't have any cons, my experience with Zendesk was great

title: Survey
overall_text: Pros:I use zendesk suite to infom the client about the new service in my company and also finding clients thoughts about service offered to them.
pros_text: Cons:Zendesk is one of platform with variety of applications therefore no complaints.
cons_text: Switched From:Zoho Desk

title: Zendesk Review
overall_text: Highly recommended. Great platform for live client chatting.
pros_text: Easy to use, chatting with clients is made very simple and smooth with Zendesk, Analytics and reporting tools are very convenient.
cons_text: No cons that I can remember off. It's a great live chat to use for any organisation. Highly recommended.

title: Zendesk facilitates Chatting
overall_text: Excellent!
pros_text: We use Zendesk in our Call Center. However, we especially use it for chatting. It makes communicating with international customers easy with it's autotranslate feature.
cons_text: I think what I like least about it are the notifications it gives off.

title: Zendesk Is great
overall_text: Pros:It's so easy to use and navigate through. I've been through a few changes with this program in terms of looks and it's always been so intitutive.
pros_text: Cons:When it goes down, it's hard to reach someone to get a hold of to notify about the issue and it can't take a few hours to get resolved.

title: Robust tool for support teams
overall_text: Having used both Front and HelpScout before, Zendesk is my pick at the end of the day for its simple layout but vast customization options.
pros_text: The customization available makes a well-run and efficient support desk. It's easy to see where there may be gaps in communication and when content has gotten stale thanks to the analytics available.It can be in-depth as you need it but is easy to understand for new employees.
cons_text: There are not any major drawbacks to Zendesk. There are some small features here and there that could be added but of course, every user has different needs and wants.

title: Zendesk is the backbone for our Support team!
overall_text: Pros:I love the ease of Zendesk. It is such an easy program to navigate around. You can easily figure out what you're trying to do, find what you're trying to find, etc. The different views and macros are life savers!
pros_text: Cons:I would say that sometimes there is some lag time with Zendesk, we've had a few instances where some tickets take a while to come through, calls don't ring, etc. Most of the time, their support team is on top of it, though!

title: Zendesk has great features, but I find it to be clunky.
overall_text: I liked Zendesk for the features, and the reporting was extensive. However, I found it difficult to use, and much more difficult than other CRMs and HelpDesks to build reports. The social metrics are also lacking in comparison to other HelpDesks.
pros_text: Zendesk has a great ticket management system, with omnichannel communications with customers. I like the Knowledge Base Management system, and the reporting is top-notch.
cons_text: It feels clunky and disconnected to me. Having to exit fully, and have to download separate things for reporting is difficult. It's also tough to build reports, but user-friendly.

title: It has allow us to comunicate better with our users
overall_text: Pros:It does what it says, the tracking is great and we can customize the experience with customres, it also help us reduce the time we use to answer FAQ
pros_text: Cons:I think that they should consider more the small business, maybe if they charge by the amount of tickets and not per agent would be awesome.

title: A recommended customer support service platform for your startup/business
overall_text: Pros:All inclusive platform to manage your customers, phone calls or texts and even email marketing has been made super easy especially for startups to grow their business.
pros_text: Cons:The FAQ feature is quite too technical to set up even if you know basic html/css

title: Most professional and used customer support tool
overall_text: I use it to help customers when i manage events with ticket selling in my job.
pros_text: Has a lot of integrations, it's the most reliable and respected customer support service for any kind of company.
cons_text: It needs a different mode to contact clients, like WhatsApp or Telegram bot. It only offer e-mail contact.

title: General Use Review
overall_text: Good. Customer support was always responsive and helpful.
pros_text: The product does help with exactly what it says it does. Widely known in the industry as a leader and used.
cons_text: Options can be a little nickle and diming when you need to add on more support or preferences. Can get expensive for everything.

title: Reinventing the wheel
overall_text: It is more effective for people working with large teams, however for myself I found it to be a solution to a problem that didn’t exist and only serves to complicate my workday.
pros_text: Zendesk allows teams of people to access the same emails and “assign” emails to different team members, thus streamlining the process so you know whether or not you have to respond to an email.
cons_text: Unless you are working with a large team on an account, I don’t think it’s more effective than using a normal email browser. You don’t get notifications when an email comes in so I have to periodically check to see if I’ve missed anything (which happens frequently)

title: Makes my day to day a lot easier!
overall_text: makes my day to day job a lot easier
pros_text: how you can see which support tickets have been opened/actioned the automatically replies after logging tickets
cons_text: its quite hard to find previous tickets

title: Just the best.. but...
overall_text: Great, there is no tool i've tried for ticketing that can beat Zendesk at this point. Great features, great marketplace & integrations, very easy to use, so deeply customisable.
pros_text: Ease of usethe rich set of featuresIntegrations
cons_text: ExpensiveHave some pricing schemes for some features that do not make any sense (ex:light agents

title: Better than ServiceNow but room for improvement
overall_text: Pros:Easy to use and fast to get up and running. Decent documentation and can do most administration yourself even if you're not experienced.
pros_text: Cons:Metrics and reporting could be better, and feature set could be most robust especially for user role management.

title: Just another great product
overall_text: Pros:good functionality, easy to use, better support incase if any issue encountered, everything is just simply nice about it.
pros_text: Cons:more templates needed while reporting things to customer support , also initially takes time for setup, also didnt found any self learning tuts when an new user joins in.

title: Best chat and helpdesk software for ur business to run on automode
overall_text: Pros:Zendesk help u to become available 24/7 for ur customer's and help u track each and every open and closed customer qwery in the form of ticket's
pros_text: Cons:Abt queing feature in the free trial... One chat at a time in free trial

title: Zendesk Review
overall_text: Ultimately, we decided to migrate off of Zendesk and build a proprietary solution in-house. We just couldn't get comfortable enough with the outdated UI of Zendesk and the inflexibility to customize it as a permanent solution.
pros_text: Zendesk's only real strength is that they have been in the game for so long that they do provide quite a bit of functionality - however, it definitely seems that they haven't invested much in terms of refining and optimizing that functionality to stay on top of the industry.
cons_text: The user interface is terrible and outdated. There are much better alternatives out there for any single facet of Zendesk.

title: Zendesk is the best Help Desk Software
overall_text: It helps to manage my daily work using tickets.
pros_text: Some of the pros includes:1. Great compatibility and integration with other apps like G-Suite, Freshbooks etc2. Easy to automate using macros and REST API3. Web Interface is very user friendly
cons_text: Some of the cons are:1. The learning curve is very steep2. Ticketing workflow is quite complex3.When this ticket information is shown in a mail. Its seems quite cluttered and hard to understand.

title: Declutter your workload
overall_text: Pros:ZenDesk makes closing work orders easy and organized. It allows you and your team to be more effective and efficient with the work orders that you have before you.
pros_text: Cons:The setup takes some work to get the workflow fit for your environment. But once it is set you can rest easy.

title: The king of customer service
overall_text: It just works.
pros_text: It's easy to interact with the customers, once your team has gotten used to it, then it becomes more agile. It provides some insightful metrics about customer behavior that are super relevant to gain insights and improve the UX and CX.
cons_text: Customer support is basically non-existing sometimes, depending on how busy they are. Also, the chat widget adds a lot of loading time to your website.

title: Servicio al cliente de forma rápida y sencilla
overall_text: Es una aplicación sólida de servicio al cliente con características útiles y herramientas de automatización que permite a empresas gestionar las interacciones con sus clientes.
pros_text: Integra varios canales de comunicación, incluyendo correo electrónico, chat en vivo, redes sociales, teléfono y más. Permitiendo personalizar la plataforma, adaptando las herramientas a sus necesidades, simplificando tareas como la clasificación de problemas, asignación de tickets, entre otros.
cons_text: La aplicación puede ser costosa para empresas pequeñas y medianas, incluso puede ser complejo el aprender a usar la aplicación.

title: Zendesk Support
overall_text: I highly recommend especially on a teamwork ICT environments.
pros_text: Since its a web based solution, less expensive to maintain also no headache of data management. One of the best cloud ticket solution for ICT department ticket tracking.
cons_text: Often we had issue of not getting notifications, like it pausing and then all mails of ticket number would come at once many of them as messing your inbox.

title: Manages our tickets with ease
overall_text: Pros:The ticketing system and article database has been the most helpful in managing our tech support needs.
pros_text: Cons:The navigation within the internal system can initially be a bit difficult (i.e. the naming of the tabs are not always clear), but once you know where to click, it's not too bad.

title: Zendesk : Simple, easy to setup and get going from day 1
overall_text: Very good, easy to use even for small businesses
pros_text: Reliability and integration options with other tools
cons_text: The mobile app interface and managing tickets can be better, compared to desktop application

title: Great way of managing customer service
overall_text: Great app for teams that deal with a lot of customer issues and from different sources (chats, calls, e-mails, etc).
pros_text: You get most of the information – from calls, sales, messages, chats, etc. – all in one place, and Zendesk does a good job at organising it all. Also, ticketing system works just fine and is easy to use. It even has a sales automation system if you need it. It's definitely a go-to app for businesses to manage their customer issues, specially for big and medium-sized companies.
cons_text: It can be a bit complex to use and implement at first; the interface is not particularly simple, but honestly that's OK given its many features.

title: Good Tool for Customer Support
overall_text: I have used this software for just over a year now. I have no idea how we even managed with Zendesk at this time. It helps us intergrate every tool we use and is the central place of work.
pros_text: Good customer support tool. Easy to track tickets and assign tickets to other team members. Easy collaboration. Lots of integration with other softwares. Easy tracking and reports.
cons_text: User interface seems busy at time. Too much going on at the same time.

title: Zendesk is nice but check if you really need it
overall_text: Pros:It has a lot of features and has been around for ages
pros_text: Cons:The company has become a large organization without the startup spirit they used to have in the beginning.I'm wondering if this thing is still in active development.

title: Zendesk has it all
overall_text: Zendesk is easy to use, straight-forward and efficient.
pros_text: Single sign-on to all the features - Phone, email, chat.
cons_text: We were unable to stay due to one contractual issue.

title: Customer service in real time!
overall_text: Customer service, general website questions, real time help
pros_text: This is customer service in real time! We use this across all of our websites to answer any questions in real time! It keeps things organized for our CS representative and we're able to build automations through it as well...
cons_text: It is a paid tool, but it's worth it in my opinion! There is a free version, but you there are certain features that are blocked with the unpaid version.

title: Great but a bit pricey and there's always a few features that would be nice to have
overall_text: It has made our support much easier and faster.
pros_text: The ease of use and the powerful trigger tool. The macro builder, external app connectors and custom fields makes for a customisable experience.
cons_text: The triggers can't trigger on just anything. Sometimes a trigger to trigger a trigger needs building.

title: A good customer service tool
overall_text: Overall it's a value add in sales and marketing team to respond to queries real-time.
pros_text: We'll integrated with website, helped us in responding to real time queries of people who visited the website. Multiple people could use it through app and respond real time
cons_text: The version I used did not have social media channel integrations. If that happens, then all conversations and queries can be integrated and be at one place.

title: I LOVE Zendesk!
overall_text: I LOVE this application. I've tried other apps and they do not beat Zendesk at all - not even close.
pros_text: I've used Zendesk for 5+ years. It's not changed a ton, but it's always been great.
cons_text: They're very slow to add feature requests. No phone support or chat support. Only email, which takes too long.

title: THE standard for ticketing/tracking
overall_text: Pros:Zendesk Just Works. it has so many customization options to let it do Exactly what yo need it to do!
pros_text: Cons:Im not a fan of how overly complex you can make your ticket routing.taking over from someone else is a challenge!

title: Love this chat software
overall_text: Zendesk chat made my job so easy and smooth, I love how all my extensions worked with it (Grammarly, Text Expander) and it was helpful regarding alerting you on time and when the customer reads the chat and when they are typing.
pros_text: I love being able so see when the customer has seen when I chat them, the time stamp shows up also which is so helpful! You can see when the customer is typing which allows you to stop, let them finish or to even type what you need to and wait for their response, kind of like intuiting your customer and being ready immediately. When your customer hasn't responded a little snooze Z symbol shows up and suggests that you reach out to your customer so its very helpful for timing and alerts.
cons_text: After using another chat system I have to say that Zendesk chat is supreme. All the pros I mentioned above make chatting with customers seamless and helpful. I have never had an issue with this software and love how it is set up. No cons from me!

title: Zendesk Review
overall_text: We can quickly and accurately resolve tickets because the software is simple to use. This assists us in resolving several tickets each day.
pros_text: This app has simple navigation. Easy to use. User friendly.
cons_text: Even though the tickets are submitted, there are situations when the Public Reply recipient does not receive the email. I know that the developers of this app is doing everything they can to fix the problems.

overall_text: Pros:We use this software for technical support questions, chat and overall support to our customers. It is very convenient, I even use the app.
pros_text: Cons:It is difficult to personalize the tickets that go to customers. Sometimes those that respond don't see others cc'd on the tickets.

title: Great Product
overall_text: Pros:I love that you are able to track leads and also integrate DocuSign and HubSpot. Makes it easier for folks who are traveling and needing to submit proposals from events.
pros_text: Cons:Signature for email. Shockingly, this has been a pain to set up. There should be an integration method upon getting the platform set up. The marketing team didn't know how to help us which seems odd.

title: Simple yet highly effective for covering all aspects of support
overall_text: Pros:I love the UI.It's structured in a simplistic fashion that makes training new agents super easy, because it just makes sense.
pros_text: Cons:Pricing for some of the additional Zendesk features are not as competitive as preferred, which makes it cost effective to consider 3rd party apps instead.

pros_text: Cons:There is a bit of a lack of organization and customization functionality when it comes to organizing fields and list views.

title: User friendly

cons_text: Zendesk offers great selection of utility for the customers, I haven't noticed any problem so far.

title: A bit complex to set up, the support team always helps

cons_text: Complexity. Zendesk Suite is difficult to set up, I wish it was simplified so that even people wit little IT knowledge can set it up.

title: Zendesk

Tickets are received and sorted by categories so operators can provide further assistance, you can use the ticket system or online chat system. Canned messages that are created helps for faster response. Tickets can be sorted by pending, unsolved, resolved and other. Everything is visible and userfriendly!

title: Good app, terrible customer service team.
overall_text: Pros:Stunningly beautiful interface. strong features and connectivity with apps. Support via integrated phone and chat. Very good knowledge base.

title: Easy to use
overall_text: very easy to use, way better than trying to handle this with gmail.

cons_text: Setting up SLA can be a bit tricky and it does not allow us to customize different SLAs for different companies.

cons_text: Not many things that I dislike. User interface could be improved in order to be more friendly for non-technical users.

title: Zendesk helped me to understand what ITSM is in terms of Incident documenting and resolution process

pros_text: Easy to use as an IT Support Analyst with no experience of Incident report documentation
cons_text: Absolute complete automation and workflow that support 1st and 2nd level IT support.

title: One of the best unified workspace for handling customers
overall_text: The overall experience was good and provides excellent features. They can probably work on providing priority support to first-time users.
pros_text: I like that they solved a very complicated process of handling customer issues in a very easy way. Their suite provides features that help us humanize the live chat and use natural language with the customers. I can customize some of the replies in a very conversational way. Moreover, I can combine it with multiple channels like email, chat, voice, or messaging, i.e., they allow me to choose the interface I want to use for different parts of my business. It is an excellent service-first CRM software that helps me handle support, sales, marketing, customer engagement, ticketing, etc. all in one place.Additionally, they support more than 50 languages, helping me expand my business across borders.
cons_text: I did not like that they did not provide me with a personal manager to set up the suite in the initial days. Only after repeated reminders, they provided me with some help. I felt somewhere, that you need to be pro-member in order to get quick responses from them.

title: Great to keep up with customer service things.
overall_text: Pros:I like that you can sort things by their specifics depending on what the report is about, and that you can make public and private comments.
pros_text: Cons:I do not like that there is no delete button for spam and unwanted emails, you have to edit the report and mark it as solved.

title: Makes communication easy.
overall_text: Pros:Makes communicating with internal teams and external teams organized, plus automates some workload. They have a great support team as well.
pros_text: Cons:For the triggers and automations you can use, it seems like there are a few solutions that would be supported out of the box that aren't.

title: Live chat and smooth social media integration
overall_text: Pros:What we liked the most is the capability to create agents and centralize all the social media and other applications like whatsapp communication via Zend Desk. We have one place in which we manage all the communication efficiently.
pros_text: Cons:Some of the third party integrations are not very easy to set up and there are few bits of the documentation that is outdated.

title: Good ticketing platform

pros_text: Cons:Although it does the job well for the price we pay there are far to many features that cost extra or ar simply not available unless you get a third-party marketplace app.

title: great helpdesk system for startups
overall_text: Pros:I love that it is an efficient helpdesk system - very easy to use, respond to queries, and monitor progress of complaints. Running a small business means you are in a critical stage of building your customer pool and making sure that you provide excellent customer support- that's what Zendesk is all about. Making sure that you're on track and nothing falls through the cracks!
pros_text: Cons:I receive double notifications sometimes which can be confusing especially if you already closed the ticket. Sometimes, the issue was already resolved but then I receive a notification about it.

cons_text: It was very expensive per user and the HR and IT division was not very robust. We did not want to put our sensitive HR data in the system.

title: Zendesk is a great way to start working

pros_text: that we can manage the incoming emails and calls in a better way, and that gives us the opportunity to improve our service to the customers, by training our agents in the topics we see they have any issues or doubts

title: Zendesk Suite - Review

title: The best Helpdesk Software
overall_text: Minus the price - Zendesk has been awesome. It has all the features that you could want, and it's also very easy to customize and extend the product. Our team enjoys working within it (compared to some other tools) and they are definitely an industry-leader in the area.
pros_text: Zendesk, to me, is the best helpdesk software out there. It has very powerful tools and it's very easy to use and customize. It has almost any task which you would want as part as your Support system.
cons_text: The biggest Con for me is the price...while Zendesk is super awesome, it also comes with a super price and is on the more expensive end of helpdesk tools.

title: Great support product with truly great support
overall_text: Pros:The system is easy to use and get up and running. Zendesk support is really out of this world , quick and very helpful. The ticketing system does everything we needed and more, it allowed us to expand our support system because of the added features.
pros_text: Cons:Zendesk, helpcentre and Zendesk ticketing is great, Zendesk chat and Community is really rubbish. The chat is barely functional and has very limited options, the community is not worth the effort of setting it up. Documentation on both are out of date, things like gamification are mentioned online but no longer supported for community.

title: Very good overall.

title: Zendesk Review
overall_text: Pros:I love that the tool is easy to deploy, use, and train for new users.
pros_text: Cons:I don't like that the administration tab takes you to completely different sites. It's a challenge to find and edit some features.

title: Great Solution for Customer Support System
overall_text: Overall, this software has made our customer support experience for our custom software solutions much easier than previous solutions we have integrated. For the time it saves and the reliability of the service, this software becomes well worth the money spent.
pros_text: The best part of this software is it's ease-of-use. One of the most recent projects we implemented this software in was a employee management system for a staffing company. The integration allowed the users of the software to quickly report bugs or ask any questions they had regarding the system we built and we were able to have our developers answer any questions at ease.
cons_text: The one issue we ran into while using this software is it's lack of specific features unless you upgrade to the enterprise level. This became an issue because for smaller clients, it would be nice to have the enterprise features like change management, but the budget is difficult to justify with a client who is budget restrained.

title: Like a broadsword, or an artsy film: Powerful, but often hard to grasp.
overall_text: It works well, just tough to get going. I have been using it for months and I am still unclear as to many aspects of the program.
pros_text: The tremendous level of granularity that one can parse support data down to. It makes our individual metrics reporting a breeze.
cons_text: The horrendous level of granularity that is available for creating custom views. the standards do not show the most pertinent information to me, but when trying to create a custom, I get lost in the options and how they are sorted. If I want them sorted by a particular metric such as who was the last to update I don't know why there would need to be an Ascending or Decending. Then I get confused as to which was which, so some of my views need to be re-ordered by clicking one of the columns at the top every time I use it. I am sure if I took the time to learn what every one of the 75 column options are I would be able to sort it out no problem. But in the words of Sweet Brown: Ain't Nobody got time for that.

title: Une suite de gestion client complète

title: Average, Run of the Mill Ticketing Software
overall_text: This product is a solid choice for your help desk/ticketing system needs.It is not the best on the market but it meets the majority of our company's needs especially if the price is reasonable.
pros_text: The end user interface for this software is very straight forward and allows for some customization.The UI is clean and easy to navigate.The product is also reliable.I have never encountered any significant down time.
cons_text: Having not used this software as an administrator, I am not sure how easy this is to run.The feature stack that I have interacted for this product with seems to be mediocre when compared to others in the industry.

title: Effective customer experience tool
overall_text: Zendesk is a simple, easy to use platform to manage our website communications with customers who either are looking to purchase or have purchased from us. If gives our company a sense of confidence in that our customers experience remains at a high level.
pros_text: Our website customers can directly communicate to our Customer Service/Sales team on any product questions or purchase issues they may have. It allows us to address everything efficiently and effectively, with a paper trail.
cons_text: There is not anything to dislike about this software as it is ridiculously effective in servicing our customers and is effortless to use.

title: Zendesk for All of Us
overall_text: Overall, it is very good. I was able to organize all my ticket by creating my own views and I was able to call the staff from different countries efficiently. Connection is almost smooth depending on your internet connection. You can call them via their phone or cellular phone.
pros_text: I like that calls are being recorded. Managers and the quality team can review each call and help employees under them improve by pinpointing the wrong thing that they did. You'll know the results of the surveys and you'll be able to review why they gave the survey by reading given comments as well.
cons_text: There are little glitches sometimes. It will show you that the call recording is 4 hours, even though it is just for 4 minutes.

title: So easy to keep track of customer requests, I'd say it improved my customer communication greatly!
overall_text: Very happy with Zendesk! Would see myself and the teams using it for the future too :)
pros_text: Tracking task developmentHistory of communicationSearch filters are A+Great notification system
cons_text: Wish I had more freedom in categorizing my tickets.

title: Love the Product!
overall_text: Pros:Love the interface. The help center, in particular, is well structured and very customizable. TThe ticketing system is also very intuitive.
pros_text: Cons:Not really any cons. This product really understands how customer support should be handled. Highly recommend.

title: Easy to use ticket management tool
overall_text: very easy to use and see all tickets made work a lot easier than you would expect
pros_text: its quick and easy to write and answer tickets from the system. there is a lot of room to maneuver in the system itself and when in need of support in regards to the account it is also readily available, use this when working with call centre agents having IT issues they would log a ticket and receive it at my end i will look into the issue and respond with a fix nice and easy
cons_text: the movile application need to be improved as when you go in it some ticket views are not available on there

title: Their customer services is absolutely outstanding. And not in a good way.
overall_text: Pros:The product does what its supposed to do in terms of chat and support. It provides a pop up on your website that people can easily find.
pros_text: Cons:The software has some bugs and difficulties in usage. However the most concerning thing is that when anything goes wrong, and in life this always happens, the customer service team are argumentative and place blame back on you. This happened three times involving over 20 interactions. An accidental internal email was sent to me which revealed how Zendesk views its customers and this is no accident. I've heard similar stories elsewhere.

title: The better of your CRM options

cons_text: Better full picture aspects, such as reading pho e number format despite input

title: Excellent customer service tool

title: Would recommend
overall_text: Delivering support through various channels can be intricate, but there's no need for your customers to be aware of that. With the Support Suite, your company can engage in seamless conversations with customers, all while shielding them from the operational complexities in the background. This solution is both advanced, catering to intricate requirements, and user-friendly, enabling you to start smoothly without delay.
pros_text: The versatility and ability to create custom reports
cons_text: Can think of nothing negative so far. In general, my experience with Zendesk has been highly gratifying. The platform boasts numerous exceptional attributes that contribute to our ability to deliver excellent customer support, a vital component for achieving business success.
