title: Tantalizing and vaguely religious
overall_text: Pros:I like the ticketing system in general.It is amazing.It keeps everything in order.It tracks everything incredibly.I know what everything is related to, when I've touched it, who else has touched it, I can pass it on to others easily, I can take over things quickly.Its so freaking perfect I love this software
pros_text: Cons:The thing I least like is that it sometimes screws up when you send emails to other Zendesk's.It seems like they keep triggering each other so sometimes we have automated emails sent back even when we close tickets internally.

title: Awesome management of tickets and projects
overall_text: Organization and efficiency
pros_text: The organization and the ability on setting up the organization is a huge difference maker for IT support managing support issues and client projects. It's super easy to create and assign tickets. Zendesk also makes it possible and easy to use add-ins from third parties
cons_text: Sometimes the site or app is a little buggy and slow but it has only improved over time and isn't that bad anymore.

title: It is very simple to write and respond to tickets in the system. Nice layout that is easy to navigat
overall_text: We've been able to beat industry standards on first reply time and customer satisfaction, despite significant ticket volume. While our people have much to do with that, it was definitely more difficult before we had Zendesk.
pros_text: Zendesk has much it does well, but most beneficial to us is the overall self-service approach the suite takes. The customer-facing portal with its knowledge base is first class in and of itself, but even better is how the knowledge base is tied into ticket workflow. It's incredibly helpful to have the KB integrated into the queue, and be able to quickly search for and include articles in customer responses. Zendesk is the best at making this whole process easier for the agent.
cons_text: Not much here to dislike, but at some point it would behoove Zendesk to upgrade its widget to allow for more interactions than simply searching the knowledge base and creating a ticket. More of a user experience there would be helpful.

title: Zendesk is my main portal for client communication.
overall_text: Pros:The ease of use between multiple agents makes client communication much easier. Sharing tickets far better than email!
pros_text: Cons:The biggest con is the formatting of emails is removed once sent from the end user, making it difficult to communicate at times.

title: Zendesk is Expensive, but has all the features
overall_text: Good experience. No complaints other than the price of the product.
pros_text: We're not using everything that we could with Zendesk and it does the job well. There are many features available however it's all pay to play so we haven't used them.
cons_text: For what we need it for, using for customer support of Shopify sites, it's expensive and there are other less expensive options out there.

title: Everyday tool: Zendesk
overall_text: Pros:It's very easy-to-use tool with tones of free great apps. By far, it has great usability. Also analytical tools are great.
pros_text: Cons:Costs are bit problem. If you have large number of teams, costs are becoming high. Also form development is a bit hard.

title: Zendesk makes Github what it should be
overall_text: Pros:It is amazing to see what Zenhub fixes about Github, you can use it as a JIRA replacement if you want and not break a sweat!
pros_text: Cons:Sometimes it is a little slow, but I imagine that is happening because of user growth and that is something hard to avoid.

title: Good needs improvement
overall_text: My advice to people generally is if you’re implementing a new system like this, especially in a grid of technology, please please please hire someone who is versed. Pay the money for the set up. Pay the money for someone who can educate someone else in your company
pros_text: I mean I could almost in certain ways compare it to QuickBooks, and that it is at enterprise software and will definitely take some work.Great for management, automated support to customers, flexibility of purchasing packages and tools. Some of the tools such as the ability to select a lot of tickets and close them at the same time( for example if you had a Web problem) is great. A previous review that I had to read described it as a robust. I agree.
cons_text: I have to be honest with you to say that I don’t use the system, I was part of the decision to implement the system, and ultimately advisory. That said, the biggest complaint that I have seen has been navigating through help forum/help desk, And integrating many of the smaller attributes that might benefit you… But I meant to say is you may not see all of your options; they are there, you just may not see them.

title: Zendesk for Live Chat! Perfect
overall_text: Its a great tool but a little pricey for small businesses.

cons_text: Data misses out while uploading or exporting the data. I am not sure if its issue with the tool or its something that I am missing.

title: Great way to offer customer support in a friendly and easy avenue

title: Transformed the way I do business

The bulk text messaging has been awesome for me reaching different target groups and building new and lasting relationships with clients
pros_text: Cons:There isnt much not to like about this software, there have been times when I have had to log out and log back in because it was not running correctly. But not anything that is of real concern to me about the software. Over all I really think this is a great program

title: Support Manager
overall_text: We enjoy using the tool for all of our support needs
pros_text: Ease of use. Our Support Team uses this directly to handle client support tickets and communication.
cons_text: Not being able to customize whether a ticket is created or not based on an incoming email.

title: Zendesk is great for tracking support emails as well as metrics on those emails.
overall_text: Pros:I like how customizable Zendesk is. We can have different categories available to track emails with that can be unique to the inbox the email was sent to. There's also great metrics available on volume and response time so we can track our team's efficiency.
pros_text: Cons:The custom reporting feature is not very user friendly. It's by no means unusable, but it's not as nice as the rest of Zendesk.

title: ZenDesk Chat - Easy to Use, Easy to Integrate!
overall_text: Again, easy way for customers to reach out instantaneously if they need further assistance! Which they usually do, because our products can be pretty difficult to sort through.
pros_text: ZenDesk Chat was very easy to integrate into our e-commerce website, which was great! Users seem to love interacting with it, and it provides us another medium through which our customers can interact (other than a phone call or email - this provides a quicker response time too). Our products are highly engineered, so the ability of users to reach out with questions or more information that they need is invaluable!
cons_text: I feel like other chatting platforms have a better look and feel that the ZenDesk Chat platform. Drift and Hubspot Chat are good examples - they look much more polished.

title: Why we recommend Zendesk

title: Zendesk is THE solution for call center support!
overall_text: I would recommend ZenDesk to businesses of ALL sizes, the flexibility of the software allows for scaling as your company grows and allows your Call Center teams to maximize their time spent addressing issues and ultimately help the customer, at a quicker pace! Love ZenDesk!
pros_text: As aprior Manager of a Helpdesk team, Zendesk has made managing open tickets seamless and efficient!The follow-up feature is amazing to get the attention of agents and allows to prioritize various streams of work. My team has definitely increased efficiencies and decreased open ticket times!
cons_text: The reporting features, while great visually, can take a bit of time to load up the correct details. I'd like to see a template based feature to allow quick creations of standard reports needed as a call center Manager

title: Zendesk usage
overall_text: It's pretty good, it was the very first tool I learned about and it never disappoints, I've learned alot from it
pros_text: I love that it allows me to separate channels and my absolute favourite is that it pushes all the open any the back so they don't mix with new tickets
cons_text: I cannot say I have a least but if I had to say it would be being rate on spot, I don't like seeing my bad ratings

title: Zendesk - Effective Ticket Support Software
overall_text: Apart from the fact that Zendesk provides centralized support and data for general enquiries, it facilitates a powerful reporting of customer satisfaction surveys. Zendesk software incorporates a large number of Apps such as Mailchimp, Shopify, Xero and others.It also creates an infused knowledge base for users and customers alike.
pros_text: Zendesk is one the best virtual open ticket support software which allows remote support agents to action and responds to multiple tickets in order to avoid backlogging and providing solution to complaints, request and enquiries. The software fosters better client engagement with chat and real-time messaging systems. It can be used on a mobile device or on the desktop.
cons_text: Data export challenge of Zendesk software a great difficulty in managing data to both JSON and CSV files. Having advanced features like triggers and automation in the subscription package turned out to be too steep.

title: Customer support platform
overall_text: I use this to help monitor agent performance and occasionally track down support tickets for users. It is a wonderful tool. The agents seem to love the user interface, and our management uses the reporting features regularly.
pros_text: I like that it’s very simple to find support tickets using Zendesk, and the reporting capabilities give us visibility into how our agents our performing on any given day (or predefined date range).
cons_text: The tagging could be improved. It’s a bit confusing when searching by tags because it includes all tickets that contain those tags in the body as text as well. Searching overall could be improved as well.

title: This review is from the Administrator side, not from IT side.
overall_text: Pros:I'm the network and sys admin for government. IT asked me to install and configure zendesk for their use. The installation and deployment was great and easy. This days zendesk its almost an standar software for helpdesk. Was easy to configure and start using it by the IT people. Has all the options that you need to give support to the computers on a large network.
pros_text: Cons:None for now. At least from the administration side. Easy to maintain and backup. I did not hear any complain from IT since they started using it. (6 month now)

title: Great Call Center for businesses of all sizes

pros_text: Cons:The implantation process was going to take longer and cost too much so we did not sign with them

title: Zendesk is popular average product for support

pros_text: Cons:Zendesk is not good for IT Support Help Desk & for IT need we had to switch to other platform.

title: Zendesk was a great place for ticketing systems, both internal and customer-facing
overall_text: Pros:I liked the ticketing system concept, that all of the relevant information was stored in one place and you could easily include people and they could find all of the context themselves.
pros_text: Cons:I thought there was a lot of training involved to get it all set up and working properly but once the training was complete, everything was pretty smooth
cons_text: Switched From:Jira

title: Zendesk is easy to get adapted to
overall_text: Well, the tool helps us in communicating to clients through responding to their tickets across different channels
pros_text: I like the user interface that makes ticket filtering so easier from the latest to the oldest and hence giving you where to start from, you can integrate it with social media platforms and respond to clients from one tool
cons_text: It is so expensive and does not have any free version as like other software on the market, and require more technical training to use it fully and understand it well

title: Best marketing department ever!
overall_text: Pros:Zendesk has an excellent marketing team who design their advertising, customer engagement campaigns and marketing website. The application itself is pretty good overall, easy to use in it's basic implementation, and fairly straightforward for admins. If it didn't go offline, have glitches, or break, it would be excellent.
pros_text: Cons:This application is critical to our business but happens to be somewhat unstable, occasionally losing a ticket or two here and there and making for irate customers (I can't blame them). The chat function is frequently unavailable, and the whole site sometimes becomes slow and unresponsive taking hours to receive tickets. The functionality of the site is also unstable on the web portal, where text formatting breaks from time to time, and the html has to be manually fixed. Support for any of these problems has been less than satisfactory for a company that makes a living on claims of outstanding support. None of this is clear until you have used the system for some time, which says a lot for the marketing efforts, but makes it hard to evaluate in a short span of time. Perhaps enterprise level customers get better support efforts.

title: Bon logiciel
overall_text: Pros:Ce logiciel est très bon d'utilisation surtout dans des projets marketing rapide,sa me permet vite de communiquer mes chiffres d'affaires dans le monde entier
pros_text: Cons:Ce logiciel est magnifique qui m'aide beaucoup dans mes projets de chiffres d'affaires c'est pourquoi je l'aime à utiliser

title: Great for support but also knowledge management
overall_text: It’s been one of the most tools for me in a new role. Having direct access with out support team but also being able to use it as a resource to troubleshoot issues for my customers on my own as well.
pros_text: Zendesk has a great interface and you never lose the tickets you’ve opened during a session which can make it really easy to work between tickets. Great internal collaboration features as well help to get to the bottom of issues more quickly.
cons_text: While the interface is user friendly it seems a little outdated and good use a little revamp. But other than that no majors downsides.

title: Zendesk, Great for Staying Organized
overall_text: Pros:It's so helpful with keeping our team organized and making sure that work is delegated equally and attended to.
pros_text: Cons:sometimes emails duplicated and were not distributed properly but was rare. It was a bit hard to navigate remotely.

title: Straight forward live chat service
overall_text: Overall, Zendesk Chat does as you'd expect. The macros are wonderful.
pros_text: The ability to utilise macros can really speed up the level of customer service. We implement macros for the most common questions which can make responding as simple as one click.
cons_text: Occasionally, when doing work on a different tab, the live chat will disconnect and the agent will appear offline and not receive notifications.

title: Overall great choice for customer support tickets
overall_text: Ease of use, Low cost for small team
pros_text: Fairly easy to set up and maintain. Ability to track new tickets, customize views, workflow, etc. Customer support addresses any questions or issues within 24 hours.
cons_text: Wish it had more features with basic plans, but you must upgrade and pay more for some basic features (like support ratings). Would like to see more integrations with other popular software.

title: Zendesk - best tickets application
overall_text: Pros:Ease to manage tickets, nice notifications and a lot of features.
pros_text: Cons:There is no such thing, everything is pretty good, of course you can always complain about the pricing.

title: Easy customer support channel and support documentation portal
overall_text: Pros:The ability to draft support documents and point people to them from within customer service requests has been great. In addition, being able to integrate Zendesk into the backend of our platform has given our clients the ability to feel supported in all aspects of their experience.
pros_text: Cons:On occasion it's been difficult for us to keep multiple people in the loop on a customer support ticket when a ticket will come in through one channel vs. another. That said, when we've hit an issue the customer service team has been immediately on it, helping out in all ways they can.

title: Probably best online product for small businesses
overall_text: Overall very positive and I would recommend it.
pros_text: Easy to use and set up. Great broad set of features.
cons_text: Can be difficult sometimes to find info on a specific problem and I do find it hard to set up knowledgebase for common queries in our business.

title: Zendesk is my best friend.
overall_text: Pros:Zendesk business rules such as triggers and automations are robust and work so well. Macros and views make day to day support a breeze.
pros_text: Cons:Would love if Zendesk had the ability to link related tickets to a customer profile.

title: Easy for Users and Admins
overall_text: Positive experience overall and I would recommend to future orgs that I work with/for. The external users/customers have always had a great experience as well, which is a huge benefit for any org.
pros_text: Setup and integration was smooth, and what support we did require was quick and helpful. Customization that would align with our brand standards was fast and simple. Reporting, KB article creation/management, and end user (internal and customer) experience were all fantastic.
cons_text: Could be a little pricey based on what we needed to utilize. Some of the backend customization on the admin side took a little time to get used to, but after that it was simple.

title: Zen
overall_text: Pros:easy tokeep track of IT requests and histry of conversation comes in the form of an email

title: Zendesk is an easy-to-use customer service tool that's resulted in faster responses and no lost ti
overall_text: Easier issue tracking and no lost tickets. We used to have a hard time keeping track of issues in our support email and which user was taking care of it.
pros_text: I love that these items don't get lost in our Support email inbox. Everything is tracked and the owner is clearly defined. We can also add tags and discover which are our most common issues and from there we develop new items to make our clients lives easier.

title: Great tool for small businesses
overall_text: Pros:This is fantastic CRM tool for little size companies, it enables us to keep worldwide inquires efficient in a prompt way. We have the ability to minimize the spam and to improve our procedures
pros_text: Cons:The combination with facebook messaging is not terrific, as quickly as we changed to Zendesk we do not get alerts about facebook messages when we respond,it looks like brand-new messages

title: Our partner for support
overall_text: Pros:I appreciate the possibility to work with tickets. Easy transfer between colleagues.
pros_text: Cons:We're still in the early stages and haven't decided if we're going to use it.
cons_text: Switched From:FreeScout,Help ScoutandZoho Desk

title: It's a standard for a reason
overall_text: Overall ZenDesk is fantastic. My complaints are minor but do require human intervention to deal with. Multiple teams can work in ZenDesk and achieve support solutions. Ultimately it's great.
pros_text: Zendesk makes scaling ticket serving a reality. Multiple teams, goals, metrics, priorities. It's all there. API integration - you got it. Integration with alternate support apps like chats, you got it! Not too bad.
cons_text: The API functionality at a surface level looks broad however its functionality is questionable. Retaining information and linking tickets is generally non functional.

title: Great tool for customer support
overall_text: Overall, Zendesk is a great tool that we use to handle emails and user support. While I would love for the multiple agents quirk to be resolved, it still works perfectly as it is.
pros_text: The assigning system is the thing we love the most about Zendesk. It makes it really easy for everyone to escalate tickets to their correct place in the chain.
cons_text: Occasionally, Zendesk will have issues processing when multiple agents are logged into the same account. This can make it very tricky when we are trying to onboard new agents, as they may get locked out without knowing what to do next.

title: Zendesk Suite Review
overall_text: Pros:This software really helped me a lot when it comes to assisting customers. It's very easy to navigate
pros_text: Cons:Sometimes the software lags and it affects my productivity.

title: Zendesk tool is a great help to business.
overall_text: Most of our driver's inquiry are communicated through Zendesk so it greatly affect our business if we can't be able to use this tool. It's very essential to us.
pros_text: I like it have compass east and west sections where important details are very visible.
cons_text: I encounter most errors and latency when solving tickets using this tool. It have to be refresh every time.

title: Most popular helpdesk
overall_text: Pros:I used Zendesk as user and it provides great customer support. They believe in customer satisfaction which is important for any product
pros_text: Cons:I think it is little bit expensive as compared to others but except that it is still best in market.

title: Great communication with sales teams
overall_text: Pros:I like the ease of access to have visibility into large amounts of tickets. The categories to divide between work nice.
pros_text: Cons:The functionality of viewing your own personal tickets can get confusing. There's a lack in finding what tickets you specifically own and timelines around them.

title: Great software for customer support
overall_text: Pros:Zendesk is vey easy to deploy and use. It took less that a week to get entire customer support team acquinted with the software. This tool helped reduce our turn around time to customers. Great investment for a company.
pros_text: Cons:There are limitations to analytics on Zendesk. Would be great to integrate text recognition and auto generated solutions.

title: Great ticket system
overall_text: all tickets
pros_text: i used Zendesk from 2014 for all our clients requests and it still works great for us. Also I love slack integration.
cons_text: Pricing is not feet startup's needs. Probably you can find more affordable solution if you need to.

title: Instrumental in giving a good customer experience
overall_text: Overall, I wouldn't want to use another software. We're able to use Zendesk to reach our customers and give them the best experience possible.
pros_text: I like how user-friendly Zendesk is. It makes providing a good customer experience as simple as possible. I like that you can integrate other apps into Zendesk!
cons_text: Occasionally there are outages or glitches, but overall Zendesk works well the majority of the time.

title: ZenDesk is useful but needs a bit more
overall_text: Pros:The software is great to use for reporting and keeping track of tickets for chats, calls, and emails.
pros_text: Cons:The speed of the program - it seems to be really slow most of the time. Also the layout of the site needs to be reworked - the New button at the top should be moved in order to prevent accidental clicks, the notifications need to be moved so they don't get in front of other features.

title: We have used Zendesk for 5+ years and it's made support much easier!

title: A Complete Omni Channel...
overall_text: We have a contact center; and we need to communicate wit hour customer through different channel, i.e. Social Media, Chat, Call etc. Zendesk gives you a platform to interact with the customer on a single platform.
pros_text: The reporting tool gives you detailed business insights.The rules feature can delete unnecessary or junk message automatically also, you can route the ticket to relevant person via rules features. It's a user friendly application; you might won't need to train your staff on Zendesk. If they have basic knowledge of omini channel. Multi-channel support: email, web, phone, chat, social media.Knowledge base portal and community forums included.
cons_text: You might need technical staff to configured or deploy Zendesk in your organization. It's bit expensive, if you want to avail all features.

title: Zendesk is an end-to-end Answer for Support
overall_text: Working with ZenDesk has been great. We've been with them for years and have had a great experience with them.
pros_text: Since ZenDesk is PAAS the setup was minimal, testing easy and it's really been set and forget for a long time.
cons_text: I had to do a little fancy footwork when it came to managing how we send email to ZenDesk, but otherwise there is very little to complain about ZenDesk.

title: Zendesk tracking customer issues
overall_text: Pros:Zendesk is a great system to track customer reported bugs/issues as well as internally reported bugs/issues
pros_text: Cons:Sometimes customers open multiple tickets accidentally, but that's more their own confusion than the software

title: Low cost support system
overall_text: Pros:The support service on our website is arranged through Zendesk - an inexpensive system that meets the needs of the company. Working with tickets is carried out in three ways - a trigger, a macro and an automator. There is integration with CRM. A large set of features saves our time.
pros_text: Cons:I did not find any disadvantages when working with this software. The interface in our team was handled in a couple of hours, it took about a week to set up the system for our needs. Now interaction with customers is put on a higher level.

title: Zendesk Helps
overall_text: Has lot of great features to provide great customer support.
pros_text: Yes. Simple to navigate and has third party integration.
cons_text: A little bit of pricey and very minimal support at all.

title: Good tool for sharing support load within a team.
overall_text: Tracking support correspondence with zendesk lets us speed up issue resolution times because issues can be easily shared amongst a team, maintaining the full correspondence history and aren't delayed in someone's email inbox.I sometimes get confused about which list I'm viewing though and pricing goes up significantly once you move past a small team.We also use the integration with slack and twilio for notification of urgent issues.
pros_text: Customer can interact via emails
cons_text: interface a bit confusing

title: Zendesk for SMEs
overall_text: We used it as a helpdesk and support desk. It is doing the job well, and reliable but we would like to see more features - particularly in the customization and web pages design.
pros_text: Easy to setup and bring it online. Allows sharing of tickets and multi-users. Merging of tickets and coordination between ticket-owners.
cons_text: The documentation editing is painful if needing to use tables or pictures. It works for text and pictures easily but once you need more sophisticated template, it becomes painful.

title: Zendesk Suite Review
overall_text: Pros:It has multi-channel support and provides very detailed analytics and reporting

title: Not Loving it/Not Hating it

pros_text: Cons:the apps, sometimes the trackers give inaccurate information so you need to add another app to get the correct information.

title: Great Ticketing System
overall_text: I love zendesk and find it pretty easy to use. I like how useful it is in everyday business setting.
pros_text: Zendesk has many integrations and also different triggers. This allows you to have tickets auto-assigned to specific agents with ease. I enjoy integrations with many different programs. Its been super helpful to my team as a ticketing system. Having internal notes makes it easy for us to keep track of requests.
cons_text: I dislike that there is little functionality with Zapier or google forms. I wish it were a little easier there to create a ticket when someone fills out a form.

title: Zendesk magic
overall_text: So far its been great! I have no complaints with this yet
pros_text: Zendesk is such a wonderful tool for call centers. I have worked in several. This software helps keep everything right in front of you (call history,customer information, etc) so its very easy to access.
cons_text: Probably not the easiest user interface I have ever seen, but once you get the hang of it this is an awesome app.

title: Zendesk, atiende a tus clientes de manera eficaz

pros_text: Es bastante sencilla de utilizar, ningún empleado ha tenido problemas con el software. Hemos mejorado notablemente la respuesta en los tickets y, con ello, la atención al cliente. Nos permite resolver problemas con clientes de manera rápida y eficaz.
cons_text: Su precio es algo elevado en comparación con el resto de herramientas del mismo estilo.

title: A very convenient and ergonomic tool to gainproductivity

pros_text: It's a very complete and easy-to-use working tool.
cons_text: The ticket service could be simpler and have automatic deletion times.

title: Zendesk Overall
overall_text: Pros:To say the least. The ticketing system is very useful and not to forget the ease of use, and understanding. We mostly use it for Help Desk but it has greatly simplified many workloads since it was implemented.
pros_text: Cons:Nothing at the moment really. Previously we had VMware's Dynamic Environment Manager and other VMware products integrated but it was not very user friendly to some of my colleagues so we had to switch.
cons_text: Reasons for Choosing Zendesk Suite:Ease of use and Manageability Features

title: It has evolved over the years to the amazing CRM it is today
overall_text: Pros:How far it came. With Zendesk Explore you have a whole new platform just for analytics.
pros_text: Cons:The time it took for Zendesk to invest in having better reporting and analytical data.

overall_text: Automation Anywhere, Inc. had many processes which involved extensive usage of excel spreadsheet for compiling the data and generating the reports. We were not happy with the one software as it had it's own limitations in generating reports, tickets assignments..etc. In due course of time it became very difficult for us to maintain the spreadsheets and extract reports. We started evaluating Zendesk extensively and found that it was way ahead of it's competitors in terms of ease of use and we strongly felt that we got the right helpdesk software. It's now one year and 6 months and we are very happy, and pleased, to be associated with Zendesk. Implementation of Zendesk was not that difficult. The Support team was very cooperative and helped us right from the word go, and even suggested better solutions forour queries. The training curve of Zendesk is so short that it does not take much time for my support experts to learn it. Our support experts are now comfortable in using Zendesk. After using Zendesk now we are able to measure the KPI's of our support experts very easily and we are happy to say that we do not use excel spread sheet to maintain our customer's data. In fact, after the implementation of Zendesk, the next step was the integration of Zendesk with Sales Force - which was successful and helped our support team and Sales team getting connected. To conclude - We are happy and love to be associated with Zendesk.

title: Established Ecosystem
overall_text: Zendesk Suite allowed me to get my business up and running in a matter of days compared to re-creating the wheel.I saved a ton of money by utilizing Zendesk Suite instead of developing from scratch.
pros_text: Established Ecosystem with tons of integrations and numerous tools to easily automate your business processes.This is your one stop shop
cons_text: Bit pricey, however the features are present.

title: Zendesk Mis-Representation
overall_text: Very, very disappointed.I would not recommend this company to anyone.
pros_text: Lacking functionality needed, we did not receive functionality that was provided in the trial.Zendesk played the upsell game by forcing the user to upgrade to get the functionality that was in the trial.Hard to trust this company
cons_text: Zendesk was dishonest when providing a trial.We signed up for the trial and then purchased the software only to find out that we did not get all the functionality that they provided in the free trial. Then it even gets worse, to be able to include company names, create groups and create reports, the upgrade is four times more than the price of the entry level product.We are looking into other solutions as we are concerned as to what other surprises we may encounter.

title: Good for starters

title: Brilliant helpdesk
overall_text: The experience with Zendesk Suite has been complementary.

title: Great idea, really bad....
overall_text: I know the say 40,000 customers, but I question how many are happy.We're small, we manage under 10 websites that need unique customer service emails.We have a few agents, some need to see all sites, others just 1.We just wanted basic email tickets from inbound email, assign to the right person, reply, all syncs up... not too much to ask.We're about 4 months in, and its been a pretty horrible experience.While customer service does answer the phone at Zen, getting the same answer twice is rare.You basically need a PHD in Zen and very few, even at the company have it.I suppose a large company pays them to do it or has a dedicated IT Zen guy on it and gets his own PHD in Zendesk.But we're small (under $10M).I gave it 2 stars, as the staff is very nice, and eager to help.And they do claim they can do it.We're pretty savvy, and figure most things out.Zen got close, but really, they're not for the small company like us.I didn't like that they bait and switched us with free live chat, and 2 weeks after, they asked us to pay for it?odd.We were thinking of using the phone system, but I can't review that as we couldn't even get the email ticket system to work, so I just don't trust it.We lost thousands in sales with lost tickets.At one point, they had marked days of emails all as spam that were legitimate emails.
pros_text: Friendly customer service
cons_text: Too many to list and complex issues.

title: Improves Customer Care
overall_text: Overall our customer service response time has improved tremendously. Customers are happy with quick responses. We don't always have the answers they are looking for when we get back to them, but we want to at least respond letting them know that we're handling it.
pros_text: It has every email sent to our support box set up as a ticket. We have a few office personnel and each takes 2 hours a day, every day (M-F) where they answer customer questions, calls, emails within a 5-15 minute period of time.
cons_text: I don't have too many cons yet, I'd say responding to emails without sending to the requester is something I need to look into with the support page. We have a receptionist company we use to field calls, so when they email our support box we don't necessarily want to email them back, but rather put the customer's email address in that spot instead and email them. This could be an option, just haven't had the time to check yet.

title: Problems solved!

overall_text: Experience is good, but reporting is a must feature across all plans ranging from basic to premium.
pros_text: Easy access to portal from all screens ie mobile to laptop
cons_text: Reports or Tickets dump as a default feature across all plans.

title: I used Zendesk at my previous role and loved it.
overall_text: Pros:I loved the layout of Zendesk and how easy and clear it was to use. At my previous job, it was our primary way to communicate with customers, so I used it all day.
pros_text: Cons:I wish Zendesk had been better about duplicating repeat requests from customers. This is a common customer service issue, and so far, I've never seen it successfully done with any other software.

title: I've implemented and manage our Zendesk helpdesk system.
overall_text: Pros:This product is great, I love their hosted solution. This allows us to avoid buying expensive server hardware to host their application in house. I was able to work with their support team and get this help desk application rolled out in a few days. I've setup other help desk applications like Cerberus, osTicket etc. This was by far the easiest deployment I have performed.
pros_text: Cons:If I had to pick something, I would say their documentation presentation. It was a bit of a bear to navigate when I first started using them about 4 years ago. Since then, they have resolved that issue with a simpler interface for looking up documentation.

title: Zendesk is simply amazing!
overall_text: Pros:I love that it includes ALL of our channels of communication. Using an internet fax solution as well, we are able to do that through Zendesk. All of our communications with a client are through Zendesk, and the tickets can all be linked together. This gives us a better picture when reassigned to another agent, or if there is ever a need to escalate, we already know what the situation is.Customization and setup are ridiculously easy, and they have lots of on-demand training videos you can watch. These are paid for, but they are crazily effective and I highly recommend it!
pros_text: Cons:Price is heavy, but I don't find that they overcharge for what they give you. It's just something to get used to, and made us really decide if we wanted this, or if we should go with a different solution.Training videos ARE paid for, and only last for 30 days.

title: My experience with Zendesk
overall_text: Zendesk seems to be a great customer service tool, but I wouldlike it to be able to allow workers receiving emails/tickets to forward them for inspection when there is a question about their legitimacy.
pros_text: It is a great program for customer service management, streamlining work process flow and allowing for total tracking of tickets.
cons_text: Since I was on the InfoSec side of the house, I was always irritated with the fact that when a suspicious email came into the Zendesk system, our customer service agents could not forward the original email to use for investigation.

title: One of the best systems for call center management
overall_text: In general, it is a very advanced system for call center management.
pros_text: You can customize Macros, Triggers, Customizable Fields,
cons_text: I do not like that when you need to activate triggers you can not assign them to clients

title: One of the best software for Chat support
overall_text: Its best, but need extra improvement from UI Side
pros_text: User-friendly and upload file functionality.
cons_text: Sometime, it pops up without requirement of chat support

title: Zendesk Honest Review
overall_text: Pros:super easy and efficient way to assign and work emails for an org. i wish all my previous jobs used this!
pros_text: Cons:a few kinks here and there which can cause small annoyances. overall really great product!

title: Feeling your Feng shui with ZeDesk
overall_text: This software makes my daily job possible with ease and helps to keep track of all the little things we tend to not think about.
pros_text: The diverse ability this software contains is baffling!
cons_text: We have run into issues with ticket totals not being calculated correctly. Whether it is the software or human error is yet to be determined.

title: Zendesk
overall_text: Pros:Great product, we use it to answer customer's queries. It is ticket based solution, you do not have to be online to receive the query. When there are many tickets on the list you can sort them by different criteria, you can prioritize any of them. Perfect way to solve issues with customers!
pros_text: Cons:Haven't had issues with the same and it works good

title: Great Software
overall_text: Wounderful very easy to use....
pros_text: The software is so organized I love it..
cons_text: The subscription cost could be less expensive but overall I can afford it.

title: Extremely user friendly!
overall_text: Pros:This software is extremely user friendly. It helped greatly with customer/client engagement and I find the price worth it for the level of service.
pros_text: Cons:Customer support consistency could be improved on, I find that I'm often routed to multiple agents. They all do their job efficiently, though.

title: Easy to use helpdesk!
overall_text: Excellent
pros_text: Its very easy to setup and get going and just seems to work, its also quick compared to our old help desk. Has all the main features
cons_text: Cost, for some of the “core” features uve got to get the high plans which makes it very expensive but well worth the cost

title: Very good product
overall_text: Pros:This software was very easy to learn how to use, it has helped improve our productivity within the company since now our agents are better at handling chats with our customers.
pros_text: Cons:Have not found any cons at the moment. Their customer service has been great every time we have found any issue

title: All in one
overall_text: Pros:In a single platform you can collect, sort, manage dozens and dozens of emails and tickets.
pros_text: Cons:It is not always possible to organize the work to the fullest, however the features are quite advanced.

title: One of the industry leaders, but he gets paid
overall_text: Not an extraordinary experience, but still worthy of a tool so renowned and widespread in the market
pros_text: zendesk allows you to create in a very granular and detailed way the entities within your company, ticket management is versatile and well structured
cons_text: I would use Zendesk much more willingly and for more projects if it also allowed us to intuitively create dashboards for users, working in a more flexible and customizable way on the interface, even the ticket interface.

title: Zendesk
overall_text: Zendesk is great and really helps me dig into my accounts at a different level by seeing if there are any support needs.
pros_text: We work with a lot of instructors that use our products with students. Students often stateThey submitted support tickets zendesk makes it easy for me to track and ticket by school and find any trends or common issues to address quickly
cons_text: There are different levels of access and admin levels . At my level I can be tagged but I can’t tag which seems like a feature anyone should have and it slows me down sometimes

title: Zendesk para la atención de Emails
overall_text: Ha sido una experiencia muy agradable, una herramienta muy sencilla de usar, fácil de implementar y práctica.
pros_text: Es muy práctico, contiene la información necesaria para resolver las inquietudes de los usuarios.
cons_text: Que no tiene un tipo de filtrado que de tickets por nombre de caso.

title: Well thought-out interface
overall_text: Pros:Zendesk does a really good job of holding a lot of information and options, without being visually cluttered and distracting.
pros_text: Cons:There used to be a bar graph that showed tickets solved by hour. I liked to use that throughout the day to gauge my process, rather than waiting for the ticket roundup to look over the next day.

title: Zendesk is great for customer support
overall_text: Pros:State of the art integrations with a lot of other softwares.One of the best support team.Has a lot of useful reports and customer satisfaction surverys.Option to create rules to automatically file emails into groups.
pros_text: Cons:The navigation and search processes on the software could be better. A little bit expensive if you plan to use all the features.

title: Easy to Use
overall_text: Overall Zendesk is a good software to use for a growing business.
pros_text: It's easy to pick this software up in a day and understand the basics of using it.The integration with other services is nice as well.
cons_text: For the average user, it is easy to get lost in different links.Along with this, it can be difficult to utilize all of the features you have readily available.

title: Zendesk review for call centers
overall_text: Very satisficed.
pros_text: Easy access and handy for online help and references.
cons_text: Maybe creating tabs instead of opening new web pages for each topic,

title: Productivity tool
overall_text: Pros:Zendesk gathers all e-mails in one place and in an easy way, you can assign these messages to agents or groups in your organization. The history of all conversations with one client is easy to find.
pros_text: Cons:For beginner is not easy to navigate through the program. I will improve the UX.

title: It helped increase our satisfaction ratings dramatically.
overall_text: Pros:The user interface is easy to use and supported on multiple platforms. You can insert ticket content based on your customers preferred language so that our agents don't have to use Google translate to reply.
pros_text: Cons:Cost is different if you wish to use advance features which I think is still much too high compared to other platforms which offers the same.

title: Making Customer Service Management a breeze
overall_text: I am using Zendesk to answer customer queries regarding an ecommerce store through multiple platforms.
pros_text: The workflow - easy to open new tickets and classify them as needed. Macros are simple and efficient. It cuts down on time spent answering emails and messages, with everything synced to one place.
cons_text: Honestly, I don't know how I would have designed it better myself.

title: Zendesk is the platform that's the easiest to implment in your wordpress page.
overall_text: Creating widgets on WordPress based pages to make support tickets and live chat really easy.
pros_text: My team has enjoyed working with Zendesk especially for its modularity and features. It's easy to set up in any webpage based on WordPress to create a widget to manage support, tickets and even live chat. You can choose any of the above or all of them as easy as a line of code.
cons_text: At first, it may be overwhelming and support may happen to not answer the question you're looking for, but at least they put you in a good track.

title: Great for all in one work solution
overall_text: Very good once you know how to use it.
pros_text: Zendesk is great to have all order enquiries under one roof. There is no lost messages and you can track communication very easily on a ticket through the company.
cons_text: Can be glitchy sometimes and there is a lot to learn on how to use it before you can use it.

title: Web Developers view on zendesk
overall_text: it has been great in terms of managing everthing. communicatiion between clients, developers and CSMs is great. tracking reply threads and tagging people is a great help.
pros_text: 1.) integrating it into your site is easy.2.) tracking, sharing and documenting tickets send by clients is a life saver
cons_text: how it looks sometimes is annoying, needs improvement on ui/ux

title: Good Product but getting it set up is a task you are left to do on your own
overall_text: Pros:The layout, ability to BCC people, the ability to add articles to an automated answer. The integrations offered.
pros_text: Cons:The onboarding and support aren't amazing. You have to wait and they just keep sending you articles to answer the questions. Sometimes you need to talk to someone to get best practices, understand the issues with your integration attempts.

title: So robust that I don't think I access all the benefits of the system
overall_text: Pros:I love that it can do everything, or it integrates with pretty much everything. This has become the core of our fulfillment team, so we look for integrations around this software.
pros_text: Cons:I'm a pretty basic user, so all of the options confuse me at times. I realize there are people on my team that feel the opposite, but as a basic user it often feels like too much.

title: The best Customer Support Software Out There
overall_text: Don't waste your time and purchase it if you are considering.
pros_text: The Saleforce of customer support software it is top of class for a reason. Cheaper options out there but none that can offer the robustness of its product suite.
cons_text: Reporting from Zendesk is not as good as it could be. Also launching a CRM so this product will not be the focus of the company.

title: Lots of features and suitable for teams as they scale
overall_text: Ticketing systems feel like a war of attrition but I feel Zendesk sets up to figure out why we're getting the kinds of inquiries that we get. It's as customizable and customizable gets and we've got ours tailored to our needs.
pros_text: An all-in-one help desk with room to grow, shallow learning curve, responsive community.
cons_text: Can get pricy, sometimes slow, analytics are weak.

title: Expensive and watch the recurring billing
overall_text: Their customer service was really poor. They had a £600 recurring subscription enabled on sign up and would not even entertain cancelling this down when we were a day into the recurring payment. All their answers seem quite scripted and unhelpful (unless it's on the script!)
pros_text: We went for brand equity on our choice for a Customer Service platform and overall, a bit dissapointed. We don't really get the most use out of Zendesk and the powerups are expensive. Yes, it's slick and has plenty of ways to use it, but not ideal for the SME in cost v benefit
cons_text: Getting from chat to ticket logging and other features seems too fiddly. There are different products under the Zendesk banner and it just could be so much simpler.

title: Otima Ferramenta Para Atendimentos
overall_text: Pros:Ferramenta excelente. otimo custo e beneficio
pros_text: Cons:Programa excelente sem reclamações gostei muito

title: Zendesk has the tools
overall_text: Pros:Very robust platform for customer service.
pros_text: Cons:Because it is so robust it can take some time to setup properly.That said, it is ready to go in a basic mode with just a small amount of time involved.

title: Solid Customer Support Platform
overall_text: Pros:- easy to learn the software without extensive training- straightforward to write and answer tickets in the system- the support team is fantastic! great experience with answering questions- love the tags feature
pros_text: Cons:- analytics could be improved to help with analyzing the effectiveness- add-ons like Chat and Talk are expensive in my opinion

title: Customer Service made easy with Zendesk
overall_text: Pros:Easy to navigate which makes work easy and much more efficient.
pros_text: Cons:Past conversations or thread are hard to find using search toggle.

title: Zendesk is picking up their game.
overall_text: Pros:I like the new reporting options.It has saved me SO much time.
pros_text: Cons:I absolutely hated the previous reporting.Having to drill in and figure out how to run simple reports was extremely painful.

title: Great SaaS Ticket System
overall_text: Pros:If you are needing to get a support desk up and running quickly, Zendesk is a great choice. The configuration is rather simple.
pros_text: Cons:This platform can get pricey depending on the options you choose and how many agents you have. I had wished that there was some more configuration available for some of the native fields.

title: Would Use Again - Needs Better Reporting/Support
overall_text: Pros:This is one of the easiest support options to learn and start using right away.Intuitive navigation and ease of use make this something that people at any level of support/customer care can pick up quickly and execute on their role well.
pros_text: Cons:There are really no deal-breaker cons to this software, rather I feel it depends on your intended purpose and integration needs. Reporting features could use some love and attention, but overall, you're really only limited by the capability of your team that would be integrating with existing systems.

title: Perfect solution to manage customer service.
overall_text: We had some problems to automate some tasks, but their customer service helped us to solve them, they are very professional.
pros_text: What I like most about Zendesk Suite is that it centralizes all the actions to be managed on the same platform.
cons_text: However, it takes a lot of effort to get the hang of it, but once you understand it, everything becomes very easy.

title: Zendesk is a powerful ticketing system
overall_text: Zendesk has effectively streamlined out ticketing process, and continues to be a powerful tool for my organization.
pros_text: Automations and Macros are a huge bonus for taking out the manual steps of moving tickets and setting up canned responses. You can integrate forms to fill out required fields in your tickets.It has greatly reduced our processes for ticket management, and has made life easier for our day to day users.
cons_text: The only con that I can think of is that it's a bit pricey on an user basis.Dropping the price per user would make it a complete win win in my opinion.

title: Zendesk Review
overall_text: Pros:For ticket raising,grievance, or for technical support, zendesk is lite and best
pros_text: Cons:Overall needs to add much more functionality

title: Seamless interactions with clients, across any platform.
overall_text: This has streamlined communications massively, and reduced my stress thinking I was missing something important! Well worth it.
pros_text: The killer feature of Zendesk is the multi platform communication. I get everything unified in one inbox, but the customer gets things back by whatever method they used. WhatsApp, Facebook, e-mail. Doesn't matter to me!
cons_text: It doesn't always manage to link a customers other tickets when they use a different contact method from last time. So occasionally I respond as if I've not had messages from them before when in fact I have. Not a big deal, but sometimes makes me look a little off the ball.

title: First Experience
overall_text: Pros:I have really enjoyed working with Zendesk. I find the ability and available options for customization and organization are a refreshing change. I have been surprised at the amount of help resources available for self help and found the company reps to be knowledgeable and quick to respond to my query's. Overall it has been a very positive experience.
pros_text: Cons:With Zendesk being so massive in it's scope, I continue to find little details that are simply overlooked. A good example of this is the function to auto assign/answer incoming chats, the function works perfectly but the chat windows open as small little bars on the bottom of the dashboard screen with no ability to change the behavior. I would like to have all chats tabbed in a separate window ( IM style) and open expanded when auto answered like they do when you manually answer them.

title: Ticket management was never easier than with Zendesk
overall_text: Pros:Ticketing and helping onboarding users was decidedly easy to use.
pros_text: Cons:No complaints at all, everything worked out of the box with little configuration required.

title: Usable product
overall_text: Pros:The built-in analytics and the search database function.
pros_text: Cons:The software is not very user friendly with ambiguous and hidden functions.

title: Easy way to track, maintain, follow up on, IT HelpDesk issues
overall_text: The ability to track any and all issues opened by customers in 1 easy to use platform
pros_text: Having a robust solution to track all issues from birth all the way to resolution. The ease of use of the platform was what I liked best.
cons_text: ZenDesk is so big that it becomes hard to feel like your individual companies' issues or customizations needed are anything close to a priority

title: Zendesk is the best
overall_text: Pros:The ease of use, it is such a remarkable platform and I wish everyone would use it.
pros_text: Cons:I wish it could integrate with our project tracking and billing hours.

title: Very nice customer service and support platform
overall_text: In my experience, Zendesk Suite is effective platform for managing customer service and support. The platform's user-friendly interface and wide range of features make it easy to track and resolve customer issues.
pros_text: The integration with other tools, such as CRM platforms. One of the best features of Zendesk Suite is its knowledge management tools, which allow businesses to create and share knowledge bases and support documentation with customers and team members. This can be a major time-saver for customer service teams, as it allows them to quickly access the information they need to resolve issues.
cons_text: Depending on the subscription plan Zendesk Suite can be a relatively expensive . It's important to carefully evaluate the features and capabilities of the platform to ensure that it aligns with your needs and budget.

title: Zendesk - All In Suite
overall_text: Pros:I enjoy the UI. It's simple and intuitive.
pros_text: Cons:I do not like having to use multiple applications. Zendesk solves this issue for me.

title: Maravilhoso
overall_text: Pros:Gostos dos produtos da Zendesk ajudam milhares de pessoas pelo mundo. As ferramentas são incríveis e super fácil de operar.
pros_text: Cons:Acredito que interface poderia ser mais limpa, clara e objetiva. Isso ajudaria os usuários a utilizar a ferramenta

title: Excellente support software
overall_text: I enjoy working with Zendesk, it's UI gives me a great work atmosphere.
pros_text: I like how Zendesk have different support tools like chat and emails.
cons_text: When it gets too cluttered it sometimes gets a bit slow.

title: A Customer Service Must
overall_text: Pros:Zendesk makes customer outreach easier than ever. As tickets and emails come in, Zendesk allows us to sort them by priority and get to what matters first. We only recently moved over to Zendesk, but I have been extremely impressed with the plug-ins and add-ons that are available to take Zendesk even higher.
pros_text: Cons:None! After working with Zendesk a few years ago, and taking a break to test a few different programs, I can confidently say that Zendesk is the best option on the market today.

title: Great customer service software
overall_text: We use Zendesk for our customer support
pros_text: Ticketing system works perfectly. Pricing is pretty affordable. User interface is very friendly and intuitive. Does not take a lot of time to be a PRO user.
cons_text: Not a lot of things I do not like about Zendesk.The one think I can mention is that it would be great to have an option to attach large files to tickets.

title: Good for managing customer support tickets and self-service knowledge base
overall_text: Pros:Zendesk has helped to make it easy to manage our support and customer queries. The dashboard is easy to use and intuitive once you've spent a little time in the platform. It's helped to improve the communication around customer support between teams, and with our customers.
pros_text: Cons:Because it's so customizable it can take a long time to set this up in a way that really works well for your team and customers. It definitely needs someone internally to manage the processes around using this.

title: Easier to Cancel your Credit Card than Try and Cancel with Zendesk
overall_text: Pros:Easy to use interface for ticket support management
pros_text: Cons:Canceling or downgrading is worse than pulling teeth. [SENSITIVE CONTENT] (tried chatting to get a rep to help cancel our account before renewal) closed out my chat request without a response after asking what I needed. Terrible sales service. You cannot adjust your seats without getting to someone and they just shut down their email so you have to either use the chat app in the service or find a link on their helpdesk for another chat..

title: Zendesk makes life easier
overall_text: Overall we are very pleased with this product.
pros_text: this is the best software for tracking tickets and running a support department. All of the features allow us to quickly address customers problems escalate them to the appropriate departments and solve issues with efficiency and ease.
cons_text: The user interface can use some improvement it would be a lot better if more thought went into the graphics and placement of fields throughout the screens.

title: Fantastic Help Desk Software
overall_text: Pros:I love the emails that go out to the end-user/customer. They're fantastically designed and very easy to read and follow.
pros_text: Cons:It feels like Zendesk nickels and dimes you for features.

title: Great record keeping
overall_text: Great platform. Great tool.
pros_text: Zendesk does a great job of keeping a concise timeline of what happened for any support ticket. I think my favorite part is that when a technician calls its recorded. Makes it clear what happened in the past. Nothing left out.
cons_text: Cant think of one,there has not been a part of the software I found lacking.

title: Made my job easier when needing to handle multiple issues at once
overall_text: It was more of a help than a headache.
pros_text: The software has few “bugs” and it was very user friendly. It enables me to be present for anyone currently in person before me as well as chat with potential tenants and set the tours.
cons_text: As a leasing manager, I found this to be lacking in terms of notifying someone that there is an unanswered issue.

title: zendesk live chat is one of the best software that can be used for business purposes.
overall_text: Pros:zendesk chat has easy to use interface.Also, you can integrate it into your website by following some simple steps. It allows you to interact with your clients on live chat and answer their queries in just minimum seconds.
pros_text: Cons:In free plan you can only serve one chat at a time. To serve concurrent chats you have to opt for their paid plan.

title: Amazing product
overall_text: Pros:This one is the one we relly on the most and for a good reason. It helps us keep track of the tickets and their status.
pros_text: Cons:Absolutely no problems, love it and use it all the time!

title: Improvement of productivity when sharing communication.
overall_text: Improves the management of information and communication both inside and outside the company, helping ease the management of it.
pros_text: The ease of communicating both public and private information, its practical design, intuitive and organized together its effectiveness at the time of creating macros to expedite the sending of information without the need to have advanced knowledge in the area of computer science. Allow the visualization of Zendesk management statistics and establish comparisons of my company in relation to others, allowing in turn to compare with different market areas that use Zendesk.
cons_text: Not have the availability to send BBC in addition to having to download a separate program to have this and various functions that should come by default in Zendesk, at the time of creating the macros can not add emails that are outside the Zendesk systems.

title: Great for ticket management and storing knowledgebase!

pros_text: Cons:Nothing about the software that I did not like, but could be the pricing, it can get expensive if you need multiple admins.

title: Zendesk suite: A complete customer solution support Desk
overall_text: Good
pros_text: Easy to use,Ticket management,API interface,chat bot
cons_text: Zendesk guide customizationand Zendesk setup could be improved

title: Zendesk Review
overall_text: Excellent
pros_text: Likes the fact that it can be integrated with numerous app,
cons_text: Can be costly to take advantage of all the features.

title: Simple to use support ticketing application
overall_text: it allowed us to host our support portal and knowledge base in one system. we could automate responses to customers based on keywords they sent in their support tickets that reduced our need to personally answer each and every ticket
pros_text: Internal/external messages make chats in a support ticket easierSimple to use and find our way around (great organisation)Allowed us to provide a knowledge base of FAQs easily to our customers
cons_text: ExpensiveQuite difficult to email external people out of support cases (i.e people not connected to the ticket)

title: Awesome Suite of products
overall_text: Pros:We have been using zendesk for more than two years and love it. It's the best tool for our customer support staff.
pros_text: Cons:None. We love it and use it everyday. Makes out life simple.

title: Use this product everyday!
overall_text: Pros:I love the functionality and that you are able to curate canned responses to be applied. This makes responding to customers 10 times easier and a most faster process. I also appreciate that I am able to track the email I just sent as well, for notation purposes.
pros_text: Cons:Frequently I have noticed that the eyeball feature will not populate when someone is currently on a ticket within Zendesk. Which causes a few issues in regards to two employees being in the same email at the same time.

title: ZenDesk: The Helpdesk King?
overall_text: Pros:The customization of the software is awesome. The software has good reporting and very easy to navigate. It is also user- friendly.

cons_text: Reasons for Choosing Zendesk Suite:The team collectively decided on ZenDesk because we didn’t know anything about Desk.com

title: Great for Service
overall_text: Pros:Alleviates pressure from our staff and helps us focus on critical issues
pros_text: Cons:Haven’t really had bad experiences quite yet

title: best crm
overall_text: i can easily find what i need without any issues
pros_text: integrated into various softwares we use
cons_text: none i have no complaints about zendesk

title: Software semplice molto utile
overall_text: Pros:Utilizzo questo software per la gestione dei ticket all'interno della mia azienda. Ha molte funzionalità ed è molto facile da usare.Si possono implementare molti automatismi, come ad esempio il fatto che quando arriva un ticket, venga assegnato in automatico ad un agente deciso in anticipo.Lo trovo davvero utile perché ci permette di gestire i ticket che arrivano non molta facilità. Inoltre ha anche la possibilità di consultare e creare delle statistiche riguardanti i ticket e gli agenti.
pros_text: Cons:Alcune funzionalità sono un po' più difficili da comprendere e da implementare e la parte reportistica potrebbe essere un po' migliorata.

title: Perfect for Customer Service - Alright as a Project Management Tool
overall_text: Pros:It's certainly versatile. We use it for our internal ticketing system instead of its intentional application as a customer service platform. I love the options we have for responding to tickets in app, web, or via email.
pros_text: Cons:We're not able to assign more than one person at a time to a ticket which can slow down ticket speed.

title: Allows for multiple uses
overall_text: I assisted with implementation in the department and creating knowledge base answers. The overall installment and training was straight forward and easy.
pros_text: The software itself fills most, if not all intake need for customer service related departments. It keeps all customer information in one place which creates better organization within the department.
cons_text: There are still fixes that need to be made to create a smoother process like being able to create a note within the email without having to create a separate entry.

title: A great tool for your overall customer support needs
overall_text: Pros:Zendesk provides a host of services and functionalities ranging from onsite chat, ticketing system, IVR (powered by third party) etc which was needed for our business customer support requirements.
pros_text: Cons:Zendesk, however extensive, lacked a few critical third party integrations which were a must for us as a business.
cons_text: Switched From:Conversational Cloud

title: Zopim Chat
overall_text: Pros:This is a very powerful tool for web based business. Our customers use this regularly to reach out to a sales rep, or get questions answered.
pros_text: Cons:Very few cons with this product, it works as it should. It does require you have a few sales reps to manage the inbound chats, some days are busier than others. Im sure there is a way to create a queue.

title: Great tool for customer service management
overall_text: Great program overall, clean looking, and very responsive.
pros_text: Great way to answer tickets quickly and broadly. You have lots of viewpoints and perspectives to see which clients need assistance first and which items have been left on hold for extended periods of time.
cons_text: I wish there were more than just email responses I can give to the client. An interactive manner for surveys or multiple choice questions to provide to the client in a survey format would be beneficial.

title: Been using Zendesk as our ticket system for years
overall_text: Pros:It's pretty straight forward. It really helps keep all our tickets and emails organized.
pros_text: Cons:Wish it had more features such as being able to upload or read attachments over 1MB.

title: Poor tool for internal communication
overall_text: Pros:You could add as much details to a ticket, however, it is not a good platform for internal communication between teams
pros_text: Cons:It treates every message interaction as a a whole new ticket. It does not allow one to create group chats, or rooms easily
cons_text: Switched From:Microsoft Teams

title: Software that assists and helps improve customer service efficiency.
overall_text: My customers and employees don't have to wait long to get answers to their concerns. They have all the information they want in real time.
pros_text: The availability of several languages is a huge asset. In addition, it is very practical and easy to use. We have a possibility to create tickets automatically. I recommend it because the trial period is one month.
cons_text: Being a novice with the tool, I am satisfied with the results because they meet my expectations.

title: Ideal Helpdesk Application
overall_text: Pros:What I appreciate most in Zendesk is the live chat option, that is unique when compared to other helpdesk systems. The user interface is neat and friendly and the cost is affordable
pros_text: Cons:It is impossible to customize reports from the UI front end. You need to manipulate the back end services for this, requiring the services of an expert

title: The most frequently used helpdesk software
overall_text: Pros:Zendesk is the most frequently used helpdesk software to better comprehend client issues. It has excellent characteristics including multi-channel assistance such as email, phone, chat and social media help. It has a very solid accounting and sophisticated analytics that helps to comprehend the customer's needs. It focuses primarily on the customer's demands. It has very excellent customer-facing user interface and very user-friendly alternatives for navigating across distinct alternatives and interactive workflow that enables us fully comprehend the pending issues.
pros_text: Cons:Certain features like chat support is not integrated directly to the dashboard.

title: Zendesk has Robust Features & is Simple to Administer
overall_text: Overall, my experience with Zendesk has been very positive. The software is highly intuitive and the resources are phenomenal.
pros_text: The features and functionality out-of-the-box are ready to use for a Support team, but there is so much customization available, that we are able to implement workflows/routing and customized fields simply and easily. I have been very impressed by the available Knowledge Base and Community for answering my questions about functionality and best practices. Zendesk Support has also been a fantastic resource!
cons_text: I dislike that there is not more customization available for the CSAT survey (either the survey itself or the frequency). I had to add a complicated recipe of custom user field + trigger + automation + modifying the existing CSAT automation to reduce the satisfaction survey frequency.

title: Zendesk Suite Review!
overall_text: Zendesk is very easy to use. Really good for the business! I can recommend this software to all customer service businesses.
pros_text: This is friendly user. You can easily track the SLA especially your open tickets. It is also good for monitoring your CSATs.
cons_text: Sometimes, there are difficulty about tags.

title: A Great Way to offer Top Notch Customer Service
overall_text: Overall, as an employee that uses this software at work, I find that it is easier and more efficient to help customers with their questions and concerns.
pros_text: I work a company that utilizes Zendesk to communicate with customers via the chat feature. I can communicate with customers in real time to solve problems, place orders, check order status, or answer general questions. It has changed the way we communicate with a customers. Phone calls and being on hold with a representative can be daunting so this feature really helps.
cons_text: At first it can be intimidating to use as an employee for a company that uses this software. There is a multiple different features we can use to get the right information for the user. It took time to navigatethe system. I do not see any negatives on the customers side.

title: Zendesk In Their Bag
overall_text: Great for business
pros_text: Its comprehensive set of features, including advanced analytics and automation, empowers businesses to deliver seamless customer experiences.
cons_text: Zendesk Suite can be overwhelming for small businesses due to its extensive features and steep learning curve.

title: Zendesk Suite Customer Support review
overall_text: Overall, Zendesk Suite is pretty awesome. I can provide assistance to multiple customers at a time unlike in phone support. Being able to use template is also another great feature
pros_text: I like the fact that you can customize or personalize the notification settings like the alert tones. I also like that you can easily share photos or files to customers.
cons_text: I would like to have a more aggressive desktop notification feature that way I will not miss any chat request.

title: Works but has flaws
overall_text: Pros:I like the ease of seeing your own personal profile and your tickets.
pros_text: Cons:Merging tickets can be super confusing.

title: Zendesk for IT Help Desk Ticketing Systems is the Way to Go for Ease of Use
overall_text: Its a great software becuase it works! I have used software with all kinds of bells and whistles that barely get the job done. Matter a fact, here comes a ticket now!
pros_text: I like how its cross platform compatible with both cellular devices and personal pcs. I always have access to support tickets that come through Zendesk while on the go.
cons_text: I only wish that the software had more user functionality. The mobile version of Zendesk seems like it was rushed and it just lacks something that I cant put words to other than rushed!

title: Excellent tool for our customer experience
overall_text: Pros:Zendesk helps us improve and track all of your customer relationships, since it enables is to make a chat window in our website, integrates with facebook messenger and we also track support tickets. It's amazing.
pros_text: Cons:Actually I don't have anything to complain about, maybe it could have a slightly better interface, although it's good enough.

title: Great for Customer Service Businesses
overall_text: I would recommend ZenDesk to all businesses in the customer service industry. Helps with faster response times, easy forms to fill out to help narrow down what the task or issue at hand is, easy to communicate both internally and externally
pros_text: Helpful features and easy for both internal and external users to use on a daily basis
cons_text: Some quirks and glitches make some tasks difficult

title: An efficient customer service ticketing and help desk system
overall_text: - Efficiency in handling customer's requests- Provides a help center for your customers- Affordable for a small business
pros_text: I liked the fact that Zendesk has a lot of options for customer support.You can create tickets, adding users and software. Zendesk also provides a help center where your customers can access a bunch of resources like FAQ's.
cons_text: What I liked least about this software is the fact that it is not that that easy to learn how to use it. It's interface seems a bit complicated for new users.

title: Get Chat Functionality!
overall_text: It really helps our team and empowers the customer to get the answer they're looking for before asking someone.That functionality then allows a lower number of calls and chats which is great for our support team. Overall, it's a great tool and I'd highly recommend it if you have a high number of calls or chats.
pros_text: We absolutely love the chat widget that Zendesk offers. It helps our sales and support team decide who needs what and if they need to be passed to a different department, person, etc. The best part is really the help option which allows the person to try to find the answer they are looking for before they're passed to an actual person.
cons_text: I think the only thing that we really dislike is the confusion of open tickets and closed tickets that are sent to the customer. They don't realize that it's a ticketing system so sometimes it creates unnecessary confusion and questions.

title: Reliable system for customer support tickets
overall_text: Excellent support system for teams or any project!
pros_text: Zendesk is a the most comprehensive system for tracking, prioritizing and solving customer support tickets for the best customer experiences.
cons_text: I wish they had more customization as sometimes we need to fine tune some elements for our custom operations, hope they can fix this sooner or later.

title: Best ticketing system out there
overall_text: Pros:Everything -- customer support, features, friendly UI!
pros_text: Cons:Pricing and some features that come bundled with (we like built in chat support, but not everything else included!)

title: Customer Support Portal - ZenDesk
overall_text: Pros:Excellent product for end users communication via emails, chat. track all support issues under one umbrella. Best feature i like about this product is you can prioritize and organize support tickets.
pros_text: Cons:Process for integrations via tickets received via different channels like emails, chat and phone calls is very difficult. Zendesk shall monitor all tickets data and provide suggestions for ease of monitoring end users.

title: An effective tool for managing support tickets
overall_text: Pros:I appreciate the ability to track a conversation with a customer including interactions with multiple team members, and the ability to merge tickets when a customer might contact us multiple times with a similar issue. It helps keep our team up to date on everything to respond to even when ticket volume is high. While I don't need to check into all tickets on a regular basis, it's nice that I can quickly see the status of any ticket.
